Philip's Soldiers: Goddess Blessings akan memurnikan jiwamu seperti air yang bersih. {nl}[Oracle Master] Apolonia Barbora

Philipas' Soldier: You will receive blessings if you offer reed flowers. {nl}Offer the reed flowers that can be found near the Purple Tree Fault Forest's Farewell Bridge. {nl}The grace of the goddess be with you, always. {nl}-- Manager : [Druid Master] Gina Greene
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan menerima Blessings bila menyumbangkan Reed Flowers. {nl}Sumbangkan Reed Flowers yang bisa ditemukan di dekat Purple Tree Fault Forest's Farewell Bridge. {nl}Semoga Goddess' Blessing selalu bersamamu. {nl}-- Manager : [Druid Master] Gina Green

Philipas' Soldier: You must offer money to the Sanctum. {nl}The blessings of the goddess will be with you. {nl}May you receive the grace of the goddess. {nl}-- Manager : [Pardoner Master] Maistes Goldmunt
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus menyumbangkan uang kepada Sanctum. {nl}Semoga Goddess Blessings bersamamu. {nl}Dan juga semoga kamu diberikan karunia oleh Goddess. {nl}-- Manager : [Pardoner Master] Maistes Goldmunt

Philipas' Soldier: Pay worship to this Sanctum. {nl}The blessings of the goddess will be with those who lay themselves low. {nl}May the grace of the goddess be with you in your ordeals. {nl}--Manager : [Krivis Master] Hercus
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoalah di Sanctum ini. {nl}Semoga Goddess Blessings bersama orang - orang baik. {nl}Semoga Blessings of Goddess bersamamu di setiap cobaan. {nl}--Manager : [Krivis Master] Hercus

Philipas' Soldier: Sanctum
Philip's Soldiers: Sanctum

Philipas' Soldier: Will you offer money and receive blessings?
Philip's Soldiers: Maukah kamu menyumbangkan uang dan menerima Blessing?

Philipas' Soldier: Find goods to use for offering.
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan beberapa barang untuk sumbangkan.

Philipas' Soldier: You need more goods.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu butuh lebih banyak barang.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard that the Purple Tree Fault Forest was damaged by Naktis. {nl}But I didn't know that even the sanctuariues would not function.. I feel bad and angry.
Philip's Soldiers: Kudengar bahwa Purple Tree Fault Forest dirusak oleh Naktis. {nl}Tapi Aku tidak mengetahui bahwa banyak Sanctuary yang tidak berfungsi.. Aku merasa sedih dan marah.

Philipas' Soldier: Take this holy water and spray it on the Sanctum. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ambilah air suci ini dan semprotkan pada Sanctum. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I hope this will be enough to purify it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kuharap ini akan cukup untuk memurnikannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope the Sanctum will be back to normal. {nl}I trust that with you, it will work out well but... Naktis and the Great Cathedral...
Philip's Soldiers: Kuharap Sanctum akan kembali normal. {nl}Aku percayakan kepadamu, itu akan bekerja dengan baik tapi.. Naktis dan Cathedral..

Philipas' Soldier: Goddess Vakarine Statue of Purple Tree Fault Forest? There are many, but one of them is broken..? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Goddess Vakarine Statue dari Purple Tree Fault Forest? Ada banyak, tapi salah satunya ada yang rusak..? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That's strange. It could be dangerous. {nl}We only have one Goddess Statue in Purple Tree Fault Forest. {nl}Well anyways, since you say it's not functioning..
Philip's Soldiers: Aneh. Ini bisa jadi berbahaya. {nl}Kami hanya memiliki satu Statue of Goddess di Purple Tree Fault Forest. {nl}Lagipula, karena kamu berkata itu tidak berfungsi..

Philipas' Soldier: It might have taken a part of the statue so hunt the monsters nearby. {nl}If my prediction is right, then it must be Naktis' act. {nl}I was away but I've been getting the news. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Monster mungkin telah mengambil bagian dari Statue jadi burulah para monster di sekitarnya. {nl}Jika prediksiku benar, ini pasti perbuatan Naktis. {nl}Aku sedang pergi tapi Aku telah mendapatkan beritanya. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you find water nearby, then try to stick the plaster piece. {nl}There seems to be a problem in the Great Cathedral...
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Kamu menemukan air di dekatnya, kemudian cobalah untuk menempelkan Plaster Piece. {nl}Sepertinya ada masalah di Cathedral..

Philipas' Soldier: You might have heard about it but since Gesti's defeat, Naktis has been trying to prove her position under Gesti by entering the Great Cathedral. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mungkin telah mendengar tentang hal ini namun semenjak kekalahan Gesti, Naktis mencoba untuk membuktikan posisinya menggantikan Gesti dengan memasuki Cathedral. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That's why she's been ransacking the Pilgrim's Way which is rumored to have the clues. {nl}It will be a difficult journey for you..
Philip's Soldiers: Itu sebabnya ia memeriksa jalur pilgrim yang dikabarkan memiliki petunjuk untuk memasukinya. {nl}Ini akan menjadi perjalanan yang sulit untukmu..

Philipas' Soldier: I feel bad that I can't go with you as I have things to do here. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasa bersalah tidak bisa pergi bersamamu karena ada banyak hal yang harus dilakukan di sini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I wish you luck.
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga berhasil.

Philipas' Soldier: You mean the Sanctum in Purple Tree Fault Forest? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Maksudmu Sanctum yang berada di Purple Tree Fault Forest? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, I heard the rumors but is it that bad?
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, Aku mendengar rumornya tapi apakah sebegitu gawatnya?

Philipas' Soldier: I guess Naktis is not an easy Demon Lord. {nl}Sounds like the the Sanctum is polluted by monsters near it. {nl}Find the badge of the Sanctum from the monsters nearby and burn it in front of the Sanctum. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kurasa Naktis bukanlah Demon Lord yang mudah. {nl}Kedengarannya Sanctum tercemar oleh monster di sekitarnya. {nl}Carilah Badge of Sanctum dari para monster di sekitar dan bakarlah di depan Sanctum. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Even if the Sanctum is purified, it might not turn back to it's original form but it will function again.
Philip's Soldiers: Walau Sanctum dimurnikan, mungkin tidak akan kembali ke bentuk aslinya namun itu bisa berfungsi kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Naktis must be looking for clues for entering the Great Cathedral. {nl}If my prediction is right, it's not only the Purple Tree Fault Forest but all of Pilgrim's Way that must be that way. {nl}If you do reach the Cathedral, please defeat Naktis. {nl}We have to stop the demons from getting their hand on the goddess' revelations.
Philip's Soldiers: Naktis sedang mencari petunjuk untuk memasuki Cathedral.{nl} Jika perkiraanku benar, bukan hanya Purple Tree Fault Forest tetapi sampai seluruh tempat di Pilgrim Way. {nl} Jika tuan Savior sampai ke Cathedral, tolong habisilah Naktis. {nl} Kamu harus menghalangi Revelation of Goddess agar tidak jatuh ke tangan Demon.

Philipas' Soldier: You must burn it at the sanctum. Please.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus membakarnya di sanctum. Kumohon.

Philipas' Soldier: Will you fetch clear water?
Philip's Soldiers: Akankah Kamu mengambil Clear Water?

Philipas' Soldier: Will you prove your faith by offering flowers?
Philip's Soldiers: Akankah Kamu membuktikan keyakinan Kamu dengan menyumbangkan flower?

Philipas' Soldier: Will you prove your faith by offering money?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan membuktikan keyakinan Kamu dengan menyumbangkan uang?

Philipas' Soldier: That purifier should be enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Purifier itu seharusnya cukup.

Philipas' Soldier: What? Me? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa? Aku? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}What was it? What was I doing...? {nl}I think Naktis told me to stay here...{nl}And I was just hungry...
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Apa ini? Apa yang kulakukan ..? {nl}Kurasa Naktis memintaku untuk tinggal di sini.. {nl}Dan aku hanya merasa lapar..

Philipas' Soldier: This place is done. {nl}All crystals have mutated. {nl}We must do everything we can to turn back the crystals.
Philip's Soldiers: Tamat sudah tempat ini. {nl} Semua Crystal bermutasi. {nl}Kita harus melakukan apapun yang kita bisa untuk mengembalikan Crystal itu seperti semula.

Philipas' Soldier: Please save me. {nl}I didn't know the crystals will be like this. {nl}I feel like slowly dying.{nl}Anyone passing through this place must be careful of the crystals.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong selamatkan aku. {nl}Aku tidak tahu Crystal-crystal itu akan seperti ini. {nl}Aku merasa seperti mati perlahan. {nl}Siapapun yang melewati tempat ini harus berhati-hati dari Crystal-crystal itu.

Philipas' Soldier: If you don't destroy it
Philip's Soldiers: Bila kamu tidak menghancurkannya

Philipas' Soldier: I guess I'm dying. {nl}If you're passing through, be careful. {nl}All the Tree Root Crystals are threatening you. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kurasa aku sekarat. {nl}Jika kamu melewatinya, berhati-hatilah. {nl}Semua Tree Root Crystals akan mengincarmu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you don't disband or destroy it, you might be cursed. {nl}The curse of Demon Lord that killed me.
Philip's Soldiers: Bila kamu tidak menghancurkannya, kamu mungkin akan terkena kutukan. {nl}Kutukan Demon Lord yang membunuhku.

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilis

Philipas' Soldier: Uhh... a pilgrim? Oh... Are you the Revelator? You must have some questions for me, but I can't move. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Uhh.. Pilgrim? Oh.. Apakah Kamu seorang Savior? Sepertinya Kamu memiliki beberapa pertanyaan untukku tetapi saat ini Aku tidak dapat bergerak. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Water... I need water. Please bring me water.
Philip's Soldiers: Air.. Aku ingin ingin minum.. Tolong bawakan aku air.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't have the strength to explain in details but... I was fleeing with all the strength I had and became like this.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak punya detail penjelasan yang kuat tapi ..  Aku telah telah berhasil melarikan diri dengan sekuat tenaga dan aku jadi seperti ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I..can't even stand. I'll explain the rest after I get some water...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bahkan tidak bisa berdiri. Aku akan menjelaskan setelah aku minum air ini..

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe gathering some dew from the gravestones down south will help.
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin dengan mengumpulkan embun dari Pemakaman diselatan dapat membantu.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if it's from the gravestones, dew is still water... I can drink it.
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun itu berasal dari batu nisan, embun tetaplah air.. Aku masih dapat meminumnya..

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, please give me that. Thank you!
Philip's Soldiers: Beri, beri itu ke aku. Terima Kasih!

Philipas' Soldier: Woah, I think I can live now.
Philip's Soldiers: Woah, Aku pikir aku bisa hidup sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Hmm?
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Hmm?

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Uhm, are you planning to pass through here like that? {nl}No you can't. You might be cursed. {nl}I will make some medicine so take that at least before you go.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Uhm, kamu berencana meninggalkannya dengan cara seperti itu ? {nl}Tidak bisa kamu lakukan. Kamu akan dikutuk. {nl}Aku akan membuat beberapa ramuan yang nantinya akan kamu bawa sebelum kamu pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Arrgh, I don't have my bag. {nl}I didn't know I've lost it to the monsters while escaping.. {nl}Hey, if you find me my bag, then I'll make you a medicine that has immune effects against the curse.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Arrgh, Aku kehilangan tas. {nl}Aku tidak sadar kehilangan tas saat mencoba melarikan diri monster.. {nl}Hey, Jika kamu menemukan tas aku, aku akan membuatkan ramuan yang memiliki efek kekebalan terhadap kutukan.

Philipas' Soldier: It's a bag with all the tools to make the medicine.. {nl}Please find it.
Philip's Soldiers: Di dalam tas terdapat alat-alat untuk membuat ramuan.. {nl}Tolong temukan.

Philipas' Soldier: I am interested in different fields so I've learned some techniques.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tertarik pada beberapa bidang jadi aku belajar beberapa teknik.

Philipas' Soldier: Yes, that's the one. {nl}Give it to me!
Philip's Soldiers: Ya, itu salah satunya. {nl}Berikan pada ku!

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Looks everything is still left in the bag since it's not food! {nl}What a relief.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Semua masih terlihat didalam tas karena bukan berisi makanan! {nl}Apakah lega.

Philipas' Soldier: I will make you the medicine as promised. {nl}As long as you get me the ingredients...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berjanji akan membuatkan kamu ramuan obat.{nl} Selama kamu menemukan bahan-bahannya..

Philipas' Soldier: The Pretense Intersection is no longer a silent road of the pilgrims because of some wild monsters. {nl}All my colleagues who came for pilgrimage with me were attacked. {nl}I started my pilgrimage to decide on my job and mission. {nl}I had craftmanship since I was young and I was interested in medicinal herbs but you can't live doing everything you like. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: The Pretense tidak menemukan jalan yang sepi karena banyaknya monsters. {nl} Semua teman Aku yang datang berziarah dengan aku ikut diserang. {nl} Aku memulai ziarah keputusan aku sebagai pekerjaan dan misi.{nl}I had craftmanship since I was young and I was interested in medicinal herbs but you can't live doing everything you like. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I wanted to decide if I want to become a pharmacist, or blacksmith or tanner. {nl}I didn't know I would meet them just before reaching the Great Cathedral... {nl}I was not enticed by them because I took my secret medicine. {nl}Drawing out the greed in people and turning people into their servants.. You need to take the medicine so that you won't suffer from one of their servants.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan ambil keputusan aku akan datang ke pharmacist, atau blacksmith atau tanner. {nl}Aku tidak tahu kalau akan bertemu mereka sebelum mencapai Cathedral.. {nl}Aku tidak tertarik dengan mereka karena aku membawa obat sendiri. {nl}Menggambar keserakahan orang dan menjadikan orang pengikut mereka... kamu perlu minum obat sehingga kamu tidak akan menderita dari salah satu pelayan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters pesting on the roots of wide leafed reeds in Sestines Wilderness have the ingredient to the medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster pesting mengenai akar alang-alang berdaun lebar diseluruh Sestine Wilderness memiliki bahan untuk obat.

Philipas' Soldier: They are grumpy so be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka marah jadi berhati-hati..

Philipas' Soldier: Sorry that I can't go with you as my body did not fully recover.
Philip's Soldiers: Maaf aku tidak bisa ikut dengan kamu karena aku belum pulih sepenuhnya..

Philipas' Soldier: This is the one! Wait for a while. {nl}Although my body is not well yet, I can do this much for someone who got me water...
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah salah satu ! Mohon tunggu sebentar. {nl}Meskipun tubuh Aku tidak belum baik, Aku bisa melakukan ini untuk seseorang yang membuatkan Aku air ..

Philipas' Soldier: How is it? {nl}Can you feel it? The effects come slowly..
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana? {nl}Bisa kamu rasakan? Efeknya datang perlahan..

Philipas' Soldier: Aside
Philip's Soldiers: Aside

Philipas' Soldier: I did drink it but is it really effective? {nl}Should I go and test it?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan meminumnya tetapi apakah itu benar-benar efektif? {nl} Haruskah aku pergi dan mengujinya?

Philipas' Soldier: Now that you've taken the medicine, you won't fall under the curse of her servants. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang kamu telah mengambil obatnya, kamu ingin berada di bawah kutukannya. {nl}. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If I may ask you a favor, there is this one guy full of greed who left for pilgrimage with me... {nl}If possible, please get him back to his senses like you did to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika aku mengatakan ke pada kamu rasannya, ada satu orang ini penuh keserakahan yang tersisa  ziarah dengan Aku .. {nl} Jika memungkinkan, silakan dia kembali ke akal sehatnya seperti yang kamu lakukan untuk Aku.

Philipas' Soldier: I do regret that I did not share the medicine with him.. {nl}The slight guilt...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyesal bahwa Aku tidak berbagi obat dengannya .. {nl} Sedikit rasa bersalah .. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Actually, he had some things that he treasured so maybe he might get back to his senses if you show him the things. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sebenarnya, ia memiliki beberapa hal yang berharga jadi mungkin dia bisa kembali ke akal sehatnya jika kamu menunjukkan kepadanya. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think the reason he lost his senses is because the trees and spring in Mirsta Lake was polluted. {nl}Just my assumption.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir alasan dia kehilangan akal sehatnya karena pohon dan musim semi yang terpolusi yang ada di Mirshita Pond. {nl} Itu hanya asumsiku.

Philipas' Soldier: While running away, I saw him drop something near the Meeting Plaza and gravestone of Wedroka Entrance. {nl}Maybe it's there somewhere...
Philip's Soldiers: Saat dia berlari menjauh, Aku melihatnya menjatuhkan sesuatu dekat Meeting Plaza dan gravestone of Wedroka Entrance. {nl} Mungkin ada disuatu tempat..

Philipas' Soldier: I think it was his mother's belongings. {nl}Although I don't know for sure.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir itu barang milik ibunya. {nl} Tapi aku tidak tahu pasti..

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Witas
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Witas

Philipas' Soldier: Arrg! Oh you? Why isn't my curse working? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Arrg! Oh kamu? Kenapa kutukan aku tidak bekerja? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Who are you? Even the beauty of the Succubus is not working?
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa kamu? Bahkan keindahan Succubus tidak bekerja?

Philipas' Soldier: Th-that? What is that? What is that in your hand? Give me that! {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ap.., Apa itu? Apa itu yang ada ditangan kamu? Berikan kepadaku!! {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Aaaak, aaakk, aaakk!!!
Philip's Soldiers: Aaaak, aaakk, aaakk!!!

Philipas' Soldier: This place is... Ah... {nl}That is my mother's portrait and handkerchief..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini .. Ah .. {nl} Itulah potret ibuku dan saputangan .. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: My mother gave it to me the day before I left my long journey for pilgrimage. {nl}Ah, mother...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ibuku memberikannya kepada aku hari sebelum aku pergi perjalanan panjang  untuk pilgrimage. {nl} Ah, ibu .. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for getting me back to my senses... {nl}I think I was delusioned to do wrong things to everyone who passed this place.{nl}What should I do for all my sins..
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih aku telah memperoleh kembali indraku .. {nl}Sepertinya aku berkhayal melakukan hal yang salah kepada semua orang yang melewati tempat ini. {nl} Apa yang harus aku lakukan untuk semua dosa-dosaku ..

Philipas' Soldier: Pretense Stream
Philip's Soldiers: Pretense Stream

Philipas' Soldier: Needs to be purified.
Philip's Soldiers: Needs to be purified.

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim soul that was trapped
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim soul yang terjebak

Philipas' Soldier: I was doing the things that I used to despise.. {nl}I am sorry... Being released... I should have thrown away my anger... {nl}I did harsh things to you...
Philip's Soldiers: aku melakukan hal-hal untuk membenci .. {nl} Aku minta maaf .. Yang dirilis .. harus buang kemarahan aku .. {nl} Aku melakukan hal-hal yang keras untuk kamu ..

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Yes.. Thank you for saving me. It's so nice like this...
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Yaa..Terima Kasih telah menyelamatkan aku. hal yang sangat baik seperti ini..

Philipas' Soldier: Trapped Soul
Philip's Soldiers: Soul that was trapped

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for finding my scriptures... {nl}I couldn't leave this world thinking about the one who tore the scriptures. {nl}Now I can... {nl}Thank you...
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih untuk menemukan scriptures aku .. {nl} Aku tidak bisa meninggalkan dunia ini karena memikirkan orang yang merobek scriptures ini. {nl} Sekarang Aku bisa .. {nl} Terima kasih ..

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim's Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Spirit

Philipas' Soldier: I can't forgive the betrayers... {nl}I should stop here. {nl}This is something that I don't need anymore...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa memaafkan pengkhianat .. {nl} Aku harus berhenti di sini. {nl} Ini adalah sesuatu yang Aku tidak perlu lagi ..

Philipas' Soldier: Who are you? Are you dazzled by the beauty of the Succubus?
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa kamu? Apakah kamu terpukau oleh keindahan Succubus?

Philipas' Soldier: They made me fall into their temptation. {nl}I think it was to curse everyone passing through here and to look for a clue. {nl}Funny that I can't remember it anymore...
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka membuat aku jatuh ke dalam percobaan mereka. {nl} Aku pikir itu untuk mengutuk semua orang yang melewati sini dan untuk mencari petunjuk. {nl} Lucu bahwa Aku tidak ingat lagi ..

Philipas' Soldier: I wanted to do a lot of things. {nl}Still same though.. {nl}That's why there was many talks about it. {nl}I'm really talkative for someone who does not have a normal body, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin melakukan banyak hal. {nl} Masih sama meskipun .. {nl} Itu sebabnya ada banyak pembicaraan tentang hal itu. {nl} Aku benar-benar bicara untuk seseorang yang tidak memiliki tubuh normal, kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, are you done? {nl}The trees and springs here.. Are the source that can keep the Pretense Intersection clean. {nl}What happened...
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, yang kamu lakukan? {nl} Pohon-pohon dan mata air di sini .. Apakah sumber yang dapat menjaga sambilan temu bersih. {nl} Apa yang terjadi ..

Philipas' Soldier: According to eyewitnesses, something huge and very scary appeared. {nl}It's face seemed like it's all cracked and had thing fingers. {nl}Considering the surroundings here, I think it's more likely that it's plant type than animal type.
Philip's Soldiers: Menurut saksi mata, sesuatu yang besar dan sangat menakutkan muncul. {nl} Wajahnya tampak seperti itu semua retak dan memiliki jari. {nl} Mengingat lingkungan di sini, Aku pikir itu lebih ke jenis tanaman bukan  jenis hewan.

Philipas' Soldier: You should study the mosses first if you want to study huge plants like that. {nl}Well then, thanks!
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama kamu harus mempelajari lumut jika kamu ingin mempelajari tanaman besar seperti itu. {nl} Baiklah, terima kasih!

Philipas' Soldier: Where will I head to next after this?
Philip's Soldiers: Dimana aku harus menuju setelah ini?

Philipas' Soldier: There must be many rocks with mosses if you go to the deserted ferry. {nl}I want you to get it from different places.
Philip's Soldiers: Di sana pasti ada banyak batu dengan lumut jika kamu pergi ke deserted ferry. {nl} Aku ingin kau mendapatkannya dari tempat yang berbeda.

Philipas' Soldier: Mosses are indicator plants. {nl}Which means you can study the mosses to guess certain pollutants.
Philip's Soldiers: Lumut adalah tanaman indikator. {nl} Yang berarti kamu harus dapat mempelajarinya untuk menebak polutan tertentu.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, nice. {nl}Fresh and looks good enough so this should do!
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, bagus. {nl} segar dan terlihat cukup baik sehingga ini akan melakukan!

Philipas' Soldier: I heard from the soldier in felled area that there is many discolored grass there. {nl}It's not like the weather is cold for it to freeze nor was it colored... What do you think?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendengar dari Soldier di daerah felled area bahwa ada ada banyak rumput berubah warna. {nl} Ini bukan seperti cuaca dingin untuk itu untuk membekukan atau itu berwarna .. Apa yang kamu pikirkan?

Philipas' Soldier: I heard the strange grass is in Naudingas Felled Area. {nl}What a relief that you're here. Haha.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendengar rumput aneh di Naudingas Felled Area. {nl} Sungguh lega bahwa kamu di sini. Ha ha.

Philipas' Soldier: Naudangis Felled Area is not that far from here. {nl}But the Vubbes will keep chasing you so better be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Naudangis Felled Area berada tidak jauh dari sini. {nl} Tapi Vubbes akan terus mengejar kamu jadi lebih baik hati-hati.

Philipas' Soldier: You plan to cross this forest? {nl}You can't. This place is seriously dangerous!{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berencana untuk menyeberangi hutan ini? {nl} Kamu tidak bisa. Tempat ini sangat berbahaya! {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ahh, I'm Scott. {nl}I'm a member of the Highlander and Peltasta Masters' joint investigation team. {nl}We were ordered to investigate what's happening in here.
Philip's Soldiers: Ahh, aku Scott. {nl} Aku anggota dari Highlander Master dan tim investigasi gabungan Peltasta Master's . {nl}Kami diperintahkan untuk menyelidiki apa yang terjadi di sini.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard that you have great abilities. {nl}So if you insist that you must cross this area... Why don't you just help our investigation?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendengar bahwa kamu memiliki kemampuan besar. {nl} Jadi, jika kamu bersikeras bahwa kamu harus melintasi daerah ini .. Mengapa kamu tidak membantu penyelidikan kami?

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, now we're talking. I like you. Haha. {nl}First, get me some tree barks those Vubbes are carrying around. {nl}The Vubbes won't carry around tree barks for no reason, don't you think? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, sekarang kita berbicara. Aku suka kamu. Ha ha. {nl} Pertama, dapatkan beberapa pohon Vubbes sekitar yang menanggis. {nl} The Vubbes tidak akan di sekitar kulit pohon tanpa alasan, jangan kamu berpikir? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Vubbes are spread all over the area. {nl}They go around in groups so you better be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Vubbes tersebar di seluruh daerah. {nl} Mereka pergi berkelompok sehingga  lebih baik hati-hati.

Philipas' Soldier: First, I will investigate because it's fishy but... {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama, aku akan investigasi karena itu mencurigakan tapi.. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You don't think the Vubbes are up to something, do you? {nl}They are too dumb for that...
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak berpikir Vubbes yang sampai ada sesuatu, kan? {nl} Ada terlalu bodoh untuk itu ..

Philipas' Soldier: You're even better than I thought! {nl}We'll get something if we investigate this. We better do because you brought it!
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bahkan lebih baik daripada yang Aku pikir! {nl} Kita akan mendapatkan sesuatu jika kita menyelidiki ini. Lebih baik kami lakukan karena kamu membawanya!

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Hmm, first, can you deliver the investigations here to Frey?{nl}He's not far from here so you'll find him easily.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl} Hmm, pertama, bisa kamu berikan penyelidikan ini untuk Frey? {nl} Dia tidak jauh dari sini sehingga kamu akan menemukannya dengan mudah.

Philipas' Soldier: It's very unusual like I suspected. {nl}I can feel something evil... It'll need some time to figure it out.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sangat tidak biasa seperti Aku curiga. {nl} Aku bisa merasakan sesuatu yang jahat .. Ini akan memerlukan beberapa waktu untuk mencari tahu.

Philipas' Soldier: I will look for evidence to who instigated it while you destroy the flag. {nl}Although we didn't catch who it was, I'm sure the demons intervened.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mencari bukti  yang menghasut  saat kamu menghancurkan bendera. {nl} Meskipun kita tidak menangkap siapa orang itu, Aku yakin demon ikut campur.

Philipas' Soldier: Good. I have one last favor to ask. {nl}Please defeat the Woodspirits. {nl}Then the rumors about something creepy showing up will be gone.
Philip's Soldiers: Baik. Aku punya satu kebaikan lalu bertanya. {nl} Silahkan mengalahkan Woodspirits. {nl} Kemudian rumor tentang sesuatu yang menyeramkan muncul akan hilang.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks. {nl}The Woodspirits were sighted in Atsylka Rest Area. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl} The Woodspirits yang terlihat di Atsylka. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: When this is over, we will trace and find out who did this. {nl}It may be a long fight..
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika ini berakhir, kita akan menelusuri dan mencari tahu siapa yang melakukan ini. {nl} Mungkin pertarungan yang sangat panjang ..

Philipas' Soldier: The demons intervening.. Feels like things are getting bigger. {nl}I think I should report this to the head when it is over. {nl}Frey will want to do it himself but it doesn't feel right. Something like it's a different level?
Philip's Soldiers: Intervensi The Demon .. Terasa seperti hal yang di besar-besarkan. {nl} Aku pikir Aku harus melaporkan hal ini ke kepala ketika selesai. {nl} Frey akan ingin melakukannya sendiri tetapi tidak merasa benar. Sesuatu seperti itu tingkat yang berbeda?

Philipas' Soldier: Haha... You're incredibly strong like Scott says, huh? {nl}I didn't imagine you'd defeat the Woodspirit this fast. {nl}I owe you one. Thank you very much. Let's meet again!
Philip's Soldiers: Haha .. Kau sangat kuat seperti yang dikatakan Scott, huh? {nl} Aku tidak membayangkan kamu akan mengalahkan Woodspirit ini dengan cepat. {nl} Aku berutang budi padamu. Terima kasih banyak. Sampai  bertemu kembali!

Philipas' Soldier: I have a favor. {nl}Can you take this Wing Fragment to our Owl Chief at Neuoder Field?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harus mendukung. {nl} Bisakah kamu mengambil ini bagian Akup ke komanda burung hantu kami di Neuoder Plains?

Philipas' Soldier: This Wing Fragment is the Brave Owl's. {nl}It's a very sad and painful thing.
Philip's Soldiers: Wing Fragment adalah Brave Owl. {nl} Ini adalah hal yang sangat menyedihkan dan menyakitkan.

Philipas' Soldier: This is a fragment of my friend's wing. {nl}It was broken off by the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah bagian dari Akup temanku. {nl} Ini rusak oleh monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Please. Deliver this Wing Fragment to the other owls. {nl}It still has the power of the goddess left in it so it will encourage them. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong. Memberikan Wing Fragment ke Owl lainnya. {nl} Ia masih memiliki kekuatan Goddess tersisa di dalamnya sehingga akan mendorong mereka. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This is a fragment of Owl Chief's wing... {nl}Thank you. We will continue to work hard!
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah bagian dari Owl Chief wing. {nl} Terima kasih. Kami akan terus bekerja keras!

Philipas' Soldier: The other owls are in Kongfiska Hill and Clover Highland. {nl}I believe that this strength will help at least a bit.
Philip's Soldiers: Owl lain di Konfiska Uphill dan Clover Plateau. {nl} Aku percaya bahwa kekuatan ini akan membantu setidaknya sedikit.

Philipas' Soldier: Isn't that a fragment of the chief's wing? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bukankah itu bagian dari chief wing? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Be careful. The monsters are flocking in!
Philip's Soldiers: Hati-hati. Monsternya berkelompok!

Philipas' Soldier: Patrol Scout
Philip's Soldiers: Patrol Scout

Philipas' Soldier: If you see an unlit bonfire, please light it again. {nl}This place is quite dark even during the day.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu melihat api unggun yang mati, nyalakan kembali. {nl} Tempat ini cukup gelap bahkan setiap hari.

Philipas' Soldier: May the grace of the goddess of fire, Gabija, be with the bonfire... {nl}This will make it last longer, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga karunia Fire Goddess Gabija bersama api unggun .. {nl} Ini akan membuatnya bertahan lebih lama, kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Writings on Pilgrim Memorial Stone
Philip's Soldiers: Writings on Pilgrim Memorial Stone

Philipas' Soldier: I'm a gravestone, the stroking hand. {nl}The sculptor placed me here as a sign of undying memory.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku adalah sebuah batu nisan, buatan tangan. {nl} Scultor  menempatkan aku di sini sebagai tKamu memori abadi. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: May you have light in your life.{nl}No sadness in your life. {nl}Life is an instant and time will take everything...
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin kamu memiliki cahaya dalam hidup kamu. {nl} Tidak ada kesedihan dalam hidup kamu. {nl} Hidup adalah instan dan waktu akan mengambil segala sesuatu ..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm requesting because there is a soul that I personally want. {nl}It's a soul with deep grudge. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku meminta karena ada soul yang Aku pribadi inginkan. {nl} Ini jiwa dengan dendam yang mendalam. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The two Soul Stones required to summon his soul can be found in the younger hill of the Siamese Twin Hills. {nl}Please hear my request.
Philip's Soldiers: Kedua Stones Jiwa diperlukan untuk memanggil jiwanya dapat ditemukan di bukit muda dari Siam Twin Hills. {nl} Silahkan mendengar permintaan Aku.

Philipas' Soldier: It was an altar long ago but now, it's just ruins. {nl}Life of man maybe is as futile as this.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu adalah altar lama tapi sekarang, itu hanya reruntuhan. {nl} Hidup manusia mungkin adalah sebagai sia-sia seperti ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, this brilliant color. {nl}Yes, this is it. You brought the right one.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, warna yang cemerlang ini. {nl} Ya, ini adalah itu. kamu membeli yang benar.

Philipas' Soldier: Look at this. What a pity. {nl}It's stuck in the Soul Stone yet craving from strength. {nl}But it isn't showing it's true colors yet. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Lihatlah ini. Kasian sekali. {nl} Ini terjebak di Batu Jiwa belum keinginan dari kekuatan. {nl} Tapi itu tidak menunjukkan warna aslinya belum. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But what I want is a pure soul. {nl}I want you to place the two soul stones in the holy box and purify it.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi apa yang Aku inginkan adalah jiwa yang murni. {nl} Aku ingin kamu untuk menempatkan dua batu jiwa dalam kotak suci dan menyucikan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: What could have possibly happened to make the soul become like that. {nl}Now it's just something that pollutes the holiness... {nl}Interesting.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang bisa mungkin terjadi untuk membuat jiwa menjadi seperti itu. {nl} Sekarang hanya sesuatu yang mencemari kesucian .. {nl} menarik.

Philipas' Soldier: The wandering of this pitiful soul will end here. {nl}I will keep this with me. {nl}Thank you for listening to the wish of this insignificant tree.
Philip's Soldiers: Jiwa mengembara yang menyedihkan ini akan berakhir di sini. {nl} Aku akan menjaga ini. {nl} Terima kasih untuk mendengarkan keinginan pohon ini.

Philipas' Soldier: The holy box is located in the older hill of the Siamese Twin Hills...
Philip's Soldiers: Kotak suci terletak di older hill of the Siamese Twin Hills..

Philipas' Soldier: Look at the Meduja Larvaes roaming around. Aren't they beautiful? {nl}Well, this is what I think. {nl}There must be a reason for these beautiful creatures to become wild and violent..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Lihatlah Meduja Larvae berkeliaran disekitar sini. Bukankah mereka indah? {nl}Baiklah, ini yang aku pikirkan. {nl}Pasti ada sebuah alasan makhluk indah ini berubah menjadi liar dan berbahaya..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The light of Meduja Larvae shine as they absorb memory of the souls roaming around. {nl}So can you gather the Meduja Larvaes?{nl}There are souls who I want to save and I need to read their memory in order to do so.
Philip's Soldiers: Cahaya Meduja Larvae bersinar karena mereka menyerap memory of the soul yang ada disekitar. {nl}Bisakah kamu mengumpulkan Meduja Larvae?{nl}Jiwa-jiwa itu akan aku simpan dan aku harus membaca memory mereka untuk melakukannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Meduja Larvae flee away if you approach them. Aren't they cute?
Philip's Soldiers: Meduja Larvae melarikan diri jika kamu mendekatinya. Bukankah mereka lucu?

Philipas' Soldier: These would be enough to read their memory. Hold on. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini cukup untuk membaca memory mereka. Tahan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I can feel the heart of the souls around here. {nl}It's near Bonewide Cliff, Sudetas Valley, Stone Hill and Duokliu Hall. {nl}Please check each one of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dapat merasakan heart of the soul disekitar sini. {nl}Dekat dengan Bone Wind Cliff, Sudjeti Stream, Stonemounded Hills, Duoklu Halls. {nl}Tolong periksa semuanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Lingering Escort Soldier
Philip's Soldiers: Lingering Escort Soldier

Philipas' Soldier: I need to guard my madam but I can't find her. {nl}I need to protect her from the monsters. {nl}But I can't strengthen up my body.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harus menjaga madam tapi aku tidak bisa menemukannya. {nl}Aku harus melindunginya dari monster.{nl}Tapi aku tidak bisa menguatkan tubuhku.

Philipas' Soldier: Madam is someone who'd even crawl her way if the carriage breaks down... {nl}At least I have to protect her!
Philip's Soldiers: Madam adalah seseorang yang bahkan harus melanjutkan perjalannya saat keretanya rusak.. {nl}Setidaknya aku harus melindunginya!

Philipas' Soldier: I need to protect Madam no matter what...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harus melindungi Madam apapun yang terjadi..

Philipas' Soldier: Lingering Soul of Merchant
Philip's Soldiers: Lingering Soul of Merchant

Philipas' Soldier: Look what happened to me because of the stupid scholar and sloppy soldier. {nl}Do you think that Madam or whatever is important when I lost my luggage?
Philip's Soldiers: Lihat apa yang terjadi denganku karena stupid scholar dan sloppy soldier. {nl}Apakah kamu pikir Madam atau apapun penting ketika kau kehilangan bagasiku?

Philipas' Soldier: It gets me angry that I've gone through all the suffering for nothing.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu membuatku marah karena membuatku menderita tapi tidak mendapatkan apa-apa.

Philipas' Soldier: My fortune is the most important thing for me.
Philip's Soldiers: Keberuntungannku adalah sangat penting untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: Lingering Soul of Scholar
Philip's Soldiers: Lingering Soul of Scholar

Philipas' Soldier: Did the rescue finally arrive? Did they come to save me? {nl}What? no? {nl}Did Madam fail by any chance? Madam is in danger!{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah pertolongan akhirnya datang? Apakah mereka datang untuk menyelamatkanku? {nl}Apa? tidak? {nl}Apakah  hilangnya Madam kebetulan? Madam dalam bahaya!{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We need the scroll that the Lapasape stole in order to save Madam. {nl}If we don't deliver the scroll to Madam..!!
Philip's Soldiers: Kita butuh scroll yang dicuri Lapasape untuk menyelamatkan Madam. {nl}Jika kita tidak memberikan scroll ke Madam..!!

Philipas' Soldier: We were cowards. We escaped while the escort and merchant were under attack. {nl}There was no way for us to save them..
Philip's Soldiers: Kita adalah pengecut. Kita kabur ketika escort dan merchant diserang. {nl}Tidak ada cara bagi kami untuk menyelamatkan mereka..

Philipas' Soldier: I regret it a lot. {nl}I should have been brave enough..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat menyesal. {nl}Aku seharusnya berani..

Philipas' Soldier: Soul of Lost Lady Explorer
Philip's Soldiers: Soul of Lost Lady Explorer

Philipas' Soldier: Excuse me! Please help me! {nl}Whew, my god! I didn't expect to meet anyone here. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Permisi! Tolong bantu aku! {nl}Waw, demi Tuhan! Aku tidak menyangkan bertemu seseorang di sini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If we announce that we've found the epitaph of the sculptor, people will recognize our family again. {nl}But strangely, I can't get off my feet. {nl}I need to take down the writings on the epitaph as evidence that it's found..
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kami mengumumkan bahwa kami telah menemukan epitaph of the sculptor, orang-orang akan mengenali keluarga kami lagi. {nl}Tapi anehnya, aku tidak bisa merasakan kakiku. {nl}Aku harus mencatat tulisan di epitaph sebagai bukti itu ditemukan..

Philipas' Soldier: Thinking of which.. I don't know. I don't know who I am, where I am from.. {nl}My head is full of thoughts about that epitaph and I can't think of anything else.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berpikirâ€¦.Aku tidak tahu. Aku tidak tahu siapa diriku, darimana asalku... {nl}Kepalaku penuh dengan pikiran tentang epitaph itu dan tidak bisa memikirkan hal lain.

Philipas' Soldier: It was a memorial stone meant to show to humans but the writings must have had powers of calming the souls. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada sebuah memorial stone untuk menunjukkan kepada manusia tapi tulisannya punya kekuatan untuk menenagkan jiwa. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Desperate Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Desperate Owl Sculpture

Philipas' Soldier: Sequoia Flame alone is a critical threat to us. {nl}Those might burn us first. {nl}It's painful and horrible to just think about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sequoia Flame saja adalah ancaman bagi kami. {nl}Itu bisa membakar kami. {nl}Itu menyakitkan dan mengerikan dengan hanya memikirkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't want to burn. {nl}Please help.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak ingin membakar. {nl}Tolong bantu.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. Now I don't have to worry about burning. {nl}I'm sick and tired of the Sequoias now.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Sekarang aku tidak khawatir tentang pembakaran. {nl}Aku sakit dan lelah dengan Sequoias.

Philipas' Soldier: Please help. There are souls whose bodies I can't save by myself. {nl}Can you take care of their remains at Nuapti Lowland?
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong bantu. Ada jiwa-jiwa yang tidak bisa aku selamatkan. {nl}Bisakah kamu mengurus sisanya di Nuapti Lowland?

Philipas' Soldier: They were soldiers heading back home. {nl}But a swarm of monsters suddenly attacked them and...
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka soldier yang kembali ke rumah mereka. {nl}Tapi segerombolan monster tiba-tiba menyerang mereka danâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: You've gathered them well. {nl}I hope this will comfort them.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkannya. {nl}Semoga ini akan menenagkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sorry. {nl}I am too weak and wasn't able to comfort them with their remains only. {nl}Maybe the keepsakes that the monsters took would help..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku minta maaf. {nl}Aku terlalu lemah dan tidak bisa menenangkan mereka yang tersisa. {nl}Mungkin benda kenangan dari monster akan membantu..

Philipas' Soldier: This forest was peaceful just four years ago. {nl}Now it's suffering because of the monsters and crying souls.
Philip's Soldiers: Hutan ini damai 4 tahun lalu. {nl}Sekarang menderita karena monster dan jiwa-jiwa yang menangis.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}I'm sure the soldiers are thanking you too.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl}Aku yakin para soldier bertima kasih juga kepadamu.

Philipas' Soldier: This might sound selfish, but.. {nl}I want to give a gift to the souls who followed me. {nl}There's a mysterious bush called Butterfly Fragrance that allows souls to smell the scent of their hometown.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini mungkin terdengar egois, tapi.. {nl}Aku akan memberikan sebuah hadiah kepada jiwa-jiwa yang mengikutiku. {nl}Ada sebuah rumput misterius yang disebut Butterfly Fragrance yang memungkinkan jiwa mencium aroma kampung halaman mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: No one would want to forget their hometown. {nl}When I smell Butterfly Fragrance, I also reminisce the days before I became a statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Tak seorang pun ingin melupakan kampung halamannya. {nl}Ketika akau mencium When I smell Butterfly Fragrance, Aku jua mengenang hari-hari sebelum menjadi sebuah patung.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you very much. {nl}Now they can rest in peace. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Sekarang mereka bisa beristirahat dalam damai. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please pray for them at the Garden of Consolation later when you have time.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong doakan mereka di Garden of Consolation nanti jika kamu ada waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: You are a very kind person. {nl}Butterfly Fragrance only grow in bushes at Butterfly Tomb.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu orang yang sangat baik. {nl}}Butterfly Fragrance hanya tumbuh di semak-semak di Butterfly Tomb.

Philipas' Soldier: We guide souls to Goddess Ausrine. {nl}But it's a big problem now because the number of souls is multiplying while the goddess is not around.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami memandu jiwa untuk Goddess Ausrine. {nl} Tapi itu masalah besar sekarang karena untuk mengalihkan ketika Goddes tidak ada di sekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Sad Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Sad Owl Statue

Philipas' Soldier: Help! {nl}A Throneweaver is destroying us.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong! {nl} Seekor Throneweaver menghancurkan kita.

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters were around even before. {nl}But ever since that tree emerged in the capital, they began to destroy us. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Monster sekitar bahkan sebelum. {nl} Tapi karena pohon muncul di gedung pemerintahan, mereka mulai menghancurkan kita. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Do you think the end of the world is really coming?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu berpikir bahwa akhir dunia akan benar-benar datang ?

Philipas' Soldier: One... Two... Three... {nl}Yes, this should be enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Satu.. Dua.. Tiga.. {nl}Ini tidak akan cukup..

Philipas' Soldier: The Throneweaver likes Sakmoli Roots very much. {nl}If it smells a mix of both, it will jump out right away.
Philip's Soldiers: Throneweavers seperti akar Sakmoli dan sangat banyak. {nl} Jika mereka mencium bau campuran keduanya, mereka akan melompat keluar segera.

Philipas' Soldier: This will be enough to lure it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini akan cukup untuk memancing mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Now go back to Tomb Spider Nest again. {nl}Defeat it when it smells the bait and rushes in.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang kembali lagi ke sarang Grave Spider. {nl} Dapat menyingkirkan mereka ketika mereka mencium bau umpan dan serang mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Teach it a lesson so that it won't destroy the owls again.
Philip's Soldiers: Keluarkan kemampuan kamu sehingga mereka tidak akan menghancurkan owl's  lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}They will not dare to attack us now.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima Kasih. {nl}Mereka tidak akan menyerang kita sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: To the monsters, our magic powers provide them good nourishment. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kekuatan mantra kami sangat penting untuk monster nourishments. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But we shouldn't end up like that. {nl}Who else will guide the souls then? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi itu tidak hanya itu. {nl} Apakah Kamu berpikir ada alasan bagi kita untuk tidak membimbing jiwa-jiwa? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Shy Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Shy Owl Statue

Philipas' Soldier: Something strange is happening. {nl}The souls I've been guiding have suddenly stopped moving. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sesuatu yang kuat terjadi. {nl} Jiwa Aku telah di bimbing tiba-tiba berhenti bergerak. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think they were caught at Nelaisve Shore but I have no way of knowing. {nl}Please help me. If we don't save the souls, they will fall to evil.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir mereka tertangkap di Nelasve Shore tapi Aku tidak punya cara untuk mengetahui. {nl} Tolong bantu Aku. Jika kita tidak menyelamatkan mereka, mereka akan jatuh ke dalam kejahatan.

Philipas' Soldier: More and more wandering souls are beginning to suffer. {nl}Maybe someone is doing this on purpose...
Philip's Soldiers: Semakin banyak jiwa penggembara mulai menderita. {nl} Mungkin seseorang melakukan ini dengan sengaja ..

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}Who would do such a thing?
Philip's Soldiers: Terima Kasih. {nl}Siapa yang akan melakukan hal seperti itu?

Philipas' Soldier: Sad Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Sad Owl Statue

Philipas' Soldier: Help me. {nl}Souls are disappearing towards Amolallul Hill. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong aku. {nl} Souls menghilang dari Amolallul Hills. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I want to find out what is happening. {nl}Please persuade the souls going to the hill and guide them to me. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin mencari tahu apa yang terjadi. {nl} Silahkan membujuk jiwa pergi ke bukit dan membimbing dia untuk Aku. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The souls are disappearing. What do you think is happening? {nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jiwa-jiwa menghilang. Apa yang Kamu pikirkan yang terjadi? {nl} {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The souls are saying the Goddess Statue at Amolallul Hill called for them. {nl}But there is no Goddess Statue there...
Philip's Soldiers: The Souls mengatakan Patung Goddes di Amolalul Hills memanggil mereka. {nl} Tapi tidak ada Patung Goddes ada ..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sure someone did this on purpose. {nl}Please go to Amolallul Hill to find out.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku yakin seseorang melakukan ini dengan sengaja. {nl} Silakan periksa Amolallul Hills.

Philipas' Soldier: There is no Goddess Statue there. What would they be referring to? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itu bukan patung  Goddess. Apa yang akan mereka katakan? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: A monster in disguise as a Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls can rest in peace. It's all thanks to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada monster yang menyamar sebagai Patung Goddess. Kasian sekali jiwa-jiwa itu. {nl} Sekarang jiwa-jiwa dapat beristirahat dengan damai. Ini semua berkat kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: If someone is intentionally intercepting the souls, then it can only be the demons. {nl}Why do you think they would want to break the balance?
Philip's Soldiers: Jika seseorang sengaja menggangu jiwa-jiwa, maka dapat menjadi demon {nl} Mengapa Kamu pikir mereka akan ingin mematahkan keseimbangan?

Philipas' Soldier: You can find Sakmolis near the Tomb Spider Nest.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat menemukan Sakmolis dekat sarang laba-laba Grave.

Philipas' Soldier: Officer's Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Soul of Officer

Philipas' Soldier: Can you see me?{nl}Then let me ask you a favor.{nl}I need someone to help us finish our last mission.{nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bisakah kamu melihat aku? {nl} Kemudian biarkan aku minta bantuanmu. {nl} Aku perlu seseorang untuk membantu kami menyelesaikan misi terakhir kami. {nl} {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That Owl Sculpture is not moving an inch. {nl}I heard they guide souls, but I don't think it's true.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahwa patung burung hantu tidak bergerak satu inci. {nl} Aku mendengar mereka membimbing jiwa-jiwa tapi Aku tidak berpikir begitu.

Philipas' Soldier: Good job. This will be enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. Ini akan cukup.

Philipas' Soldier: I will weave this wood to make it human-like. {nl}After this, the crisp skin of Old Kepa at Purple Fountain would be just right. Please do me another favor.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan waeve kayu tersebut dan membuatnya manusia seperti. {nl} Kulit renyah dari Old Kepa di Purple Cahaya Penampungan akan tepat. Harap membantu Aku lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: I've spent a long time without salvation. {nl}My men will also be saved if you defeat those monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menghabiskan waktu yang lama tanpa keselamatan. {nl} pria Aku juga akan disimpan jika Kamu mengalahkan rakasa itu.

Philipas' Soldier: You've gathered the skin of the Old Kepas? This will be enough. Good.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah Kamu mengumpulkan kulit Old Kepa? Ini akan cukup. Baik.

Philipas' Soldier: The decoy is ready. {nl}I'm sorry, but I want you to test this on the monsters at Uzesy Hill for me.
Philip's Soldiers: Umpan siap. {nl} Aku minta maaf tapi Aku ingin Kamu untuk menguji ini pada monster di Uzesy Lot bagi Aku.

Philipas' Soldier: Run away if the decoy fails. {nl}I don't want you to become like me.
Philip's Soldiers: Melarikan diri jika umpan gagal. {nl} Aku tidak ingin Kamu untuk menjadi seperti Aku.

Philipas' Soldier: The decoy seems alright then. {nl}Follow me to Grobis Crossroads.
Philip's Soldiers: Umpan baik-baik saja. {nl} Ikuti Aku untuk Grobis Crossroad.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for following me. {nl}Weave in some Ellom Leaves to finish the decoy with hair.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih telah mengikuti Aku. {nl} Menenun beberapa daun Ellum untuk menyelesaikannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Good work. Now it's time for revenge.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. Sekarang saatnya untuk balas dendam.

Philipas' Soldier: This is my last favor. {nl}It's at Grobis Crossroads. Please finish our last mission with this decoy.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah bantuan terakhir Aku. {nl} Ini Grobis Crossroad. Silakan menyelesaikan misi terakhir kami dengan umpan ini.

Philipas' Soldier: If your life is in danger, don't hesitate to run. {nl}I don't want you to get caught up avenging us.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika hidup Kamu dalam bahaya, jangan ragu untuk menjalankan. {nl} Aku tidak ingin kau terjebak untuk membalas dendam kami.

Philipas' Soldier: Whew. Now my men and I can rest in peace. {nl}We will meet the goddess soon. I will pray for her grace towards you.
Philip's Soldiers: Wah. Sekarang Aku dan dia bisa beristirahat di peave. {nl} Kami akan bertemu Goddess segera. Aku akan berdoa untuk kasih karunia Kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. Thank you very much.{nl}First, please get some Legs of Solid Wood from the Bushspiders at Purple Fountain.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Terima kasih banyak. {nl} Dapatkan Aku menemukan kayu keras pertama dari Bushspider di Purple Light Shelter.

Philipas' Soldier: Well. I don't know what I'm still doing here. {nl}That Owl that's supposed to guide us is not saying a word either.
Philip's Soldiers: Baik. Aku tidak tahu apa yang Aku lakukan di sini. {nl} The Owl's itu yang seharusnya membimbing kita tidak mengatakan sepatah kata pun.

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe we can go back to the goddess if we achieve what we were not able to. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin kita bisa kembali ke Goddess jika kita mencapai apa yang kita mampu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That fellow worries a lot. {nl}I said it's not Deadborn but he's still worrying like that.
Philip's Soldiers: Fella yang memiliki banyak kekhawatiran. {nl} Aku mengatakan itu bukan Deadborn tapi masih seperti itu.

Philipas' Soldier: It's worth a shot if it's Saltistter. {nl}But if it's Deadborn, then I'm out of here.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini patut dicoba jika itu Salister. {nl} Jika itu Deadborn, maka Aku akan lari.

Philipas' Soldier: I never heard of any Deadborn sightings in Kateen Forest.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak pernah mendengar adanya penampakan Deadborn di Katyn Forest.

Philipas' Soldier: We had to go through so much to recapture this entrance to Kateen Forest. I don't think Deadborn will appear, would it?
Philip's Soldiers: Kami harus melalui begitu banyak untuk dapat kembali Katyn Forest Entrance. Aku tidak berpikir Deadborn akan muncul, kan?

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters' endless raids are tiring us. {nl}If you help us and break their assault, then my soldiers can cheer up.
Philip's Soldiers: monster terus menyerang  yang melelahkan kita. {nl} Jika Kamu membantu kami dan melepaskan kepungan, para prajurit akan senang.

Philipas' Soldier: Not knowing what happened to the other troops is frustrating.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak tahu apa yang terjadi dengan pasukan lainnya membuat frustasi.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. I can feel relieved for the time being. {nl}Ah, if you see a soldier named Roy, please tell him to return.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima Kasih. Aku bisa merasa lega untuk sementara waktu. {nl} Ah, jika Kamu melihat seorang tentara bernama Roy, tolong katakan padanya untuk kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: We didn't just stay put when we were sieged by the monsters. {nl}We sent out scouts to get away from here but no one came back. {nl}{NP}If it's okay with you, I'd like to ask you to search for them. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kami tidak hanya tinggal diam ketika kami serang oleh mosnters. {nl} Kami mengirim pengintai untuk menjauh dari sini tapi tidak ada yang datang kembali. {nl} {NP} Jika tidak apa-apa dengan Kamu, Aku ingin meminta Kamu untuk mencari mereka. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We need every man we have. {nl}I hope nothing happened to them...
Philip's Soldiers: Kita perlu setiap orang yang kita miliki. {nl} Aku berharap apa-apa yang terjadi pada mereka ..

Philipas' Soldier: You're really trustworthy. {nl}They went up north.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu benar-benar dapat dipercaya. {nl} Mereka pergi ke utara.

Philipas' Soldier: Were you sent by Danus? {nl}You're too late. The others were taken out already.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah Kamu dikirim oleh Sir Danius? {nl} Kau terlambat. Lainnya sudah dibawa ke bawah.

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters will come to attack again soon. {nl}But I can't move right now.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster akan datang untuk menyerang lagi. {nl} Tapi aku tidak bisa bergerak sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: You saved me. I won't ask you to bring me back to camp, though. {nl}Thank you for saving my life!
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menyelamatkanku. Aku tidak bisa meminta Kamu untuk membawa Aku kembali ke kamp. {nl} Terima kasih untuk menyelamatkan hidup Aku!

Philipas' Soldier: This is a method I used when I was alive. {nl}It was mostly successful back then.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah metode yang Aku gunakan ketika Aku masih hidup. {nl} kebanyakan sukses saat itu.

Philipas' Soldier: The Supply Squad should have arrived already, but they are late. {nl}I'm sure something happened to them. Can you search for them in the lower area?
Philip's Soldiers: Persediaan prajurit seharusnya telah tiba  tapi mereka terlambat. {nl} Aku yakin sesuatu terjadi pada mereka. Kamu dapat mencari mereka di daerah lain.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sure we can find our way out of here if we can find the Supply Squad.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku yakin kita dapat menemukan jalan keluar dari sini jika kita menemukan prajurit yang membawa persediaan.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you from the Rearguard Unit? {nl}I'm sorry we've been so late. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah Kamu dari barisan prajurit terakhir?{nl} Maaf aku begitu lama. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But we are all very tired. {nl}If you want to help us get back to the Rearguard Unit Camp, please help us gather the scattered supplies.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi kami semua sangat lelah. {nl} Jika Kamu ingin mengirimkan kembali ke unit barisan terakhir, tolong bantu kami mengumpulkan persediaan yang tersebar.

Philipas' Soldier: All kinds of monsters attack us when we have supplies. {nl}We need more soldiers, but we haven't received any, no matter how much backup we requested.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua jenis monster menyerang kita ketika kita memiliki persediaan. {nl} Kami membutuhkan lebih banyak tentara tetapi tidak ada berita tidak peduli berapa banyak kembali kami meminta.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}This will be enough to cover for us.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl} akan cukup untuk menutupi.

Philipas' Soldier: Right now, it would be best for our troops to join with Danus' troops. {nl} We will join them soon after a little rest so please deliver them the food supplies first.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang, akan lebih baik bagi pasukan kita untuk bergabung dengan pasukan Danius '. {nl} Kami akan bergabung dengan mereka setelah sedikit istirahat jadi silakan memberikan mereka persediaan makanan pertama.

Philipas' Soldier: We are sorry for delivering the supplies late. {nl}But this is the situation of most supply troops.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami meminta maaf karena terlambat mengirimkan persediaan. {nl} Tapi ini adalah situasi yang paling berbahaya.

Philipas' Soldier: What happened? {nl}Is the Supply Squad well on their way? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang terjadi? {nl} Apakah pasukan persediaan baik dalam perjalanan mereka? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: At least the food supplies were delivered first. {nl}Good work. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Setidaknya persediaan makanan dikirim pertama. {nl} pekerjaan yang baik. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Danus ordered me to return? {nl}I can't return until I collect a Puragi's Hook.
Philip's Soldiers: Sir Danius memerintahkan untuk kembali? {nl} Aku tidak bisa kembali sampai aku mengumpulkan semua Puragi Hooks.

Philipas' Soldier: My mission is more important than his order to return. {nl}If we were to consider priorities, I mean.
Philip's Soldiers: Misi lebih penting daripada perintah untuk kembali. {nl} Jika kita mempertimbangkan prioritas, itu yang Aku maksud.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for your help. {nl}But do I just return to Danus' troops?
Philip's Soldiers: Terima Kasih atas bantuan kamu.. {nl}Tapi apakah Aku harus kembali ke pasukan Danius'?

Philipas' Soldier: Have you seen a soldier named Roy? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu melihat prajurit bernama Roy? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You mean you returned him to the Rearguard? {nl}That's bad. We're short on men. You are partly responsible for that now, so you better cooperate.
Philip's Soldiers: Maksud kamu , kamu kembali dari unit yang paling belakang?{nl}Itu buruk. Kami pria cebol. Kamu ikut bertanggung jawab untuk itu sehingga Kamu lebih baik bekerja sama juga.

Philipas' Soldier: Blood will be shed soon. {nl}I pity you for going in Roy's stead.
Philip's Soldiers: Darah akan ditumpahkan segera. {nl} Aku kasihan Kamu untuk masuk untuk Roy.

Philipas' Soldier: So, just as I've heard. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi, seperti yang Aku dengar. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The next mission is to find my missing scouts. {nl}They were sent to Razygis Hill but have not returned for hours.
Philip's Soldiers: Misi berikutnya adalah untuk menemukan Scouts yang hilang. {nl} Mereka dikirim ke Razysis Hills tetapi belum kembali selama berjam-jam.

Philipas' Soldier: The scout unit was attacked, myself included. {nl}I hope I can at least find the report to send to sir Philipas...
Philip's Soldiers: Pasukan diserang, dan begitu juga I. {nl} Aku harap setidaknya menemukan laporan untuk mengirim ke Pak Palipas ..

Philipas' Soldier: Our squad is all dead because of my incompetence. {nl}I'm the only one alive but I don't think I have much time left either.
Philip's Soldiers: Pasukan Aku semua mati karena kesalahan Aku.. {nl} aku satu-satunya yang masih hidup tapi Aku tidak berpikir Aku punya banyak waktu lagi baik.

Philipas' Soldier: This report is completely soaked in blood and unreadable. {nl}I can't stand that my men's efforts were all for nothing.
Philip's Soldiers: Laporan ini semua direndam dalam darah dan tidak dapat dibaca. {nl} Aku tidak tahan bahwa usaha Aku semua untuk apa.

Philipas' Soldier: There is one last favor I would like to ask you. {nl}The remains of my men are up in the hills. Please take care of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada satu bantuan lalu Aku ingin meminta Kamu. {nl} Sisa-sisa orang Aku di perbukitan. Silakan merawat barang peninggalan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: I feel sorry for them being abandoned amongst the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasa kasihan pada mereka yang ditinggalkan di antara monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you.{nl}My men can now rest in peace. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl} pria Aku sekarang bisa beristirahat dalam damai. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, I've found some readable parts from my men's reports. {nl}Please tell sir Philipas that the monsters will attack the regular troops soon.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, Aku telah menemukan beberapa bagian yang dapat Kamu baca dari laporan pria itu. {nl} Tolong beritahu  Philipas bahwa monster akan menyerang pasukan segera.

Philipas' Soldier: ...Is that so? I guess it's too late for the scouts. {nl}I swear to treat them with respect. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: ..Lalu ??. Aku tebak itu sudah telat untuk scouts. {nl}Aku berjanji untuk memperlakukan mereka dengan hormat. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: According to Johan's report, we better strike them from behind. {nl}I will meet you in Isdaigininko Highway.
Philip's Soldiers: Menurut laporan Johan, lebih baik kita menyerang mereka dari belakang. {nl} Aku akan bertemu Kamu di Izdaginkas jalan.

Philipas' Soldier: Revenge is best served cold. {nl}Even for Johan and his men.
Philip's Soldiers: Pembalasan terbaik adalah diam. {nl}Bahkan untuk Even dan teman-temannya.

Philipas' Soldier: You're here. {nl}Are you ready? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu disini. {nl}Apa kamu sudah siap? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The battle has begun. Troops have entered Isdaigininko Highway already. {nl}It will be a big help if you fight with them.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertempuran telah dimulai. Pasukan telah memasuki Izdaginkas jalan sudah. {nl} Ini akan menjadi bantuan besar jika Kamu bertengkar dengan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: The plan will not fail. {nl}I promise this to Johan's troops.
Philip's Soldiers: Rencana tidak akan gagal. {nl}Aku berjanji kepada pasukan Johan's.

Philipas' Soldier: It looks like you've done more than Roy's part. {nl}If it wasn't for you, we would not have been successful. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: It looks like you've done more than Roy's part. {nl}If it wasn't for you, we would not have been successful. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I hope the blessings of the goddess are with you on your journey.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berharap doa dari Goddess akan selalu bersamamu selama perjalanan kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't close my eyes before we defeat that monster.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa menutup mata sebelum bisa mengalahkan monster itu.

Philipas' Soldier: When will this pitiful feeling end. {nl}When I look at the souls, I don't think it will end.
Philip's Soldiers: Disaat aku berharap perasaan ini akan berakhir.[nl}Disaat aku melihat jiwa itu, aku rasa itu tidak akan berakhir.

Philipas' Soldier: I can suffice with delayed supplies or reinforcements. {nl}But telling us to just wait around is too much.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak dapat membantu menyuplai atau backup terlambat. {nl}Tapi tellins kita untuk menunggu hanya terlalu banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm afraid where the monsters will jump out from. {nl}I plan to run away if an unknown monster shows up.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku takut jika monster melompat keluar dari {nl}Rencana aku menjauh jika monsters itu muncul.

Philipas' Soldier: We're making up for the lacking supplies. {nl}If the supplies don't arrive, we have to cover for it on site.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami membuat persediaan berkurang. {nl} Jika pasokan tidak tiba, kita harus menutup untuk lokasi itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Somehow, at least sir Philipas' troops...
Philip's Soldiers: Entah bagaimana, setidaknya pasukan Sir Philipas '..

Philipas' Soldier: There was another route that we used before. {nl}But it got like this when that gigantic tree suddenly emerged. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada cara lain yang kita gunakan sebelumnya. {nl} Tapi ini terjadi ketika pohon raksasa tiba-tiba muncul. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We're clearing up this route to make it easy for supplies but.. {nl}As if the monsters isolating us was not enough, now there are no news of supplies, and the soldiers are becoming weary.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami membersihkan jalur untuk membuat mudah bagi persediaan tapi .. {nl} Seperti jika monster menyebabkan kita terisolasi, saat ini belum ada kabar dari persediaan dan tentara menjadi lelah.

Philipas' Soldier: I'll be grateful if you can do that. {nl}If you relieve us from their attacks, it might even boost the troop's morale.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan berterima kasih jika Kamu melakukan itu. {nl} Jika Kamu melepaskan kita dari pengepungan, bahkan mungkin meningkatkan morales pasukan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: I want to let go of everything and just rest. {nl}But thinking of my men..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin menjatuhkan lalu semua turun dan hanya beristirahat. {nl} Tapi Aku memikirkan pria itu ..

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters are swallowing my companions. {nl}This never happened before that big tree emerged in the capital...
Philip's Soldiers: Monster yang menelan teman-teman Aku. {nl} ini tidak terjadi sebelum pohon besar di kota muncul ..

Philipas' Soldier: There are more and more wandering souls, {nl}and souls that are suddenly disappearing. It's really scary.
Philip's Soldiers: Jiwa yang berkeliaran semakin meningkat. {nl} Jadi, apakah itu jiwa yang tiba-tiba menghilang. Ini terlalu menakutkan.

Philipas' Soldier: First, you have to find the hiding Throneweaver. {nl}Please gather Ridimed Leaves. The Throneweaver loves it. {nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama, Kamu harus menemukan Throneweaver yang bersembunyi. {nl} Harap mengumpulkan daun Ridimed. The Throneweaver menyukainya. {nl} {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Good. {nl}First, defeat the Big Blue Grivas up the hills and put a damper on them.
Philip's Soldiers: Baik. {nl} Pertama, mengalahkan Big Blue Grivas di atas bukit dan kalahkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: I feel regretful. I can't close my eyes like this.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasa khawatir. Aku tidak bisa menutup mata Aku seperti ini.

Philipas' Soldier: I have a request. Please save my companions. {nl}They will be eaten if we don't save them quickly.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mempunyai sebuah permintaan. Harap menjaga teman-teman Aku. {nl} Mereka akan dimakan jika kita tidak menyelamatkan mereka dengan cepat.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a monster's nest at the end of this road. {nl}My colleagues may still be alive there.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada sarang rakasa itu di ujung jalan ini. {nl} Teman-teman Aku mungkin masih hidup di sana.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}My colleagues were taken to the nest at the end of the road.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl} Teman-teman Aku dibawa ke sarang di ujung jalan.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't feel the owl that guides the souls at Ishrai Crossroads. {nl}I'm worried that it may have been attacked by the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa merasakan Owl's yang dipandu jiwa-jiwa di Ishari Crossroad. {nl} aku khawatir bahwa mungkin telah diserang oleh monster.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope nothing happened to it...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berharap tidak ada yang terjadi..

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters' attacks are becoming stronger and there is no news from the troops that went out. {nl}This is not good.
Philip's Soldiers: Serangan monster 'menjadi lebih kuat dan tidak ada berita dari pasukan yang keluar. {nl} Ini tidak baik.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}I thought I would lay dormant forever like this. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl} Aku pikir Aku akan tidur selamanya seperti ini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It's confusing. {nl}There seems to be something with Lydia Schaffen and Ruklys... but they're still traitors, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Ini membingungkan. {nl} Sepertinya ada sesuatu dengan Lydia Schaffen dan Ruklys .. tapi mereka masih pengkhianat, kan?

Philipas' Soldier: (You cannot read it because it's broken.)
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak bisa dibaca karena itu rusak.

Philipas' Soldier: We are after an unknown monster. {nl}I hope it's not Deadborn, but I feel like it is. Can you help us?
Philip's Soldiers: Kami ada sebelum monster diketahui.{nl} Aku harap itu bukan Deadborn tapi aku merasa seperti itu. Bisakah Kamu membantu kami?

Philipas' Soldier: That's weird. I think I saw a Deadborn.. {nl}What do you think?
Philip's Soldiers: Itu aneh. Aku pikir Aku melihat Deadborn .. {nl} Apa pendapat Kamu?

Philipas' Soldier: Dear Revelator, please lend us your strength! {nl}We're fighting against Saltistter and us alone is not enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Dear Savior, silakan meminjamkan kami kekuatan Kamu! {nl} untuk melawan Salister karena kita saja tidak cukup.

Philipas' Soldier: You're great, as expected! Commander Vacenin wants to meet you. Go to the camp quickly.
Philip's Soldiers: Kau hebat seperti yang diharapkan! Komanda Vacenin ingin bertemu Kamu. Pergi ke kamp cepat.

Philipas' Soldier: Soldier Rudolfas
Philip's Soldiers: Soldier Rudolpas

Philipas' Soldier: Even if you're the Revelator, this place is too dangerous. {nl}Please go to a safe area.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan jika Kamu Savior, tempat ini terlalu berbahaya. {nl} Silakan pergi ke daerah yang aman.

Philipas' Soldier: What did I tell you? {nl}Thanks for your help but you should turn back quickly.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang Aku katakan. {nl} Terima kasih atas bantuan Kamu, tetapi kembali dengan cepat.

Philipas' Soldier: Soldier Aspas
Philip's Soldiers: Soldier Aspas

Philipas' Soldier: I was careless. {nl}It would be big trouble if the monsters attacked now.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ceroboh. {nl} Ini akan menjadi masalah besar jika monster menyerang.

Philipas' Soldier: You saved me. {nl}Do you know what happened to my colleagues?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menyelamatkan Aku. {nl}Apa kamu mengetahui apa yang terjadi dengan teman-teman Aku?

Philipas' Soldier: Meleech swallowed Dominic's engagement ring. {nl}I did lose it, it's really terrible.
Philip's Soldiers: Merlich menelan cincin pertunangan Dominic. {nl} Aku kehilangan tapi itu terlalu banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: This place is too dangerous for citizens to go around. {nl}Go to a safe area.
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini terlalu berbahaya bagi warga sekitar. {nl}Cepat pergi ke area yang aman.

Philipas' Soldier: I understand that you are strong but it's dangerous to go around alone here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku memahami bahwa Kamu kuat tapi itu berbahaya untuk pergi sekitar sini sendirian.

Philipas' Soldier: I could have supported O'Rourke and the troops, if only I was not injured...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bisa didukung Oruk dan pasukan kalau saja aku tidak terluka ..

Philipas' Soldier: This place is dangerous. {nl}Especially with Ironbaum around, I have not seen such a violent monster before.
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini berbahaya. {nl} Bahkan dengan Ironbaums, Aku belum melihat seperti rakasa kekerasan sebelumnya.

Philipas' Soldier: There are still many who have not yet returned. {nl}Do we really have to go through all this danger to clear a path to the Gorge Area...
Philip's Soldiers: Masih banyak yang belum kembali. {nl} Apakah kita harus melalui semua bahaya ini untuk membuat jalan ke daerah Gorge ..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm safe thanks to my colleagues. {nl}I did not think we could defeat Ironbaum.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku aman berkat teman-teman Aku. {nl} Aku tidak berpikir kita bisa mengalahkan Ironbaum.

Philipas' Soldier: Bishop Aurelius' Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Soul of Bishop Aurelius

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator.. It was a long time. {nl}I have awaited centuries to guide you. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Savior .. Itu waktu yang lama. {nl} Aku telah menunggu cukup lama untuk membimbing Kamu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This Great Cathedral is a legacy of Maven, the first bishop, and a sanctuary with a revelation. {nl}But I am unable to leave this precise area. {nl}As it stands, I have no power to aid the holy mission.
Philip's Soldiers: Katedral adalah warisan pertama Uskup Maven dan tempat perlindungan dengan wahyu. {nl} Tapi aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini. {nl} Aku tidak bisa melanjutkan misi suci seperti ini.

Philipas' Soldier: It has been worth the long wait. {nl}Although my body is like this, I am overflowing with emotion right now.
Philip's Soldiers: Perlu menunggu lama. {nl} Meskipun tubuh Aku seperti ini, Aku tidak bisa menangani emosi meluap.

Philipas' Soldier: This will be enough.
Philip's Soldiers: This will be enough.

Philipas' Soldier: I believe a scripture will hold the Spirit Essences well enough. {nl}Unfortunately, they are all at Pamaldu Groom. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir kitab suci akan baik untuk memegang esensi souls. {nl} Kasiannya, itu di lantai Pamaldu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Although I'm just a spirit, I have offered myself to the goddess. {nl}I want to be placed in a scripture.
Philip's Soldiers: Meskipun aku hanya jiwa, Aku telah menawarkan diri untuk Goddes. {nl} Aku ingin ditempatkan di kitab.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you done with the ritual? {nl}Check if this scripture can call me correctly.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu sudah selesai dengan ritual mu? {nl} Periksa apakah ayat ini dapat menyebutnya dengan tepat.

Philipas' Soldier: Splendid. {nl}Now you must solve the secret of the Great Cathedral and get the revelation. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Besar. {nl} Sekarang Kamu harus memecahkan rahasia Katedral dan mendapatkan blessing. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Of course, there will be hardship. {nl}The burden of the holy mission will surely weigh down on your shoulders. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tentu saja, kesulitan akan mengikuti. {nl} Beban misi suci akan menekan dirimu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But only you and the goddess can save this world..{nl}Even knowing my body would turn out like this, I desired to guide you.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi hanya Kamu dan Goddess yang bisa menyelamatkan dunia ini .. {nl} Aku ingin membimbing Kamu bahkan jika Aku harus mengubah cara ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Don't worry. You just have to finish the bowl to hold me. {nl}First, gather the Essence of Soul. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir. Kamu hanya perlu menyelesaikan mangkuk untuk menahan Aku. {nl} Pertama, mengumpulkan Essence Soul. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, the vessel should be completed at the Altar of Stability. {nl}I have spent centuries without a body, so I hope you get a decent scripture.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, Vessel di Altar of Stability seharusnya sudah lengkap. {nl} Aku telah menghabiskan berabad-abad tanpa tubuh jadi Aku harap Kamu mendapatkan decent scripture.

Philipas' Soldier: It's simple. {nl}Use the scripture of soul in your inventory.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini mudah. {nl}Gunakan kitab soul di inventory kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Cleric
Philip's Soldiers: Cleric

Philipas' Soldier: This Great Cathedral is like a repository of knowledge. {nl}Of course, that should mean that we can find how to release Naktis' curses.
Philip's Soldiers: Katedral seperti repositori pengetahuan. {nl} Tentu saja, itu juga berarti bahwa kita dapat menemukan cara untuk melepaskan kutukan Naktis.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm roughly done studying this area, but we need the reports of clerics from other areas. {nl}If you meet other clerics in the Great Cathedral, can you get their reports for me?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku telah selesai mempelajari daerah ini tetapi kita perlu laporan dari Clerics dari daerah lain. {nl} Jika Kamu bertemu clerics lainnya di Katedral, Kamu bisa memberikan laporan kepada Aku?

Philipas' Soldier: If we've got the reports, even Naktis' curse will just be as if it were a mere spell. {nl}Yup, that's right. Great work. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kita mendapatkan laporan, bahkan kutukan Naktis  hanya akan menjadi mantra belaka. {nl} Yup, itu benar. Pekerjaan besar. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Isn't it scary in here? {nl}Even the Owl Sculpture feels gloomy..
Philip's Soldiers: Bukankah menakutkan di sini? {nl} Bahkan patung burung hantu terasa suram ..

Philipas' Soldier: I've heard about sightings of souls with resentment. {nl}If it's true.. Uhh, you're not one of them, are you?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pernah mendengar tentang penampakan jiwa dengan kebencian. {nl} Jika itu benar .. Uhh, Kamu tidak salah satu dari mereka, kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Grave Keeper Romas
Philip's Soldiers: Grave guard Romas

Philipas' Soldier: Being a Revelator doesn't mean that you can roam around freely tomorrow as you do today.
Philip's Soldiers: Menjadi Savior tidak berarti bahwa Kamu dapat berkeliaran dengan bebas besok seperti yang Kamu lakukan hari ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Every Revelator who said that they were different never really made it far.
Philip's Soldiers: Setiap Savior yang mengatakan bahwa mereka berbeda pernah benar-benar membuatnya panjang.

Philipas' Soldier: This is no place for civilians to pass by and it won't happen anytime soon. {nl}It's too dangerous.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini ada tempat bagi warga sipil untuk lewat dan itu tidak akan terjadi dalam waktu dekat. {nl} Ini terlalu berbahaya.

Philipas' Soldier: My colleagues are still inside. {nl}It's frustrating because there's no way to know what happened to them.
Philip's Soldiers: Teman-teman Aku masih di dalam. {nl} Ini membuat frustrasi karena tidak ada cara untuk mengetahui apa yang terjadi pada mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't forgive them for making the tower such a mess.
