Philipas' Soldier: Commander Uska says a swarm of monster appeared from the deep forest but he did not have enough men to do anything about it. Defeat 100 monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest for the commander.
Philip's Soldiers: Commander Uska bilang banyak monster keluar dari dalam hutan tapi dia tidak memiliki cukup orang untuk membantunya mengusir mereka. Kalahkan 100 monster di Purple Tree Fault Forest untuk commander.

Philipas' Soldier: Completed the Purple Tree Fault Forest monster huntdown mission. Return to Uska and tell him the good news.
Philip's Soldiers: Selesaikan tugas memburu Purple Tree Fault Forest monster. Kembalilah kepada Uska dan sampaikan berita baiknya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters in Purple Tree Fault Forest
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monsters di Purple Tree Fault Forest

Philipas' Soldier: Observe the Fallen Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Awasi fallen owl statue

Philipas' Soldier: There is an Owl Sculpture at Tomb Spider Nest. Take a look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada owl staue di Tomb Spider nest. Jagalah baik-baik.

Philipas' Soldier: The Throneweaver appeared when you touched the collapsed sculpture!
Philip's Soldiers: Throneweaver muncul saat kamu menyentuh collapsed statue!

Philipas' Soldier: Suspicious Goddess Statue
Philip's Soldiers: Goddess Statue yang mencurigakan

Philipas' Soldier: There is a Goddess Statue in Amolallul Hill. This statue looks different from the other statues but worship it first anyway.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada Goddess Statue di Amolallul. Statue ini terlihat berbeda dengan statues lainnya. Tetapi tetap mendoakannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Corrupted
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan the Corrupted

Philipas' Soldier: The Goddess Statue turned into Corrupted! Defeat the Corrupted first.
Philip's Soldiers: The Goddess Statue berubah menjadi Corrupted! Kalahkan the Corrupted.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Corrupted
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan the Corrupted

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the Owl Chief Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara kepada Leader Owl Statue

Philipas' Soldier: The Earnest Owl Chief Sculpture seems gloomy. Talk to it again.
Philip's Soldiers: The earnest Leader Owl Statue terlihat murung. Bicaralah padanya sekali lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Check on the Weak Owl Sculpture at Ishrai Crossroads
Philip's Soldiers: Periksalah the weakened owl statue di Ishrai Crossroad

Philipas' Soldier: The Owl Chief says it's worried about the owl at Ishrai Crossroads. Look for the Weak Owl and if it is out of place or fallen down, help it back up.
Philip's Soldiers: Leader Owl bilang dirinya khawatir dengan owl di Ishrai Crossroad. Periksalah weakened statues dan jika posisinya bergeser terlalu jauh atau terjatuh, kembali kan seperti semula.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the Weak Owl Sculpture
Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah kepada the Weakened Owl Statue

Philipas' Soldier: Stood back the Weak Owl Sculpture lying on the floor. Talk to it.
Philip's Soldiers: Pasang kembali the Weakened Owl Statue yang terletak di lantai. Bicaralah padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: The Weak Owl Sculpture seems like it is about to cry. Talk to it.
Philip's Soldiers: The Weakened Owl Statue sepertinya hendak menangis. Bicaralah kepadanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Find traces of the kidnapped Owls
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan jejak dari kidnapped owls

Philipas' Soldier: The Weak Owl wants you to find other owls that the monsters took away. Find the traces of owl statue in the monster's hideaway located at each end of the Ishrai Crossroad.
Philip's Soldiers: The Weakened Owl ingin kamu menemukan owls lainnya yang diambil oleh monster. Temukan jejak dari owl statue di persembunyian monster pada end of the Ishrai Crossroad.

Philipas' Soldier: Give the broken owl sculpture parts to the Weak Owl
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan Broken Piece of Owl

Philipas' Soldier: Found all the Broken Pieces of the Owl. Give it to the Weak Owl.
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan semua Broken Pieces of the Owl. Berikan kepada Weakened Owl.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Liliya
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara pada Lilya

Philipas' Soldier: There is a pilgrim names Liliya in Way of the Big Staving Demons. Seems like she desperately needs something so try talking to her.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada seorang pilgrim bernama  Lilya di Way of the Big Staving Demon. Sepertinya dia membutuhkan sesuatu, bicaralah dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Find food
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan makanan

Philipas' Soldier: Liliya keeps saying that she's hungry. Get some meat from the monsters around and give it to her.
Philip's Soldiers: Lilya terus berkata bahwa dia lapar. Dapatkan daging dari monster disekitarmu dan berikan kepadanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Give monster meat to Liliya.
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan daging monster kepada Lilya.

Philipas' Soldier: Get %s from monsters nearby
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan %s dari monsters terdekat

Philipas' Soldier: Liliya still seems hungry. Talk to her again.
Philip's Soldiers: Lilya sepertinya masih lapar. Bicaralah padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Get soft reed stem
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkanlah soft reed stem

Philipas' Soldier: Gather soft reed stem for Liliya from the reed sprouts nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan soft reed stem untuk Lilya dari reed sprouts disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Gathered all the soft reed stems. Give it to Liliya.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan semua soft reed stems. Berikan pada Lilya.

Philipas' Soldier: Gather %s from reed sprouts
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan %s dari reed sprouts

Philipas' Soldier: Is Liliya's hunger satisfied? Talk to her again.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah rasa lapar Lilya's sudah terpenuhi? Bicaralah padanya kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Carnivore
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Carnivore

Philipas' Soldier: What happened? The hungry Liliya is gone and a Carnivore suddenly appeared. First, defeat the Carnivore that is attacking you.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa ini? The hungry Lilya pergi dan Carnivore mendadak muncul. Pertama, kalahkan Carnivore yang menyerang dirimu.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Liliya on the floor
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara pada Lilya diatas lantai

Philipas' Soldier: Liliya appeared on the spot where Carnivore was defeated. Try talking to Liliya.
Philip's Soldiers: Lilya muncul pada tempat dimana Carnivore dikalahkan. Bicaralah pada Lilya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Carnivore that seems like what Liliya turned into
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Carnivore yang sepertinya adalah Lilya yang berubah

Philipas' Soldier: Make a grave for Liliya
Philip's Soldiers: Buatlah makam untuk Lilya

Philipas' Soldier: Seems like Liliya will lose her breathe soon.. Do her last favor.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Lilya akan segera kehilangan nyawanya.. Kabulkanlah keinginan terakhirnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Make a grave for Liliya
Philip's Soldiers: Buatlah makam untuk Lilya

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Pilgrim Julius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah kepada Pilgrim Julius

Philipas' Soldier: There are many pilgrims with stories in the Starving Demon's Way. Talk to Julius.
Philip's Soldiers: Banyak sekali pilgrims dengan kisahnya di dalam Starving Demon's Road. Bicaralah pada Julius.

Philipas' Soldier: Get monster meat
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan daging monster

Philipas' Soldier: Can't understand Julius' story exactly but he seems hungry. {nl}Try to get him something to eat from the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak begitu mengerti cerita dari Julius, tapi kelihatannya dia lapar. Dapatkan sesuatu untuk diberikan padanya dari monsters terdekat.

Philipas' Soldier: Give food to Pilgrim Julius
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan makanan kepada Julius

Philipas' Soldier: Got enough monster meat. Give it to Julius.
Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan cukup daging monster. Berikan kepada Julius.

Philipas' Soldier: Get %s from monsters nearby
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan %s dari monster terdekat

Philipas' Soldier: Julius is gobbling down the monster meat. Try talking to him again.
Philip's Soldiers: Julius melahap daging monster. Bicaralah padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Persuade Drapeliun
Philip's Soldiers: Bujuklah  Draperiun

Philipas' Soldier: Is there some kind of curse casted in the Way of Big Staving Demon? Julius took the orgel then turned into a Drapeliun! You need to persuade him to turn back into human. How about consuming some HP first by attacking it?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah ini sejenis kutukan yang dipasang pada Way of Big Staving Demon? Julius mengambil orgel lalu berubah menjadi Draperiun! Kamu harus membujuknya agar menjadi manusia kembali. Bagaimana jika menyerap HP dengan menyerangnya?

Philipas' Soldier: Julius appeared again. Talk to him and listen to his story.
Philip's Soldiers: Julius Muncul kembali. Bicara padanya dan dengarkan ceritanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Seems like Julius is back to himself now. Go and listen to what he says.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Julius kembali menjadi dirinya lagi. Dengarkan ceritanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Get the young Nikotia leaves
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan young Nikotia leaves

Philipas' Soldier: You need to get young Nikotia leaves so that Julius can get back up and tell his story. You can get the leaves in Emptry Tree Forest.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus mendapatkan young Nikotia leaves sehingga Julius sadar dan dapat memberitahukan ceritanya. Kamu bisa mendapatkan leaves di Emptry Tree Forest.

Philipas' Soldier: Gathered all the young Nikotia leaves needed. Give it to Julius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan young Nikotia leaves yang dibutuhkan. Berikan kepada Julius.

Philipas' Soldier: Food supplies in the Ascetic haven
Philip's Soldiers: Cadangan makananan di the Ascetic haven

Philipas' Soldier: The rotten meat Julius mentioned can be found past the Ascetic haven, just before the Ray-lit Land. Go there and find the Reaverpeded that swallowed Julius and Liliya's ring.
Philip's Soldiers: Daging busuk yang disebut oleh Julius bisa ditemukan di Ascetic haven, tepat sebelum Ray-lit Land. Pergilah kesana dan temukan Reaverpeded yang menelan cincin Julius dan Lilya's.

Philipas' Soldier: The Reaverpede that swallowed Liliya and Julius' necklace appeared! Defeat it and get back the necklace.
Philip's Soldiers: The Reaverpeded yang menelan cincin Lilya dan Julius' telah muncul! Kalahkan dia dan dapatkan necklace kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Reaverpede that swallowed the necklace
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Reaverpeded yang menelan necklace

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Pilgrim Zenius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara pada Pilgrim Zenius

Philipas' Soldier: There are two pilgrims in the Reed field in Starving Demon's Way. Seems like they have a story to tell so try talking to them.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada dua pilgrims di the Reed field pada Starving Demon's Road. Sepertinya mereka memiliki hal yang ingin diceritakan.

Philipas' Soldier: Who was the one killed while going through the food piles guarded by Zenius? What is happening in Starving Demon's Way? Let's talk to Zenius first.
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa yang terbunuh saat hendak mendekati tumpukan makanan yang dijaga oleh Zenius? Apa yang terjadi di Starving Demon's Road? Bicaralah pada Zenius.

Philipas' Soldier: Zenius is still huffing and saying that even the monsters are preying on the food piles. First, clear up the surroundings.
Philip's Soldiers: Zenius menduga dan mengatakan bahwa monster sedang menggerogoti food piles. Pertama, bersigkan terlebih dahulu lingkungan sekitarnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Cleared up the surrounding area as Pilgrim Zenius asked. Talk to him again.
Philip's Soldiers: Bersihkan area sekitar sesuai permintaan Zenius. Bicaralah padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Get monster bait from the food piles
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan umpan untuk monster dari food piles.

Philipas' Soldier: You need to find some food to calm Zenius down
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus menemukan makanan untuk menenangkan Zenius

Philipas' Soldier: Use food scraps to catch monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan food scraps untuk menangkap monster

Philipas' Soldier: Found hard black bread with some molds on it which seems suitable to use as bait for the starving monsters. Use it to lure the monsters nearby and help Zenius build the food piles.
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan hard black bread dengan bentuk yang sepertinya bisa digunakan untuk menggoda monster lapar. Gunakan untuk membantu Zenius memancing monster disekitar dengan membangun food piles.

Philipas' Soldier: Gathered enough grains that the monsters stole. Take it to Zenius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan grains yang dicuri oleh monsters. Berikan kepada Zenius.

Philipas' Soldier: Lure the monsters with food scraps and get %s
Philip's Soldiers: Pancing monsters dengan food scraps dan dapatkan %s

Philipas' Soldier: Clean up the food piles
Philip's Soldiers: Bersihkan food piles

Philipas' Soldier: There are food piles here and there along the Starving Demon's Way. People just gathered and left the food to spoil when gluttony took over them. Clean up the food piles that are full of rotten food.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada tumpukan makanan disini dan juga disana sepanjang Starving Demon's Road. Orang-orang yang berkumpul membuang-buang makanan sementara rasa lapar mereka semakin menguat. Bersihkan tumpukan makanan yang sudah membusuk.

Philip's Soldiers: Periksa Indolent Tree Root Crystal

Philip's Soldiers: Ada Tree Root Crystals yang aneh di Nevasingas road. Sepertinya itulah yang menyebabkan keanehan disekitarnya, jadi periksalah.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Tree Root Crystal protection device
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Tree Root Crystal protection device

Philipas' Soldier: Guardian devices appeared while you were checking the Tree Root Crystal! Avoid monsters' attacks and destroy all the protective devices within time limit.
Philip's Soldiers: Guardian devices muncul saat kamu memeriksa Tree Root Crystal! Hindari serangan monster dan hancurkan semua protective devices dalam batas waktu yang ditentukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the protection device of Indolent Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan protection device dari Indolent Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: Try to destroy the Indolent Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Indolent Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: In Nomadic camp, there are mutated Tree Root Crystals under the curse of Naktis. Approach it and destroy it.
Philip's Soldiers: Di Nomadic camp, ada mutated Tree Root Crystals dalam pengaruh curse of Naktis. Dekati dan hancurkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Guardian Stone of the summoned Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Guardian Stone of the summoned Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: When you attacked the mutated Tree Root Crystal in Nomadic Camp, its stamina disappeared and the core split nearby. First, find the cores and break it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika kamu menyerang mutated Tree Root Crystal di Nomadic Camp, stamina miliknya berkurang dan core di dekatnya terbelah. Pertama, temukan cores dan hancurkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Indolent Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Indolent Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: Broke all the cores of the Crystal. {nl}Try to destroy the mutated Tree Root Crystal again.
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan semua cores of the Crystal. Dan coba hancurkan mutated Tree Root Crystal kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Mutated Tree Root Crystal of Zikore Shore
Philip's Soldiers: Mutated Tree Root Crystal of Zikore Shore

Philipas' Soldier: There are mutated Tree Root Crystals in Zikore Shore. Approach it and release the curse of Indolence.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada mutated Tree Root Crystals di Zikore Shore. Dekati dan hilangkanlah curse of Indolence.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters swarming out
Philip's Soldiers: Mengalahkan monsters yang berkeliaran

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters jumped out when you touched the Tree Root Crystal! Defeat them all within time limit.
Philip's Soldiers: Monsters keluar saat kamu menyentuh Tree Root Crystal! Kalahkan mereka dalam batas waktu yang ditentukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the mutated Tree Root Crystal in Zikore Shore
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan mutated Tree Root Crystal di Zikore Shore

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated all monsters. Destroy the Tree Root Crystal again.
Philip's Soldiers: Mengalahkan semua monsters. Hancurkan Tree Root Crystal lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: There is a Tree Root Crystal to the east of Pilgrim's Grave. You must destroy that Tree Root Crystal in order to release the curse on this land.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada Tree Root Crystal di dekat Pilgrim's Grave. Kamu harus menghancurkan Tree Root Crystal untuk melepaskan kutukan pada tanah ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Cactusvel
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Cactusvel

Philipas' Soldier: The Tree Root Crystal turned into a Cactusvel! Defeat the Cactusvel.
Philip's Soldiers: Tree Root Crystal berubah menjadi Cactusvel! Kalahkan Cactusvel.

Philipas' Soldier: Mutated Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Tree Root Crystal yang bermutasi

Philipas' Soldier: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal in Paskuti Crooked Road. Take a close look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat mutated Tree Root Crystal di Paskuti Crooked Road. Periksalah dengan teliti.

Philipas' Soldier: Gather energy source of Tree Root Crystal from monsters nearby
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan sumber energi dari Tree Root Crystal dari monster didekatnya

Philipas' Soldier: While taking a look at the Tree Root Crystal, it made a weird reaction and contaminated nearby area! First, let's find the energy source of Tree Root Crystal that were scattered among the monsters during the reaction.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat memeriksa Tree Root Crystal, mengeluarkan reaksi yang aneh dan mencemari area disekitarnya! Pertama, temukan sumber energi dari Tree Root Crystal yang tersebar pada monster-monster di sekitarnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Seal the mutated Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Segel mutated Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: Gathered all the energy source of Tree Root Crystals. Use it to seal the Tree Root Crystal.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan semua sumber energi dari Tree Root Crystals. Gunakan untuk menyegel Tree Root Crystal.

Philipas' Soldier: Mutated Tree Root Crystal of Noras Fountain
Philip's Soldiers: Mutated Tree Root Crystal dari Noreti Shelter

Philipas' Soldier: There is a mutated Tree Root Crystal in Noras Fountain. Get closer and check what must be done to release the curse of Indolence.
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat mutated Tree Root Crystal di Noreti Shelter. Pergilah kesana dan periksalah apa yang harus dilakukan untuk melepaskan curse of Indolence.

Philipas' Soldier: Break the Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: Multiple Tree Root Crystals were summoned while you were checking the Tree Root Crystal! Find the real Tree Root Crystal and break it.
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa Tree Root Crystals muncul saat kamu memeriksa Tree Root Crystal! Temukan Tree Root Crystal yang asli dan hancurkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Alley to the Scattered Stairway
Philip's Soldiers: Gang menuju Scattered Stairway

Philipas' Soldier: In the vacant lot along the alley to the Scattered Stairway, there is a large mutated Tree Root Crystal. Its size and form is different from other Tree Root Crystals. Take a look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ditempat yang kosong sepanjang gang di Scattered Stairway, ada Tree Root Crystal besar yang bermutasi. Ukuran dan bentuknya berbeda dari Tree Root Crystals lainnya. Cobalah untuk memeriksanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Shape-shifting Glutton
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan transformed Glutton

Philipas' Soldier: The Tree Root Crystal suddenly transformed to a Glutton! Defeat the Glutton!
Philip's Soldiers: Tree Root Crystal berubah menjadi Glutton! Kalahkan Glutton!

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Glutton that was once a Tree Root Crystal
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Glutton yang berubah menjadi Tree Root Crystal

Philipas' Soldier: There is a treasure chest in Pilgrim's grave. What will happen when you kick it?
Philip's Soldiers: Ada peti di Pilgrim's grave. Apa yang terjadi jika kamu menendangnya?

Philipas' Soldier: Bring back the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa kembali monsternya

Philipas' Soldier: All the monsters came out of the treasure chest when you opened it! Bring back the monsters and place them back in the box.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua monster keluar dari treasure chest ketika kamu membukanya! Bawalah monsters dan letakan kembali di dalam kotak tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: There seems to be a pilgrim in trouble near Vinas Brewery. Approach him and listen to his story.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya mereka adalah pilgrim yang sedang mengalami masalah di dekat Vinas Brewery. Datangi dia dan dengarkan kisahnya.

Philipas' Soldier: When Pilgrim Gracius touched the altar, something went wrong. Pilgrim Gracius fainted and monsters rushed out. First, defeat all the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika Pilgrim Gracius menyentuh altar, sesuatu yang janggal terjadi dan monster keluar lalu Gracius pingsan. Pertama, Kalahkan semua monsters.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Pilgrim Gracius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara pada Gracius

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated all the monsters. Pilgrim Gracius regained his senses again so ask him what happened.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan semua monster. Gracius kembali sadar jadi tanyalah padanya apa yang sebenarnya terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that rushed out of the altar
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monsters yang keluar dari altar

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Gracius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah pada Gracius

Philipas' Soldier: Try talking to Gracius
Philip's Soldiers: Coba berbicara dengan Gracius

Philipas' Soldier: Pray to the altar
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoalah kepada altar

Philipas' Soldier: With a suspicious look, Gracius asked you to offer prayer to the altar in front. Offer prayers first to relieve Gracius' suspicions and listen to his story.
Philip's Soldiers: Dengan curiga, Gracius memintamu berdoa pada. Berdoalah untuk menghilangkan kecurigaan Gracius's suspicions dan dengarkanlah kisahnya.

Philipas' Soldier: You offered prayer to the altar and released the trapped souls. Talk to Pilgrim Gracius again.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berdoa pada altar dan melepaskan jiwa yang terjebak. Bicaralah kembali pada Gracius again.

Philipas' Soldier: Now talk to Gracius again.
Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah kembali pada Gracius.

Philipas' Soldier: Go and Test the Reagent
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi dan beristirahatlah.

Philipas' Soldier: Let's go and test if the medicine Gracius gave you is effective. The key point is to test it carefully while avoiding the monster attacks.
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi dan periksalah apakah obat yang diberikan oleh Gracius berkhasiat. Intinya adalah mencobanya dengan hati-hati sembari menghindari serangan monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Tell Gracius about the results
Philip's Soldiers: Beritahu Gracius hasilnya

Philipas' Soldier: It seems to have failed. Tell Gracius about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Keli9hatannya gagal. Beritahu Gracius mengenai hal ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Told him the test medicine did not work. Now talk to him again on what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Beritahu dia bahwa test medicine tidaklah bekerja. Sekarang tanya kembali padanya apa yang harus dilakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Get the Scripture from the Pilgrim's Soul
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan kitab para pilgrims

Philipas' Soldier: You need to get on more thing for the test medicine. You can get a hint about it from the altar on the northern part of Rudiziu Forest road.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu perlu mengumpulkan beberapa bahan lagi untuk test medicine. Kamu bisa mendapatkan petunjuknya dari altar di bagian utaraf Rudiziu Forest road.

Philipas' Soldier: Give the scriptures
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan kitabnya

Philipas' Soldier: The pilgrim who was trapped by Merge gave you the scripture as he disappeared. Give it to Pilgrim Gracius.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim, terperangkap oleh Merge, memberikan kitab suci sebelum dia pergi. Berikan kepada Gracius.

Philipas' Soldier: Seems like you can now listen to the story behind this place from Gracius.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya kamu mengetahui kisah dari tempat ini melalui Gracius.

Philipas' Soldier: Free the soul from the monster
Philip's Soldiers: Bebaskan soul dari monster

Philipas' Soldier: Angry souls are not only in the altar but also trapped in the monsters. You can see the monsters with souls in it when you use the dye of light that Gracius gave you. Get those monsters and free the souls.
Philip's Soldiers: Soul yang marah tidak hanya terdapat pada altar namun juga terjebak di dalam montser. Kamu dapat melihat monster dengan soul di dalamnya ketika kamu menggunakan dye of light yang diberikan oleh Gracius. Kejar para monster dan bebaskan para soul.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated all the monsters that had souls trapped inside them. Talk to Pilgrim Gracius agian.
Philip's Soldiers: Tangkap semua monster yang memiliki soul terjebak. Bicaralah pada Gracius.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters with souls trapped inside them
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan para Monster dengan jiwa yang terjebak di dalamnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Gracius to free the souls trapped in each altar.
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara pada Gracius untuk membebaskan soul yang terjebak di setiap altar.

Philipas' Soldier: Free the souls
Philip's Soldiers: Bebaskan soul

Philipas' Soldier: Follow Gracius' words and find altars in the Scattered Stairway and calm the angry souls who are enraged for being betrayed.
Philip's Soldiers: Ikutilah saran dari Gracius dan temukan altars di Scattered Stairway dan tenangkan angry souls yang mengamuk karena di khianati.

Philipas' Soldier: Meet Pilgrim Gracius
Philip's Soldiers: Temuilah Pilgrim Gracius

Philipas' Soldier: Successfully comforted all trapped souls. Now return to Gracius.
Philip's Soldiers: Berhasil menenangkan trapped souls. Sekarang kembalilah kepada Gracius.

Philipas' Soldier: Chliz Uphill Altar
Philip's Soldiers: Altar dalam perjalanan ke Chliz Uphill

Philipas' Soldier: There is an altar on the way to Chliz Uphill. Offer prayers for the souls in Scattered Stairway.
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat altar dalam perjalananan menuju Chliz Uphill. Persembahkan doa pada soul di Scattered Stairway.

Philipas' Soldier: Flowers for the angry souls
Philip's Soldiers: Bunga untuk angry souls

Philip's Soldiers: Masih ada altars yang tidak diketahui fungsinya pada Scattered Stairway. Altars di the North Rudiziu Trail lumayan hacur membuatnya makin sulit diketahui apa fungsinya. Pergi dan periksalah.

Philipas' Soldier: Merge suddenly appeared when you approached the altar and started destroying the souls that appeared nearby the altar! Defeat the Merge!

Philip's Soldiers: Persembahkan doa untuk sanctuary

Philip's Soldiers: pancinglah monsters untuk digunakan sebagai persembahan

Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu mau menghormati sanctuary dengan benar, kamu harus mengorbankan sesuatu seperti yang tertulis pada penunjuk. Pancing monster terdekat ke sanctuary dan kalahkan.

Philip's Soldiers: Memberikan persembahan pada Sanctuary

Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monsters dekat sanctuary

Philip's Soldiers: Monsters keluar saat kamu mempersembahkan doa pada sanctuary! Sepertinya monsters muncul setelah mencium bau daging karena sanctuary sudah tercemar. Kalahkan monsters lalu carilah jalan untuk memulihkan sanctuary.

Philip's Soldiers: Pergilah ke Priest Master

Philip's Soldiers: Priest Master menjaga sanctuary ini jadi dia pasti tahu cara memulihkannya. Sepertinya akan menjadi perjalanan yang panjang, tapi ayo kita lakukan.

Philip's Soldiers: Orang-orang kehilangan silver dan bahkan pingsan setelah memberikan persembahan uang ke sanctuary. Sepertinya sanctuary ini juga tercemar dan petunjuk yang ada mengatakan bahwa Pardoner Master yang merawatnya, jadi temuilah dia.

Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Ironbaum

Philip's Soldiers: Frey melihat Woodmen di Deer Hooves Lot dan dia berpikir mungkin mereka ada hubungannya dengan suara tidak menyenangkan yang dibawa bubbes bersama mereka. Agar Frey bisa memeriksanya, kalahkan Woodmen dan bawakan fragments kepadanya.

Philipas' Soldier: The occurrence of the Petrifying Frost became irregular after Medzio Diena four years ago.{nl}Due to its irregularity, we lost many of our soldiers in this wasteland.{nl}And we also install the search devices for the Petrifying Frost limitedly here in Verkti Square and we move out our soldiers accordingly based on the frequency of the occurrence.
Philip's Soldiers: The occurence of petrified frosts became irregular after the day of divine tree 4 years ago.{nl}Due to its irregularity, we lost many of our soldiers in this wasteland.{nl}And we also install the search devices for the petrified frosts limitedly here in Verkti Square and we move out our soldiers accordingly based on the frequency of the occurence.

Philipas' Soldier: You've accepted a difficult mission, so I don't know how I can thank you...{nl}Okay, I need you to defeat monsters at the Forest of Prayer.{nl}The Forest of Prayer is located past Fedimian and on the way to the Great Cathedral.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menerima tugas yang sulit sampai aku tidak tahu caranya berterima kasih..{nl}Baiklah, kalau begitu kalahkanlah monster di Forest of Prayer.{nl}Forest of Prayer terletak dekat Fedimian dalam perjalanan menuju great cathedral.

Philipas' Soldier: My necklace... My music box...
Philip's Soldiers: Kalungku.. Kotak musikku..

Philipas' Soldier: Julius... I am sorry...
Philip's Soldiers: Julious...Maafkan aku..

Philipas' Soldier: Hey... I am so hungry, I can't move at all.{nl}Anything will do, please get me something to eat.
Philip's Soldiers: Hei.. Aku tidak bisa bergerak karena lapar.{nl}Berikan apa saja untuk aku makan.

Philipas' Soldier: The meat of those monsters over there will do.{nl}Please hurry..
Philip's Soldiers: Daging monsterpun tidak masalah.{nl}Cepatlah..

Philipas' Soldier: Not yet?{nl}I am so hungry that I feel like I could even eat a handful of dust...
Philip's Soldiers: Belum?{nl}Aku sangat lapar bahkan batu pun mungkin bisa kumakan..

Philipas' Soldier: Meat? Are you going to eat it?{nl}Yes.. Give me that!
Philip's Soldiers: Meat? Apa kamu akan memakannya?{nl}Tentu.. Berikan padaku!

Philipas' Soldier: Don't go yet! I am starving to death.{nl}The meat you brought me came too late. What must I do?
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan pergi! Aku kelaparan sampai mati.{nl}Dagingnya terlambat. Apa yang harus aku lakukan?

Philipas' Soldier: Okay.. I think I can eat those Young Leaves.{nl}They're thin and wet... yes, they will be good!
Philip's Soldiers: Baiklah. Mungkin aku akan memakan daun muda itu.{nl}Kecil dan basah.. Pasti enak!

Philipas' Soldier: My hunger doesn't go away even after eating a lot.{nl}It's actually getting worse, I might as well just die.
Philip's Soldiers: Rasa laparku tidak hilang walau sudah banyak makan.{nl}Dan semakin parah, lebih baik aku mati.

Philipas' Soldier: There must be something to eat around here..{nl}Please... get me something to eat.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pasti ada yang bisa dimakan di sekitar sini..{nl}Kumohon.. Ambilkan aku sesuatu yang bisa dimakan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I am so hungry yet something is echoing inside my head...{nl}The sound of a music box..  I can't eat an echo..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat lapar sampai terdengar gemuruh dalam tubuhku..{nl}Suara kotak musik yang tidak bisa dimakan..

Philipas' Soldier: Ahh, my Liliya...{nl}I will never be able to see you again...
Philip's Soldiers: Ahah, Lily ku..{nl}Mungkin aku tidak akan bisa melihatmu lagi

Philipas' Soldier: Please think of that necklace as the gift from Liliya and keep it safe.{nl}It carries a blessing from the Great Cathedral, so it will help you.
Philip's Soldiers: Anggap saja kalung itu adalah hadiah dari Liliya dan jaga baik-baik.{nl}Benda itu diberkati oleh cathedral jadi pasti itu akan membantumu.

Philipas' Soldier: I am still hungry. Hungry...{nl}I can't take it anymore. I am hungry!
Philip's Soldiers: Aku masih lapar. lapar.{nl}Sudah tidak kuat. Lapar!

Philipas' Soldier: I am so... hungry.{nl}Hey, if you have any leftover food, please share it with me...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat.. lapar.{nl}Oi, kalau kamu punya makanan sisa, bagi dong..

Philipas' Soldier: Even if that's all you have, please share it with me... Please...
Philip's Soldiers: Jika hanya itu yang kamu miliki, bagilah aku.. tolong..

Philipas' Soldier: Meat... Quickly... {nl}I feel like I am dying.
Philip's Soldiers: Meat..cepat. {nl}Sepertinya aku sekarat.

Philipas' Soldier: Meat... Meat!{nl}Please give it to me fast. Fast!
Philip's Soldiers: Meat.. Meat!{nl}Berika padaku. Cepat!

Philipas' Soldier: Wait, that music box.. What is it?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tunggu.. Itu, kotak musik? Itu apa?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: My memories... She...{nl}Give it to me! That's mine!
Philip's Soldiers: Kenangankuâ€¦ dia..{nl}Berikan padaku! Itu milikku!

Philipas' Soldier: Damn. What was I doing?{nl}Ahah. Liliya... My Liliya!{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sial. Apa yang aku lakukan?{nl}Ahah. Liliya.. Liliya ku!{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We left for a pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral to receive the blessings of the goddesses to celebrate our wedding.{nl}But then, that evil Naktis... that unforgivable Demon Lord.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus pergi ke great cathedral untuk melakukan ziarah demi pemberkatan Goddesses saat merayakan pernikahan.{nl}Lalu, si Naktis yang kejam.. Demon Lord yang tidak bisa ku maafkan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Stole her music box and necklace and gave them to the monsters and cursed her with gluttony.{nl}As if to laugh at Maven's lessons.
Philip's Soldiers: Mencuri kalung dan musik box miliknya lalu memberikannya kepada monsters kemudian mengutuknya dengan keserakahan.{nl}Seolah-olah menertawakan ajaran Maven.

Philipas' Soldier: Wait. My head is shaking because of the curse. {nl}I still have a lot more to say... I don't know if I would be able to endure until then.
Philip's Soldiers: Tunggu. Kepalaku berguncang karena kutukan. {nl}Aku masih ingin mengatakan banyak hal.. Aku tidak tahu apakah akan bisa bertahan sampai saat itu.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard the Asellus at the Hollow Tree Forest have purifying powers.{nl}I should be able to endure with its purification.
Philip's Soldiers: Kudengar Aselus menyucikan Empty Trees Forest.{nl}Kita akan bertahan dengan penyucian miliknya.

Philipas' Soldier: To completely remove the curse, you should go see the priests...{nl}I want to stay here and recollect Liliya a little more.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk benar-benar melepas kutukannya, kamu harus pergi menemui disciples..{nl}Aku ingin tetap berada disini sedikit lagi untuk mengenang Liliya.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks. Way better.{nl}My Liliya... my music box... She must not be in this world.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Rasanya jauh lebih baik.{nl}Liliya ku.. Kotak musik ku.. Dia tidak mungkin ada di dunia ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you meet the servant of Naktis in any case, please get a revenge for her.{nl}The mark of our love which the demon possesses... Please receive it as a compensation for my gratitude.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kebetulan kamu bertemu dengan pengikut Naktis, balaskanlah dendamnya.{nl}Bukti cinta yang telah dirasuki oleh demon.. Terimalah ini sebagai ungkapan atas rasa terima kasihku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This necklce will be very useful since it is blessed by the Great Cathedral. {nl}That necklace is meaningless to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalung ini akan berguna berhubung sudah diberkati oleh great cathedral. {nl}Kalung ini sangat berarti untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: You should not touch it.{nl}It will come soon... just wait little more.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak boleh menyentuhnya.{nl}Sedikit lagi akan datang.. Tunggulah sedikit lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you see that? That boy is my son, who left for the pilgrimage four years ago.{nl}I followed him to save him from the curse.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu melihatnya? Anak itu adalah anakku yang pergi berziarah 4 tahun lalu.{nl}Aku mengikutinya untuk melepasnya dari kutukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much for your words.{nl}It will be good if you could defeat the monsters that are disturbing me.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih atas kata-kata mu.{nl}Akan lebih baik lagi jika kamu menghabisi monster yang mengganggu ku.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a way to save my son.{nl}I believe that my devotion to this will reach him eventually.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada cara untuk menyelamatkan anakku.{nl}Aku percaya kebenaran akan terungkap suatu saat.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done. {nl}I won't be scared of anything from now on, because of you.
Philip's Soldiers: bagus. {nl}Aku tidak takut dengan apapun karena kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: If the amount of Food Scraps that I gave to you is not enough, go to Isblyskes Square.{nl}I have mixed divine water into the food there.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika jumlah maknan tersisa yang aku berikan tidak cukup, pergilah ke Ishiblashi square.{nl}Aku telah mencampur divine water kedalam makanan di sana.

Philipas' Soldier: The food that was stolen by my son is mixed with the divine water. {nl}As time passes by, he will throw up all the energy of the curse.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Makanan yang dicuri dari anakku tercampur dengan divine water. {nlSeiring ebrjalannya waktu, dia akan memuntahkan semua energi kutukan itu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: To be honest with you, I don't know if I will be able to save my son with this.{nl} I need hope, I mean... I need some reliable results.
Philip's Soldiers: jujur saja, aku tidak tahu apakah bisa menyelamatkan anakku dengan ini.{nl}Maksudku.. Aku butuh kepastian.

Philipas' Soldier: When you throw these Food Scraps to the monsters, some of them might eat the food.{nl}If you attack them a lot afterwards, they will throw up. Bring me what they throw up.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika kamu melempar makanan sisa ini kepada para monster, pasti akan ada beberapa dari mereka yang memakannya.{nl}Jika kamu menyerang mereka, pasti akan ada yang menjatuhkannya. Bawakanlah padaku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If there are not enough Food Scraps, you can get some more at Isblyskes Square.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika makanan sisa yang ada tidaklah cukup, kita bisa mendapatkannya dari Ishiblashi square.

Philipas' Soldier: The Condensed Cursed Energy. It indeed worked. {nl}Now I should just wait for my son to throw up.{nl}Thank you so much. May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always...{nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulan dari kutukan. Benar-benar berguna. {nl}Aku hanya perlu menunggu anakku untuk melepaskannya.{nl}Terima kasih banyak. Semoga Goddesses selalu memberkati mu..{nl}{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I am sorry, but I am a bit busy.{nl}I have many things going on in my head, so could you just please go now?
Philip's Soldiers: Maafkan aku, tapi aku sibuk.{nl}Masih banyak yang aku harus pikirkan, jadi bisakah kamu pergi sekarang?

Philipas' Soldier: What the hell was that...{nl}You saved me. I am sorry about before.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang..{nl}Kamu menyelamatkan ku. Maafkan aku.

Philipas' Soldier: While my brothers were on the their way to the pilgrimage, they all died due to the tricks from the demons.{nl}I feel sorry for my brothers who can't return to the godddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika para saudaraku pergi untuk latihan, mereka semua mati karena tipu muslihat demon.{nl}Aku sangat berduka akan roh para saudaraku yang tidak bisa kembali pada Godddess.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I might be down a bit, but I want to help them somehow.{nl}Please. Please help me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku juga tidak normal, tapi aku ingin membantumu.{nl}Jadi tolonglah. Sekarang bantulah aku.

Philipas' Soldier: I was going to release the souls that were locked in this altar.{nl}But, it didn't work. Was there something wrong with my prayer?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membebaskan jiwa yang terkunci pada altar ini.{nl}Tapi, hal itu tidak berjalan mulus. Apakah ada doaku yang salah?

Philipas' Soldier: I was broken off from the group due to my injury, but became sensitive to what lay ahead.{nl}After all, I saw a group of demons move on out.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangatlah sensitif sebelum pindah dari garis depan karena cedera.{nl}Setelah aku melihat barisan para demon.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That night... I hid behind the grass forest and had to look at everything. {nl}Everyone was pointing guns at each other. They were so close to each other...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Malam itu.. Aku bersembunyi dibelakang grass forest dan memperhatikan semuanya. {nl}Semua orang mengarahkan senjatanya satu sama lain. Mereka sangat dekat..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: And they were so absorbed with madness even after their death so they could not even return to the goddesses.{nl}That's why I wanted to give them the eternal sleep.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dan mereka begitu terhanyut oleh kemarahan bahkan setelah meninggal mereka tidak bisa kembali kepada Goddesses.{nl}Itulah sebabnya aku ingin membantu mereka beristirahat.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe, everything so far was fated so that I would become a priest. Oh, goddesses...
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin, semua ini memang sudah takdirku untuk menjadi disciple. Ah Goddesses..

Philipas' Soldier: I can't move with my legs like this.{nl}Why'd it have to be like this... The only one I can trust is you.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa bergerak dengan kaki seperti ini.{nl}Bagaimana bisa ini.. Yang bisa kupercaya hanyalah kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Before I left for my pilgrimage, I overheard the stories about the Revelators.{nl}And you are really special among them. Can you listen to me little more?
Philip's Soldiers: Sebelum aku pergi untuk berziarah, aku mendengar kisah para Saviors.{nl}Dan kamu sangatlah spesial diantara mereka semua. Maukah kamu mendengarnya lebih banyak lagi?

Philipas' Soldier: It was really horrible. Those brothers who used to be keen to each other hurt each other...{nl}And the demons cheated on those brothers who died.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sangat mengerikan. Mereka yang bersaudara satu sama lain kini mencoba untuk saling membunuh..{nl}Dan demon memanfaatkan mereka yang sudah mati.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Some of their souls were thrown to the monsters like toys.{nl}Those souls need to be laid to rest as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa jiwa dilemparkan kepada monsters seperti mainan.{nl}Padahal para jiwa itu membutuhkan ketenangan.

Philipas' Soldier: Can you first test this?{nl}I am making a reagent that will extract souls from monsters, but it's not working so well.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bisakah kamu mencoba ini?{nl}Aku membuat medicine untuk memisahkan spirits dari monsters, tapi tidak berfungsi dengan baik.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Test this on the monsters that shines with the light of the souls
Philip's Soldiers: Coba gunakan ini pada monsters yang bersinar karena light of the spirits

Philipas' Soldier: Use anything you have, this method, that method, this ingredient and that ingredient.{nl}It should work well...
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan apapun yang kamu miliki, cara ini, atau yang itu, bahan ini dan bahan yang lainnya.{nl}Seharusnya dapat berfungsi dengan baik..

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, something must be lacking.{nl}Maybe the method is wrong too...
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, pasti ada yang kurang.{nl}Mungkin caranya juga salah..

Philipas' Soldier: I remembered what's missing. A scripture!{nl}One of the souls that is locked in the nearby altar should have one.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingat apa yang kurang. Scripture!{nl}Salah satu spirits yang terjebak di altar terdekat pasti memilikinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Unfortunately, I lost my Scripture in the mess.{nl}If I had it, I would have remembered that right away.
Philip's Soldiers: Sayangnya, aku kehilangan scripture milikku dalam kekacauan.{nl}Andai saja aku memilikinya, aku harus segera mengingatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: This is it. Many mysteries are being solved because of you.{nl}Let's see, why don't we try a different method this time?
Philip's Soldiers: Ini dia. Banyak petunjuk yang terpecahkan karena bantuanmu.{nl}Ayo kita lihat, kenapa kita tidak mencoba cara lainnya?

Philipas' Soldier: The spirits inside the monsters' stomach will shine when you use this medicine this time.{nl}When you defeat that monster, the spirits that were tied there will be freed.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Spirit di dalam perut monsters akan bersinar ketika kamu menggunakan medicine ini.{nl}Setelah mengalahkan monster itu, spirits yang terikat akan terbebaskan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: My brothers are blaming each other and crying out in madness even after their death.{nl}At the altar of the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saudaraku saling menyalahkan dan menangis dalam kegilaan bahkan setelah mereka meninggal.{nl}Di altar of the Goddesses.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Even a living being like myself could never forgive it, how would the souls feel?{nl}How could I let priests, those who should spread the love of the goddesses, do such a thing?
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan yang masih hidup sepertiku pun tidak bisa melupakannya, bagaimana perasaan sebuah spirit?{nl}Bagaimana bisa aku membuat seorang disciples melakukan hal seperti itu yang seharusnya adalah menyebarkan kebaikan sang Goddesses.

Philipas' Soldier: They will definitely thank you.{nl}I hope the blessing of the goddess lights your way.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka juga pasti akan berterima kasih.{nl}Aku harap berkat dari Goddess  akan menerangi jalanmu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This method will be effective for sure.{nl}It must be. If not...
Philip's Soldiers: Cara ini pasti akan berhasil.{nl}Dan ini pasti terjadi saat ini. Jika saja bukan aku..

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much for everything so far.{nl}Because of you, my brothers can rest in peace now.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih untuk semuanya sejauh ini.{nl}Karena bantuanmu, saudaraku dapat beristirahat dengan tenang.

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, not only my brothers are trapped here.{nl}When you see a soul that needs saving, please do not just leave it, but save it in the name of the goddess.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, bukan hanya untuk saudaraku ditahan disini.{nl}Ketika kamu melihat spirit yang tidak terselamatkan, jangan hanya lewat saja, selamatkanlah demi nama Goddess .

Philipas' Soldier: The demons were looking for this thing while teasing spirits.{nl}Maybe it has something to do with the Great Cathedral at the end of the Pilgrims' Way.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hal yang dijaga oleh demon saat menyiksa spirits.{nl}Mungkin ada hubungannya dengan great cathedral pada akhir perjalanan penjiarah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, something came to mind now that you mention the Great Cathedral.{nl}I have this crafting recipe, but I have no idea how to use it.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, aku jadi mengingat sesuatu saat kamu menyebutkan nama great cathedral.{nl}Aku memiliki crafting manual, tapi tidak tahu cara menggunakannya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But if there's anyone who could help all the spirits lay into eternal rest..{nl}It would be the owner of this land.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Namun jika ada yang mau menolong para spirits untuk beristirahat..{nl}Dia pastilah pemilik tanah ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If it's you, then it won't be hard to find a way to save them.{nl}I will stay here and pray that the souls attain eternal rest.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika itu adalah kamu, tidak akan sulit bagimu menemukan cara untuk menyelamatkan mereka.{nl}Aku akan menetap disini dan berdoa untuk ketenangan para spirits.

Philipas' Soldier: There are many ways to send souls to eternal rest.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada banyak cara untuk memberikan kedamaian bagi para spirits.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You may have to dedicate some flowers, or you may have to collect the scriptures of the pilgrims..{nl}You may have to suppress wrathful spirits with your power.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bisa mempersembahkan bunga, atau kamu harus mengumpulkan scriptures of the pilgrims..{nl}Kamu mungkin harus melawan para spirits marah itu dengan kekuatanmu.

Philipas' Soldier: You helped the restrained spirits to sleep eternally?{nl}Oh my god.. This craft manual definitely belongs to you. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu membantu spirits untuk tidur selamanya?{nl}Ya ampun.. Craft manual ini adalah milikmu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This artifact was left to me by my grandfather. He gave it to me because I had always dreamed to become a priest.{nl}This is meaningless to me now. I will create a commemoration for my colleagues here and live on.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah artifact yang ditinggalkan oleh kakekku berhubung aku pernah bermimpi menjadi disciples. {nl}Ini tidak berarti untukku sekarang. Aku akan memperingati kematian teman-temanku dan terus berjuang untuk hidup.

Philipas' Soldier: Guide Purple Tree Fault Forest
Philip's Soldiers: Guide Purple Tree Fault Forest

Philipas' Soldier: There are many blessed sanctums in the Forest of Prayer. {nl}All pilgrims who cross here should pray in front of these sanctums and receive the blessings of the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada banyak blessed sanctums di Forest of Prayer. {nl}Semua peziarah yang melewati tempat ini berdoa di depan santums dan menerima berkat dari Goddesses.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Each sanctum is managed by a master of the cleric class. {nl}If you find any problems at a sanctum, go meet the class master that manages that sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Setiap sanctum dijaga oleh Cleric Master. {nl}Jika kamu menemukan masalah pada sanctum, pergi temui Cleric Master yang menjaga sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: The detailed locations of each sanctum..{nl}(The notice board is broken in half, so you can't read the rest.)
Philip's Soldiers: Lokasi detail dari setiap sanctum..{nl}(Petunjuknya terbelah dua jadi kamu tidak bisa membacanya dengan jelas.)

Philipas' Soldier: Sanctum Notice Board
Philip's Soldiers: Notice Board of Sanctums

Philipas' Soldier: When you make a contribution to prove your belief, you will receive blessings from the goddesses.{nl}Please understand that the amount of the contribution one can make differs by the individual.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika kamu memberikan jasa untuk membuktikan kepercayaanmu, kamu akan menerima berkat dari Goddesses.{nl}Jumlah kontribusi dari setiap orang berbeda-beda jadi aku meminta pengertianmu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: May the blessing of good fortune be with you today.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Pardoner Master] Mistes Goldmund
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga keberuntungan selalu menyertaimu.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager  [Pardoner Master] Mistes Goldmund

Philipas' Soldier: Show your determination to defeat enemies for the goddesses.{nl}Sacrifice their vicious beings to the sanctum as proof of your belief.
Philip's Soldiers: Tunjukkan tekadmu bahwa kamu akan menghabisi para monster tersebut demi Goddesses.{nl}Habisi makhluk-makhluk jahat di sanctums sebagai bukti kepercayaanmu.

Philipas' Soldier: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Priest Master] Boruble
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga berkat Goddesses selalu bersamamu.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Priest Master] Boruble

Philipas' Soldier: The goddesses will only answer to truthful prayers.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Goddesses hanya akan menjawab doa yang tulus.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Cleric Master] Rosalia
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga berkat Goddesses selalu bersamamu.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Cleric Master] Rosalia

Philipas' Soldier: A scripture cover page with a vague smell of blood. Did the monsters swallow the other pages?
Philip's Soldiers: Sampul dari scripture dengan bau darah yang samar. Apa monsters memakan halaman lainnya?

Philipas' Soldier: Pure Water that purifies the spirits.{nl}This is also the mighty power of the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Air bersih yang mensucikan spirits.{nl}Ini juga salah satu kekuatan dari Goddesses.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The stream near the sanctums has been purified, so get Pure Water from Ryskus City.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Oracle Master] Apolonija Barbora{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mata air di dekat sanctums telah disucikan begitu pula dedicate the water of Lishikio.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Oracle Master] Apolonija Barbora{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: All life that flourishes on this land are the results of the blessings of the goddesses.{nl}Appreciate the goddesses with beautiful flowers.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Semua kehidupan yang ada di tanah ini adalah berkat yang diberikan oleh Goddesses.{nl}Ungkapkanlah penghargaan kepada Goddesses dengan bunya yang indah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: May the blessings of the goddesses be with you always.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Druid Master] Gina Greene{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga berkat Goddesses selalu bersamamu.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Druid Master] Jina Green{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you prove your belief by making contributions, you will receive our blessing.{nl}For advice on this belief, please purchase warp scrolls from the stand and visit our master.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu membuktikan kepercayaanmu dengan berkontribusi, kamu akan diberkati.{nl}Sebagai saran kepada sesama penganut, belilah warp scrolls dari toko.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Lower yourself in front of the goddesses and leave everything to them.{nl}The goddesses will bless the ones who truly confess their wrongdoings.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Rendahkan dirimu dihadapan Goddesses dan serahkan semua padanya.{nl}Goddesses akan memberkati mereka yang mengakui semua kesalahannya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: May the goddesses remove your ordeals.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Krivis Master] Hercus
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga Goddesses menghapus dosa-dosamu.{nl}-- Sanctum Manager : [Krivi Master] Hercus

Philipas' Soldier: Make contributions to appreciate the goddesses.{nl}The blessing will be with you always.
Philip's Soldiers: Berkontribusi lah untuk menunjukan penghargaan kepada Goddesses.{nl}Kamu akan selalu diberkati.

Philipas' Soldier: Pray in front of the goddesses.{nl}Sacrifice the vicious monsters to prove your belief.
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoalah di depan Goddesses.{nl}Kamu harus menghabisi makhluk jahat sebagai persembahan.

Philipas' Soldier: I already knew that Pilgrim's Way was ruined with Naktis' curse.{nl}But I didn't know that even the sanctums were corrupted.. It's such a shame.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah tahu bawah jalan para peziarah terganggu oleh ulah Naktis.{nl}Tapi, aku tidak tahu kalau sanctums sudah tercemar.. Sayang sekali.

Philipas' Soldier: It would be the best if I do it myself, but I can't leave this place behind.{nl}I want you to purify the Sanctums with this divine water.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Akan lebih baik jika aku melakukannya sendiri, tapi aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini.{nl}Aku ingi kamu mensucikan sanctums dengan divine water ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I heard the congregation sent the disciples, but I guess it didn't turn out right.{nl}I think the everything will be alright since you will do it. But I am still uneasy.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dengar congregation mengirim para disciples, tapi aku rasa hal ini tidak benar.{nl}Aku rasa semuanya akan baik-baik saja kalau kamu yang melakukannya. Tapi rasanya masih tidak nyaman.

Philipas' Soldier: The statue of Goddess Vakarine at the Forest of Prayer..{nl}Naktis.. How would have one ever known that she would ruin the teachings of Archbishop Maven.
Philip's Soldiers: Statue of Vakarine di Forest of Prayer.{nl}Naktis.. Bagaimana mungkin orang akan tahu bahwa dia akan menghancurkan ajaran Maven, sang great bishop.

Philipas' Soldier: In any case, we could at least do some emergency procedures.{nl}Collect Grey Gypsum Fragments and repair it with dewdrops that are endowed with the blessings of the morning star.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimanapun seharusnya kita bisa melakukan prosedur darurat.{nl}Kumpulkan plaster fragments dan perbaikilah dengan menggunakan embun yang diberkati oleh bintang fajar.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope the goddesses protect you.{nl}Not only the statues of the goddesses, but the sanctums also would have many problems.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harap Goddesses melindungimu.{nl}Bukan hanya statues of the Goddesses, namun sanctums juga memiliki banyak masalah.

Philipas' Soldier: By 'corrupted sanctums', you mean the Forest of Prayer, right?{nl}I thought I had prepared a lot for that, but I guess Naktis' curse was even stronger.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu bilang sanctums yang tercemar, maksudnya adalah Forest of Prayer, kan?{nl}Aku kira aku sudah mempersiapkan diri untuk itu, tapi kurasa kutukan Naktis jauh lebih kuat.

Philipas' Soldier: I hid my Symbol of Faith in the sanctums to prepare for times like this.{nl}That symbol enables you to find the monsters who have swallowed the badges of the sanctum.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyembunyikan mark of the belief di sanctums untuk bersiap diri dengan kejadian seperti ini.{nl}Tanda itu memungkinkanmu untuk menemukan monsters yang akan menelan insignias dari monsters.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Find the badges of the sanctum and burn them in front of the sanctum.{nl}It may not return to how it used to be, but you will be able to purify it a bit.
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan insignias of the sanctums dan bakar semuanya di depan sanctums.{nl}Mungkin tidak akan kembali seperti semula, tapi setidaknya kamu bisa sedikit menyucikannya.

Philipas' Soldier: The blessing that cleanses evil energy.{nl}Oh, goddesses, bless us with purified water.
Philip's Soldiers: Blessing yang menyucikan energi jahat.{nl}Goddesses, memberkati dengan air suci.

Philipas' Soldier: A floral tribute to the goddesses.{nl}The pleasure and joy of collecting flowers.
Philip's Soldiers: Bunga yang dipersembahkan untuk Goddesses.{nl}Kegembiraan dan kebahagiaan

Philipas' Soldier: I was able to get one step closer to the goddesses due to my contribution.{nl}May the blessing be with you always.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku selangkah lebih dekat dengan Goddesses karena berkontribusi.{nl}Semoga kamu diberkati setiap saat.

Philipas' Soldier: You know that Pilgrim's Way holds the lessons of Maven right?{nl}To be able to cast a curse on humans as if they originally sinned... Naktis sure is formidable.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tahu kan bahwa Way of Pilgrims adalah ajaran Maven ?{nl}Naktis sangat menakjubkan. Dia dapat memberikan kutukan pada manusia seolah-olah itu adalah dosa mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: I feel hurt whenever I think about my son.{nl}I can't believe that my son who left for the pilgrimage to the Great Cathedral received the curse...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sedih setiap memikirkan anakku.{nl}Aku tidak percaya bahwa anakku yang pergi untuk berziarah ke great cathedral malah menerima kutukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Hey.. Please wait. You will face great danger if you just go on like that.{nl}This place has a very dangerous curse cast upon it. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hei.. Tunggu. Kamu akan menghadapi mara bahaya kalau pergi seperti itu begitu saja.{nl}Tempat ini dipenuhi oleh kutukan berbahaya. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, I just want to try some alchemy. I don't mean any harm. {nl}I will make some medicine for you, so you can consume it.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, aku ingin menjadi alchemist. Aku tidak bermaksud buruk. {nl}Aku akan membuat medicine untukmu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Okay then, I want you to find my bag... {nl}I am sorry. As you can see, I fell down while I was running away.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau begitu aku ingin kamu menemukan tas ku.. {nl}Maafkan aku. Seperti yang terlihat, aku terjatuh saat melarikan diri.

Philipas' Soldier: This place is crazy. {nl}This road is less like the road of the pilgrimage, and more like the road of the curses.
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini gila. {nl}Ini bukanlah jalan menuju ke penziarahan, ini adalah jalanan terkutuk.

Philipas' Soldier: The stuff in my bag should be untouched, since none of it was edible. {nl}I will make the medicine soon.
Philip's Soldiers: Benda-benda yang ada di dalam tas tidak tersentuh karena tidak dapat dimakan. {nl}Aku akan segera membuat medicine.

Philipas' Soldier: Darn. I thought they were all okay, but one of the bottles is broken. We needed that.. {nl}Fortunately, the ingredients are near here, but its too dangerous. What should I do?
Philip's Soldiers: Sialan. Aku kira mereka baik-baik saja, tapi salah satu botolnya pecah. Kami membutuhkannya.. {nl}Untungnya, bahan-bahannya ada di dekat sini, namun tempat ini berbahaya. Apa yang harus kulakukan?

Philipas' Soldier: Apsimesti Crossroads is not a road for pilgrims anymore, due to those vicious demons.{nl}How would one have ever known that they would encounter such demons right before they arrived at the Great Cathedral?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apsimesti Crossroad bukanlah rute yang aman lagi bagi peziarah karena ulah para demon.{nl}Bagaimana bisa mereka tidak mengetahui akan bertemu dengan para demon sebelum tiba pada Great Cathedral?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: After seeing my companion Witas fall under the curse of the demons, I ran away.{nl}As a result, I don't know about other curses, but I will be able to stop Witas' curse.
Philip's Soldiers: Setelah melihat teman-temanku, Withus jatuh kedalam kutukan para demon, aku berlari sekuat tenaga.{nl}Hasilnya, aku tidak mengetahui sama sekali tentang kutukan itu, tapi aku pasti bisa mengatasi kutukan Withus.

Philipas' Soldier: Go to the Sestines Wilderness and look for reeds with big leaves.{nl}Get the liquid essence from the monsters that reside in the reeds' roots.{nl}Remember to be careful...
Philip's Soldiers: Pergilah ke Sestine Wasteland dan carilah Big Leaves Reeds.{nl}Dapatkan liquid essence dari monsters yang bersarang di akarnya.{nl}Berhatri-hatilah..

Philipas' Soldier: I am not fully recovered yet... I am sorry that I can't go with you.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku belum sembuh sepenuhnya.. Maafkan aku tidak dapat pergi bersamamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, you did a good job. Please wait a moment.{nl}I am still hurt, but I think I can manage.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Karena kamu sudah membawanya. Tunggu sebentar.{nl}Aku masih terluka, tapi aku rasa masih bisa kuatasi.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Here you go. It is now completed. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini dia. Sekarang sudah sempurna. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: How about it? Can you feel it?{nl}The effect comes slowly so please be patient.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana? Bisa merasakannya?{nl}Efeknya berjalan lambat jadi bersabarlah.

Philipas' Soldier: A refreshing feeling slowly came over me.
Philip's Soldiers: Efeknya berjalan lambat dan aku merasa tenang.

Philipas' Soldier: When the medicine starts to take effect, you will be able to endure against the demons' curses.{nl}But wait, I... I have a favor to ask. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saat efek dari medicine bekerja padamu, kamu akan kebal terhadap kutukan demon.{nl}Tapi, Aku.. Aku memiliki permintaan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Witas. My colleague who is cursed.{nl}I would do anything to restore him to his normal status.
Philip's Soldiers: Withus. Temanku yang terkena curse.{nl}Aku ingin mengembalikannya seperti semula.

Philipas' Soldier: Objects that are precious to Witas are here. {nl}If you find these and show them to him, I think he will regain his senses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Benda yang sangat berarti untuk Withus ada di sini. {nl}Jika kamu menemukan dan menunjukannya padanya, aku rasa dia akan sadar kembali.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The things that he dropped while desperately following me are probably those objects...{nl}It was between the tombstone near Meeting Plaza and Klajone Access Road.
Philip's Soldiers: Benda yang dijatuhkannya saat mengikutiku mungkin adalah ini..{nl}Letaknya berada dekat tempat bertemu dan makam di pintu masuk Wedroka.

Philipas' Soldier: I remember he said that item was what his mother left to him before she died.{nl}I don't know a lot about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pernah mendengar bahwa benda itu adalah peninggalan ibunya.{nl}Aku tidak mengetahui banyak mengenai itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Who are you anyways? How come my curse didn't work?{nl}How come the power of seduction that the Succubus taught me didn't work on you?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu siapa? Bagaimana bisa curse milikku tidak bekerja dengan baik?{nl}Bagaimana bisa kekuatan penggoda yang diajarkan oleh Succubus tidak bekerja padamu?

Philipas' Soldier: That.. Give it to me, now!{nl}That's not an object that belongs to you!
Philip's Soldiers: Itu.. Berikan padaku!{nl}Itu bukanlah milikmu!

Philipas' Soldier: What have I done?{nl}Ah, mother... what should I do with this sin...
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang sebenarnya aku lakukan?{nl}Ah. ibu.. Apa yang harus kulakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Pond of Silence
Philip's Soldiers: The stream of silence

Philipas' Soldier: (This stream needs to be purified.)
Philip's Soldiers: (Stream harus disucikan)

Philipas' Soldier: I've done the same thing as the people I used to hate would do.{nl}I am sorry. Had I thrown away my anger, I wouldn't have been trapped like this..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka melakukan hal yang sama seperti orang yang kubenci.{nl}Maafkan aku. Seharusnya aku melepaskan kemarahan jika sudah dibebaskan seperti ini..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: How could I do and say such things to your innocent being...{nl}Yes... Thanks for saving me. I am at peace now.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana bisa mereka melakukan ini padamu..{nl}Ya.. Terima kasih sudah menyelamatkanku. Aku sudah tenang.

Philipas' Soldier: When I thought about the moment when this scripture had been ripped into pieces,{nl}I became so enraged that I ended up trapping myself here.{nl}But now I am able to rest because of you.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saat aku memikirkan saat scripture dihancurkan, aku sangat marah dan berusaha menahan diri.{nl}Tapi sekarang aku bisa beristirahat karena kamu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I really appreciate the effort you took, getting back this precious scripture. {nl}But, I'm no longer attached to it now. Goodbye...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat berterima kasih karena kamu telah menemukan scripture yang berharga. {nl}Tapi, saat ini tidak ada artinya untukku. Dadah..

Philipas' Soldier: I realized that all deaths of my colleagues were due to the revenge.{nl}I don't need it anymore... Thanks.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyadari bahwa kematian teman-temanku adalah karena balas dendam.{nl}Aku tidak membutuhkannya lagi.. Terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: Who are you? Become the slave of the Succubus!
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa kamu? Jadilah budak Succubus!

Philipas' Soldier: I can't say milk and honey flows in this land anymore.{nl}Should I give up on bee farming?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa bilang tanah ini dipenuhi susu dan madu seperti dulu.{nl}Haruskah aku menyerah memelihara lebah?

Philipas' Soldier: The bees have turned into violent monsters.{nl}I don't know how I can make a living from now on.
Philip's Soldiers: Lebahnya menjadi monsters yang ganas.{nl}Aku tidak tahu lagi caranya mencari penghasilan.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't remember what happened after I was casted with the curse.{nl}But, those demons, they definitely must be looking for something.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak ingat apa yang terjadi saat aku terkena curse.{nl}Tapi para demon itu, pasti mencari sesuatu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you are going to the Great Cathedral, I want to stop you.{nl}The demon who casted the curse on this land went to the Great Cathedral.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu ingin pergi ke Great Cathedral, Aku ingin menghentikanmu.{nl}Demon yang memberikan kutukan pada tanah ini ingin pergi ke Great Cathedral.

Philipas' Soldier: I saw the true nature of the curse with my own eyes.{nl}That Succubus beside Naktis... Even I, who was silently watching, almost got seduced.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku melihat wujud asli dari curse dengan mataku sendiri.{nl}Succubus selain Naktis.. Bahkan aku, yang hanya memperhatikannya diam-diam hampir saja terpikat.

Philipas' Soldier: Even during Medzio Diena, this place was safe.{nl}I used to think disasters were somebody else's problem.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan pada hari pohon suci, tempat ini aman.{nl}Aku bahkan sempat berpikir kemalangan bukanlah untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: The bees are not the only ones that changed.{nl}The monsters that I saw for the first time in my life had overrun Siauliai Woods back then.
Philip's Soldiers: Bukan hanya lebah yang berubah.{nl}Monsters yang pertama kali aku lihat sejak aku dilahirkan terus menerus datang ke Siaulai Forest.

Philipas' Soldier: I've spent many years making mead, but I have to end now without any significant product.{nl}Who should I blame for this..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menghabiskan waktu bertahun-tahun untuk membuat honey alcohol, tapi harus berakhir tanpa hasil.{nl}Siapa yang harus aku salahkan..

Philipas' Soldier: All other Revelators were wrong.{nl}But if it were you... I don't know.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua Saviors lainnya salah.{nl}Namun jika kamu.. Aku tidak tahu.

Philipas' Soldier: The priests told us to wait, but the damage caused by the monsters was getting bad.{nl}I could not stand it anymore so I took action.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciples meminta kita untuk menunggu, dan kerusakan yang disebabkan oleh para monster sangatlah besar.{nl}Aku sudah tidak tahan lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: I will find out why the monsters are making a mess here.{nl}Then the priests will be speechless.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan menemukan penyebab mengapa monster membuat keributan disini.{nl}Lalu disciples tidak akan bisa berkata apa-apa.

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe we touched something we shouldn't have touched.{nl}I think we did...
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin kita menyentuh apa yang tidak seharusnya kita sentuh.{nl}Sepertinya begituâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: The priest is very angry.{nl}Damn, if only she told me more about the altar.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple sangatlah marah.{nl}Sial, akan lebih baik jika dia memberitahuku mengenai altar.

Philipas' Soldier: The villagers told us that they couldn't trust the priest anymore so they were taking action themselves.{nl}Me? I don't care, as long as the monsters get taken care of.
Philip's Soldiers: Para penduduk bilang kita tidak boleh mempercayai disciples lagi sehingga mereka melakukannya sendiri.{nl}Aku.. Aku tidak peduli dengan siapa yang akan mengurus para monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Where could Goddess Austeja have gone at a time like this?
Philip's Soldiers: Kemana Austeja Goddess  pergi pada saat-saat seperti ini?

Philipas' Soldier: I know that the priests are trying their best, but we should protect our village.{nl}We're having trouble living on due to those monsters, so we can't just do nothing.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tahu bahwa disciples mencoba berusaha sebaik mungkin, namun kita harus melindungi desa kita.{nl}Hidup menjadi sulit karena ulah para monsters itu jadi kita tidak bisa diam saja

Philipas' Soldier: The priests never told us what's wrong.{nl}We know that they are afraid that we might feel uneasy... But still we want to know.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciples tidak pernah memberitahu kami apa yang salah.{nl}Kami tahu bahwa mereka takut kami terguncang.. Tapi tetap saja kami ingin tahu.

Philipas' Soldier: I know this might come out wrong but, I only trust you alone, Revelator.{nl}I am sorry to the priests... and I am sorry to you, Revelator, for saying that.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tahu bahwa ini bukanlah hal yang seharusnya kuberitahukan padamu, tapi aku akan mengandalkanmu.{nl}Aku tidak tahu apa yang harus kuberitahukan pada disciples.. Aku minta maaf pada Savior.

Philipas' Soldier: So we created the incident.{nl}Our actions.. I am so sorry.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi kita merancang sesuatu.{nl}Karena kami.. Maafkan aku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I'm scared Goddess Austeja won't come back to protect our village...{nl}But, I am even more scared of the monsters in front of my eyes.
Philip's Soldiers: Austeja Goddess  akan melindungi desa kami..{nl}Tapi, aku lebih takut dengan monster didepan kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I refuse to just wait around as the priests have said.{nl}I refuse to be driven around by those monsters anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menolak jika hanya menunggu disciples saja.{nl}Aku menolak dikendalikan para monster itu lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't want to doubt the goddesses.{nl}But the priests don't tell us anything.. Isn't that strange?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak ingin mencurigai Goddesses lagi.{nl}Tapi disciples tidak memberitahu kami.. Apakah tidak aneh?

Philipas' Soldier: There's so much distrust between our priests and the villagers right now.{nl}I don't want to create a mess..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada pertentangan diantara para disciples dan penduduk desa.{nl}Aku tidak ingin membuat keributan..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The only thing I could tell to the villagers who were wounded was to wait..{nl}Even if it was the monsters' doing. Reality is cruel.
Philip's Soldiers: Satu-satunya hal yang bisa kuberitahukan kepada penduduk desa yang terluka adalah menunggu..{nl}Bahkan walau itu adalah karena monster, ini sangatlah kejam.

Philipas' Soldier: A thorn forest... If it weren't for you, this place would have became just like that.{nl}I feel grateful to the villagers since I believe they guided you to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Thorny forest.. Jika bukan karena kamu, tempat ini akan berubah menjadi seperti itu.{nl}Aku merasa bersalah kepada penduduk desa yang kupercaya mempertemukan aku dan kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: The seal here was able to be protected by you.{nl}But, I can't relax yet because the seal of Spring Light Wood is still left.
Philip's Soldiers: Segel berhasil kamu lindungi.{nl}Tapi, aku tidak bisa beristirahat karena segel Spring Light Wood masih tertinggal.

Philipas' Soldier: My sister Laima has told me about this in the past.{nl}The goddesses have a duty to save humans, but the humans also have a duty to save us.
Philip's Soldiers: Dahulu kala, Goddess  Laima memberitahuku mengenai hal ini.{nl}Goddesses harus menyelamatkan manusia, tapi manusia juga harus membantu kami.

Philipas' Soldier: Farmer Druva
Philip's Soldiers: Farmer Druba

Philipas' Soldier: I don't care about the monsters or the seals.{nl}Someone else getting hurt is their problem. We clear?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak peduli dengan segel atau monster.{nl}Aku tidak khawatir tentang salju. Kamu mengerti kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Times like this are an opportunity.{nl}Prices for agricultural products are increasing due to the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus mengambil kesempatan disaat seperti ini.{nl}Harga dari produk pertanian meningkat karena monsters.

Philipas' Soldier: I was a refugee from the capital.{nl}I moved here hearing that this place was safe.. but that apparently is untrue. I'm ruined.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku adalah pengungsi dari ibu kota.{nl}Aku kesini karena aku dengar tempat ini aman.. Namun itu semua bohong. Habislah sudah.

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, I am so hungry... I can't endure any longer.{nl}Hey. Is there something to eat?
Philip's Soldiers: Ahah, aku lapar.. Aku tidak kuat lagi.{nl}Hei. Ada yang bisa dimakan?

Philipas' Soldier: I can't do anything since I am starving to death...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa melakukan apapun karena terlalu lapar.

Philipas' Soldier: I came here to save my son who is cursed.{nl}If you see a young man who is about to starve to death, let me know.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin menyelamatkan anakku yang dikutuk.{nl}Jika kamu melihat orang yang hampir mati kelaparan, beritahu aku.

Philipas' Soldier: I will return to my hometown with my son.{nl}Yes. The Revelator of the goddesses helped us.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan kembali ke kampung halaman bersama anakku.{nl}Ya. Savior dari Goddesses membantu kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I want to see my son being healthy again.{nl}It's too painful to wait until my son to throw up the vicious energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin melihat anakku sehat kembali.{nl}Sangat menyakitkan menunggu anakku melepaskan semua energi jahatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: What should I do about it to save the spirits?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang harus aku lakukan untuk menyelamatkan para spirit?

Philipas' Soldier: These are not Maven's teachings.{nl}They are just Naktis' curse.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu bukanlah ajaran Maven.{nl}Itu hanyalah kutukan dari Naktis.

Philipas' Soldier: There are four more necklaces besides this necklace, each with a teaching of Maven.{nl}They are all meaningless to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami memiliki 4 necklaces lagi selain necklace dengan ajaran Maven.{nl}Semuanya tidak ada gunanya untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: We all promised each other to become good priests.{nl}It feels like that moment was just the day before yesterday... Just a meaningless dream.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami berjanji satu sama lain untuk menjadi disciples yang baik.{nl}Itu adalah kemarin lusa.. Semuanya tidak ada artinya saat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Witas really.. went back to the goddess.{nl}This is all the curse's doing, please don't feel guilty about it.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Withus akhirnya.. Kembali kepada Goddess .{nl}Ini semua adalah karena kutukan jadi kamu tidak perlu merasa bersalah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, if you see the Tree of Faith, please restore it.{nl}I heard that tree blocks the curse's energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, jika kamu melihat tree of body and mind, tolong dipulihkan.{nl}Kudengar pohon dapat menahan energi kutukan.

Philipas' Soldier: If it weren't for you, Maven's teachings would have been left cursed until the end.{nl}You saved this land. Witas' spirit as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika bukan dirimu, ajaran Maven tetap akan ternodai sampai akhir.{nl}Kamu menyelamatkan tempat ini. Begitu juga spirit of Withus.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard that all the necklaces of Maven can be combined together through a special method.{nl}I heard the crafting recipe is present somewhere, but I don't know where it is.
Philip's Soldiers: Kudengar necklaces of Maven bisa digabungkan dengan metode khusus.{nl}Kudengar craft manual ada disuatu tempat, tapi aku tidak tahu dimana.

Philipas' Soldier: No... Not yet.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak.. Belum saatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I've been waiting for you for hundreds of years.{nl}However, you are still weak. You must improve...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menunggumu selama ratusan tahun.{nl}Tapi, masih kurang. Sedikit lagi..

Philipas' Soldier: Priest Daram
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Daram

Philipas' Soldier: I heard that a priest succeeded in removing the energy of the curse.{nl}But, her method only works on the curse of gluttony.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendengar kisah disciple yang berhasil melepaskan energi curse.{nl}Tapi, hanya bekerja pada curse of gluttony.

Philipas' Soldier: The special bishop is at the Great Cathedral.{nl}He died when he was young, but he still stays at the Great Cathedral because of his special mission.
Philip's Soldiers: Special bishop ada di great cathedral.{nl}Dia mati ketika muda, tetapi dia masih ada di great cathedral karena misi khusus yang dimilikinya.

Philipas' Soldier: I tried my best to hide Maven's secret, but..{nl}Naktis is also staying at the Great Cathedral too long.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mencoba yang terbaik untuk menyembunyikan Maven's secret, tapi..{nl}Naktis juga sudah terlalu lama menetap di great cathedral.

Philipas' Soldier: Priest Goda
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Goda

Philipas' Soldier: The Great Cathedral has collapsed, but it still keeps its beauty.{nl}Especially, the secrets of Archbishop Maven, they look amazing every time we see them.
