Philip's Soldiers: Temanku berlaku aneh. {nl}Dia tidak bernafas dan mukanya pucat. Dan jantungnya juga sudah tidak berdetak lagi.{nl}Apa dia sudah pergi menemui Goddess? Dalus, tolong buka matamu..

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much. {nl}Dallas would also speak of you to the goddesses.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Dalus juga akan menceritakan tentangmu ke Goddess.

Philipas' Soldier: I am going to go to bury Dallas.{nl}Can you be with me until the end?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mengubur Dalus.{nl}Maukah kamu menungguku?

Philipas' Soldier: So you are safe.{nl}I am going to go back to my hometown with Dallas' belongings.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi kamu sudah aman.{nl}Aku akan kembali ke kotaku dengan barang-barang milik Dalus.

Philipas' Soldier: Are the peaceful days going to return like the old times?{nl}Revelator...
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah keadaan akan kembali damai seperti dahulu kala Savior?

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator. I want to bury Dallas under the Taika Cliff where he can see his hometown.{nl}But there are so many monsters there. Please get rid of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Revalator. Aku ingin mengubur Dalus di Ramivi Cliffs jadi dia dapat melihat kotanya dari sana.{nl}Tapi di sana sangat banyak monster berkeliaran. Tolong singkirkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: First, it would be better to find some documents at the Sanctuary.{nl}I remember there are documents there about methods of disguising as demons.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang lebih baik kita cari dulu naskah kuno itu di Sanctuary.{nl}Seingatku memang letaknya tersembunyi.

Philipas' Soldier: Okay. Use the scroll to lure the demons to the Apgaule Altar.{nl}If you want to know what will happen... Well, you'll have to wait and see.
Philip's Soldiers: Nah sudah siap. Gunakan ini untuk memancing demon-demon ke Gaule Altar.{nl}Aku tidak tahu apa akan berhasil atau tidak, yah kita tunggu saja.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a dangerous demon luring priests and leading them to their deaths.{nl}It disguises itself to look like a secret of Maven.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Merekalah demon-demon yang menjebak murid-muridku.{nl}Mereka itu seperti Secret of Maven.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The location is Maskuote Narthex.{nl}Please relieve our priests of this threat so they can concentrate on their mission.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka ada di Yujima Antenave.{nl}Tolong tenangkan semua muridku agar mereka dapat fokus pada misinya.

Philipas' Soldier: I will submit a report as soon as I return to the congregation.{nl}This should soothe the priests who were in despair. Thanks.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan langsung membuat laporan setelah aku kembali.{nl}Aku masih harus menenangkan murid-muridku sebelumnya. Terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: And so all five keys are now collected.{nl}Go to Pasala Altar. The secret there will lead you to the hidden room.
Philip's Soldiers: Setelah kelima kunci terkumpul, pergilah ke Pasara Altar. Semua petunjuk yang ada akan mengarahkanmu ke ruangan tersembunyi.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the Revelator of the goddesses or the one who belongs to the mighty power of the darkness?{nl}The evil darkness can not cross here.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa kamu? Apa kamu Savior dari para Goddess atau kamu pengikut kegelapan?{nl}Mereka yang telah tercemar oleh kegelapan tidak diperkenankan lewat.

Philipas' Soldier: You've proven that you are the Revelator of the goddesses.{nl}You may enter the room where the revelation is located.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah membuktikan siapa dirimu.{nl}Kamu boleh masuk ke ruangan tempat pertanda itu disimpan.

Philipas' Soldier: It's so brutal. {nl}Our Great Cathedral, to those demons...
Philip's Soldiers: Kejam sekali. {nl}Demon-demon itu di dalam Cathedral..

Philipas' Soldier: Druid Ellie
Philip's Soldiers: Druid Elley

Philipas' Soldier: Hello. This is the garden of Ginaga.{nl}This place is the hometown and the land of Druid Master, Gina Greene.{nl}The master welcomes all people who visit this land.
Philip's Soldiers: Halo. Inilah Garden of Ginaga.{nl}Inilah tempat tinggal Druid Master Gina Green.{nl}Master menyambut semua yang datang ke tempat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: You must have traveled various places in the kingdom.{nl}I am sorry, but do you know anything about the mysterious girl?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pasti kamu sudah berpetualang ke banyak tempat.{nl}Maaf yah aku mau tanya sesuatu, apa kamu tahu tentang Mysterious Girl?

Philipas' Soldier: The girl left these trees before Medzio Diena.{nl}My master asked me to find about the trees, but I knew nothing about them...{nl}I want to get help from you.
Philip's Soldiers: Gadis itu pergi sebelum peristiwa Divine Tree.{nl}Master memberiku tugas untuk mencari tahu tentang kejadian itu, tapi aku tidak tahu apa-apa..{nl}Maukah kamu membantuku?

Philipas' Soldier: We should find out if they just imply some kind of a symbol or they are endowed with some kind of power.{nl}Please first collect the leaves of Ellum at the neglected grape fields.
Philip's Soldiers: Coba selidiki dulu apa itu hanya simbol saja atau ada mengandung sihir.{nl}Kumpulkan daun Ellum dari kebun anggur yang terlantarkan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: This girl had a mysterious energy.{nl}A long time ago, she traveled across the kingdom and left many forecasts and miracles.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dia adalah gadis dengan energi misterius.{nl}Sejak dulu dia berkelana ke seluruh pelosok negeri, banyak keajaiban dan ramalan yang dia berikan selama itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Recently, we saw a similar looking girl at the Crystal Mine. {nl}But, strangely, she wasn't able to say anything.
Philip's Soldiers: Akhir-akhir ini kami melihat gadis yang mirip dengannya di Crystal Mine. {nl}Tapi anehnya, dia tidak dapat berkata apa-apa.

Philipas' Soldier: Ellums are the monsters that were created in mass after Medzio Diena.{nl}If the trees here are endowed with some kind of power, the leaves of Ellum should react to them.
Philip's Soldiers: Ellums adalah monster yang tercipta saat peristiwa Divine Tree.{nl}Kalau memang tanda itu memiliki kekuatan sihir, pastinya daun Ellum akan bereaksi.

Philipas' Soldier: This will be enough. {nl}Let me concentrate for a bit.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya ini sudah cukup, ayo kita fokus pada hal ini dulu.

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator, this is amazing!{nl}When we endowed the power of the trees to the leaves of the monsters that you brought, they waned right away.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior, lihat ini!{nl}Ketika kita memberikan energi dari pohon ini ke daun Ellum yang kamu bawa, mereka langsung menyusut.

Philipas' Soldier: If that's the case... Please get me two lumps of sample soil corrupted with evil energy.{nl}I want to know more about the power of this tree.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau begitu... Tolong kumpulkan 2 genggam contoh dari tanah yang telah tercemar energi jahat itu.{nl}Aku sangat ingin tahu lebih banyak mengenai pohon ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Before, evil energy was purified by the power of humans.{nl}But, if the power of this tree is true... they will be purified by planting it at several places.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan, energi jahat ini dibersihkan oleh kekuatan dari manusia.{nl}Tapi kalau memang pohon-pohon ini memiliki kekuatan, maka dengan menanamnya di beberapa tempat, tanah ini akan bersih dari energi jahat.

Philipas' Soldier: So you brought them.{nl}I just finished the preparation for the purification ritual.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah kamu sudah kembali.{nl}Aku sudah menyiapkan ritual untuk membersihkan tanah ini.

Philipas' Soldier: I will see the responses of this sample like the leaves.{nl}I hope it goes well.. Please see it yourself Revelator!
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan lihat dulu reaksi dari tanah ini, apakah sama dengan daun itu atau tidak.{nl}Semoga saja berjalan lancar.. Ayo kemarilah lihat sendiri!

Philipas' Soldier: Oh goddess, please look at this. The ritual was successful.{nl}The master would purify everything at once with trees like this one.
Philip's Soldiers: Wow, ini lihatlah. Ritualku berhasil.{nl}Master akan mampu membersihkan seluruh tanah ini dengan menggunakan energi dari pohon-pohon itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Until the master comes back, I am going to do some base work for the large scale purification.{nl}Can you collect the five bottles of Tanus fluids from the Kvie Farm Area?
Philip's Soldiers: Sambil menunggu Master kembali, aku akan mempersiapkan yang dibutuhkan untuk ritual itu.{nl}Maukah kamu membantu mencari 5 botol Tanus fluids dari Kvie farm?

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks for helping me.{nl}The girl who left this tree.. who was she I wonder?
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih atas bantuanmu.{nl}Oh iya, siapa Gadis yang keluar dari pohon itu?

Philipas' Soldier: This tree is so mysterious.{nl}It's like the Revelator brought the clues of purification.
Philip's Soldiers: Pohon-pohon ini misterius sekali, semuanya terlihat seakan-akan Saviorlah yang membawa kunci untuk membersihkan tanah ini.

Philipas' Soldier: You've done enough.{nl}I should tell the Druid Master that you've been a great help.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bantuanmu sudah cukup banyak.{nl}Aku akan menyampaikan pada Druid Master semua jasa-jasamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, I have one last thing to request of you.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, aku masih punya 1 permintaan lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: This is a box that we discovered that contains more of these trees.{nl}If you get a chance to go to Shaton Farm, please give it to Druid Martinek.
Philip's Soldiers: Kotak ini kami temukan bersamaan dengan pohon-pohon ini.{nl}Kalau kamu lewat Shaton Farm, tolong berikan pada Martineck.

Philipas' Soldier: He likes to interfere with others' lives so he may be involved in some kind of matter.{nl}Maybe you should ask the people there about his whereabouts.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia suka ikut campur urusan orang, jadi mungkin saja dia tahu mengenai hal ini.{nl}Mungkin kita harus tanya orang-orang mengenai keberadaannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Farm Supervisor Dorn
Philip's Soldiers: The Farm Supervisor Dorun

Philipas' Soldier: This is the private land of Shaton. {nl}Even a Revelator should not interfere here.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah tanah pribadi Shaton. {nl}Bahkan Savior tidak boleh lewat.

Philipas' Soldier: Farmer Max
Philip's Soldiers: Farmer Max

Philipas' Soldier: Wheat farming is possible here unlike Shaton Farm.{nl}We were able to harvest the last farming... but...{nl}I am worried about the next farming.
Philip's Soldiers: Di sini padi masih dapat ditanam, tidak seperti Shaton Farm.{nl}Masa panen terakhir berhasil dengan sukses... Tapi aku tidak tahu nasib dari masa panen berikutnya...

Philipas' Soldier: Farmer Darcy
Philip's Soldiers: Farmer Daahsi

Philipas' Soldier: Blast it. We might have to leave this place.{nl}We were able to harvest and live due to the care of Gina Greene, but it's too hard now.
Philip's Soldiers: Sial, sepertinya kita harus pergi.{nl}Berkat bantuan dari Gina Green, kita dapat menanam, memanen, dan hidup dengan tenang, tapi sekarang sudah berbeda.

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters are the bigger problem we have at the moment besides failing harvesting due to vicious energy.{nl}If you could move out the monsters, then we may be able to endure little more.
Philip's Soldiers: Masalah yang lebih penting adalah monster-monster yang kian agresif hari demi hari. Gagal panen karena energi jahat ini masih dapat menunggu.{nl}Kalau kamu dapat menyingkirkan semua monster-monster ini, mungkin kita dapat memikirkan tentang panen ini dengan tenang.

Philipas' Soldier: We may be able to stand until the harvest season.{nl}But, the land is getting more and more corrupted, so one day it may turn just like the thorn forest.
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin saja kita masih bisa bertahan sampai masa panen berikutnya.{nl}Tapi kalau keadaannya tidak berubah, lahan pertanian akan berubah menjadi hutan berduri.

Philipas' Soldier: To receive unexpected help from you..{nl}You and the druids are all trying hard, so I can't just give up like this.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak pernah berharap kamu mau membantu namun kamu dan para Druid telah menunjukkan padaku untuk tidak menyerah semudah itu.

Philipas' Soldier: We were lucky though. Do you know the Druid Master?{nl}Gina Greene, the owner of this farm.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kebetulan kita beruntung. Apa kamu mengenal Druid Master?{nl}Jina Green,pemilik taman ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: She lent me the land without asking for any consideration after I lost my hometown due to Medzio Diena.{nl}But, what should I do now. Harvesting is becoming ineffective, and the number of monsters is increasing.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dia meminjamkanku tanah ini tanpa melihat bahwa aku telah kehilangan kampung halamanku dikarenakan day of divine tree.{nl}Tapi, apa yang harus kulakukan sekarang. Memanen sekarang menjadi tidak efektif, dan jumlah monster semakin banyak.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I was so thankful until now, but I can't let the families starve..{nl}If the vicious energy of the garden does not get removed, we have no choice, but to leave.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat berterima kasih sampai sekarang, tapi aku tidak dapat memberikan keluargaku kelaparan..{nl}Jika energi jahat di taman tidak dilenyapkan, maka kami tidak punya pilihan lain selain pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you feel something strange while you were coming here?{nl}I mean the dandelions. They are big compared to the ones in other places.. and they are quite threatening.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu merasakan sesuatu yang aneh ketika kamu datang kesini?{nl}Maksudku dandelions. Mereka lebih besar dibanding dengan yang lainnay di tempat lain.. Dan mereka cukup berbahaya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We should pull them out while they are sprouts, otherwise they could cover the whole farm.{nl}But due to the monsters, we can't continue our work.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kita menarik mereka saat masih berbentuk tunas, kalau tidak mereka akan menutupi seluruh taman.{nl}Tapi karena banyaknya monster, kami tidak dapat melanjutkan pekerjaan kami.

Philipas' Soldier: It may be a lethargic excuse.{nl}We lost our hometown and we can't even farm on the land that we hardly deserve.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu mungkin hanya alasan saja.{nl}Kami kehilangan kampung halaman kami dan kami tidak dapat bercocok tanam di lahan yang sebenarnya milik kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I should help you somehow since you helped me a lot.{nl}I will pay attention from now on. I won't lose to those monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membantumu karena kamu sudah banyak membantuku.{nl}Aku akan memperhatikan mulai sekarang. Aku tidak akan kalah oleh monster-monster itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Matilda, the young lady of the farm
Philip's Soldiers: Matilda, si kembang desa

Philipas' Soldier: This is my hometown that I returned after a long time and it has changed a lot.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini kampung halamanku yang aku tinggalkan dulu dan itu telah banyak berubah.

Philipas' Soldier: Farmer Miren
Philip's Soldiers: Farmer Miren

Philipas' Soldier: I want the druids to drive the monsters out, but they're all focused on that tree.{nl}It's infuriating me. Who is that girl anyway? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin membantu Druids untuk mengusir monster-monster itu, tapi mereka hanya melihat pohon itu.{nl}Aku sangat sebal. Siapa pula wanita itu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Hey. You, Revelator. Please help me instead of just looking at me.{nl}I want you to drive out the monsters that are on my fields.
Philip's Soldiers: Hei. Kamu, Savior. Tolong bantu aku, jangan Cuma melihat saja.{nl}Aku ingin kamu mengusir monster-monster itu dari lahanku.

Philipas' Soldier: The girl the druids are talking about.{nl}I don't know about the tree, but I think it will bring disaster.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Perempuan yang dibicarakan para druid.{nl}Aku tidak tahu tentang pohon-pohon itu, tapi aku rasa mereka akan membawa bencana.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I can't farm due to the evil energy and also those monsters..{nl}I've been farming here for a long time, but ever since that girl came here and left, we've had only trouble.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak dapat bercocok tanam dikarenakan energi jahat dan monster-monster itu..{nl}Aku telah bercocok tanam disini sejak dulu, tapi sejak perempuan itu datang kesini dan pergi, kami mengalami banyak masalah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I know that I've lived here for my whole life, but young people should not lie.{nl}Are you telling me the tree or the girl could be of help? That's nonsense.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tahu kalau aku telah hidup disini seumur hidupku, tapi anak-anak muda itu seharusnya tidak berbohong.{nl}Apa kamu mau bilang bahwa pohon-pohon itu atau perempuan itu akan membantu? Itu tidak masuk akal.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks, really.{nl}You are way better than those useless druids there.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Kamu jauh lebih baik daripada Druid-druid tidak berguna disana.

Philipas' Soldier: I would have driven out all druids if it weren't Gina Greene.{nl}When I was running away from the monsters last time, they saved me, but they don't look after me after that.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mungkin sudah mengusir semua druid itu apabila bukan karena Jina Green.{nl}Ketika aku sedang melarikan diri dari monster-monster itu, mereka menyelamatkanku, tapi mereka tidak merawatku setelah itu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Okay, good. Please find my bag.{nl}I was so busy then, I forgot everything about that bag.
Philip's Soldiers: Ok, bagus. Tolong bantu cari muatanku.{nl}Aku sangat sibuk waktu itu sehingga aku lupa segalanya tentang muatan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: There are many farmers here so there may be bags of other people here as well.{nl}There are name tags in the bags so please do not mix them up.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada banyak petani disini jadi pastilah ada banyak muatan orang lain juga disini.{nl}Di muatan-muatan itu terdapat label nama jadi jangan sampai tertukar.

Philipas' Soldier: Where did I lose it?{nl}I fell down once somewhere..
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat apa ini?{nl}Aku pernah terjatuh disana sekali..

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much for finding my bag. {nl}Now that I look at it, I can't blame the druids. They all have hard times right now.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak karena sudah menemukan muatanku. {nl}Sebenarnya, itu bukan kesalahan druid. Mereka semua hidupnya susah.

Philipas' Soldier: Alchemist George
Philip's Soldiers: Alchemist George

Philipas' Soldier: I came here to get the useful ingredients of alchemy, but I can't move my body..{nl}I have an important experiment soon, but there's no one who could help me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku datang kesini untuk mendapatkan bahan-bahan yang berguna untuk alchemy, tapi aku tidak dapat menggerakkan tubuhku..{nl}Aku mempunyai eksperimen penting sebentar lagi, tapi tidak ada seorangpun yang dapat membantuku.

Philipas' Soldier: Investigator Monahan
Philip's Soldiers: Investigator Monahan

Philipas' Soldier: I came here from Klaipeda.{nl}To investigate the damage on the farms of this kingdom since Medzio Diena.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berasal dari Klaipeda.{nl}Untuk menyelidiki tentang kerusakan yang terjadi di pertanian kerajaan ini sejak day of divine tree.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You must know that there isn't enough food in the kingdom.{nl}If you are okay, can you help me with my investigation?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus tahu bahwa tidak ada cukup makanan di kerajaan.{nl}Jika kamu tidak keberatan, dapatkah kamu membantu penyelidikanku?

Philipas' Soldier: That's so thankful.{nl}First, please get me the eggs of the monsters first. I have something to check.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu akan sangat membantu.{nl}Pertama-tama, tolong bawakan aku eggs of the monsters terlebih dahulu. Aku harus memeriksa sesuatu.

Philipas' Soldier: There are places that need me so I feel very thankful. {nl}But, my stamina is not like before.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada banyak tempat yang membutuhkanku jadi aku sangat bersyukur. {nl}Tapi, staminaku tidak seperti dulu lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done.{nl}With this, we should be able to know how much evil energy has accumulated so far.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus.{nl}Dengan ini, kita akan bisa mengetahui berapa banyak energy jahat yang sudah terkumpul sampai saat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: That's strange. I thought I should give up on this place, but some other energies are mixed together.{nl}To know this, we need something that received the energy of the ground strongly. Could you help me a bit?
Philip's Soldiers: Itu aneh. Aku pikir sebaiknya aku menyerah saja, tapi beberapa energi lain bercampur menjadi satu.{nl}Untuk memastikan ini, kita membutuhkan sesuatu yang dapat menerima energi dari tanah. Dapatkah kamu membantuku sebentar?

Philipas' Soldier: Please take a look at the roots of grapevine closely at the Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}The other monsters' eggs must be adjacent to them. I want you to bring me about three of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong periksa roots of grapevine secara seksama di Abarza grape farm.{nl}Monsters' eggs pasti ada disebelahnya. Aku ingin kamu membawakanku sekitar 3 buah.

Philipas' Soldier: Please be careful since you may get hurt when you touch the egg houses.{nl}It is a good habit to be always be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: tolong berhati-hati karena kamu dapat terluka ketika kamu menyentuh egg houses.{nl}Biasakan selalu berhati-hati.

Philipas' Soldier: Good. The sacred energy is slowly spreading in the ground.{nl}Since you helped me, we don't have to give up on this garden.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. Energi suci perlahan-lahan menyebar di tanah.{nl}Karena kamu sudah membantuku, kita tidak harus menyerahkan taman ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But, that energy is too weak and it is from the kind that I barely knows.{nl}Maybe the druids should know about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, energi itu terlalu lemah dan aku tidak mengetahuinya.{nl}Mungkin druid-druid itu tahu tentang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Shaton Family's Private Officer Hartman
Philip's Soldiers: Private officer of Shaton Family Hartman

Philipas' Soldier: I will help you so please move out before I scold you!
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membantumu jadi tolong keluar sebelum aku memarahimu!

Philipas' Soldier: You can't enter here unless you have the permission.{nl}But, it may be possible.. You know what I am saying right?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak dapat masuk kesini kecuali kamu mempunyai izinnya.{nl}Tapi, mungkin saja bisa.. Kamu tahu maksudku kan?

Philipas' Soldier: If that's so, come back after defeating those Drakes.{nl}Ah, and don't forget to bring me the evidence. I've got something to report.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau begitu, kembalilah setelah mengalahkan Drake-drake itu.{nl}Ah, dan jangan lupa membawakanku bukti-buktinya. Aku harus mempunyai sesuatu untuk dilaporkan.

Philipas' Soldier: This place is the private farm of the Shaton family.{nl}No one can enter except for tenant farmers and the people who are permitted to enter.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini adalah private farm of Shaton family.{nl}Tidak seorangpun boleh masuk kecuali tenant farmers dan orang-orang tertentu yang mendapatkan izin.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you are gonna keep spouting nonsense such as pollution, you better move out of here fast.{nl}Or... there is another way to get the permission from me.
Philip's Soldiers: Apabila kamu tetap berbicara sembarangan seperti polusi, sebaiknya kamu cepat pergi dari sini.{nl}Atau.. Cari cara lain untuk mendapatkan izin dariku.

Philipas' Soldier: If you receive something, then you shuld also give up something.{nl}You thought you would be able to enter without any charges here?
Philip's Soldiers: Apabila kamu menerima sesuatu, maka kamu juga harus memberikan sesuatu.{nl}Kamu pikir kamu akan dapat masuk dengan gratis disini?

Philipas' Soldier: Very well. From now on, you will be able to enter the farm whenever you want.{nl}But, you should do something about my underlings though.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus sekali. Mulai sekarang, kamu dapat masuk ke pertanian kapapunpun kamu mau.{nl}Tapi, sebaiknya kamu melakukan sesuatu tentang pengikutku juga.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you looking for Druid? I know where he is. {nl}The soldiers levied the tax, but it's not enough.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu mencari Druid? Aku tahu dia dimana. {nl}Para prajurit sudah memungut pajak, tapi itu tidak cukup.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I am sure that he hid it away, but I don't know where it is.{nl}The brown pocket with the grains in it. If you understood it, come fast.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku yakin dia menyembunyikannya, tapi aku tidak tahu dimana itu.{nl}Kantung berwarna cokelat dengan biji-bijian di dalamnya. Apabila kamu mengerti, datanglah secepatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: It's going to take more time to look for the druid if you take more and more time.
Philip's Soldiers: Pencarian Druid akan semakin memakan waktu apabila kamu terus menunda.

Philipas' Soldier: Great work. Well done.{nl}The druid that you are looking for actually came here before.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. Bagus.{nl}Druid yang kamu cari, dia pernah datang kesini sebelumnya.

Philipas' Soldier: He talked about the labor conditions of the farmers, so I sent him away with some petty excuse.{nl}He just walked off after I told him that the farmers at the workplace and the brewery weren't returning{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dia berkata banyak hal tentang kondisi para petani jadi aku memindahkan dia dengan beberapa alasan.{nl}Setelah aku bilang padanya bahwa para petani di workspace dan brewery tidak kembali, dia langsung menghilang dengan cepat.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What, that's wasn't a lie so that shouldn't be a problem.{nl}Go to Neshiva Road.
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm, itu bukanlah kebohongan jadi seharusnya tidak apa-apa.{nl}Pergilah ke Neshiba intersections.

Philipas' Soldier: I was acting kindly to the druid because of the neighbouring farm located not far from here.{nl}Remember, if you annoy me, I will expel you from here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berpura-pura baik kepada Druid karena pertanian yang lokasinya ada di sebelahnya.{nl}Tapi, apabila kamu mengganggu aku, ingatlah bahwa kamu akan diusir dari sini.

Philipas' Soldier: Druid Martinek
Philip's Soldiers: Druid Martineck

Philipas' Soldier: You have something for me?{nl}Hold on. You came at the right time. I have to first save these people.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu punya sesuatu untukku?{nl}Tunggu sebentar.Kamu datang di waktu yang tepat. Pertama-tama aku harus menyelamatkan orang-orang ini dulu.

Philipas' Soldier: Druid Joel
Philip's Soldiers: Druid Joel

Philipas' Soldier: We need lots of help here.{nl}Could you help them with me?
Philip's Soldiers: Kami membutuhkan banyak bantuan disini.{nl}Dapatkah kamu membantu mereka tanpa qCould you help them with me?

Philipas' Soldier: I will pay attention to your story later.{nl}First, here's an antidote, please use it to cure the poisoned farmers.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mendengarkan cerita mu nanti perlahan-lahan.{nl}Aku akan memberikanmu penawarnya terlebih dahulu jadi tolong beri makan cursed ones dengan penawaroti.

Philipas' Soldier: This is just emergency care, so I'll stay here to make more medicine.{nl}The locations that are indicated on the report are Zirta Brewery and Gausa Workplace. Please, hurry!
Philip's Soldiers: Ini hanyalah perawatan sementara jadi sebaiknya aku tetap disini untuk membuat obatnya.{nl}Lokasi yang ditandai adalah Jireta brewery dan Gausa workplace. Tolong cepatlah!

Philipas' Soldier: Shaton Farm looks peaceful at first sight.{nl}But, this land is polluted with evil energy.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Shaton farm terlihat damai ketika kamu melihatnya.{nl}Tapi, tanah itu tercemar dengan energi jahat.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I know that purification is important,{nl}but if we don't save those poisoned farmers right away, they may lose their lives.{nl}As a druid, how can I leave those people behind?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tahu pensucian itu penting, tapi jika kita tidak dapat menyelamatkan cursed farmers secepatnya, kita bisa kehilangan nyawa kita.{nl}Sebagai seorang Druid, bagaimana caraku memindahkan orang-orang tersebut keluar?

Philipas' Soldier: Please hurry. {nl}I assume they won't die very soon, but they must be suffering a lot.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong cepatlah. {nl}Mereka tidak akan langsung mati, tapi mereka pasti sangat menderita.

Philipas' Soldier: It's fortunate that you came when you did, or else we would've been in big trouble.{nl}By the way, did you need anything from me?
Philip's Soldiers: Baguslah kamu datang tepat waktu karena kami hampir mendapatkan masalah.{nl}Ngomong-ngomong, apakah kamu membutuhkan sesuatu dariku?

Philipas' Soldier: I see, so Ellie finally found the true nature of the trees.{nl}And the seeds of those trees are in this box.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, jadi Ellie akhirnya tahu sifat sejati pohon itu.{nl}Seeds of the trees ada di dalam peti ini.

Philipas' Soldier: But these seeds are too old, we need to endow them with the power of nature.{nl}Could I borrow your help, please?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, dikarenakan benih ini sudah terlalu tua, kami harus memberkati mereka dengan kekuatan darialam.{nl}Dapatkah kamu membantuku sebentar?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I will borrow some power from the frogs with wings.{nl}Could you exhaust them and bring them back using this stick?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mendapatkan sebagian kekuatan dari winged frogs.{nl}Make them exhausted and bring them with this stick.

Philipas' Soldier: These are the seeds that were discovered with the tree that the mysterious girl had left.{nl}We also found out that these seeds are that of those trees.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah benih yang ditemukan bersamaan dengan pohon yang ditinggalkan oleh gadis misterius itu.{nl}Dand kami juga menemukan bahwa benih ini berasal dari pohon itu.

Philipas' Soldier: But, since no one knew about what these trees really were, we never thought about planting them.{nl}However, I will use these seeds to engage in the large scale purification.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, karena tidak ada seorangpun yang mengetahui tentang identitas sebenarnya dari pohon itu, kami tidak pernah berpikir untuk menanam mereka.{nl}Namun, aku akan menggunakan benih ini untuk dipakai di dalam pemberkatan segala besar.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It is not a hard task for a druid to revive old seeds.{nl}Of course, it will be important to look for a place to plant them first.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu bukanlah tugas yang sulit untuk para druid menghidupkan kembali old seeds.{nl}Tentu saja, mencari tempat untuk menanam mereka akan menjadi penting.

Philipas' Soldier: Make sure that the monster is alive.{nl}We can only use its power if it's alive.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster itu harus tetap hidup.{nl}Kita hanya bisa menggunakan kekuatannya apabila dia masih hidup.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done. {nl}If we now give them a moist environment, they will become healthy seeds.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. {nl}Ketika kita menjaga lingkungannya tetap lembap, mereka akan menjadi benih yang sehat.

Philipas' Soldier: However, the areas nearby are too polluted with evil energy. We will need a specific type of water.{nl}The water at the well of Gausa Workplace may work..
Philip's Soldiers: Namun, area di sekitar sini sudah terlalu banyak tercemar dengan energi jahat, jadi kita membutuhkan air dengan spesifikasi tertenu.{nl}Air yang ada di sumur di Gausa workplace mungkin bisa dipakai..

Philipas' Soldier: It's dangerous to go alone, so take this. This is a plate that is used in the ritual ceremony of the druids.{nl}It will purify the evil energy by a little bit.
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa ini. Ini adalah piring yang biasanya digunakan oara Druid.{nl}Itu dapat mensucikan energi jahat sedikit.

Philipas' Soldier: The stream near here is too polluted.{nl}The water at the well of Gausa Workplace should be okay since they are located far below underground.
Philip's Soldiers: Mata air di dekat sini juga sudah tercemar.{nl}Air dari sumur di Gausa workplace seharusnya baik-baik saja karena mereka terletak sangat dalam.

Philipas' Soldier: It's so fortunate to see you are okay. {nl}Let's start the ritual soon.
Philip's Soldiers: Sungguh beruntung melihatmu baik-baik saja. {nl}Ayo mulai ritualnya segera.

Philipas' Soldier: Alright, let's start. {nl}This is a simple ritual, so it should be quick.
Philip's Soldiers: Baiklah kalau begitu kita mulai. {nl}Ritual ini sederhana jadi tidak akan banyak memakan waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: You came.{nl}I guess I didn't plan for this.
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi kamu sudah datang.{nl}Aku rasa aku terlalu pesimis.

Philipas' Soldier: Farm Soldier Gedson
Philip's Soldiers: Soldier at the farm Gedson

Philipas' Soldier: Even if you are the Revelator, this is a private land. {nl}Go out if you don't have any business here!{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun kamu adalah Savior, ini adalah lahan pribadi. {nl}Pergilah jika kamu tidak ada urusan lagi disini!{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If that's so, come back after defeating Cysts up there.{nl}After seeing how you behaved, I will think about whether I would just let it go or not.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau begitu, kembalilah setelah mengalahkan Cist diatas sana.{nl}Setelah melihat sikapmu, aku akan memikirkan tentang apakah aku akan memberikannya begitu saja atau tidak.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't do this anymore.{nl}This place is corrupted with evil energy and they are not even paying me a lot.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak dapat melakukan ini lagi.{nl}Tempat ini sudah tercemar oleh energi jahat dan mereka bahkan tidak membayarku banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: Good. I appreciate that.{nl}But, it doesn't mean I will let you go just yet. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. Aku sangat menyukainya.{nl}Tapi, bukan berarti aku melupakannya begitu saja. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The one who makes me most annoyed is Drake.{nl}He is violent and looks disgusting. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Drake lah yang paling membuatku merasa terganggu.{nl}Dia kasar dan menjijikkan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Come back after defeating the drake at Ishicla farming road. {nl}I won't say anything if you could do that for me.
Philip's Soldiers: Kembalilah setelah mengalahkan Drake di Ishicla farming road. {nl}Aku tidak akan mengatakan apapun jika kamu dapat melakukan itu untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: Those monsters are doing well even if the evil energy and the poison is all over the place.{nl}This world is such an unfair place.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster-monster itu baik-baik saja walaupun energi jahat dan racun tersebar di seluruh tempat.{nl}Dunia ini sungguh tidak adil.

Philipas' Soldier: As I promised, I won't say anything for your intrusion into the farm before.{nl}But, this is just my jurisdiction. Behave yourself.
Philip's Soldiers: Sesuai janji, aku tidak akan memberitahu bahwa kamu pernah masuk ke pertanian.{nl}Namun tidak selamanya aku membantu. Berhati-hatilah.

Philipas' Soldier: The woman at the far, Charlotte
Philip's Soldiers: The woman at the far, Charlotte

Philipas' Soldier: I don't wanna see Shaton family and those soldiers.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak mau bertemu keluarga Shaton dan para soldiers.

Philipas' Soldier: Tenant Farmer Charlotte
Philip's Soldiers: Tennant farmer, Charlotte

Philipas' Soldier: Please help us.{nl}We have to grow things like this, they will all die within a short period of time.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantulah kami.{nl}Kita harus menumbuhkan semuanya seperti ini, mereka akan mati dalam waktu singkat.

Philipas' Soldier: A lot of grapes were spoiled due to the evil energy.{nl}If this continues, people could die.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Banyak grapes yang tercemar karena energi jahat.{nl}Jika seperti ini terus, akan ada banyak orang yang mati.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please spray the herbicide on the grape vines without those soldiers knowing about it.{nl}If they find out that the grapes are not growing, Shaton might change his mind.
Philip's Soldiers: Semprotkanlah herbicide pada grape vines tanpa diketahui para soldiers.{nl}Jika menemukan grape tidak tumbuh lagi, Shaton mungkin akan berubah pikiran.

Philipas' Soldier: When was it.. I believe it was way back before Medzio Diena.{nl}There was a girl in worn out clothes who told us, with an{nl}awkward accent and gestures, that the disaster would come.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kira-kira.. sebelum day of divine tree.{nl}Gadis dengan pakaian lusuh datang untuk memberitahu kami bahwa akan segera terjadi bencana dengan bahasa dan sikap yang aneh.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Medzio Diena came not long after that.{nl}Just like that girl said, I personally think the spoiled grapes are a part of the disaster.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dan tidak lama setelah itu, the day of divine tree datang.{nl}Seperti yang dikatakan gadis itu. Aku pikir polluted grapes adalah salah satu bencana yang dimaksud.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I cannot fathom why he wants to harvest even those..{nl}I am sure that Shaton, the owner of this farm, has gone crazy.{nl}It surprises me to see how a person could change that much after losing his son.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka bahkan ingin memanen itu..{nl}Aku rasa pemilik pertanian, Shaton sudah gila. Aku terkejut orang yang kehilangan anaknya bisa berubah seperti itu.

Philipas' Soldier: What? A forest is covered with thorns and vines?{nl}I like grapes, but these grapes are spoiled with evil energy.. That's horrible, don't you think?
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa hutan dipenuhi pohon berduri?{nl}Aku suka grapes, tapi grapes tersebut sudah dicemari oleh energi jahat.. Bukankah menyeramkan?

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you very much. I understand the son of Shaton is missing, but still..{nl}I have no doubt that he went crazy because of that.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Aku menerti bahwa dia kehilangan anaknya, tapi..{nl}Kurasa dia juga menjadi gila karena itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Damn!{nl}Chupakabras came after smelling the polluted grape vines dried to their deathes.{nl}What should we do?
Philip's Soldiers: Sial!{nl}Chupakabras datang setelah mencium bau daun kering polluted grape vines.{nl}Apa yang harus kita lakukan?

Philipas' Soldier: If you go near the bushes, the hidden monsters may suddenly appear.{nl}I am counting on you.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu pergi ke semak-semak, monster yang tersembunyi akan muncul.{nl}Aku mengandalkanmu.

Philipas' Soldier: I am relieved.{nl}Thank you. Now, it will be better if Shaton regains his consciousness.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah lega sekarang.{nl}Terima kasih, akan lebih baik jika Shaton sadar kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Farmer Louise
Philip's Soldiers: Farmer Louise

Philipas' Soldier: Shaton farm was not the place to live long ago.{nl}But, at least, it wasn't like this before.
Philip's Soldiers: Shaton farm bukanlah tempat yang bisa dihuni beberapa saat lalu.{nl}Tapi setidaknya, kondisinya tidak separah ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Tennant farmer, Louise
Philip's Soldiers: Tennant farmer, Louise

Philipas' Soldier: I am having a hard time because of the supervisor and the soldiers.{nl}They want me to go to the Zirta Brewery.. I think they are trying to kill me.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku memiliki masa yang berat karena supervisor dan soldiers.{nl}Dan mereka ingin aku pergi ke Jireta brewery.. Mereka ingin membunuhku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Hey. I am sorry, but I don't have any power.{nl}If you are okay, could you go to Zirta Brewery and defeat Tontus nearby?
Philip's Soldiers: Hei. Maafkan aku, tapi aku tidak memiliki kekuatan.{nl}Jika kamu tidak apa-apa, bisakah kamu pergi ke Jireta brewery dan mengalahkan Tontus?

Philipas' Soldier: The soldiers want bribes and the supervisor doesn't care even if anything happens to us.{nl}And Shaton takes the taxes in the amount that would barely keep us alive.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Soldiers ingin bayaran dan supervisor tidak peduli dengan apa yang terjadi pada kami.{nl}Lalu Shaton meminta pajak yang cukup tinggi.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If we don't listen to them, I am sure they will just ask for more bribes.{nl}In the end we either starve to death, or risk our lives.{nl}The old days when his son was the owner were much better.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jika mereka tidak mendengarkannya, aku yakin mereka akan meminta lebih banyak bayaran.{nl}Daripada mati kelaparan, mereka meresikokan nyawanya. Semua lebih baik saat anaknya yang mengelola.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Even if the monsters get defeated, the peaceful time wouldn't contine for a long time. The monsters would come again soon. {nl}But, do you think I can think about tomorrow when I am having hard times now?
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan jika monster dikalahkan, kedamaian tidak akan bertahan selamanya. Monster pasti akan datang kembali. {nl}Tapi, apa kamu pikir aku peduli hari esok jika saat ini saja belum tentu bisa hidup?

Philipas' Soldier: I'm really grateful that you did this for me.{nl}I'm also thankful to the druid here. You and him are good people.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Para druids disini memang cukup membantu, tapi kamu benar-benar orang yang baik.

Philipas' Soldier: I want to ask you one more favor.{nl}There are some seeds that aren't corrupted yet. It's because I secretly stashed them.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin meminta satu bantuan lagi.{nl}Ada bibit yang belum tercemar. Aku diam-diam menanamnya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I hid them well by avoiding the eyes of the soldiers, but the monsters blew them away.{nl}Could you get me those back? They are in the square of the farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyembunyikannya dengan baik dan menghindari tatapan mata para soldiers, tapi para monster mengacaukan semuanya.{nl}Bisakah kamu mendapatkannya? Semuanya tersebar di pertanian.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't do this anymore.{nl}Once I get those seeds back, I will leave this farm and start my own farm.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa melakukan ini lagi.{nl}Jika saja aku bisa menemukan bibit itu, aku akan meninggalkan farm ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you very much for retrieving it.{nl}I understand that Shaton has lost his son, but still..{nl}I've heard that they are recruiting tenant farmers near Klaipeda's suburbs.{nl}Maybe I should go there.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih sudah menemukannya untukku.{nl}Aku mengerti bahwa dia telah kehilangan anaknya, tapi tetap saja..{nl}Kudengar mereka menyewa tennat farmers dekat Klaipeda suburban jadi mungkin kita harus pergi kesana.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope Shaton thinks about the people who are starving a little more.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harap Shaton lebih memikirkan orang yang menderita.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard about Mr. Shaton being stubborn, but I did not know he was this stubborn.{nl}If we don't somehow persuade him, the evil energy can possibly spread across the kingdom.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kudengar Shaton itu keras kepala, tapi tidak aku sangka ternyata separah ini.{nl}Jika kita tidak membujuknya segera, energi jahat akan menyebar ke seluruh kingdom.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You may have listened to me.{nl}But, if only you could somehow convince him.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior mungkin akan mendengarkanku.{nl}Kamu harus mencoba membujuknya.

Philipas' Soldier: Gord Shaton
Philip's Soldiers: Gorde Shaton

Philipas' Soldier: Are you working with that druid?{nl}Are you here to tell me to plant those useless trees at my son's farm?{nl}How preposterous.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu sang Druid tersebut?{nl}Kamu bilang ingin menanam pohon aneh di pertanian anakku? Tidak masuk akal.

Philipas' Soldier: If we fail to persuade Shaton..{nl}Then our next move is to meet with his daughter.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kita gagal membujuk Shaton..{nl}Mungkin kita bisa mencoba berbicara dengan anak perempuannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I will hear no more about this 'purification'.{nl} Leave my lands at once!
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak mau mendengar apapun mengenai purification.{nl}Pergi dari sini.

Philipas' Soldier: Mary Shaton
Philip's Soldiers: Mary Shaton

Philipas' Soldier: Welcome to Shaton's farm
Philip's Soldiers: Selamat datang di Shaton's farm

Philipas' Soldier: Vanessa Shaton
Philip's Soldiers: Vanessa Shaton

Philipas' Soldier: I am sorry. I apologize for my father's behavior.{nl}Please understand why he's like this. He's been suffering for my brother, who went missing a long time ago.
Philip's Soldiers: Maafkan aku. Aku akan meminta maaf atas perlakuan kasar ayahku.{nl}Mohon mengerti kondisinya yang telah kehilangan kakak ku beberapa saat lalu.

Philipas' Soldier: Look, I believe what the druid said was right.{nl}I will help you, so that my father can give up on the vineyard.
Philip's Soldiers: Namun, kata-kata dari Druid juga ada benarnya.{nl}Aku akan membantu agar ayah menyerah terhadap grape farm.

Philipas' Soldier: My brother left to investigate the underground tunnels but never came back.{nl}If you can find traces of my brother in the underground tunnels..{nl}I guess my father could realize the truth.
Philip's Soldiers: Saudaraku pergi untuk memeriksa underground tunnel dan tidak pernah kembali.{nl}Jika saja jejak dari saudaraku bisa ditemukan pada underground tunnel.. Ayah juga pasti akan menerimanya.

Philipas' Soldier: You haven't found any traces of my brother yet?{nl}There are quite a few underground tunnels near the farm, so please look in every single one of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah sisa jejak saudaraku belum ditemukan?{nl}Ada banyak sekali underground tunnels di dekat pertanian jadi kamu harus memeriksanya satu persatu.

Philipas' Soldier: My brother.. in the underground tunnels..{nl}Please show this necklace to my father, to prove to him that my brother will never return..
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi saudaraku. Ada di underground tunnel..{nl}Tunjukkan necklace ini kepada ayah. Untuk membuktikan bahwa saudaraku sudah tiada.

Philipas' Soldier: This grape farm belongs to my brother.{nl}My father is managing this farm on behalf of my brother.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Grape farm adalah milik saudaraku.{nl}Ayahku mengelola tempat ini menggantikannya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: A long time ago, my brother went missing while he was investigating the underground tunnels.{nl}All my other family members have buried him in their hearts, but my father.. couldn't do that.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi dia menghilang saat memeriksa underground tunnel.{nl}Semua anggota keluarga sudah merelakannya, tapi ayahku.. Tidak dapat melakukannya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think it was from that point on,{nl}that my father continuously said my brother would eventually return,{nl}and since then he became obsessed with managing the vineyard.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sejak saat itu. {nl}Ayahku selalu berkata bahwa saudaraku pasti akan kembali dan dia terlalu terobsesi dengan grape farm.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: James Shaton
Philip's Soldiers: James Shaton

Philipas' Soldier: If you are not gonna help me, get outta my land!
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu tidak mau membantuku, silahkan pergi!

Philipas' Soldier: What is this. My son's necklace?{nl}Are you telling me that my son is dead just by showing that necklace?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa ini. Necklace anakku?{nl}Kamu ingin mengatakan bahwa anakku mati karena ini?

Philipas' Soldier: You just want me to give up on my son's vineyard, don't you?{nl}Did you really think that I wasn't aware of your dirty little plan? Get out of here! I know nothing about purification.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalian ingin aku menyerah terhadap grape farm anakku.{nl}Apa kamu pikir aku tidak tahu rencana busukmu? Pergi dari sini karena aku tidak peduli dengan purification.

Philipas' Soldier: Actually, I do know something now! That my son would never return again.{nl}Quick. Anyone! Just defeat those who killed my son!
Philip's Soldiers: Faktanya, aku tahu mengenai itu! Bahwa anakku tidak akan pernah kembali lagi.{nl}Cepatlah. Siapapun bunuhlah pembunuh anakku!

Philipas' Soldier: I do not want to talk about it anymore.{nl}Get out of my sight.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak ingin membicarakannya lagi.{nl}Pergilah.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you think you can persuade me just because you've done that?{nl}You don't know what it is like to lose a son.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu kira bisa mempengaruhiku dengan itu?{nl}Kamu tidak memahami perasaan ayah yang kehilangan anaknya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That's right. It's not enough. {nl}Actually, I have something nice..
Philip's Soldiers: Itu tidak cukup. {nl}Sebenarnya, aku memiliki sesuatu yang bagus.

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm... If you have something to do in my farm, I won't block you.{nl}But, you should not disturb my subordinates or my farmers! Do you understand?
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm... Jika ada yang ingin kamu lakukan di lahan pertanianku, aku tidak akan melarang.{nl}Tapi, jangan ganggu anak buah atau pekerjaku! Mengerti?

Philipas' Soldier: I paid a lot for this from the black market in Fedimian. {nl}It will be much more helpful than the Revelator like you or those shameless druids.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku membayar mahal untuk ini kepada black market di Fedimian. {nl}Akan lebih membantu daripada Savior sepertimu atau para druids tidak berguna.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Soon, powerful monsters will be born that will only listen to my orders.{nl}Then, I will get rid of all the monsters in my son's farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Segera, monster kuat yang hanya mendengarkan perintahku akan terlahir.{nl}Aku akan melenyapkannya dari lahan pertanian anakku.

Philipas' Soldier: Our colleagues came to the garden of Greene family to support us.{nl}With their help, we were able to set the protective barriers on the trees.{nl}I came here in a hurry since I had an ominous feeling. It was indeed dangerous.{nl}If it weren't you, it would have been really dangerous. Thank you.
Philip's Soldiers: Teman-teman kami datang ke garden of Green Family untuk membantu.{nl}Dengan bantuannya, kami berhasil menciptakan protective barriers untuk pohon-pohon.{nl}Aku datang karena merasakan sesuatu yang tidak enak. Ternyata memang sangat berbahaya.{nl}Jika bukan karena kamu, semuanya akan hancur. Terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: What am I doing... {nl}I feel like my son is scolding me.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang aku lakukan.. {nl}Rasanya anakku sedang memarahiku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I felt like if I gave up on grape farming, it would be like losing my son completely.{nl}I knew something was wrong... I just didn't want to admit that my son was dead.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir jika aku menyerah menanam grape, Rasanya seperti kehilangan anakku sendiri.{nl}Aku tahu bahwa ada yang salah.. Aku hanya tidak bisa menerima kematian anakku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I will leave this farm to my daughter from now on.{nl}My daughter can make wise decisions. I am sorry and I want to thank you for making me realize the truth.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan meninggalkan lahan pertanian ini kepada anak perempuanku.{nl}Anakku pasti bisa mengambil keputusan yang cerdas. Terima kasih dan maaf sudah merepotkan.

Philipas' Soldier: That is good to hear that his daughter is now managing the farm.{nl}Can you explain the large scale purification process to his daughter?
Philip's Soldiers: Sangat melegakan mendengar bahwa anak perempuannya yang mengelola pertanian.{nl}Dapatkan kamu menjelaskan mengenai purification kepada anakmu?

Philipas' Soldier: Instead of me explaining, it will be better if you explain it.{nl}The reason why Shaton gave up his obsesseion is because of you.
Philip's Soldiers: Daripada aku jelaskan, lebih baik kamu yang melakukannya.{nl}Alasan mengapa Shaton menyerah terhadap obsesinya adalah karena dirimu.

Philipas' Soldier: Yes. My father has told me about it.{nl}I am planning to plant the trees with the help of the druid in this farm.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ya. Aku dengar dari ayahnya.{nl}Aku berencana untuk menanam pohon dengan Druids di pertanian ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I will give up on harvesting the grapes. And I will improve the labor conditions of the tenant farmers. {nl}I believe that my brother, who is with the goddesses right now, would have done the same.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan menyerah menanam grapes. Dan aku akan meningkatkan kondisi pekerjaan dari tennant farmers. {nl}Saudaraku yang sudah bersama Goddesses pasti akan melakukan hal serupa.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: More than anything else, thank you so much for enlightening my father... Thank you.
Philip's Soldiers: Lebih dari yang lainnya, terima kasih telah menyadarkan ayah.. Terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: I am really honored to have been together with you up to now.{nl}I wish for the best of luck in the large scale purification process.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Merupakan kehormatan bisa bersama denganmu.{nl}Semoga purification massal berjalan lancar.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe... that particular girl didn't only forecast about the disaster.{nl}Well then, may the grace of Goddess Zemyna be in your footsteps.
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin.. Aku rasa gadis itu tidak hanya meramalkan tentang bencana.{nl}Aku harap Gemina Goddess  memberkati perjalanananmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Steward Valen
Philip's Soldiers: Steward Baren

Philipas' Soldier: You must think this farm is strange, right?{nl}You probably don't understand why they are growing the spoiled grapes, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu juga berpikir tempat ini aneh kan?{nl}Kamu tidak mengerti kenapa mereka menanam polluted grapes kan?

Philipas' Soldier: This is the farm where Shaton is awaiting his lost son.{nl}It is why I cannot turn my back against my master. Wouldn't you agree?
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah pertanian dimana Shaton menunggu anaknya yang tidak akan kembali.{nl}Itulah sebabnya aku tidak bisa menentang master. Bukankah begitu?

Philipas' Soldier: If that's so, then I have a request for you.{nl}I will pay you handsomely. Please get rid of the Carcashus who are ruining this farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika begitu, aku memiliki permintaan.{nl}Aku akan membayarmu jadi uruslah Carcashu yang berkeliaran di pertanian.

Philipas' Soldier: It's such a pity.{nl}His son is dead, but he just won't admit it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sangat malang.{nl}Anaknya sudah mati, tapi dia tidak bisa menerima kenyataan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done.{nl}Even if we plant some other crops in the future, it will be better if there are no monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus.{nl}Bahkan walau kita menanam bibit di masa depan, akan jauh lebih baik tanpa kehadiran monster.

Philipas' Soldier: As you can imagine, there are many people with stomach aches due to the spoiled grapes.{nl}That's why I sent people to Klaipeda to buy medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: Seperti yang kamu lihat, banyak yang terkena sakit perut karena polluted grape.{nl}Itulah sebabnya aku mengirim orang ke Klaipeda untuk membeli medicine.

Philipas' Soldier: However, they were attacked by monsters and barely managed to survive.{nl}How could I find the bags with the medicine with this old body of mine?
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, dia berhasil bertahan hidup setelah diserang oleh monsters.{nl}Bagaimana bisa aku menemukan medicine pada kantung tubuh yang tua ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Since I am going to share them with all the people in the farm, we need a lot.{nl}I hope my master will also eat it, but I don't know if he's going to.
Philip's Soldiers: Karena aku akan membaginya ke semua orang di pertanian, kami memiliki banyak persediaan.{nl}Aku harap master juga memakannya, tapi aku tidak yakin dia mau.

Philipas' Soldier: Regrettably, the soldiers here only listen to the orders of the master.{nl}Thanks, I will use the medicine well.
Philip's Soldiers: Sayangnya soldier hanya mendengarkan perintah master.{nl}Aku akan menggunakan medicine.

Philipas' Soldier: The commander of Shaton Family, Buros
Philip's Soldiers: The commander of Shaton Family, Buros

Philipas' Soldier: Shaton is not kind at all normally...{nl}But, he is especially sensitive today.{nl}You should be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Shaton memang bukan jenis yang normal...{nl}Tapi, saat ini dia terlalu sensitif.{nl}Berhati-hatilah.

Philipas' Soldier: General Buros
Philip's Soldiers: The commander, Buros

Philipas' Soldier: I am working here by order, but this place feels bad.{nl}A long time ago, the son of my master disappeared in the underground tunnels. That alone is somewhat frightening.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bekerja disini karena tugas, tapi tempat ini rasanya tidak menyenangkan.{nl}Pada masa lalu, anak dari master menghilang kedalam underground tunnel. Hal tersebut sangat menakutkan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Hey. I will share you some of my works. Are you interested?{nl}You just have to defeat Raujinutes across the tunnel.
Philip's Soldiers: Hei.Aku akan membagi pekerjaanku padamu. Apa kamu tertarik?{nl}Kamu hanya perlu mengalahkan Raujinutes diseberang tunnel.

Philipas' Soldier: Obsessed, perhaps too obsessed.{nl}I feel sorry for Shaton.
Philip's Soldiers: Obsesinya terlalu besar.{nl}Aku merasa kasihyan pada Shaton.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done. This is my reward to you, as promised.{nl}I have tons of work here, so you can always come back if you want.
Philip's Soldiers: Selamat. Ini adalah hadiah yang aku berikan padamu.{nl}Kita memiliki banyak pekerjaan jadi datanglah kapanpun kamu mau.

Philipas' Soldier: It's you again. You just have to defeat Raujinutes across the tunnel.{nl}My subordinates don't wanna go that place since it is somewhat spooky.
Philip's Soldiers: Lagi-lagi kamu. Kamu hanya perlu mengalahkan Raujinutes yang ada pada tunnel.{nl}Anak buahku tidak mau kesana karena terlalu menyeramkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Please defeat Raujintes this time as well.{nl}We are almost seeing the end so keep up the good work at the tunnel just little bit more.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Raujintes.{nl}Kami hampir melihat akhir dari semua ini jadi teruslah bekerja membersihkan tunnel sedikit lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: I think Shaton will be satisfied now.{nl}Well done. Oh and, don't tell any others about this.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku rasa Shaton akan puas saat ini.{nl}Selamat. Jangan katakan ini pada siapapun.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh my god. You must have gone crazy.{nl}I heard Scorpio appeared near the Wind Vane Tower because of you. You should be responsible for this!
Philip's Soldiers: Ya ampun. Kamu pasti sudah gila.{nl}Aku dengar Scorpio muncul di dekat weatherclock karena kamu. Kamu harus bertanggung jawab!

Philipas' Soldier: My useless subordinates already ran away.{nl}Quick, go to the Wind Vane Tower.
Philip's Soldiers: Anak buahku yang tidak berguna sudah kabur.{nl}Cepat pergi ke weatherclock.

Philipas' Soldier: You are the one who went crazy so you should be responsible for this.{nl}But since I also have the pride, I will pay you for that.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamulah yang bertingkah gila jadi kamu yang harus bertanggung jawab.{nl}Tapi karena aku memiliki harga diri, aku tetap akan membayarmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunter Oliver
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter Oliver

Philipas' Soldier: I am doing an important task at the moment.{nl}If you are not gonna help me, don't disturb me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku melakukan tugas yang penting saat ini.{nl}Jika tidak membantu, jangan ganggu.

Philipas' Soldier: Someone requested me to hunt for those Beeteros.{nl}They need those leaves.{nl}Don't go into too much details. I don't ask the requestor too many details.{nl}Anyways, it seems it's too much for a person.. how about it? can you help us?{nl}If you could collect the leaves, I will pay you enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Seseorang memintaku berburu untuk para Beeteros.{nl}Mereka membutuhkannya.{nl}Jangan terlalu lama mencari informasi. Aku tidak memerlukan informasi detil.{nl}Sepertinya memang sulit untuk dikerjakan sendiri.. Bagaimana? Bisa membantu?{nl}Jika kamu bisa mengumpulkannya, aku akan membayarmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Good decision.{nl}It will be much better to collect together instead of collecting them alone.
Philip's Soldiers: Keputusan yang bagus.{nl}Akan lebih baik mengumpulkannya bersama daripada sendirian.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you going to receive the compensation with just those?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu akan menerima kompensasi hanya dengan itu saja?

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm. The quality isn't bad.{nl}The requestor would also be satisfied.{nl}It is fortunate that we don't have any competitors. Here this is for you.
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm. Kualitasnya tidak buruk.{nl}Pemesan juga pasti puas.{nl}Beruntung sekali kita tidak memiliki saingan. Ini untukmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Straggling Soldier Upham
Philip's Soldiers: Soldier, Upham yang tertinggal

Philipas' Soldier: Help me! I was patrolling with my colleagues, a..and was attacked by the monsters..{nl}and then fell behind.{nl}I am begging you. Can you take me back to my general?
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu aku! Saat berpatroli bersama temanku, kami diserang oleh monster dan tertinggal.{nl}Aku meminta bantuanmu. Bisakan kamu mengantar kami ketempat commander?

Philipas' Soldier: That's a relief. {nl}I'll be careful not to fall behind.
Philip's Soldiers: Sangat beruntung. {nl}Pastikan tidak tertinggal.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't understand why all my men are like this.{nl}Thank you very much. What a useless little..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak mengerti kenapa semua anak buahku seperti ini.{nl}Terima kasih. Dia memang keras kepala..

Philipas' Soldier: Do you think I am still the stone in your pocket?..{nl}Do you think I will be defeated by you guys!
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu pikir aku seperti sebuah batu dikantungmu?..{nl}Apa kamu pikir aku bisa kalian kalahkan!

Philipas' Soldier: You guys are on the same side..{nl}I was ignorant.{nl}But you guys really think you can face me!
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berada dalam situasi yang sama..{nl}Aku terlalu keras kepala.{nl}Tapi kamu benar-benar berpikir dapat melawanku!

Philipas' Soldier: You better leave without being involved in the matter
Philip's Soldiers: Lebih baik pergi dan tidak terlibat sama sekali

Philipas' Soldier: Keep listening to him
Philip's Soldiers: Tetap dengarkan dia

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Liliya passed away..{nl}Please make the grave for her#5

Philipas' Soldier: Give him the music box
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan dia Music Box

Philipas' Soldier: Ask him if there's anything you could help
Philip's Soldiers: Bertanyalah padanya jika ada yang bisa dibantu

Philipas' Soldier: Tell him to take some rest now
Philip's Soldiers: Beritahu dia untuk beristirahat

Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Jenus berkata bahwa orang tersebut adalah anaknya dan ia ingin anaknya lepas dari kutukan. Pertama-tama, kalahkan monster di sekitar.

Philip's Soldiers: Bereksperimenlah dengan para monster menggunakan makanan yang tersisa

Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Jenus berkata apabila kamu melempar makanan sisa kepada para monster, mereka akan memakannya. Kalahkan monster yang memakan sisa makanan itu dan kumpulkan energi kutukan. Kamu dapat mendapatkan makanan sisa lagi dari tumpukan makanan di Ishiblashi Square.

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected all the Cores of Tree Root Crystal. With those, seal the Spoiled Tree Root Crystal.

Philip's Soldiers: Tree root crystal di Noreti stream

Philip's Soldiers: Ada banyak tree root crystal di Noreti stream. Cari dan lihat dengan seksama agar kamu mengetahui cara menyelesaikan kutukan malas itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Find the real Crystal among the summoned Tree Root Crystals and destroy it.
Philip's Soldiers: Cari yang aslinya diantara tree root crystal yang sudah dipanggil dan hancurkan mereka.

Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu sedang melihat tree root crystals, tiba-tiba berbagai macam tree root crystals dipanggil! Cari yang aslinya diantara tree root crystal yang sudah muncul dan hancurkan mereka

Philip's Soldiers: Selidiki tree root crystals saat menuju ke altar.

Philip's Soldiers: Ada beberapa cursed tree root crystal besar di lahan kosong saat menuju ke altar. Mereka terlihat berbeda dari tree root crystal biasanya. Dekati mereka dan lihat dengan seksama.

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat melihat treasure chest di dekat makam para pilgrim. Dekati dan buka itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Return the evil energy into the Treasure Chest
Philip's Soldiers: Kembalikan energi jahat ke dalam peti

Philip's Soldiers: Energi jahat yang keluar dari peti merasuki para monster. Kalahkan para monster di dekat peti dan kembalikan energy jahat itu kembali ke dalam peti.

Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Grachius terlihat putus asa. Dekati Grachius dan Bicaralah dengannya.

Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Grachius memintamu berdoa di depan altar. Berdoa terlebih dahulu untuk melepaskan kecurigaan Grachius dan dengarkan cerita dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Gracius looks surprised after seeing your face. Talk to him again.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Grachius terlihat terkejut saat melihat wajahmu. Bicara dengan Grachius lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Let's go test whether the medicine which Gracius give to you will be effective. Get closer to the monsters near Rudiziu Trail and test the medicine.

Philipas' Soldier: Let Pilgrim Gracius know the results
Philip's Soldiers: Beritahu Pilgrim Grachius hasilnya

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that the result turned out to be a failure. Tell this to Pilgrim Gracius.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya hasilnya akan gagal. Beritahu hasilnya ke Grachius.

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menceritakan ke Grachius bahwa obat eskperimennya tidak efektif. Tanyakan padanya apa yang harus kamu lakukan selanjutnya.

Philip's Soldiers: Langkah akhir yang dibutuhkan untuk obat eksperimen itu adalah naskahnya. Kamu mungkin bisa mendapatkan itu dari altar yang ada di sisi atas Rudiju Forest Way.

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Grachius untuk menyelamatkan spirit yang marah yang terjebak di tiap altar.

Philipas' Soldier: There are many altars at Altar Way. Investigate the altar on the Branginti Hill to find out what kind of story is behind it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan menemukan banyak altar di perjalanan. Selidiki altar di Brangiti Hills untuk mengetahui cerita sebenarnya.

Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan %s dari monster

Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan lembaran naskah dari monster
