Philip's Soldiers: Altar di Forest of Prayer

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that there may be some restrained souls at the altar on the way to the Forest of Prayer. Get closer to it and check it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya memang ada beberapa spirit yang terjebak di altar dekat Forest of Prayer. Pergi kesana dan Coba periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Fire rod is hidden in this altar rather than the souls being restrained here. Defeat Fire Rod before you get into a danger.
Philip's Soldiers: Ternyata Fire rod yang tersembunyi di altar ini, bukan spirit yang terjebak. Kalahkan Fire Rod.

Philipas' Soldier: There are many altars at Altar Way. The altar at the upper side of Rudiziu Trail is broken in half so you don't know if it's working. Get closer to it and look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan menemukan banyak altar di perjalanan. Altar yang ada di sisi atas Rudiju Forest terbelah menjadi dua jadi kamu tidak dapat menggunakannya. Pergilah kesana dan cari tahu tentang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: The anger from the altar at Osimas Highway can be cooled down by Cold Fluid that you can get from monsters. Defeat the monsters near the altar and get the Cold Fluid.
Philip's Soldiers: Murka di altar yang ada di Oshimas highway dapat diredakan dengan cairan dingin yang bisa kamu dapatkan dari monster.Kalahkan para monster di sekitar altar dan dapatkan cairan dinginnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Receive the Sanctum's Blessing by reading the notice nearby the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Menerima blessing of the sanctum dengan membaca informasi di samping sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: You can receive the blessing from this sanctum by making contributions, but the amount of contribution differs for each person. Make a contribution and receive the blessing.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat menerima blessing dari sanctum ini dengan membuat kontribusi, tapi jumlah kontribusi yang dapat dibuat tiap orang berbeda-beda. Buat sebuah kontribusi dan terima blessing.

Philipas' Soldier: Lure monsters to the sanctum and defeat them
Philip's Soldiers: Pancing para monster ke sanctum dan kalahkah mereka

Philipas' Soldier: You need sacrifices in order to receive the blessing here. Lure the monsters near the sanctum and defeat them.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu butuh korban untuk menerima blessing. Pancing para monster yang ada di dekat sanctum dan kalahkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: You've contributed enough monsters as sacrifices. Pray to receive the blessing.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkan cukup monster untuk dijadikan korban. Berdoa untuk menerima blessing.

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters rushed in as you prayed in front of the Sanctum. You better defeat the monsters first.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster-monster menyerbu saat kamu mulai berdoa di depan sanctum. Sebaiknya kamu mengalahkan mereka terlebih dahulu.

Philipas' Soldier: We should look for a way to purify the sanctum. Meet with the Priest Master, who is the manager of the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kita mencari sebuah cara untuk mensucikan sanctum. Pergi temui Priest Master yang merupakan pengurus sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: We should first purify the corrupted sanctum on Sukurys Hill. Talk to the Priest Master what to do.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kita mensucikan sanctum tercemar yang ada di Pamaishi Hills terlebih dahulu. Bicara dengan Priest Master tentang apa yang harus dilakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Purify the sanctum using Holy Water
Philip's Soldiers: Sucikan sanctum menggunakan air suci

Philipas' Soldier: The Priest Master asked you to purify the sanctum on Sukurys Hill using the Holy Water. Return to the Forest of Prayer and purify the corrupted sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Priest Master memintamu mensucikan sanctum di Pamaishi Hills menggunakan air suci. Kembali ke Forest of Prayer dan sucikan sanctum yang tercemar.

Philipas' Soldier: Pray in front of the Goddess Statue near the grave of the saint
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoa di depan patung Goddess  di dekat makam para Saint.

Philipas' Soldier: There is the Goddess Statue near the grave of the saint. Pray in front of the statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada patung Goddess  di dekat makan para Saint. Berdoa di depan parimgnear the grave of the saint. Pray in front of the statue.

Philipas' Soldier: This statue was a fake. Defeat Sparnashorn, who was disguised as a Goddess Statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Patung ini palsu. Kalahkan Sparnahorn yang menyamar menjadi patung Goddess .

Philipas' Soldier: There is a Goddess Statue at the lower side of Malone Trail. Let's find what is real among these statues.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada patung Goddess  di sisi bawah Marone Forest Way. Mari cari tahuLet's find what is real among these statues.

Philipas' Soldier: Get advice from Sculptor Tesla
Philip's Soldiers: Minta beberapa saran dari Sculptor Tesla

Philipas' Soldier: This Goddess Statue seems to have some kind of problem. Meet with Sculptor Tesla and ask him what to do about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada yang aneh dengan patung ini. Pergi temui Tesla yang membuat patung ini dan tanyakan padanya apa yang terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with Tesla about the Goddess Statue that does respond
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Tesla tentang patung yang memberikan respon.

Philipas' Soldier: Return to the Forest of Prayer
Philip's Soldiers: Kembali ke Forest of Prayer

Philipas' Soldier: You've heard about how to repair the Goddess Statue from the Sculptor Tesla. Return to the Forest of Prayer to repair the Goddess Statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mendengar cara memperbaiki patung dari Sculptor Tesla. Kembali ke Forest of Prayer untuk memperbaiki patung.

Philipas' Soldier: Inspect the Goddess Statue
Philip's Soldiers: Melihat dengan seksama patung Goddess .

Philipas' Soldier: First, inspect the Statue. You should know what kind of problem exists before you repair the Statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama-tama, lihat dengan seksama patung Goddess . Sebaiknya kamu tahu permasalahan apa yang akan kamu hadapi sebelum kamu memperbaiki patungnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the materials to repair the Goddess Statue with
Philip's Soldiers: Obtain the materials to repair the statue of the Goddess

Philipas' Soldier: Get the materials for repairing the Goddess Statue as the Sculptor Tesla advised. You can get Grey Gypsum Fragments from monsters and Dewdrops from the reeds nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Cari beberapa material untuk memperbaiki patung Goddess  seperti yang disarankan sculptor Tesla. Kamu dapat mendapatkan Grey Gypsum Fragments dari monster dan Dewdrops dari alang-alang.

Philipas' Soldier: Repair the Goddess Statue
Philip's Soldiers: Perbaiki patung Goddess

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected all the materials for the repair work. Return to the Goddess Statue and repair it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkan seluruh material untuk perbaikan. Kembali ke patung Goddess  untuk memperbaikinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Check if the Goddess Statue is well repaired
Philip's Soldiers: Coba periksa apakah patung Goddess  sudah selesai diperbaiki

Philipas' Soldier: You've completed repairing the Statue. Check it again to see if the Statue has recovered well.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu selesai memperbaiki patung. Lihat dengan seksama lagi apakah patungnya sudah diperbaiki dengan benar.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the demon summoning circles
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan demon summon field

Philipas' Soldier: The statue that you spent time repairing was fake. Destroy the demon summoning circles quickly, since you don't know what will happen.
Philip's Soldiers: Patung yang sudah kamu perbaiki sebelumnya ternyata palsu. Hancurkan itu karena kamu tidak tahu apa yang akan terjadi di demon summon field.

Philipas' Soldier: The sanctum was already corrupted. Defeat the monsters that are coming to the corrupted sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Sanctum sudah tercemar. Kalahkan para monster yang dateng ke  polluted sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: The manager of this sanctum is the Cleric Master. Ask her what she should do to purify the corruption of the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Pengurus sanctum ini adalah Cleric Master. Tanyakan padanya apa yang sebaiknya dia lakukan untuk membersihkan polusi di sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: Listen to the advice of the Cleric Master
Philip's Soldiers: Dengarkan saran dari Cleric Master

Philipas' Soldier: Get some advice from the Cleric Master regarding the corrupted sanctum at the Forest of Prayer.
Philip's Soldiers: Dengarkan saran dari Cleric Master mengenai polluted sanctum di Forest of Prayer.

Philipas' Soldier: You have obtained advice on how to purify the corrupted sanctum from the Cleric Master. Return to the Forest of Prayer.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mendapatkan saran bagaimana cara membersihkan polluted sanctum dari cleric master. Kembali ke Forest of Prayer.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the Symbol of Faith at the sanctum
Philip's Soldiers: Cari symbol of the religious belief di sanctum

Philipas' Soldier: To prepare times like this, the Cleric Master hid her Symbol of Faith at the sanctum. Look for the Symbol of Faith at the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk mengantisipasi hal-hal seperti ini, cleric master menyembunyikan symbol of the religious belief di sanctum. Cari symbol of the religious belief di sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: Burn the badges of the sanctum after finding it.
Philip's Soldiers: Bakar badge of the sanctum setelah menemukannya

Philipas' Soldier: As the Cleric Master taught you, use the Symbol of Faith to find the badges of the sanctum which the monsters swallowed.
Philip's Soldiers: Seperti yang Cleric Master ajarkan kepadamu, gunakan symbol of the religious belief untuk mencari badge of the sanctum yang ditelah oleh monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Burn the badges of the sanctum
Philip's Soldiers: Bakar badge of the sanctum yang ada di sanctum

Philipas' Soldier: You have found the badges of the sanctum. Burn the badges to purify the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil menemukan badge of the sanctum. Bakar badge untuk membersihkan sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain some Pure Water from Ryskus City
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan air bersih dari Lishikio

Philipas' Soldier: You will need Pure Water in order to receive the blessing from the sanctum. Get some Pure Water from the stepping stones in Ryskus City.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu membutuhkan air bersih untuk menerima blessing dari sanctum. Dapatkan air bersih dari stepping stones at Lishikio.

Philipas' Soldier: I've brought Pure Water. Go to the sanctum and pray.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah membawakan air bersih. Pergi ke sanctum dan berdoa.

Philipas' Soldier: Pray in front of the Vakarine Statue
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoa di depan patung Vakarine

Philipas' Soldier: There is a Vakarine Statue near the Hermit's House. {nl}Try praying in front of the Statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada patung di Vakarine dekat dengan rumah petapa. Coba berdoa di depan patung itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Protect the Goddess Statue
Philip's Soldiers: Lindungi patung Goddess

Philipas' Soldier: As you prayed, the Statue was attacked. Remove the thorny bushes that are binding the statue and protect it from the monsters that are coming from various places.
Philip's Soldiers: Selagi kamu berdoa, patung diserang. Hancurkan semak belukar yang mengekang patung dan lindungi patung dari monster yang datang dari seluruh arah.

Philipas' Soldier: Devote Flowers
Philip's Soldiers: Devote Flowers

Philipas' Soldier: You should devote flowers to this sanctum. Put flowers on the sanctum and pray in front of it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kamu mempersembahkan bunga untuk sanctum ini. Letakkan bunga di sanctum dan berdoa di depannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Since you have flowers, devote them to the sanctum and receive its blessing.
Philip's Soldiers: Dikarenakan kamu sudah membawa bunganya, persembahkan bunga kepada sanctum dan terima blessing.

Philipas' Soldier: Get advice from the Pardoner Master
Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan beberapa saran dari Pardoner Master

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that this place is also polluted so go meet the Pardoner Master who is the manager of the Sanctum and get some advices. If you purchase the warp scroll that will direct you to the outer edge of Fedimian from the stand beside, you will be able to move faster.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya tempat ini juga tercemar jadi pergi temui Pardoner Master yang merupakan pengurus sanctum dan mintalah saran. Jika kamu membeli warp scroll yang akan membawa kamu langsung ke outer edge of Fedimian, kamu akan menghemat banyak waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: Purify the corruption at the sanctum
Philip's Soldiers: Bersihkan polusi di sanctum

Philipas' Soldier: The Purifier that you bought from the Pardoner Master can purify the sanctum a bit. Burn the Purifier in front of the sanctum.
Philip's Soldiers: Purification device yang kamu beli dari Pardoner Master dapat membersihkan sanctum sedikit. Bakar purification device di depan sanctum.

Philipas' Soldier: Ask the Pardoner Master how to purify the sanctum
Philip's Soldiers: Tanya Pardoner Master cara membersihkan sanctum

Philipas' Soldier: As you were about to pray in front of the sanctum, Ironbaum appeared. You better defeat it first.
Philip's Soldiers: Selagi kamu berdoa di sanctum, monster-monster bermunculan dari suatu tempat. Sebaiknya kamu mengalahkan mereke terlebih dahulu.

Philipas' Soldier: Pray in front of the Sanctum and receive the blessing.
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoa di depan sanctum dan terima blessing.

Philipas' Soldier: Fortunately, it seems that the sanctum is not corrupted yet. Pray again at the sanctum and receive the blessing.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, sepertinya sanctum belum tercemar. Berdoa lagi di sanctum dan terima blessing.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a pilgrim who fell down at the Sestines Wilderness on Apsimesti Crossroads. Ask him what happened.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada seorang pilgrim yang terluka di Sestine wilderness di Apsimeti Crossroad. Tanyakan padanya apa yang terjadi

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis is calling for you desperately. Get closer and talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilus memanggilmu dengan putus asa. Dekati dia dan Bicaralah dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Investigate Theophilis' bag.
Philip's Soldiers: Selidiki bag of Theophilus dari monster

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis told you that this place is cursed and also told you that he would make some medicine for you if you could find his bag. Find Theophilis' bag which the monsters took.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilus mengatakan padamu bahwa tempat ini terkutuk dan juga memberitahukanmu bahwa dia akan membuat obat untukmu jika kamu bisa menemukan bag miliknya. Cari bag of Theophilus yang diambil oleh monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand it over to Pilgrim Theophilis
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan kepada Pilgrim Theophilus

Philipas' Soldier: You've found the bag of Pilgrim Theophilis. Give it back to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menemukan bag of Pilgrim Theophilus. Serahkan kepada pemiliknya

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve %s from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Ambil kembali %s dari monster

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis is looking at the bag. Talk to him again to get the promised medicine again.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilus mencari bag miliknya. Bicaralah dengannya lagi untuk mendapatkan promised medicine lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain Reed Sap Crystals
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Reed Sap Crystals

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis doesn't know what to do since one of his medicine bottles is broken. Obtain Reed Sap Crystals from the monsters that are living on the roots of the reeds with big leaves at the upper side of the Sestines Wilderness.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilus doesn't know what to do since one of the medicine bottle is cracked. Obtain the fluid of reed essence dari monsters that are living on the roots of big leaves' reeds at upper side of Sestine Wilderness.

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained all the Reed Sap Crystals. Now, take the materials to Theophilis.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mendapatkan semua Reed Sap Crystals. Sekarang, bawa semuanya ke Theophilus.

Philipas' Soldier: You felt strange as you consumed the medicine created by Pilgrim Theophilis. Talk to Theophilis again.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu merasa aneh setelah meminum obat buatan Pilgrim Theophilus. Bicara dengan Theophilus lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Search through Witas' belongings
Philip's Soldiers: Cari dari barang milik Withus

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Theophilis wants his colleague, Witas to be cured of his condition. Look for Witas' belongings at the gravestone near Meeting Plaza and Klajone Access Road.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Theophilus ingin temannya, Withus kembali ke kondisi sebelumnya. Cari barang milik Withus di gravestone dekat Meeting Plaza dan Wedroka Access Road.

Philipas' Soldier: Give them to Pilgrim Witas
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan semuanya ke Pilgrim Withus

Philipas' Soldier: You've found all the objects that belong to Witas. Go to Pilgrim Witas to return all the objects that you just found.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan seluruh barang milik Withus. Temui Pilgrim Withus untuk mengembalikan semuanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for Pieces of the Portrait
Philip's Soldiers: Cari pieces of the drawing

Philipas' Soldier: You've found a Small Frame near the gravestone, but only ripped pieces of the Portrait is left. You may find the rest of the Portrait from the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan sebuah bingkai kecil dekat gravestone, tapi hanya ada sobekan gambar yang tertinggal. Kamu bisa menemukan sisanya dari monster disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for a %s by hunting monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Cari %s dengan membunuh monster-monster

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the pieces of the Portrait by hunting the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Cari pieces of the drawings dengan membunuh monster-monster

Philipas' Soldier: The Abandoned Chest at Klajone Access Road
Philip's Soldiers: The abandoned box di pintu masuk Wedroka

Philipas' Soldier: There is a chest that seems to be abandoned at Klajone Access Road. Inspect it to find out more about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada sebuah peti yang sepertinya diterlantarkan di pintu masuk Wedroka. Lihat dengan seksama untuk mencari tahu ceritanya.

Philipas' Soldier: You can't find the key for the chest. It is possible that the monsters have swallowed it, so try defeating the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak dapat menemukan kunci untuk peti itu. Ada kemungkinan monster-monster menelannya, jadi coba kalahkan monster-monster di sekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Open the chest
Philip's Soldiers: Buka peti itu

Philipas' Soldier: You've found the key! Now, let's open the chest.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan kuncinya! Sekarang, ayo buka petinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the key by defeating the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan key dengan mengalahkan monster-monster

Philipas' Soldier: The only Pond at the Apsimesti Crossroads looks very dirty. You may find a way to purify it near the Pond.
Philip's Soldiers: Satu-satunya danau di Apsimesti Crossroad terlihat sangat kotor. Kamu dapat menemukan cara membersihkannya di dekat danau itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Place the pots that will store the sap of the Tree of the Brothers
Philip's Soldiers: Letakkan pot yang akan membantu menyimpan getah dari Tree of the Brothers

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the pots that can store the sap near the pond. Take those pots and put them under the Trees of the Brothers near Niekas Field.
Philip's Soldiers: Cari pot yang akan menyimpan getah di dekat danau. Letakkan pot-pot tersebut dibawah Tree of the Brothers di dekat Niekas Fields.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the pots that can store the sap near the Pond. Take those pots and put them under the Trees near Niekas Field.
Philip's Soldiers: Cari pot yang akan menyimpan getah di dekat danau. Bawa dan letakkan pot-pot tersebut dibawah Tree of the Brothers di dekat Niekas Fields.

Philipas' Soldier: Purify the Pond of Silence with the sap of the Tree of the Brothers
Philip's Soldiers: Bersihkan Pond of Silence dengan getah dari Tree of the Brothers

Philipas' Soldier: The sap has collected some at the pots that you have placed. Purify the Pond of Silence using the collected sap.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mengumpulkan cukup getah. Bersihkan Pond of silencer menggunakan getah tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: When you purify the Pond of Silence using the sap, the Tree of Faith will retrieve its energy. Pour the sap into the Pond.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu sudah membersihkan Pond of Silence menggunakan getah, Tree of Faith akan mendapatkan energi mereka kembali. Percikkan getah ke dalam danau.

Philipas' Soldier: The appearance of an evil energy
Philip's Soldiers: Penampakan energi jahat

Philipas' Soldier: As the Tree of Faith revived, an unknown, evil energy appeared at the Peddler Camp. Hurry to it.
Philip's Soldiers: Selagi Tree of Faith tumbuh lagi, energi jahat yang tidak diketahui muncul di Peddler Camp. Ayo cepat menuju kesana.

Philipas' Soldier: The Succubus that lured the pilgrim at the Apsimesti Crossroads appeared. Defeat the Succubus.
Philip's Soldiers: Succubus yang memancing pilgrim di Apsimesti Crossroad muncul. Kalahkan Succubus.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that are protecting the hidden space
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster-monster yang melindungi hidden space

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that we are still far away from resolving the accident that occurred at Paupys Crossing. Talk with Frey what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya kita masih jauh dari menyelesaikan kecelakaan yang terjadi di Paupis Dock. Bicara dengan Frey apa yang harus dilakukan selanjutnya.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that you are now more closer to the true nature of the scary incident that occurred at Paupys Crossing. Talk to Ukert.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya kamu semakin dekat dengan kejadian sebenarnya dari kecelakaan menakutkan yang terjadi di Paupis Dock. Bicara ke Yukirt.

Philipas' Soldier: You can see something that is caved in at Poslinkis Forest. Get closer to it to look closely.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat melihat sesuatu ada di Poslinkis Forest. Dekati dan Coba periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: There are suspicious treasure chests at Poslinkis Forest. Get closer to it to look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada treasure chest mencurigakan di Poslinkis Forest. Dekati dan Coba periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Bishop Aurelius at the Grand Corridor
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Bishop Aurelious di Grand Corridor

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained Maven's First Key. Talk to Bishop Aurelius who is waiting at the Grand Corridor.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mendapatkan first key of Maven. Bicara dengan Aurelious yang sudah menunggu di Grand Corridor.

Philipas' Soldier: Solve the secret at the Platform of Benevolence
Philip's Soldiers: Pecahkan rahasia dari Platform of Benevolence

Philipas' Soldier: Solve the secret at the Platform of Benevolence by stepping on the footholds of the Arka Chapel and the Reception Room. If you have a trouble solving for the secret, get some help from Bishop Aurelius.
Philip's Soldiers: Solve for the secret at Platform of Benevolence by stepping on the footholds of the Arka worship place and the reception room. If you have a trouble solving for the secret, get some help dari Bishop Aurelious.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain Maven's Second Key
Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan second key of Maven

Philipas' Soldier: The secret is solved. Obtain Maven's Second Key at the Platform of Benevolence
Philip's Soldiers: Rahasia itu terpecahkan. Mendapatkan second key of Maven di Platform of Benevolence

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Bishop Aurelius at Uola Chapel
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan bishop Aurelious di Uolie worship place

Philipas' Soldier: Pass through the Penitence Route at the upper side of the Grand Corridor and reenter into the Grand Corridor to meet Aurelius.
Philip's Soldiers: Lewati Penitence Route di sisi atas Grand Corridor dan masukin Grand Corridoer untuk bertemu Aurelious.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the demons that are after the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan demon yang mencari divine symbols of the spiritual energy

Philipas' Soldier: Naktis' servants are trying to solve Maven's secret by obtaining the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power. Defeat the demons and obtain the Symbol of Spiritual Power.
Philip's Soldiers: Anak buah Naktis mencoba memecahkan secret of Maven dan mendapatkan divine symbol of the spiritual power. Kalahkan para demon dan dapatkan symbol of the spiritual power.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan divine symbol of the spiritual power

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated all the demons that are going after the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power. Obtain the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan seluruh demon yang mengincar divine symbol of the spiritual power. Dapatkan divine symbol of the spiritual power.

Philipas' Soldier: Fortunately, the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power seems to be okay. Talk to Bishop Aurelius again.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, divine symbol of the spiritual power kelihatannya baik-baik saja. Bicara dengan Bishop Aurelious lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Recharge the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power
Philip's Soldiers: Isi ulang divine symbol of the spiritual power

Philipas' Soldier: Recharge the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power by deploying it and defeating monsters nearby. If you have difficulty recharging the symbol, get help from Bishop Aurelius.
Philip's Soldiers: Isi ulang magical power setelah mengalahkan monster-monster disekitar menggunakan divine symbol of the spiritual power. Jika kamu mempunyai kesulitan mengisi ulang symbol itu, minta bantuan dari  Bishop Aurelious.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain Maven's Third Key at Karuna Altar
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan third key of Maven di Veinika altar

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain Maven's Third Key using the Holy Symbol of Spiritual Power at Karuna Altar.
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan third key of Maven menggunakan divine symbol of the spiritual power di Veinika Altar.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Priest Ruodell
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Disciple Ruodell

Philipas' Soldier: Priest Ruodell needs your help. Talk to Priest Ruodell.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Ruodell membutuhkan bantuanmu. Bicara dengan Disciple Ruodell.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for documents that are related to Naktis
Philip's Soldiers: Cari dokumen yang berhubungan dengan Naktis

Philipas' Soldier: You've found documents that would help removing the Naktis' curse. Talk to Priest Ruodell.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan dokumen-dokumen yang dapat membantu melepaskan kutukan Naktis. Bicara dengan Disciple Ruodell.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Priest Yosana
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Disciple Yosana

Philipas' Soldier: Priest Yosana seems to be at a loss. Talk to Priest Yosana again.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Yosana terlihat tidak tahu harus berbuat apa. Bicara dengan Disciple Yosana lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve Priest Yosana's Research
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa kembali dokumen penelitian milik Disciple Yosana

Philipas' Soldier: Priest Yosana told you that her research documents have disappeared and she suspects the demons have a role. Defeat the demons and retrieve her research documents.

Philip's Soldiers: Ada beberapa hal aneh yang tertancap di tanah saat kamu sedang menuju ke Dalryus dari Maryus. Sepertinya itulah yang membuat makanan menjadi cepat basi. Ayo hancurkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Return to Marius
Philip's Soldiers: Kembali ke Maryus

Philipas' Soldier: You've eliminated the things that were stuck into the ground. Tell this to Marius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil menghancurkan sesuatu yang tertancap di tanah. Ceritakan itu pada Maryus.

Philipas' Soldier: Help Marius
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu Maryus

Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Mayus butuh bantuan. Bantu dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve the seeds
Philip's Soldiers: Kembalikan Benih

Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya monster di land of Areluno baron mencuri Benih. Bawa kembali pockets of the Benih dari monster yang muncul di sekitar land of Areluno Baron.

Philip's Soldiers: Seseorang yang membutuhkan bantuamu mencarimu. Dekati dia dan Bicaralah dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Check the strange aura
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa irregular energy

Philipas' Soldier: Arunas, the secretary of the baron is checking the irregular energy in this region. Go to the place where Arunas pointed and check the irregular energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Arunas, Baron's secretary sedang memeriksa irregular energy di daerah ini. Pergi ke arah yang ditunjuk oleh Arunas pointed dan periksa irregular energy.

Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Arunas

Philipas' Soldier: Tell Arunas that there's no problem at the place where Arunas mentioned
Philip's Soldiers: Katakan pada Arunas bahwa tidak ada masalah di tempat yang disebutkan oleh dia

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Arunas

Philip's Soldiers: Tugas yang diperintahkan oleh Arunas

Philip's Soldiers: Arunas mengatakan padamu bahwa sebaiknya kamu memblokir energi aneh di tempat itu dan memberikanmu beberapa wooden sticks dan sebuah doll untuk menggunakan spell. Buat magic field di tempat dimana energy aneh tersebut muncul dan bakar doll nya untuk memblokir energi.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Arunas
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Arunas

Philipas' Soldier: You've created the magic circle that eliminates the strange enery and burned the doll, but it seems that the crops are withering. Anyways, report to Arunas that you successfully created the magic circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil membuat magic field yang bisa menghapus strange enery dan membakar doll tersebut, tapi sepertinya itu membuat tanaman menjadi layu. Namun, lapor ke Arunas bahwa kamu berhasil membuat the magic field.

Philipas' Soldier: Meet the Wizard Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Bertemu dengan probationary magician

Philipas' Soldier: There is Wizard Rimas. Talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu dia probationary magician. Bicaralah dengannya.

Philip's Soldiers: Enhance magic field itu

Philipas' Soldier: Would the attitude of Rimas change after you enhance the magic circles at each side?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah perilaku Rimas berubah setelah kamu enchance magic field di setiap sisinya?

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: You successfully enhanced the two magic circles. Tell this to Rimas.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil enhance kedua magic field. Laporkan ke Rimas.

Philipas' Soldier: Look closely at the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Coba periksa magic field itu

Philipas' Soldier: Look closely at the magic circles first in order to eliminate the strange energy
Philip's Soldiers: Coba periksa magic field itu terlebih dahulu untuk menghapuskan strange energy

Philipas' Soldier: Eliminate the protective jewel
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan protective jewel

Philipas' Soldier: As you were looking closely at the magic circle, the objects which resemble jewels came out from the lower side of the magic circle and scattered to various places nearby. It seems that they were protecting the strange energy. It seems that the magic circle would be enhanced when you break those jewels.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu sedang meCoba periksa magic field, sesuatu seperti jewel muncul dari bagian bawah magic field dan menyebar ke seluruh tempat di sekitar. Sepertinya mereka melindungi strange energy itu. Sepertinya magic field akan berhasil dienhance ketika kamu menghancurkan jewel-jewel itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Enhance the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Enhance magic field itu

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected all the energies of the monsters into the empty bottles. Now, sprinkle the energies of the monsters to the magic circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semua energies of the monster ke dalam empty bottle. Sekarang, sebarkan energi monster ke magic field.

Philipas' Soldier: Get closer to the magic circle and find out why the magic circle is not stable.
Philip's Soldiers: Mendekat ke magic field dan cari tahu kenapa magic field tidak stabil.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the energies of the monsters into the bottles and bury them under each side of the magic circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan energies of the monster ke dalam botol dan kubur mereka di tiap sisi magic field.

Philipas' Soldier: When you bury the bottles at each side of the magic circle after putting the energies of the monsters into them, the sealed magic circle will be enhanced.
Philip's Soldiers: Ketika kamu mengubur botol-botol itu di kedua sisi magic field setelah memasukkan energies of the monsters di dalamnya, sealed magic field itu akan berhasil dienhance.

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rimas

Philip's Soldiers: Terkadang monster mencuri dari storage yang di dalamnya terdapat fuel of the power generator . Bantu Rimas.

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated the monsters that were about to attack the storage. Go to Rimas and tell him about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil mengalahkan monster yang menyerang storage. Temui Rimas dan ceritakan padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that are trying to attack the storage
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang berusaha menyerang storage

Philipas' Soldier: Get near to the magic circle and look closely into it.
Philip's Soldiers: Dekati magic field dan Coba periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Explain to Rimas about the situation
Philip's Soldiers: Jelaskan situasinya kepada Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle is vibrating stragely. Report Rimas about this.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic field bergetar dengan aneh. Laporkan kepada Rimas.

Philipas' Soldier: Sprinkle the poison to the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Sebarkan poison ke magic field

Philipas' Soldier: Take the poison bottle that Rimas gave to you and go to the magic circle to sprinkle it. I don't understand why the vicious energy of the monsters enhance the magic circle, but get some more information by doing as Rimas told you to do so.
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa poison bottle yang Rimas berikan padamu dan pergi tebarkan ke magic field. Aku tidak mengerti kenapa vicious energy of the monsters dapat meng-enhance magic field itu, tapi dapatkan informasi dengan melakukan apa yang diminta oleh Rimas.

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle will now be enhanced since you sprinkled the poison onto it. Go there and take a look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic field seharusnya sudah berhasil di-enhance karena kamu telah menyebarkan poison keatasnya. Pergi kesana dan lihatlah.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that rushed in to the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang sedang bergegas ke magic field

Philipas' Soldier: As you were about to enhance the magic circle, the monsters suddenly rushed in! It seems that it's due to the poison that was sprinkled onto the magic circle. Defeat the monsters first.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu sedang enhance the magic field, tiba-tiba monster menyerbu masuk! Sepertinya mereka datang karena poison yang kamu sebarkan. Kalahkan monster terlebih dahulu.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that rushed in after smelling it
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang menyerbu masuk karena mencium baunya

Philipas' Soldier: There seems to be an unstable magic circle. Enhance the magic circle before the strange energy spreads anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya magic field ini tidak stabil. Enhance magic field itu sebelum strange energy menyebar lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Absorb the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Absorb monster-monster itu

Philipas' Soldier: In order to enhance the magic circle, you should bring the monsters near the magic circle. Bring the monsters that are alive.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk melakukan enhance ke magic field, sebaiknya kamu membawa monster-monster mendekati magic field. Bawa monster yang masih hidup.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the man
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan pria itu

Philipas' Soldier: There is a man standing who seems to be related to the baron. Talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada seseorang yang berdiri yang sepertinya mempunyai hubungan dengan baron. Bicaralah dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Go there by bringing the meats
Philip's Soldiers: Pergilah kesana dengan membawa meat

Philipas' Soldier: The Baron's secretary Benius is complaining that the Manticen that the Baron is keeping for strategic purposes is eating too much despite it's lack of usefulness. He gave you some new meat mentioning that the Manticen has become a fastidious eater. Go to the location mentioned by Benius with the meat.
Philip's Soldiers: Baron's Secretary yang baru, Ephesus, mengatakan saat ini telah terjadi fenomena aneh di area ini. Permintaan akan daging terus meningkat dan mereka meminta rasa yang lebih enak terus ditambahkan khususnya ke daging jenis baru ini. Temukan daging yang dimaksud di Holding Bay.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Benius
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Benius

Philipas' Soldier: Tell Benius that Manticen was disappeared since he was trying to eat humans.
Philip's Soldiers: Katakkan pada Benius bahwa Manticen telah menghilang sejak dia mencoba memakan manusia.

Philipas' Soldier: Observe the suspicious place
Philip's Soldiers: Amati tempat mencurigakan itu

Philipas' Soldier: You can see half of the head from the statue of the Goddess is buried in the ground. The statue of the Goddess in this place.. Go there and and dig it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat melihat setengah dari kepala di patung Goddess  terkubur di tanah. Patung Goddess ada di tempat ini.. Pergi kesana dan galilah.

Philip's Soldiers: Menggali kepala patung Goddess

Philipas' Soldier: It is strange that the head of the statue is in this place. {nl}Try digging it.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidakkah aneh bahwa kepala dari patung berada di dalam tempat ini. {nl}Cobalah menggalinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the information of the object
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan informasi dari benda itu

Philipas' Soldier: The thing that was buried under the ground was not a Goddess Statue, but in fact the head part. You better tell this to someone.
Philip's Soldiers: Benda yang terkubur di bawah tanah bukanlah patung Goddess , tapi hanya bagian kepalanya saja. Sebaiknya kamu menceritakan ini pada seseorang.

Philip's Soldiers: Buka alcohol box

Philipas' Soldier: Break the alcohol container
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan alcohol container

Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu sedang membuka alcohol container, monster-monster bermunculan dan berusaha mengganggu! Hindari serangan para monster dan hancurkan container dalam waktu tertentu dan buka itu!

Philip's Soldiers: Cari seseorang yang akan memberikan petunjuk

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan bagian-bagian yang sepertinya berasal dari bagian atas tubuh patung dari broken container. Bawa ini ke seseorang untuk dicari tahu kebenarannya.

Philipas' Soldier: It's hard to open the alcohol container. You've heard before that the wooden containers like this should be opened with a wooden hammer. Look for the materials to make a wooden hammer nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Sangatlah sulit untuk membuka alchocol container. Kamu pernah mendengar bahwa cara membuka container seperti ini haruslah menggunakan sebuah wooden hammer. Cari material untuk membuat sebuah wooden hammer di sekitar sini.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for clues
Philip's Soldiers: Cari petunjuk-petunjuk

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu membutuhkan seseorang yang akan mendengarkan tentang pieces of the stone statue yang kamu temukan di dalam alcohol container. Cari orang itu dan tanyakan padanya.

Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan beberapa petunjuk dari sayap itu

Philip's Soldiers: Ada beberapa energi yang keluar dari tempat tertentu, dan Yoana ingin mencari tahu apa itu. Kurangin HP monster menjadi setengah dan bicaralah pada magic field untuk mencari tahu apa yang terjadi.

Philip's Soldiers: Seseorang sepertinya melakukan banyak hal disini. Dekati orang itu dan cari tahu apakah dia mempunyai informasi yang bisa kamu dapatkan.

Philip's Soldiers: Ayo hancurkan magic field menggunakan monster disekitarnya. Jika kamu melempar monster ke dalam magic field, tidakkah kamu pikir magic field tersebut juga akan terbakar?

Philip's Soldiers: Ambil patung Goddess  dan letakkan di dalam magic field

Philipas' Soldier: Jonaris told you that in order to eliminate the magic circle, the mighty power of the Goddesses would be enough. Check whether the pieces of the statue are well glued together and try putting it on the magic circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Yonaris mengatakan padamu bahwa untuk menghancurkan magic field, kekuatan Goddess  sudah cukup. Periksa apakah pieces of the statue itu tertempel dengan baik dan coba letakkan di dalam magic field.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Jonaris
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Yonaris

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle has been successfully removed and the sprouts started to grow from the fields beside! Tell this to Jonaris.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic field berhasil dihilangkan dan tunas-tunas mulai tumbuh di area sekitarnya! Ceritakan ini pada Yonaris.

Philip's Soldiers: Jugas mengatakan bahwa sepertinya monster-monster disini membawa Benih yang dibutuhkan untuk bercocok tanam disini. Kumpulkan Benih dari monster di sekitar dan bawa kembali ke Jugas.

Philip's Soldiers: Sebenarnya kamu tidak tahu secara pasti, tapi bawa benda yang kamu dapatkan dari monster ke Jugas.

Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus mengatakan padamu bahwa untuk membuat sesuatu yang besar, dia membutuhkan banyak wooden sticks. Dapatkan beberapa wooden stick dari pagar disekitar.

Philip's Soldiers: Bawa mereka ke Horaceus

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mendapatkan beberapa wooden stick. Bawa mereka ke Horaceus.

Philipas' Soldier: Collaborate with Horacius
Philip's Soldiers: Bekerjasama dengan Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Horacius to help him what he is preparing
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Horaceus untuk membantu dia mempersiapkan semuanya

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain hard stones
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan hard stones

Philipas' Soldier: Let's collect some stones to help Horacius' big task. You can get them from the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo kumpulkan beberapa batu untuk membantu tugas berat Horaceus. Kamu bisa mendapatkan mereka dari monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand them over to Horacius
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan semuanya ke Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: Take the stones that you obtained from the monsters to Horacius
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa batu-batu yang kamu dapatkan dari monster ke Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Horacius has some requests to you. Talk to him.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect some poison from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan beberapa poison dari monster

Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus mengatakan padamu bahwa dia membutuhkan beberapa poison untuk dilumuri di ujung wooden stick. Letakkan pot yang ia berikan padamu dan pancing monster-monster untuk mendapatkan beberapa poison.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand over the poison of the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan poison of the monster

Philipas' Soldier: Take the poison of the monsters to Horacius
Philip's Soldiers: Bawakan poison of the monster itu ke Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: Ask Horacius if there's anything you could help for the supply of the weapons
Philip's Soldiers: Tanyakan pada Horaceus apakah ada yang dapat kamu bantu tentang penyediaan senjata

Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan farming tools

Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus mengatakan padamu bahwa dia membutuhkan banyak farming toolsyang akan digunaka sebagai senjata. Dia tidak dapat bergerak karena dia sedang mengubahnya menjadi senjata, jadi tanyakan kepada para petani di sekitar dimana kamu bisa mendapatkan beberapa tool itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Take the farming tools to Horacius
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa farming tools ke Horaceus

Philip's Soldiers: Tauras yang mempunyai tugas menyediakan makanan yang berat itu. Untuk membantu tugasnya, mari cari beberapa dandelions dari daerah xx. Ketika kamu menarik keluar dandelion, ingatlah bahwa kamu juga perlu menarik akarnya.

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil menemukan seluruh sacks of the grains. Serahkan semuanya ke Doron dan tanyakan padanya tentang keberadaan Druid.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Gord Shaton is planning something. Talk to Gord Shaton so he can calm down again.

Philip's Soldiers: Gorde Shaton memanggil monster yang dia katakan dia beli dari Fedimian, tapi monster-monster itu tidak mau mendengarkan dia dan mulai menyerang. Kalahkan semua summoned monsters.

Philipas' Soldier: Gord Shaton realized something as he saw the monsters attacking him. Talk to Gord Shaton.

Philip's Soldiers: Gorde Shaton akan memberikan tugas mengatur pertanian kepada Vanessa. Bicaralah dengan Druid Martineque tentang hal itu.

Philip's Soldiers: Periksa kantung obat-obatan

Philipas' Soldier: Valen ordered people to purchase medicine from Klaipeda, but they were attacked by monsters and barely managed to survive. Please find the bags of the medicine on behalf of Valen.
Philip's Soldiers: Baren memerintahkan seseorang untuk membeli obat dari Klaipeda, tetapi dia diserang oleh monster dan susah payah bertahan. Tolong temukan kantung pengobatan atas nama Baren.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand it over to Steward Valen
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan kepada Baren

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Lauzinute across the underground tunnel
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Lauzinute diseberang lorong bawah tanah

Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Scorpio didekat menara jam cuaca

Philip's Soldiers: Buros mengatakan padamu bahwa Scorpio muncul kembali karena sikapmu yang kelewatan. Kalahkan Scorpio di dekat menara jam cuaca.

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated Scorpio. Report to Buros.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengalahkan Scorpio. Laporlah kepada Buros.

Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah dengan Oliver

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Oliver came to this farm to look for something. Let's listen from him what he is trying to obtain.
Philip's Soldiers: Tampaknya Oliver datang ke pertanian ini untuk mencari sesuatu. Marilah dengarkan apa sedang dicarinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the leaves of Biterose
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan daun Biterose

Philip's Soldiers: Oliver menginginkan daun Biterose. Kamu akan mendapatkan reward setelah menolongnya.

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected enough leaves so Oliver would be satisfied. Let's return to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mengumpulkan cukup daun untuk memenuhi permintaan Oliver. Bicaralah padanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with Farm Soldier Upham
Philip's Soldiers: Bicaralah dengan tentara, Upham

Philipas' Soldier: You've found Farm Soldier Upham, who is sitting down alone at the Wind Vane Tower. Ask him why he is sitting there alone.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menemukan tentara bayaran di pertanian, Upham yang duduk sendirian di menara jam cuaca. Dengarkan mengapa dia duduk sendirian disana.

Philipas' Soldier: Escort Farm Soldier Upham to a safe place
Philip's Soldiers: Kawal Upham ke tempat yang aman

Philipas' Soldier: Upham was separated from his colleagues due to monster attack. Please take Upham to the Farm Assembly Hall where General Buros is at.
Philip's Soldiers: Upham terpisah dari teman-temannya karena serangan para monster. Bawalah Upham ke tempat pertemuan di pertanian dimana Broknews berada.

Philipas' Soldier: You've took Upham to General Buros. Talk with General Buros.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah membawa Upham ke Broknews. Bicara dengan Broknews.

Philipas' Soldier: How should we know what the baron's thinking?{nl}All he told us was to behave well when the Revelator came...{nl}We're just doing the work he told us to do.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana kita mengerahui pemikiran seorang baron.{nl}Dia mengatakan kita harus bersikap sopan saat Savior datang maka kami hanya mengerjakan tugas seperti yang dia minta.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Well, if you go see the baron yourself, you may find out.{nl}He is working on something big at Myrkiti Farm, so why don't you go meet him?
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin kalau kamu menemui sendiri sang baron, kamu akan mengetahui sesuatu.{nl}Dia sedang mengerjakan hal besar di pertanian Mirukiti, jadi mengapa kamu tidak pergi menemuinya?

Philipas' Soldier: I have to tie the sacks of grain, but I don't have enough rope.{nl}I am sure that the monsters nearby took them. Please get some tight rope for me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harus mengikat karung gandum tetapi tidak memiliki cukup tali.{nl}Pastilah monster di dekat sini mengambilnya. Tolong carilah tali yang cukup kuat untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, ignore what the workers around here say.{nl}They are whining.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, jangan pedulikan perkataan orang.{nl}Mereka bisanya mengeluh saja.

Philipas' Soldier: Good. {nl}Now the task here is completed.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. {nl}Kini semua tugas di tempat ini telah terselesaikan.

Philipas' Soldier: Hey, are you the Revelator?{nl}Then I welcome you. The baron told me to treat you well.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hei, Apakah kamu seorang Savior?{nl}Maka aku menyambutmu. Baron berkata harus melayani kamu baik-baik.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: There is a small task you can do.{nl}We don't have enough hands here. No, I am not talking about farming.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada tugas kecil yang dapat kamu kerjakan.{nl}Kami tidak memiliki cukup tenaga disini. Ah, Aku tidak membicarakan mengenai bertani.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Something seems to be moving in the sacks.
Philip's Soldiers: Sesuatu tampaknya bergerak di dalam kantung.

Philipas' Soldier: I request that you finish the rest.{nl}There are some abandoned sacks at Tvora Road. I want you to take care of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku memintamu menyelesaikan sisanya.{nl}Ada beberapa kantung yang terbengkalai di Tvora Highway. Aku ingin kamu melengkapinya.

Philipas' Soldier: We don't have enough workforce.{nl}Of course, the biggest reason is that the workers here are not working hard.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kami tidak memiliki cukup tenaga disini.{nl}Tentu, alasan terbesarnya ialah pekerja disini tidak giat bekerja.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: That garbage came from other farms due to the lack of workforce.{nl}But, I don't understand why they have to be taken care of here.
Philip's Soldiers: Sampah itu datang dari pertanian lain karena kita kekurangan tenaga kerja.{nl}Tetapi, aku tidak mengerti mengapa.

Philipas' Soldier: You can bury them under the ground or push them off from the cliff.{nl}I've been doing that 'til now.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat menguburkannya dibawah tanah atau mendorongnya dari tepi gunung.{nl}Aku masih melakukannya sampai saat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Why are you back again?{nl}Did you see something that you shouldn't have seen?
Philip's Soldiers: Mengapa kamu kembali kesini lagi.{nl}Kamu melihat hal yang seharusnya tidak kamu lihat?

Philipas' Soldier: Save me!{nl}Please, save me..
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong aku!{nl}Tolong, selamatkan aku..

Philipas' Soldier: I feel light headed. Please get me something to eat..{nl}I hid some food in the bushes a long time ago while I was working.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pusing. Tolong carikan aku sesuatu untuk dimakan..{nl}Aku menyembunyikan makanan di semak-semak beberapa waktu lalu saat aku sedang bekerja.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm not sure. I was working like I usually do, and then I went upstairs... {nl}Something strange happened... It became dark...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bekerja seperti biasanya hari ini lalu pergi ke lantai atas.. {nl}Aneh.. Tiba-tiba pandanganku menjadi gelap..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know what happened.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahu apa yang terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: What happened to all the people who were with me..{nl}Just what the hell happened..
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang terjadi dengan orang yang berada bersamaku..{nl}Apa yang terjadi sebenarnya..

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you.{nl}I should recover some energy after eating this...
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl}Seharusnya energiku pulih setelah memakannya..

Philipas' Soldier: Soldier Stepas
Philip's Soldiers: Private soldier, Stephas

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the supporting workforce? No? {nl}We don't have enough workforce so I want to ask someone to help us.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu bala bantuannya? tidak. {nl}Kami tidak memiliki cukup tenaga kerja jadi aku ingin meminta bantuan setiap orang untuk membantu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I need to distribute a nutritious tonic that the baron gave to me.{nl}But since this is undiluted, I should mix something into it.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan menyebarkan tonik bernutrisi yang diberikan baron padamu.{nl}Tetapi,karena belum disuling kita harus mencampur sesuatu dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: The relationship between the farmer and the private soldier is always the same.{nl}One side works and the other side manages it.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hubungan antara petani dan kopral memang selalu sama.{nl}Satu sisi bekerja dan sisi lain mengaturnya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Plus, it's the baron's orders,{nl}Even if he wants to share more, he can't. That's why I think their relationship is sour.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Karena dia yang menerima perintah sang baron,{nl}Bahkan kalau dia ingin membagi lebih,tidak bisa. Makanya kukira hubungan antara mereka tidak begitu baik.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What we need is venom from the Scorpio. {nl}The Scorpio is nocturnal, so it must be sleeping at Soil of Arable.{nl}Wake it up and extract the venom out from it. Sounds easy, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah racun Scorpio. {nl}Mereka semua bekerja pada malam hari dan pasti tertidur di daerah perencanaan kultivasi.{nl}Bangunkan mereka dan ambil racun dari tubuh mereka. Gampang bukan?

Philipas' Soldier: Approach it carefully..{nl}If you attack too fast, it won't be effective.
Philip's Soldiers: Jalanlah perlahan-lahan..{nl}Jika kamu terlalu cepat menyerang, hasilnya tidak akan efektif.

Philipas' Soldier: All done. {nl}Now, I will share this with the workers.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Selesai. {nl}Kini aku akan memberitahukan para pekerja yang lain.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Especially Dalius over there. He seems to always be exhausted these days.{nl}He's not doing his work and he looks exhausted.{nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terutama, Dalryus disana. Sepertinya dia mudah lelah akhir-akhir ini.{nl}Dia tidak bekerja dan kelihatan capek.{nl}{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I will take one sweet herb leaf on my way.{nl}That medicine, it's disgusting to consume it.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mencari sweet herb leaf.{nl}Obat itu, sangat menjijikkan untuk dimakan.

Philipas' Soldier: The Scorpio Venom.{nl}Can humans consume it?
Philip's Soldiers: Racun sang Scorpio.{nl}Memang manusia boleh memakannya?

Philipas' Soldier: Who are you? {nl}Stepas sent you?
Philip's Soldiers: Siapa kamu? {nl}Stephas mengirimmu?

Philipas' Soldier: Nutritious tonic? He told you to give it to me? {nl}Hmm, that's unexpected.
Philip's Soldiers: Tonik bernutrisi? Dia memintamu untuk memberikan kepadaku? {nl}Hmm, tidak kusangka.

Philipas' Soldier: The poison of Scorpio was somewhat strange.{nl}Damn. It's already in effect. I won't mind it, if it doesn't threaten my life.
Philip's Soldiers: Racun sang Scorpio, tampaknya aneh.{nl}Sial. Sudah terjadi. Aku tidak peduli kalaupun mengancam nyawaku.

Philipas' Soldier: I have a headache. What's happening?{nl}My stomach's aching too... I'm an idiot to consume what that man gave me right away.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pusing. Apa yang terjadi.{nl}Aduh.. Aku memang orang bodoh yang memakan begitu saja apa yang diberikannya kepadaku.

Philipas' Soldier: Is he really going to be okay?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah akan baik-baik saja nantinya?

Philipas' Soldier: I should bring lunch to my brother, he's working at Shlake Trail.{nl}Whenever I try to cross the bridge though, the bread gets spoiled.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mesti membawa makan siang kepada saudara laki-lakiku yang bekerja di Shilake forest.{nl}Kapanpun aku mencoba menyeberangi jembatan, rotinya selalu habis.

Philipas' Soldier: I swear I'm not lying.{nl}Can you take it there for me?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berjanji tidak akan berbohong.{nl}Tolonglah aku membawanya?

Philipas' Soldier: Come back if it gets spoiled.{nl}But I only have two remaining breads so be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Kembalilah jika ada yang hilang.{nl}Tetapi tinggal tersisa dua roti jadi berhati-hatilah.

Philipas' Soldier: Did my brother ask you to give this to me?{nl}I'm tired and I don't know why these kind of things keep happening...{nl}But thank you, I appreciate this.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah saudara laki-lakiku yang memintamu memberikannya?{nl}Aku sangat lelah dan tidak mengerti mengapa ini selalu terjadi, terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: Is it okay now?{nl}Okay then hand it over to Dalius.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang sudah tidak apa-apa kan?{nl}Serahkan kepada Dalryus.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you scared?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu takut?

Philipas' Soldier: Strange isn't it? How come the food gets spoiled whenever I cross over there?{nl}Is it because of the smoke?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aneh bukan? Bagaimana bisa roti bisa hilang saat aku menyeberang.{nl}Apakah karena asap disana?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: How should I know about it?{nl}If you're going back to my brother, please get rid of those strange things.{nl}I'm too scared to do it myself.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana aku mengetahuinya. {nl}Kalau kamu kembali ke saudaraku tolong selidiki hal aneh itu, aku sangat ketakutan makanya aku tidak dapat melakukannya.

Philipas' Soldier: If they really are getting spoiled due to the smoke, I wonder what it is...{nl}It can't be good for your health, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau makananku hilang karena asap itu, memang apa sebenarnya yang terjadi disana..{nl}Lagipula tidak baik untuk kesehatan kan?

Philipas' Soldier: I actually suspected that those round things were making the smoke.{nl}They always said it was created by the baron, and that a harvester like me couldn't possibly know anything about that.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebenarnya aku mencurigai benda bundar itu yang mengeluarkan asap.{nl}Tetapi mereka terus mengatakan bahwa benda itu diciptakan oleh sang baron untuk memudahkan panen, jadi bagaimana mungkin aku mengetahuinya.

Philipas' Soldier: So did the smoke go away?{nl}That's the first time I've seen such a thing.
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi apakah asapnya menghilang?{nl}Ini kali pertama aku melihatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Hello. I am the secretary of Baron Allerno, who is the owner of this place.{nl}There are some things that the baron told me to do, but it's not working well.{nl}I am somewhat tired also.. whenever I come out to the land, I get tired and my body doesn't seem good.{nl}Please help me a bit.
Philip's Soldiers: Hai. aku adalah sekretaris baron Areluno, pemilik tempat ini.{nl}Berbagai macam hal ditugaskan padaku, tapi beberapa diantaranya tidak berjalan dengan mulus.{nl}Lagipula aku lelah, setiap kali aku keluar kemari aku kelelahan dan tubuhku sakit.{nl}Tolonglah aku.

Philipas' Soldier: Rimas said the crops here not growing well due to the strange energy in this place.{nl}But, since there is no strange energy and the crops are growing well..{nl}Thanks for checking it.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimas mengatakan bahwa tanaman disini tidak tumbuh sempurna dikarenakan adanya energi aneh.{nl}Tetapi, semenjak lenyapnya energi aneh itu tanaman kembali tumbuh..{nl}terima kasih telah memeriksanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Anyways, I received the report that the strange energy was definitely at the place you took a look at while ago.{nl}I will give the doll and some woods, use them to burn the doll.{nl}You will be prepared for some strange energy that may appear.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menerima laporan bahwa energi aneh berada ditempat yang beberapa waktu lalu kamu selidiki.{nlAku akan memberikan beberapa kayu dan boneka, gunakan untuk membakar bonekanya.{nl}Kamu mesti bersiap menghadapi energi aneh yang mungkin saja muncul.

Philipas' Soldier: What? The crops died after doing what you were told to do?{nl}Was the curse of the doll little strong?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa? Tanaman mati setelah kamu melakukan apa yang kuminta?{nl}Apakah kutukan boneka itu teramat kuat?

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the Revelator? {nl}I don't care about that, I am a bit busy right now so could you help my task?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu sang Savior? {nl}Aku tidak peduli mengenai hal itu, Aku cukup sibuk saat ini jadi bisakah kamu membantu dalam tugasku?

Philipas' Soldier: There are some magic circles around here that we put after receiving the order of Baron Allerno.{nl}The magic circle blocks the strange energy in this region and supplies the magical power onto this generator.{nl}But, since the power of the magic circle is weak, we need to enhance it.
Philip's Soldiers: Atas perintah Baron Areluno kami telah memasang  berbagai pagar magis disekitar sini.{nl}Pagar magis akan menghalangi energi aneh di daerah ini dan mensuplai kekutan magis ke generator ini.{nl}Tetapi, karena kekuatan pagar magis melemah, kita harus menperkuatnya kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}The true Revelator would find the way to enhance the magic circle just by looking at it.{nl}Take the bottles since you may need them.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Sang Savior sejati pasti dapat mencari cara memperkuat pagar magis hanya dengan melihatnya.{nl}Bawalah botol ini siapa tahu kamu akan memerlukannnya.

Philipas' Soldier: The power generator works by using the grains that are piled up at the storage over there.{nl}That's why I needed them a lot.
Philip's Soldiers: Kekuatan generator bekerja dengan menggunakan butiran-butiran yang bertumpuk di gudang sebelah sana.{nl}Maka itu aku sangat membutuhkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}The tenants are cooperating with us without any resistance.{nl}.. Anyways, I am worried since that storage gets attacked by the monsters frequently these days.{nl}I guess that's not strange since we piled up the grains like that.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Para penyewa tanah bekerjasama tanpa penolakan.{nl}.. Hmm, tetapi aku menjadi kuatir karena gudang itu seringkali diserang para monster.{nl}Kuharap itu bukan hal aneh karena kita yang menumpuk butiranna sembarangan.

Philipas' Soldier: I can only say it's the power generator that helps the important gate which connects the two places to be stayed open.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku hanya bisa berkata bahwa power generator yang membantu gerbang penting menghubungkan dua tempat agar selalu terbuka.

Philipas' Soldier: What is that? Is that the head part of the sculpture? Give it to me. I got something to check.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa itu? Apa kepala itu merupakan bagian dari patung? Berikan padaku. Aku harus memeriksanya

Philipas' Soldier: This is the upper body part of the sculpture. Give it to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah bagian paling atas dari patung. Berikan padaku.

Philipas' Soldier: That's the lower body part of the sculpture..?{n}Give it to me
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah itu merupakan bagian terbawah dari patung..?{n}Berikan padaku

Philipas' Soldier: They are the wings of the sculpture.. Can you give them to me?
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat sayap pada patung.. Dapatkah kamu menunjukkannya padaku?

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for saving me.{nl}I am going to return now.
Philip's Soldiers: terima kasih telah menyelamatkanku.{nl}Aku akan kembali sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: No matter how many times you ask, there are not many things I can tell you. {nl}But, where did the villagers go? I don't see any familiar faces..
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun kamu menanyakan hal lain padaku, banyak sekali hal yang tidak dapat kukatakan padamu lagi. {nl}Tetapi, kemanakah penduduk desa pergi? Aku tidak dapat menemukan wajah yang kukenali disini..

Philipas' Soldier: What? A person came out from the sack? What the hell?{nl}I really don't know anything. How could I know anything? I came from a different farm.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apa? Seseorang muncul dari dalam karung? Aneh sekali?{nl}Aku sama sekali tidak mengetahui apapun. Bagaimana aku bisa tahu? Aku datang dari pertanian yang berbeda.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You've done a good job.{nl}I will report separately, so just go on your way.
Philip's Soldiers: Selamat.{nl}Aku akan melaporkan ini jadi selamat berpisah.

Philipas' Soldier: This land is too infertile and the monsters have taken all the seeds.{nl}Can you find the seeds that the monsters took?
Philip's Soldiers: Tanah disini agak tandus dan para monster juga telah mengambil semua benih.{nl}Tolong bantu aku menemukan benih yang diambil para monster?

Philipas' Soldier: You haven't gotten enough of the seeds back yet.{nl}I am sorry, but can you get me some more?
Philip's Soldiers: Jumlah benih yang kamu kumpulkan belum cukup.{nl}Aku minta maaf, tetapi dapat kamu mendapatkannya lagi?

Philipas' Soldier: I put them well in small bags.{nl}I think the monsters who took them ran away to Tvora Road.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku meletakkan mereka di dalam kantung.{nl}Aku pikir para monster yang mengambilnya melarikan diri ke Tuvora Highway.

Philipas' Soldier: If I ask the baron to give me seeds again, he may hit me. {nl}The soldiers can't say anything to the baron either.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika sang baron memintaku untuk memberi benih lagi, dia mungkin mengenaiku. {nl}Para tentara tidak dapat mengatakan apapun juga ke sang baron.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, yes. This is it.{nl}Unfortunately, this isn't all that was taken.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, ya. Ini dia.{nl}Namun, belum semuanya terkumpul.

Philipas' Soldier: Now we have enough seeds. {nl}Thank you so much.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang kita sudah memiliki cukup benih. {nl}Terima kasih banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: Where did Manticen hide?{nl}It's about the time that I should feed him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kemanakah Mentiken bersembunyi{nl}Sekaranglah waktunya aku memberinya makan.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Hmm? Are you new here?{nl}Then you should help my task.{nl}Please find the Manticen who ran away with the food.{nl}He may be near the brewery. I will search that side.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Hmm? Apakah kamu orang baru disini?{nl}Maka kamu mesti membantuku.{nl}Tolong temukan Mentiken yang lari dengan makanan.{nl}Dia mungkin berada di dekat brewery. Aku akan mencari sisi lainnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I am doing many tasks that the baron told me to do.{nl}Well.. something like feeding..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku melakukan banyak hal yang ditugaskan baron padaku.{nl}Yah.. Hal seperti memberikan makan..

Philipas' Soldier: If you find it, throw this meat to lure it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu menemukannya, lemparkan daging ini untuk memancingnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm? You defeated it since it was trying eat humans?{nl}Ah.. okay..{nl}Okay. I will report to the baron.
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm? Karena dia ingin memakan manusia maka kamu mengalahkannya?{nl}Ah.. oke..{nl}Oke. Aku akan melaporkannya kepada sang baron.

Philipas' Soldier: Somehow, I came up front.{nl}It's embarassing.{nl}I am just a tennant here.
Philip's Soldiers: Mengapa aku berada didepan.{nl}Rada memalukan.{nl}Aku hanya penyewa disini.

Philipas' Soldier: We can make lots of weapons with the leather and the stonese.{nl}Right now, we don't have enough leather.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami dapat membuat banyak senjata dengan leather dan stonese.{nl}Namun saat ini kami tidak memiliki cukup leather.

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters are perfect to get the materials.{nl}You can also get the leathers from the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Para monsters merupakan sumber material.{nl}Kamu dapat mendapatkannya dari mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Now we should collect some poison.{nl}It will be used diversely.
Philip's Soldiers: Kini kita mesti mengumpulkan beberapa poison.{nl}Penggunaannya akan dipisah.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}My grandmother taught me this method.{nl}It is the method to obtain some specific substancees from the things nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Nenekku mengajarkan metode ini.{nl}Metode ini dapat digunakan untuk memperoleh material tertentu dari benda disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: The farming tools are used to crave the land so they can be also used as weapons.{nl}But, we definitely need the cooperation from the tenant famers..
Philip's Soldiers: Peralatan pertanian dipakai untuk menggali tanah jadi mereka pun dapat dipakai sebagai senjata.{nl}Tetapi, kita mesti memperoleh ijin dari petani penyewa..

Philipas' Soldier: Please extract some Nioles from there.{nl}Niole is a thankful flower.{nl}You can make soups with the grains and they can also be used as herbs.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong dapatkan beberapa Nioles dari sana.{nl}Niole adalah bunga penuh kegunaan.{nl}Kamu dapat membuat sup dengan butiran gandum dan mereka pun dapat digunakan sebagai obat.

Philipas' Soldier: The problem is that the food storage often gets attacked by the monsters.{nl}I have a colleague who is protecting there, but it's always dangerous.{nl}Could you help me a bit?
Philip's Soldiers: Masalahnya gudang makanan seringkali diserang oleh para monsters.{nl}Aku memiliki rekan yang mengawal disana, tetapi sangat berbahaya.{nl}Dapatkah kamu menolongku?

Philipas' Soldier: The food storage is at Vinoga Brewery.
Philip's Soldiers: Gudang makanan berada di Vinoga Brewery.

Philipas' Soldier: I am counting on your help with the storage.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mengandalkanmu menjaga di sana

Philipas' Soldier: I am working for that day.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bekerja pada hari itu.

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated all the monsters that were attacking the storage!{nl}Thanks.{nl}As we were about to attack, the storage keeper hid well since you helped.{nl}I should tell him to protect the storage well.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengalahkan semua monsters yang menyerang gudang makanan!{nl}terima kasih.{nl}Karena kami segera akan melakukan penyerangan, sang penjaga gudang bersembunyi.{nl}Aku mesti menegurnya untuk lebih menjaga gudang dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the Revelator?{nl}I often hear your stories even when I am in this kind of rural area.{nl}I am removing the magic circles that are stuck in the tenants' farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu sang Savior?{nl}Aku sudah sering mendengar tentangmu walaupun aku berada di tempat yang terpencil ini.{nl}Aku melepaskan pagar magis yang tersangkut di pertanian ini.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}We are doing this kind of tasks to help Horacius.{nl}Of course, I am doing the tasks for me as well.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Kami melakukan tugas seperti ini untuk menolong Horaceus.{nl}Tentu, aku pun melakukannya juga untuk diriku sendiri.

Philipas' Soldier: I've doing this job til now..{nl}Now, we have about 3 left.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku telah melaksananakannya hingga saat ini..{nl}Tinggal tersisa 3 saja.

Philipas' Soldier: The seal magic circle that was discovered in the fallow ground.. We should eliminate them.{nl}I can't break them since they have protective barrier.{nl}I will give you the stone of the blessing so try to break it by throwing this.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Segel pagar magis ditemukan di tanah kosong.. Kami mesti memusnahkannya.{nl}Aku tidak dapat menghancurkannya karena terdapat pelindung magis.{nl}Aku akan memberikan blessing stone jadi coba hancurkan dengan melemparkan batu ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: There's a magic circle at the entrance of Tarvas.{nl}You should break that first.{nl}But the monsters always disturb it..
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat magic field di gerbang Tarvas.{nl}Kamu harus menghancurkannya pertama kali.{nl}Tetapi para monsters selalu mengganggunya..

Philipas' Soldier: Now we are almost done!{nl}Thank you so much!
Philip's Soldiers: Kini tugas kami hampir selesai!{nl}Terima kasih banyak!

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that the pieces that he gave to me belong to the statue of the Goddess.{nl}This must be.. the trace of those barons manipulating something on this ground and breaking it afterwards.{nl}You who collected these..
Philip's Soldiers: Tampaknya benda yang diberikannya adalah bagian dari statue of the Goddess .{nl}Ini pasti adalah.. Jejak para baron yang memanipulasi sesuatu di tanah ini lalu menghancurkannya.{nl}Tolong kumpulkan..

Philipas' Soldier: I am collecting the traces here.{nl}I can't tell you in details, but I am preparing for something big.{nl}To do that, I need to persuade the tenant farmers.{nl}So I am collecting those.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mengumpulkan jejak disini.{nl}Aku tidak dapat memberitahumu lebih jauh, tetapi aku tengah mempersiapkan suatu yang besar.{nl}Aku mesti bisa membujuk para petani disini untuk melakukan itu.{nl}Maka aku mengumpulkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: There's a magic circle before you reach Ramus Intersection.{nl}And the smoke is coming up from the ground.{nl}That's called the strange energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Terdapat pagar magis dihadapan kamu didepan persimpangan Ramus.{nl}Dan tanah mengeluarkan asap.{nl}Energi aneh biasanya disebut.

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters fall into the eternal sleep.. dying..{nl}The monsters die due to the energy that is coming out from there..{nl}The monsters are tiresome and vicious.
Philip's Soldiers: Para monsters terlelap dalam tidur abadi.. sekarat..{nl}Mereka mati karena energi yang keluar disana..{nl}Para monster kesetanan dan lalu menjadi lelah.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}The monsters fall into the eternal sleep due to that energy, that proves that the energy is not bad.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Para monster terlelap dalam tidur abadi karena energi itu, itu membuktikan tidak ada masalah disana.

Philipas' Soldier: The amount of the crops after harvesting reduced a lot from some point of time in the past.{nl}Even if we care a lot, the crops wither easily.{nl}I think it may be due to the magic circle that the barons created on this land.{nl}Could you help me out?
Philip's Soldiers: Jumlah padi yang dipanen menurun drastis dibanding sebelumnya.{nl}Padi menjadi sangat mudah mengering.{nl}Kukira ini adalah akibat dari pagar magis yang dibuat sang baron di tanah ini.{nl}Dapatkah kamu menolongku?

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}That's why the amount of the crops was reduced.{nl}I am trying to find the reason for it.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Maka itu hasil panen menurun.{nl}Aku tengah mencari penyebabnya.

Philipas' Soldier: This magic circle has some kind of protective barrier so it's not easy to break it.{nl}So I am trying to light it up.{nl}To break the shield, I should maintain the flame.
Philip's Soldiers: Pagar magis ini memiliki sejenis mantra pelindung maka tidak mudah dihancurkan.{nl}Aku akan mencoba membakarnya.{nl}Seharusnya jika api terus menerus membakarnya, pagar ini pun akan hancur.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Should we kill those orange Dandells and throw kindlings on them?{nl}Try it.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Haruskah kita membantai orange Dandells itu atau mengampuninya?{nl}Cobalah.

Philipas' Soldier: The barons are pludering a lot these days and the magic circles like that have been created a lot across this region. Some of them are less shiny.{nl}Anyways, you get hurt from the ones that shine more so it's hard to eliminate them.
Philip's Soldiers: Para baron sangat aktif akhir-akhir ini dan pagar magis seperti itu sangat banyak dibuat di sepanjang daerah ini. Beberapa diantaranya bersinar redup.{nl}Kamu akan terluka dari pagar yang bersinar terang jadi sangat sulit memusnahkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: You came at the right time. I connected the pieces with some sticky stuff.{nl}.. As I expected. This is the statue of the Goddess.{nl}I could only glue them like this with my skill.. It will break again if I don't do it well.{nl}I am sorry that I just glued them like this..
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu datang pada saat tepat. Aku sudah merekatkan bagian-bagian ini dengan lem khusus.{nl}.. Seperti kuduga ini adalah statue of the Goddess .{nl}Inilah yang dapat kulakukan.. Kalau tidak hati-hati patungnya dapat lepas lagi.{nl}Maafkan aku kalau aku tidak mendapat ijinmu..

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Hey, take it.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Hei, ambillah.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh really?{nl}Very well done!{nl}Too bad about the statue.. but the Goddesses would forgive this.
Philip's Soldiers: Sungguh?{nl}Mantap!{nl}Tidak apa-apa kalau patungnya dilem dengan sesuatu yang jorok.. Tetapi pasti sang Goddesses dapat memaafkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: There's a uncompleted seal magic circle down there.{nl}The seal is not complete yet so the strange energy is coming out from it, but the problem is that it doesn't look like that.
Philip's Soldiers: Disana terdapat segel magis yang belum sempurna.{nl}Walaupun belum sempurna tetapi ada energi aneh yang keluar darinya, tetapi masalahnya bukan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}It is suspicious.{nl}I have to connect these pieces, so can you find out more about the energy?
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Mencurigakan.{nl}Aku akan menghubungkan bagian-bagiannya, jadi dapatkah kamu menyelidiki lebih jauh mengenai energi itu?

Philipas' Soldier: To accomplish a big task..{nl}You should first collect the clues.{nl}You can only persuade the tenant farmers with them.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk menyelesaikan tugas besar..{nl}Pertama kamu mesti mengumpulkan petunjuknya.{nl}Kamu hanya dapat membujuk para petani dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: The crops aren't growing.. There aren't anything to eat..
Philip's Soldiers: Padi yang ditanam tidak tumbuh.. Tidak ada yang bisa dimakan..

Philipas' Soldier: The enhancement of the magic circle and the magical power supply are closely related to each other.
Philip's Soldiers: Proses penguatan pagar magis dan supply kekuatan magis berkaitan erat satu sama lain.

Philipas' Soldier: We are keep going to do the task to find ours and let the truth spreads.{nl}But, your task will end here.{nl}You can go on your way.{nl}I really thank you for helping us this far.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita mesti terus maju kedepan untuk menemukan kebenaran lalu menyebarkannya.{nl}Tetapi, tugasmu akan berakhir disini.{nl}Teruskan tugasmu.{nl}Aku sangat berterima kasih kamu telah menolong kami hingga sejauh ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator.{nl}We are now ready.{nl}Now, we are going to do our work.
Philip's Soldiers: Sang Savior.{nl}Kini kami sudah siap.{nl}Kini, kami akan melakukan tugas kami.

Philipas' Soldier: Well then, I will be inside your little pocket now.{nl}Don't forget. Trust no one.
Philip's Soldiers: Maka, Kita akan berpisah.{nl}Jangan lupa. Tidak ada yang bisa dipercaya.

Philipas' Soldier: The Goddess wants you to eliminate all demons in the prison.{nl}The demons became unforgivable creatures after Medzio Diena.
Philip's Soldiers: Sang Goddess  memintamu memusnahkan para demons di penjara.{nl}Para demons menjadi mahkluk bengis tanpa ampun setelah hari divine tree.

Philipas' Soldier: But, since the demons are coming through the space of the metastasis, it's not going to be easy.{nl}You should resist the demons that are trying to free the Demon Lord, Blut.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi , semenjak para demons keluar melalui ruang metastasis, pasti tidak akan mudah.{nl}Kamu mesti menghentikan demon yang ingin membangunkan Demon Lord, Blut.

Philipas' Soldier: This place is not the world of humans or the demons' world, but it is another isolated place.{nl}We've locked the demons in this prison that are not helpful in this world.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini bukan dunia human ataupun demon, tetapi ini adalah tempat lain yang tertutup.{nl}Kami sudah mengunci para demon di penjara ini yang tidak bermanfaat bagi kami di dunia ini.{nl}
