Philipas' Soldier: I am the secretary of the farm owner, Baron Allerno. {nl}Lord Allerno wants your help in purifying this land.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku adalah sekretaris pemilik peternakan, Baron Allerno. {nl}Sir Allerno ingin meminta bantuanmu untuk memurnikan tanah ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Lord Allerno hired wizards to build a laboratory for purifying the farm. {nl}He gave the whole farm for it. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sir Allerno menyewa penyihir untuk membangun laboratorium dan memurnikan pertanian. {nl}Dia memberikan seluruh pertanian untuk itu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Everyone is tired because of the strange aura. {nl}But they say that this aura will disappear when the device is complete so we'll be fine soon. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Semua orang kelelahan karena adanya aura aneh. {nl}Tapi mereka berkata bahwa aura ini akan hilang bila perangkatnya selesai sehingga kami akan baik-baik segera. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The work is simple. {nl}All workers, including me, are feeling very exhausted because of the strange aura. {nl}Please check if it is also affecting the the crops near the Abandoned Farmland.
Philip's Soldiers: Pekerjaan itu sederhana. {nl}Semua pekerja, termasuk aku, merasa kelelahan karena aura aneh. {nl}Tolong periksa jika itu juga mempengaruhi tanaman di dekat Abandoned Farm.

Philipas' Soldier: Still not finished yet? {nl}Baron Allerno's expecting a lot from the Revelator.
Philip's Soldiers: Masih belum? {nl}Baron Allerno berharap banyak pada Savior.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a strange aura right? {nl}But it's not affecting the crops.. That's different from Rimas' story.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada aura aneh ya? {nl}Tapi itu tidak mempengaruhi tanaman.. Itu berbeda dari yang Limas ceritakan.

Philipas' Soldier: The strange aura is definitely there, so we should get rid of it.{nl}If we just perform the ritual Wizard Rimas told us...{nl}Sorry, I suddenly feel a bit dizzy.
Philip's Soldiers: Pokoknya, aura aneh pasti ada sehingga kita harus menyingkirkannya. {nl}Jika kita hanya melakukan ritual yang Limas katakan kepada kami.. Maaf, aku agak sedikit pusing.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh I'm causing such trouble.. Thank you. {nl}You just have to make a magic circle with the firewood I give you and burn the Shaman doll on top of it.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh aku menyebabkan masalah itu.. Terima kasih. {nl}Kamu hanya perlu membuat Magic Circle dengan kayu bakar yang kuberikan dan bakar boneka Shaman di atasnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I want to sit and rest. {nl}But I can't do that as a secretary.
Philip's Soldiers: Saya ingin duduk dan beristirahat. {nl}Tapi aku tidak bisa melakukannya sebagai sekretaris.

Philipas' Soldier: The crops died when you did what you were told to do? {nl}It's okay. I was told that the bad aura within the crops will go away like that. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tanaman mati saat kamu melakukan apa yang diminta? {nl}Tidak apa-apa. Aku diberitahukan bahwa aura jahat dalam tanaman akan pergi seperti itu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Now things will grow better. {nl}Anyway, if you haven't met the baron, I suggest you do.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang itu akan tumbuh lebih baik. {nl}Lagi pula, jika kamu belum bertemu dengan Baron, kusarankan kemu menemuinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Wizard Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Wizard Limas

Philipas' Soldier: Welcome to the farm.{nl}The baron is deeply worried about the contamination of this farm so allow me to welcome you for him.
Philip's Soldiers: Selamat datang di peternakan ini. {nl}Baron sangat khawatir tentang kontaminasi terhadap pertanian dan memintaku menyambut kamu untuknya.

Philipas' Soldier: Worries? Ah, the spells aren't concentrated in power because of the strange aura.{nl}We tried laying a magic circle in every test area but they're weaker than expected.
Philip's Soldiers: Kekhawatiran? Ah, mantranya tidak berguna karena aura aneh. {nl}Kami mencoba meletakkan Magic Circle di setiap test area tapi Magic Circle lebih lemah daripada yang kupikir.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh, this is a very important device. {nl}The portal and the power to retain it.. Oops, forget about what I just said. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Oh, ini adalah alat yang sangat penting. {nl}Portal dan kekuatan untuk mempertahankannya.. Ups, aku lupa tentang yang satu ini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It is something needed to remove the strange aura in this land. {nl}I'm talking about purification. Isn't it such a problem?
Philip's Soldiers: Lagipula, itu diperlukan untuk menghapus aura aneh di negeri ini. {nl}Maksudku adalah pemurnian. Itu adalah sebuah masalah.

Philipas' Soldier: Well, how is it going?
Philip's Soldiers: Hey, bagaimana?

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. Check the magic circle in the test area first. {nl}If you come across a weird crystal, it's a working magic circle so you only have to remove the weird crystals.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Periksa Magic Circle di Test Area dahulu. {nl}Jika kamu menemukan Crystal aneh, itu adalah Magic Circle yang bekerja sehingga kamu cukup hancurkan Crystal itu saja. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But if there is no crystal, then it mean there is a problem. {nl}You just have to gather the evil force of monsters in this bottle and bury it near the magic circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi jika tidak ada Crystal, artinya ada masalah. {nl}Kamu cukup mengumpulkan Evil Force of Monster dalam botol ini dan menguburnya di dekat Magic Circle.

Philipas' Soldier: Great. {nl}But this isn't the only problem.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. {nl}Tapi ini bukan satu-satunya masalah.

Philipas' Soldier: That power device works with the energy of nature.{nl}With crops, it'll receive plenty of nature's energy.{nl}But, the monsters there are preying on that warehouse and it might become a problem.
Philip's Soldiers: Power Device itu bekerja dengan kekuatan alam. {nl}Tapi para monster memangsa gudang itu dan menjadi masalah.

Philipas' Soldier: Luckily, the tenant farmers are cooperative. {nl}But it's a pain that the monsters are preying on that warehouse.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, para petani penyewa mau bekerjasama. {nl}Tapi sayangnya para monster menggerogoti gudang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: The power source needs enery of nature and what do you think can be used right away? {nl}The crops in the warehouse, that is. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sumber tenaga memerlukan energi alam dan menurutmu apa dapat digunakan saat ini? {nl}Tanaman di gudang, itu dia. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Don't worry. We'll have a good harvest if we solve the corruption problem. {nl}And if that portal is also maintained.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir. Akan ada panen yang baik jika kita memecahkan masalah kontaminasi. {nl}Itupun jika kita mempertahankan pintu itu.

Philipas' Soldier: It's the Old Food Storage warehouse site. {nl}After all, there's a pile of crops there, so the monsters could prey on it.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu adalah persediaan makanan Warehouse Site. {nl}Lagipula, ada tumpukan tanaman sehingga para Monster dapat memakannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't leave this place because I have to guard it. {nl}But I can't make the baron go himself either.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini karena harus menjaganya. {nl}Tapi aku tidak bisa membuat Baron pergi sendirian.

Philipas' Soldier: Now we can have some peace for a while. {nl}We just have to keep that portal.. Hmm, anyway, never mind.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang kita bisa merasakan kedamaian untuk sementara. {nl}Kita hanya perlu untuk menjaga pintu tersebut.. Hmm, by the way, gpp.

Philipas' Soldier: Wait that.. seems like a familiar statue? {nl}Sorry but can I take a look?
Philip's Soldiers: Tunggu.. Sepertinya patung ini mirip? {nl}Maaf boleh aku lihat?

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, right. I forgot about the magic circles at Stishka Farm Road. {nl}Take this and try spraying it. I prepared it before. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, betul. Aku lupa tentang magic circles di Shtishka farm road. {nl}Ambil ini dan coba sebarkan. Sebelumnya aku membuatnya. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I had a hard time gathering it from the monsters and refining it. {nl}Don't worry. Even evil auras can be useful, depending on how you handle it.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku kesulitan pada saat mengumpulkannya dari monster dan menyulingkannya. {nl}Jangan khawatir. Bahkan evil aura bisa berguna jika kamu tahu cara mengurusnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Something doesn't feel right about this liquid. {nl}To enhance the magic circle with this sounds suspicious, but let's give it a try.
Philip's Soldiers: Cairan dengan rasa yang tidak enak. {nl}Kuatkan magic circle dengan ini, terdengar aneh tapi ayo coba.

Philipas' Soldier: This is a big problem. Where did it go with the food? {nl}Hey, I'm sorry but can you help find the Manticen? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini masalah besar. Kemana perginya dia bersama makanan itu? {nl}Hey, Aku minta maaf tapi apakah kamu bisa menemukan Mentiken untuk aku ? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Manticen? Nothing's weird about it. It's a monster. {nl}The baron needs it, so I'm looking after it. It likes food. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mentiken? Jangan memikirkan yang aneh tentang itu. Dia adalah monster. {nl}Baron membutuhkannya jadi aku mencari dia. Hal seperti memberikan makanan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Don't ask about where it's needed. {nl}It's all for the farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan tanya dimana dibutuhkannya. {nl}Itu semua demi peternakan.

Philipas' Soldier: It might be near the brewery. I will look around that area. {nl}If you find it, throw this meat to lure it.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia mungkin berada didekat brewery. Aku akan mencari disekitar area tersebut. {nl}Jika kamu menemukannya, Lempar daging ini untuk memancing dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Baron Secretary Benius
Philip's Soldiers: Baron Secretary Venius

Philipas' Soldier: This is tough. {nl}Many might be killed..
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sulit. {nl}Mungkin banyak yang terbunuh..

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. Well then, nevermind. I will report it to the baron.
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm? Kamu membunuhnya karena dia mencoba memakan orang? {nl}Ah.. Oke, tidak apa apa. Aku akan melaporkannya ke Baron.

Philipas' Soldier: Even in a rural area like this, we have heard about you. {nl}We are preparing to fight against the baron's arrogant plundering. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan di rural area seperti ini, kami telah mendengar tentang kamu. {nl}Kita bersiap siap untuk bertarung melawan Plunder dan arrogance of the Baron. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It would be a great support to us if you could help us supply ourselves with weapons.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini akan menjadi dukungan yang berharga jika kamu menolong pasokan senjata kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I just happened to take the lead like this. {nl}I'm just a tenant farmer who could no longer stand the baron's exploitation and tyranny.
Philip's Soldiers: Tiba tiba saja aku menjadi pemimpin seperti ini. {nl}Aku hanya petani sewaan yang tidak kuat dengan arogansi Baron lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: What makes us even more angry is that he is trying to fool us under the guise of purification. {nl}All he does is a disgrace to the goddess' name.
Philip's Soldiers: The plunder dan arrogance adalah masalah tetapi apa yang membuat kita sangat marah adalah mereka membodohi kita di disguise of purification. {nl}Semua yang dia lakukan hanyalah memalukan nama Goddess saja.

Philipas' Soldier: Please get some wooden rods from the wooden structures nearby. {nl}We're going to make weapons.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong cari beberapa wood sticks dari wooden fences terdekat. {nl}Kita akan membuat senjata.

Philipas' Soldier: We don't know how much we can fight the baron's guards. {nl}But we fight, that will have some meaning.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak tahu seberapa kuat kita melawan baron's guards. {nl}Tetapi pertarungan ini pasti memiliki arti.

Philipas' Soldier: This will be about enough. {nl}I will tell you more later, but if what I suspect is right, the baron betrayed the goddess.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sudah cukup. {nl}Aku akan bilang kepadamu nanti tetapi jika aku pikir benar,  Baron mengkhianati Goddess.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron is said to have ordered the magic circles to be put up around the farm to suppress the strange aura. {nl}But that was a lie. The baron is not interested in purification. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Baron berkata untuk memerintahkan magic circles letakkan didekat peternakan untuk menekan strange aura. {nl}Tetapi itu semua bohong. Baron tidak tertarik dengan purification. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please help us get leather for making weapons. {nl}You can get it from the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Anyway, tolong bantu kami mendapatkan leather untuk membuat senjata. {nl}Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari monster disekitar sini.

Philipas' Soldier: There are strange auras spread all over the farm.{nl}The baron said they were dangerous and gave orders to make magic circles to suppress them.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada aura yang aneh tersebar di peternakan.{nl}Baron berkata itu berbahaya dan memerintahkan magic cirlce untuk menekan aura itu.

Philipas' Soldier: But nobody was hurt by the strange aura. {nl}It's ridiculous. Instead, the crops grew rather well.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi tidak ada yang hancur karena strange aura. {nl}Ini bahkan tidak lucu. Tanaman bahkan tumbuh dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: We won't just stand by anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak akan berdiam diri saja.

Philipas' Soldier: That will be enough. Thank you. {nl}To be honest, I don't care what the baron wants. {nl}But..
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sudah cukup. Terima Kasih. {nl}Sejujurnya, Aku tidak peduli apa yang baron mau. {nl}Tetapi..

Philipas' Soldier: I mean even if what the baron wants really is purification. {nl}With my colleagues gone, it's nonsense that I have to bear the expensive farm rent fees.
Philip's Soldiers: Maksudku bahkan jika yang Baron mau adalah Purification. {nl}Dengan temanku yang sudah tidak ada, tidak masuk akal jika aku harus membayar mahal biaya sewa Peternakan.

Philipas' Soldier: That's what I think. Now.. I have to collect poison. {nl}It will be useful.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu yang aku pikirkan sekarang. Sekarang. Aku harus mengumpulkan racun. {nl}Akan berguna nanti.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm not sure if this is his weak point. {nl}But I think something is hidden in the Aqueduct Bridge Area's Restricted Area.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak yakin jika ini adalah titik kelemahan dia. {nl}Tetapi aku pikir ada yang tersembunyi di Aqueduct Bridge Area's Restricted Area.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: He's a greedy old man so there must be something. I'm sure of it.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia adalah kakek tua yang serakah jadi aku yakin ada sesuatu disana. Aku yakin tentang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Place the poison pot, lure the monster to it, then kill it. {nl}Bring it to me when enough is collected.
Philip's Soldiers: Letakkan poison pot, pancing monster kesitu, lalu bunuh. {nl}Bawakan kepadaku jika sudah terkumpul.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sorry for having to ask something like this of you. {nl}But please feel pity on us and help us out a little more.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku minta maaf karena bertanya seperti ini. {nl}Tapi tolong kasihani kami dan bantu kami sedikit saja.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm thinking about borrowing farm tools from the farmers nearby for improvised weapons. {nl}You are a famous Revelator, so it should be fairly easy for you to convince them.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku memikirkan tentang meminjam peralatan bertani dari petani sekitar dikarenakan kekurangan senjata. {nl}Kamu adalah Savior terkenal jadi akan lebih mudah meminjam ke para petani.

Philipas' Soldier: If you persuade them with the letter I give you, they will understand.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu membujuk dengan surat yang aku berikan kepadamu, mereka akan mengerti.

Philipas' Soldier: So many... Thank you so much. {nl}Oh, and if you have time, I hope you can help my colleagues as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebanyak ini.. Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Oh, Jika kamu mempunyai waktu luang, Aku berharap kamu bisa menolong teman temanku juga.

Philipas' Soldier: I am Horacius' colleague. I'm in charge of the food supplies.{nl}The promised day is coming, but we don't have enough manpower. Can you help us?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku temannya Horacius. Aku yang bertanggung jawab dalam persediaan makanan. {nl}Hari yang dijanjikan telah datang tetapi kita tidak mempunyai cukup orang. Bisakah kamu menolong kami?

Philipas' Soldier: We will support Horacius.{nl}Everyone is tired of the unreasonable farm rent fees.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita akan membuatnya dengan Horacius. {nl}Semua orang sudah muak dengan biaya sewa yang tidak logis.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron secretary used to protect us, but now they're gone...{nl}We have only our own two hands to trust.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang sekretaris Baron yang melindungi kita sudah pergi.. {nl}Kita hanya punya Teo yang bisa dipercaya.

Philipas' Soldier: Then please collect Nioles from Riaum Hill.{nl}We can use them with potatos to make soup, and they're also used as medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: jadi tolong dapatkan Nioles dengan dari Riaum knoll. {nl}Kita bisa menggunakan Potato untuk membuat sup dan bisa digunakan sebagai obat.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if the baron did something right, he only did it for himself. {nl}No one can blame us for what we're doing.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan jika Baron melakukan sesuatu yang benar, itu semua untuk dia untuk dia untuk tinggal. {nl}Tidak ada yang bisa menunjuk kepada kita.

Philipas' Soldier: Dried food has a long shelf life.{nl}You'll feel full even when you consume only a small amount of beef jerky.{nl}That's why we're accumulating a lot of it.
Philip's Soldiers: Dan.. Makanan kering cocok untuk disimpan dalam jangka waktu lama. {nl}Terutama jerkey membuatmu tetap kenyang jika hanya memakannya sedikit jadi aku berusaha mengumpulkan sebanyak yang aku bisa.

Philipas' Soldier: The farm rent fees have become a burden recently.{nl}The baron used weird reasons to collect them more often.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Biaya sewa perkebunan sudah menjadi beban belakangan ini. {nl}Dia juga mempunyai alasan yang aneh untuk mengumpulkan lebih sering. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: My colleague even disappeared one day.{nl}Since then, whatever the baron says about purification and all seem like a lie.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Rekan rekan ku bahkan menghilang suatu hari. {nl}Semenjak itu, hal yang baron katakan tentang purification dan yang berhubungan dengan itu kelihatannya bohong. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I believe all this has something to do with the baron.{nl}I want to find out what it is, even if I have to resort to violence.{nl}Horacius agrees too.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku percaya semua ini ada hubungannya dengan Baron. {nl}Aku ingin tahu apa itu. Bahkan jika harus bertarung. {nl}Dan Horacius berpikiran yang sama denganku.

Philipas' Soldier: You need to get edible meat from the monsters nearby.{nl}Once we have the meat, you just have to place it in the dryer.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus mendapatkan edible meat dari monster disekitar. {nl}Jika kita mempunyai meat, Kamu harus meletakkannya di drier.

Philipas' Soldier: The point is to get edible meat from the monsters.{nl}Most of them are tough and fishy.
Philip's Soldiers: Intinya adalah untuk mendapatkan edible meat dari Monster. {nl}Diantara mereka banyak yang tangguh dan mencurigakan.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you very much. {nl}We need to be full to fight well.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Kita harus kenyang sebelum bertarung dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: Lastly.. The problem is that the monsters frequently prey on the food storage house. {nl}There is a fella guarding that place but it's constanly exposed to danger.
Philip's Soldiers: Terakhir.. Permasalahannya adalah para monster sering menyerang rumah penyimpanan makanan. {nl}Ada orang yang menjaga tempat tersebut tetapi itu sangat berbahaya

Philipas' Soldier: The Food Storage is at Vinoga Brewery.{nl}Do you think it's already too late though?
Philip's Soldiers: The Food Storage berada di Vinoga Brewery Site. {nl}Apakah kamu berpikir ini sudah telat?

Philipas' Soldier: The storage keeper told me to thank you for him.{nl}Oh, and if you see my colleagues asking for help, please help them.
Philip's Soldiers: Warehouse keeper bilang kepadaku untuk berterima kasih kepadamu. {nl}Oh, jika kamu melihat rekanku meminta bantuan, tolong bantu mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the Revelator?{nl}News like that reaches us, even out here.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu Savior? {nl}Aku mendengar berita meskipun aku berada disini.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm helping Horacius remove the baron's magic circles.{nl}If it's alright, can you help me?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menolong Horacius melepas magic circles of the baron. {nl}Jika tidak merepotkan, Apakah kamu bisa menolong ku?

Philipas' Soldier: The baron said the strange aura is dangerous and told us not to go near it.{nl}But I don't think that's the case.
Philip's Soldiers: Baron berkata strange aura sangat berbahaya dan berkata untuk tidak pergi kedekat situ. {nl}Tapi aku tidak berpikir demikian.

Philipas' Soldier: It's actually similar to the aura I felt from the giant statue of Goddess Zemyna in Fedimian.{nl}I wonder if it actually purifies the land instead.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasakan aura yang sama dari aura tersebut seperti aura dari Giant Goddes Zemyna di Fedimian. {nl}Aku merasa sebenarnya aura tersebut membersihkan daratan tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: Let's see. Now there are around 3 left. {nl}Darbas Entrance, Padeka Altar, and the Fallow Ground.
Philip's Soldiers: Mari kita lihat. Sekarang tersisa 3 lagi. {nl}Darvas Entrance, Padeka Altar, dan Fallow Land.

Philipas' Soldier: The people in this farm used to pray to Goddess Zemyna from the Padeka Altar.{nl}After the baron made magic circles though, the monsters took over that place.
Philip's Soldiers: Penduduk disini biasanya berdoa pada Goddes Zemyna di Padeka Altar. {nl}Tetapi setelah Baron membuat Magic Circle, para monster malah mengambil tempat tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: I can only assume that the monsters were drawn to the magic circle. {nl}The magic circle is suppressing the divine power of the altar..? or something.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku hanya bisa berasumsi bahwa monster ditarik ke magic cirlce. {nl}Magic circle menyimpan divine power dari altar..? Atau apalah.

Philipas' Soldier: It's a monster called Kirmeleech. {nl}Don't forget to remove the magic circle after defeating the monster.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster itu bernamaKirmeleech. {nl}Jangan lupa untuk menyingkirkan magic circle setelah mengalahkan monster.

Philipas' Soldier: It's been a while since we've offered prayers because of Kirmeleech. {nl}What if the goddess is angry?
Philip's Soldiers: Sudah beberapa kali kita memberikan Doa karena Kirmeleech. {nl}Bagaimana jika Goddess marah?

Philipas' Soldier: Good job.{nl}Now we can pray to Goddess Zemyna again.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. {nl}Sekarang kita bisa berdoa lagi kepada Goddes Zemyna.

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle at Fallow Ground has protective barriers so it's difficult to destroy it right away. {nl}I will give you some Magic Stones of Blessing. Try using these to destroy it.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic Circle di Fallow Land mempunya pelindung tersendiri jadi sulit untuk langsung menghancurkannya. {nl}Aku akan memberikan kamu magic stone of blessings. Coba lemparkan ini untuk menghancurkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I used to take priest lessons before Medzio Diena. {nl}I'm here now because I like farming more.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pernah mengambil Latihan Priest sebelum Divine Day. {nl}Aku disini karena aku lebih suka bertani.

Philipas' Soldier: You will get hurt if you go near the magic circle rashly. {nl}Be sure to destroy the magic circle using magic stone of blessings.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan terluka jika kamu berada di dekat magic circle. {nl}Pastikan kamu sudah menghancurkan magic circle menggunakan stone of blessings.

Philipas' Soldier: You did it! {nl}Now this farm is back to looking the way it should.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil! {nl}Sekarang Perkebunan ini sudah seperti sedia kala.

Philipas' Soldier: This is the last one. {nl}The magic circle in Tarvas Entrance will have a lot of monsters interfering. {nl}With the divine power suppressed, the monsters are naturally drawn to that area.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini yang terakhir. {nl}Magic Circle di Tarvas Entrance akan dijaga banyak monster. {nl}Dengan Divine Power yang tertekan, Para monster biasanya tertarik ke area tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle isn't attracting the monsters, but it's suppressing the divine power.{nl}That's why the monsters are gathering.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic circle tidak menarik para monster. {nl}Tetapi menekan kekuatan Divine Power dan itu sebabnya para monster berkumpul disitu.

Philipas' Soldier: All the magic circles in this farm are destroyed.{nl}Now we can only hope for Horacius' work to succeed.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang semua magic circle di Area ini sudah dihancurkan. {nl}Sekarang kita hanya bisa berharap usaha Horacius berhasil.

Philipas' Soldier: This looks like part of the Goddess Statue that used to stand.{nl}Seems like someone destroyed it on purpose... Could it be the baron?
Philip's Soldiers: Ini seperti Goddess Statue yang biasanya utuh ? {nl}Sepertinya ada orang yang sengaja menghancurkannya.. Apakah itu baron ? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You don't look like one of the baron's people at least.{nl}We need help. We want to revive this farm and we'll do whatever it takes.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Setidaknya kamu tidak terlihat seperti anak buah Baron. {nl}Kita butuh bantuan. Kita ingin menghidupkan kembali pertanian ini dengan segala cara. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Baron is doing something to purify this farm. {nl}But recently the crops are dying and people are starting to fall sick. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Baron melakukan sesuatu untuk mensucikan perkebunan ini. {nl}Tetapi belakangan ini semua hasil panen gagal dan penduduk mulai sakit. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I couldn't believe it at first, but if this piece is really from a Goddess Statue.. {nl}Either the baron is lying to us or something is wrong.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertamanya aku tidak yakin jika potongan ini adalah benar Goddes Statue.. {nl}Mungkin Baron yang berbohong kepada kita atau ada yang salah.

Philipas' Soldier: First, I better stick the pieces together. {nl}It may be a little blasphemous but can you get some Sticky Sap from the monsters?
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama, Lebih baik aku mengumpulkan potongan seutuhnya. {nl}Ini mungkin sedikit menghina tapi apakah kamu bisa mendapatkan sticky secertion dari Monster?

Philipas' Soldier: I feel like it's soiling the Goddess Statue but I have nothing else so we'll have to settle for that. {nl}The goddess will forgive us.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasa ini seperti mengotori Goddess Statue tetapi aku tidak mempunyai apa apa jadi kita harus mengatur ini. {nl}Goddess akan memaafkan kita.

Philipas' Soldier: Yes. That will be enough. Let me try sticking this together first. {nl}Oh, and one more thing.
Philip's Soldiers: Ya. Ini sudah cukup. Biarkan aku melekatkan dahulu. {nl}Oh, dan satu lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron has a bad reputation because of the things he has done. {nl}And for what he's been up to nowadays.. He must be planning on something. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Baron mempunyai reputasi yang buruk dari apa yang telah dia perbuat. {nl}dan dari apa yang sudah dia rencanakan sekarang.. Dia pasti merencanakkan sesuatu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Some people say 'the baron is human, after all', so he won't do such things. {nl}So we need to collect clues to persuade them.
Philip's Soldiers: Orang orang bilang Baron bukanlah manusia jadi dia tidak akan melakukan hal tersebut. {nl}Jadi kita membutuhkan bukti untuk mendesak mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: If you head toward the crossroad, you'll see an oddly sparkling smoke. {nl}Attack a monster and take it there before killing it. You might find something out, don't you think?
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu menuju perempatan, kamu akan melihat oddly sparkling smoke. {nl}Serang monsternya dan sebelum terbunuh, bawa kesini. Kamu akan menemukan sesuatuYou might find something, bagaimana menurutmu?

Philipas' Soldier: No results yet? {nl}There should be some reaction whether good or bad if you check using the monster.
Philip's Soldiers: Belum ada hasil ? {nl}Seharusnya ada hasil meskipun buruk atau bagus jika kamu memeriksa menggunakan monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Surely suspicious. {nl}If that aura is a bad aura, it wouldn't attack a monster, right? {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tentu mencurigakan. {nl}Jika aura ini aura buruk, tidak mungkin akan menyerang monster kan ? {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I've got good evidence thanks to you. {nl}This might be enough to persuade the others. Thank you!
Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan bukti yang bagus terima kasih untukmu. {nl}Ini mungkin cukup untuk mendesak yang lainnya. Terima kasih!

Philipas' Soldier: Varas
Philip's Soldiers: Varas

Philipas' Soldier: No matter how much I think about it, the magic circles are the reason the harvest is bad. {nl}It's not purifying the land but rather making it worse.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak peduli betapa sering aku memikirkannya, Magic cirlce lah alasannya kenapa panen disini gagal. {nl}bukannya mensucikan daratan ini malah membuat semakin buruk.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Even if this is the baron's order, this is too much. {nl}But what can I do when all I've ever held was a plow.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan jika ini perintah Baron, ini terlalu banyak. {nl}Tetapi apa yang bisa aku lakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: This area used to be a fertile land. {nl}But ever since the baron's men made the magic circles, harvests decreased a lot. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Area ini dulunya dulunya subur. {nl}Semenjak anak buah baron membuat magic circle, hasil panen menurun banyak. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Purify? That's not even funny. {nl}We farmers know better about this land.
Philip's Soldiers: Mensuburkan? Lucu. {nl}Kita, Para petani, tau lebih banyak tentang tanah.

Philipas' Soldier: You can remove it by lighting fire with my firewood. {nl}But there is a protective shell so even if you light fire, the fire will easily die out. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bisa melepasnya menggunakan lighting fire dengan perapian aku. {nl}Tetapi ada pelindung jadi jika kamu menyalakan dengan api, apinya akan mudah mati. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think it's better to get kindlings from the Dandels all over the area to keep the fire.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir lebih baik mendapatkan kindlings dari Dandels disemua area untuk menjaga api.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't stand paying ridiculous farm rent fees at times like this. {nl}How can he do that, as a human?
Philip's Soldiers: aku bisa membayar biaya sewa yang konyol ini disaat saat seperti ini. {nl}Tetapi bagaimana dia melakukannya sebagai manusia?

Philipas' Soldier: Did you do it? {nl}That's great. But there are more magic circles.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah menyelesaikannya? {nl}Itu bagus. Tetapi masih banyak Magic Circle.

Philipas' Soldier: If the magic circles are really a like, then you should be able to remove the magic circles in Talia trails with Goddess' power. {nl}I mean something like the Goddess Statue. Is there any way to get it?
Philip's Soldiers: Jika magic circle benar mirip, Seharusnya kamu bisa untuk menghancurkan magic circles di Talia trails dengan Goddess Power. {nl}Maksudku sesuatu yang mirip dengan Goddess Statue. Apakah ada cara untuk mendapatkannya?

Philipas' Soldier: If the magic circles really are for the better, I can just pay more rent and ask for forgiveness. {nl}We'll know for sure if we check with the goddess' power.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika magic circle benar bagus, aku bisa membayar lebih biaya sewa untuk meminta maaf. {nl}Kita akan tahu dengan memeriksa Goddess Power.

Philipas' Soldier: But if it isn't, the baron better be prepared. {nl}He fooled us, harmed the land, and betrayed close friends.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi jika bukan, Baron harus bersiap siap. {nl}Dia membodohi kita, Menghancurkan tanah, dan kehilangan rekan rekan.

Philipas' Soldier: Indeed Joana has it. Use that power to remove the magic circle. {nl}Then checking the crops around will confirm it.
Philip's Soldiers: Tentu Joana mempunyainya. Gunakan kekuatannya untuk menyingkirkan magic circle. {nl}Lalu cek kembali hasil panen supaya lebih yakin.

Philipas' Soldier: You're just in time. {nl}You said you needed this Goddess Statue, right? Here, take it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tepat waktu. {nl}Kamu bilang kamu membutuhkan Goddess Statue ini kan? Ini, ambil ini.

Philipas' Soldier: {memo X duplicate line}I used the Sticky Sap to glue the pieces and indeed, it was a Goddess Statue. {nl}But this is all I can do so.. It might break easily.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendapatkan secretion kamu harus menempelkan potongannya, Itu adalah Goddess Statue. {nl}Tetapi ini yang bisa aku lakukan.. Ini mungkin mudah pecah.

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle will be a problem whether it's good or bad. {nl}But at least, it's better than begging the baron.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic circle akan menjadi masalah. {nl}Tetapi setidaknya, ini lebih baik daripada memohon kepada Baron.

Philipas' Soldier: I used the Sticky Sap to glue the pieces and indeed, it was a Goddess Statue. {nl}But this is all I can do so.. It might break easily.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendapatkan secretion kamu harus menempelkan potongannya, Itu adalah Goddess Statue. {nl}Tetapi ini yang bisa aku lakukan.. Ini mungkin mudah pecah.

Philipas' Soldier: Alright. Thank you very much. {nl}At least now we know the magic circle is bad for sure. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Baiklah. Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Setidaknya kita tahu sekarang magic circle itu membawa pengaruh buruk. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Anyway, I feel bad for the Goddess Statue being broken, but don't be so discouraged. {nl}The goddess will forgive us.
Philip's Soldiers: Ngomong ngomong, Aku merasa tidak enak Goddess Statue rusak. {nl}Para Goddess akan memaafkan.

Philipas' Soldier: If the magic circle can't be removed by the power of the goddess, the baron had better be prepared. {nl}He will probably claim that the power of the goddess is evil. I'll watch what he has to say.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Magic circle tidak bisa disingkirkan dengan kekuatan Goddess, baron harus bersiap. {nl}Atau mungkin dia akan mengklain bahwa kekuatan Goddess adalah buruk. Aku harus memperhatikan apa yang dia katakan.

Philipas' Soldier: Have you seen the crops pouch the monsters took from me? {nl}Can you please help me find it? I need to pay for the farm rent.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu pernah melihat crops puch yang monster ambil dariku? {nl}Bisakah kamu menolongku menemukannya? Aku harus membayar untuk biaya sewa perkebunan.

Philipas' Soldier: If I don't pay, I will surely be kicked out this time. {nl}Please help me.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika aku tidak membayar, Aku pasti diusir. {nl}Tolong bantu aku.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you very much. {nl}I worked so hard to gather it all and they just threw it to the monsters.. Those awful guards..
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak. {nl}Aku bekerja keras untuk mengumpulkannya dan mereka melemparkannya kepada para monster.. Maksudnya mereka adalah penjaga..

Philipas' Soldier: There is an unstable magic circle on the way to Ramus Crossroads. {nl}They say to not go near it because a strange aura flows out from it. But it really doesn't seem so. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada magic circle yang tidak stabil di dekat Ramus Crossroad. {nl}Mereka berkata jangan mendekati itu karena ada aura aneh dari situ. Tetapi terlihat seperti itu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It's full of suspicious stuff. {nl}I have to glue these pieces together so can you check that aura for me?
Philip's Soldiers: Penuh dengan barang yang mencurigakan. {nl}Aku harus menempelkan potongan potongan itu jadi kamu bisa memeriksa aura itu untukku?

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for helping us. {nl}From now on, we won't just stand back.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih telah menolong kita. {nl}Mulai sekarang, Kita tidak akan diam saja.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope the goddess blesses your journey..{nl}Please wish us luck.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harap Goddess memberkati perjalanan kamu..{nl}Tolong doakan kami ya.

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator, it is time. {nl}Now we will do what we have to do.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior, sekarang waktunya. {nl}Sekarang kita harus bertindak.

Philipas' Soldier: Good work. {nl}With so many demons defeated, her vigor should be softened.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. {nl}Dengan banyaknya Demon yang dikalahkan, kekuatan dia seharusnya sudah melemah.

Philipas' Soldier: The servants of Hauberk who lost their commander started to follow her. {nl}They essentially betrayed Hauberk.
Philip's Soldiers: The servants of Hauberk yang kehilangan pemimpin mulai mengikuti dia. {nl}Mereka seperti menghianati Hauberk.

Philipas' Soldier: It's retrieving the Mark that Hauberk gave his servants as sign of loyalty. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.
Philip's Soldiers: Tanda yang Hauberk berikan kepada anak buahnya adalah simbol dari kesetiaan. {nl}Pergi ke 2nd Isolation Area. Mereka pasti berkumpul disana.

Philipas' Soldier: Even now, Hauberk's servants think Nuaele is Hauberk. {nl}But if Hauberk gets back his marks, then they will realize who the real master is. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan sekarang, Anak buah Hauberk berpikir Nuaele adalah Hauberk. {nl}Tetapi jika Hauberk mendapatkan kembali simbolnya, Mereka akan sadar siapa pemimpin yang asli. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But Nuaele is acting strangely. {nl}With the powers she's been collecting, it's actually enough to break through the barrier. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi Nuaele bertingkah aneh. {nl}Dengan kekuatan yang dia kumpulkan, Sebenarnya itu sudah cukup untuk menghancurkan penghalang. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You will need Hauberk's help. {nl}Hauberk is also a demon so he must be able to read the thoughts.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan membutuhkan pertolongan dari Hauberk. {nl}Hauberk juga Demon dia pasti bisa membaca pikiran.

Philipas' Soldier: She planned to make this Demon Prison her demonic world from the start. {nl}If this place falls under her hands, not even Ausrine will be able to do anything about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia berencana membuat Velnias Prison sebaga dunia Demonic dari awal. {nl}Jika tempat ini jatuh ketangan dia, Bahkan Ausrine pun tidak akan bisa melakukan apa apa.

Philipas' Soldier: What about striking the monsters in 4th Isolation Area first? {nl}If we defeat them, it will be like gettting rid of Nuaele's strongest weapons.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana dengan menyerang monster di 4th Isolation area dulu ? {nl}Jika kita mengalahkan mereka, Itu seperti mengalahkan senjata Nuaele yang paling kuat.

Philipas' Soldier: They used to be Hauberk's servants. I'm sure Hauberk doesn't need them anymore. {nl}They ran to Nuaele right away the minute Hauberk was sealed and gave her the Piece of Seal.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka dulunya anak buah Hauberk. Aku yakin Hauberk tidak membutuhkan mereka lagi. {nl}Mereka berpaling ke Nuaele setelah Hauberk disegel dan memberikan Piece of Seal.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele was eliminated, but the demons at the 4th isolated area are still not following her order.{nl}If you don't eliminate her fragments from them, the demons would move again.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaele telah dikalahkan, tetapi demon di 4th Isolated Area masih tidak mengikuti perintah dia.{nl}Jika kamu tidak menghancurkan Fragments dari mereka, Demon akan bertindak lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}We should not let this kind of thing occur again in the future.{nl}Please retrieve the fragments of Nuaele by defeating the demons at the 4th isolated area.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Kita tidak bisa membiarkan ini terjadi lagi di masa depan.{nl}Tolong ambil kembali Fragments of Nuaele dari Monster di 4th Isolated Area.

Philipas' Soldier: It will take a long time to re-establish order in the prison.{nl}It will take a long time, just like Nuaele did preparing for now..
Philip's Soldiers: Akan membutuhkan waktu yang cukup lama untuk menegakkan peraturan di Prison.{nl}Ini akan memakan waktu yang lama seperti Nuaele sudah bersiap sekarang..

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks. I will break the fragments myself. {nl}I wish the Goddesses protect you.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Aku akan menghancurkan Fragmentnya sendiri. {nl}Aku harap para Goddess melindungi kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele is engaged in the ritual to summon the demons in his area at the moment.{nl}However, since his arms and legs are all disconnected, it's going to be easy to defeat him.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaele terlibat dalam ritual untuk memanggil Demon di daerahnya saat ini.{nl}Tetapi, Semenjak tangan dan kakinya terputus , akan mudah mengalahkan dia.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You've eliminated the gigantic space of the metastasis, but there are too many demons that came across so far..
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mengalahkangigantic space of the metastasis, tetapi terlalu banyak Demon yang datang..

Philipas' Soldier: We have to use the last method.{nl}Please retrieve the symbols of the seal which was put on the demons that had strong power.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus mencoba metode terakhir.{nl}Tolong ambilkan Symbols of the Seal yang di berikan kepada demon yang mempunyai kekuatan dahsyat.

Philipas' Soldier: The symbol of seal would absorb the one's power whose name is engraved on the seal.{nl}You would be able to obtain the power if you defeat the demons at Atmesta isolated area with the runes of the night star.
Philip's Soldiers: The symbol of seal Akan menyerap kekuatan Orang yang namanya tertulis di simbol.{nl}Kamu akan mendapatkan kekuatan jika kamu mengalahkan demon di Atmesta isolated area menggunakan Runes of the Night Star.

Philipas' Soldier: We weren't able to monitor all the demons in the prision.{nl}That's why we engraved the symbol of the seal on them so they can't be found.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak dapat memantau demon di Prison.{nl}itu sebabnya kita mengukir simbol segel pada mereka sehingga mereka tidak dapat ditemukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done.{nl}You would be able to enlarge the size of the spirit of Hauberk with these symbols.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus.{nl}Kamu bisa memperbesar ukuran Spirit of Hauberk dengan symbol symbol ini.

Philipas' Soldier: So the monsters were after this particular piece?{nl}This is also my first time seeing it.. I guess we should check Gaudeji Altar on the right side as well then.
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi para monster mengejar Fragment ini?{nl}Ini juga pengalaman pertama ku melihatnya.. Mungkin aku harus melihat Gaudeji altar di sebelah kanan.

Philipas' Soldier: That's why I lured the demons with the demonic stone..{nl}Those villagers were too hasty.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itulah kenapa aku memancing para Demon menggunakan demonic stone..{nl}Para penduduk terlalu terburu buru.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We should find out whether that is just a symbol or endowned with some kind of power.{nl}First, I want you to collect the toe nails of Lizardmen from the abandoned grape fields.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus emncari tahu apakah itu hanya sebuah simbol atau memiliki semacam kekuatan.{nl}Pertama, Aku ingin kamu mengumpulkan toe nails of Lizardmen dari  abandoned grape fields.

Philipas' Soldier: Lizardmen are the monsters that appeared a lot after Medzio Diena.{nl}If some kind of power is in this tree, it will definitely react to the toe nails.
Philip's Soldiers: Lizard men sering muncul setelah kejadian Day of the Divine Tree.{nl}Jika semacam kekuatan ada di pohon ini, itu pasti akan bereaksi pada toe nails.

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator, this is astonishing!{nl}After I put the power of the tree into the toe nails of the monster that you brought, it corroded right away.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior, Ini menakjubkan!{nl}Setelah aku meletakkan Power of the Tree ke Toe Nails dari monster yang kamu bawa, Itu langsung berkarat.

Philipas' Soldier: Now let's see how this sample will react.{nl}I hope it works out well.. You should also see it, Revelator!
Philip's Soldiers: Aku juga akan melihat bagaimana sampel ini akan bereaksi.{nl}Aku berharap ini bekerja.. Kamu juga melihatnya Savior!

Philipas' Soldier: Until my master comes, I will prepare for a large-scale purification.{nl}Can you collect five bottles of Orange Tama body fluid at the Kvie Farm Area for me?
Philip's Soldiers: Sampai master datang, Aku akan menyiapkan untuk Scale Purification skala besar.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengumpulkan five bottles of the fluids of orange Tamas di Kvie Farm?

Philipas' Soldier: Right now, the bigger problem we have is the monsters, not the bad harvests.
Philip's Soldiers: Maslah yang lebih besar sekarang Para monster bukan berkurangnya hasil panen.

Philipas' Soldier: Hey you. Revelator. Don't just look at me. Help me.{nl}Please kick out Lizardmen on my fields.
Philip's Soldiers: Hey kamu. Savior. Jangan Cuma melihatku saja. Tolong aku.{nl}Tolong usir Lizard men di pekarangan di lapanganku.

Philipas' Soldier: That's so thankful.{nl}Please get me the leaves that Tama is putting on. I got something to check.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat bersyukur.{nl}Tolong carikan Leaves yang Tama letakkan. Aku punya sesuatu yang harus aku periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Please look at the lower side of the gravevine at Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}I need the root of it. Please get me three of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong periksa lower side of the Gravevine di Abarza Grape Farm.{nl}Aku butuh akarnya. Tolong dapatkan 3 akar untukku.

Philipas' Soldier: Please be careful since if you touch the roots accidently, the poison may come out from them.{nl}Or the monsters may come out.{nl}It is a good habit to be careful always.
Philip's Soldiers: Harap berhati-hati karena kamu sudah menyentuh akar itu secara tidak sengaja, racun dapat keluar dari sana.{nl}Atau para monsters dapat muncul.{nl}Berhati-hati adalah kebiasaan yang baik.

Philipas' Soldier: If that's the case, please eliminate all short trees.{nl}Ah, don't forget to bring the evidence as well. I need something to report.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika itu masalahnya, tolong hancurkan semua short trees.{nl}Ah, jangan lupa untuk membawa bukti. Aku butuh sesuatu untuk dilaporkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Are you looking for the druid? Of course I know where he is. {nl}But you know, we soldiers have been collecting rent, and it doesn't seem enough.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu mencari Druid? Tentu saja aku tahu dimana dia. {nl}Tetapi, Para prajurit mengumpulkan biaya sewa, Tetapi mereka tidak cukup.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Stumpy Trees are most irritating.{nl}They are violent, and they also look disgusting.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Short Trees  sangat menjengkelkan.{nl}Mereka kasar dan menjijikkan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please just defeat the short trees at Zole Farm. {nl}If you could do that, I won't say anything anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong kalahkan short trees di Zole Farm. {nl}Jika kamu melakukannya, Aku tidak akan berkata apa apa.

Philipas' Soldier: Listen. I am really sorry, but I don't have any power.{nl}If you don't mind, could you defeat all the Cysts at Zirta Brewery?
Philip's Soldiers: Hey. Aku minta maaf, tetapi aku tidak punya kekuatan.{nl}Jika tidak menjadi masalah, bisakah kamu mengalahkan semua Cists di Jireta Brewery ?

Philipas' Soldier: The soldiers want bribes and the supervisor doesn't care at all, even if something happens to us.{nl}The current owner of this farm, Shaton, takes a lot of rent from us.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Para prajurit ingin imbalan dan pengawas tidak peduli sama sekali jika sesuatu terjadi pada kita.{nl}Dan pemilik Peternakan, Shaton mengambil biaya sewa yang mahal dari kita.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I hid them well without being discovered by the soldiers, but there are monsters roaming.{nl}Is it possible for you to retrieve it back for me? It's at the Farm Plaza.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyembunyikannya dengan baik tanpa diketahui oleh Prajurit, Tetapi para monster bercerita tentang itu.{nl}Bisakah kamu mendapatkannya? Mereka berada di Peternakan

Philipas' Soldier: Hey, I will give you some of my commission, so are you interested in doing some work?{nl}It's a simple task, just get all the pink root moles that are across the underground tunnels.
Philip's Soldiers: Hey, Aku akan memberikanmu sedikit penghasilanku jadi apakah kamu tertarik untuk melakukan sesuatu?{nl}Sederhana saja jika kamu bisa mendapatkan semua moles yang berada di tree roots di Underground Tunnel

Philipas' Soldier: It's you again. As usual, get rid of all the pink root moles across the underground tunnels.{nl}My men don't want to go there because they don't like the underground tunnels.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu lagi. Kamu hanya harus mengalahkan semua Moles yang ada di Tree Roots di Underground tunnel.{nl}pengikut ku tidak ingin kesana karena mereka tidak suka dengan Underground Tunnel.

Philipas' Soldier: Please, do continue your work on those moles.{nl}It's almost done, so keep up the good work just little bit more beyond the underground tunnels.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus memusnahkan mole di akar pepohonan.{nl}Sudah hampir selesai, teruskan kerja bagusmu di underground tunnel.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh goddesses, What have you done?!{nl}I heard the Glass Mole has appeared near the Wind Vane Tower, and it's because of you! You should be responsible for it!
Philip's Soldiers: Aduh. Apa yang kamu lakukan?{nl}Aku dengar Glass Mole muncul disekitar weatherclock karena kamu. Kamu harus bertanggung jawab!

Philipas' Soldier: Do you still think I am the stone in your pocket?..{nl}You think I would be defeated?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu pikir aku adalah batu di kantung kamu?..{nl}Kamu pikir aku akan kalah?

Philipas' Soldier: The identity of the gigantic transformed plant
Philip's Soldiers: Identitas Gigantic Transformed Plant

Philipas' Soldier: I will help if it's related to the purification
Philip's Soldiers: Bilang kepada dia bahwa kamu akan menolong jika ada hubungannya dengan Purification

Philipas' Soldier: Tell him to take some rest since you will do it for him
Philip's Soldiers: Bilang kepada dia untuk ber istirahat karena kamu akan melakukannya untuk dia

Philipas' Soldier: I will help if it's related to the purification
Philip's Soldiers: Bilang kepada dia bahwa kamu akan menolong jika ada hubungannya dengan Purification

Philipas' Soldier: About the power generator in front
Philip's Soldiers: Tentang power generator didepan

Philipas' Soldier: Check the Gaudeji Altar towards the right
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa Gaudeji altar disebelah kanan

Philipas' Soldier: Maras didn't know what the piece is, but he told you that there's a similar altar, so check the Gaudeji Altar towards the right.
Philip's Soldiers: Maras tidak tahu tentang potongan ini, tetapi dia bilang ada Altar lain seperti ini jadi periksa Gaudeji altar disebelah kanan.

Philipas' Soldier: You have found another piece of similar shape at Gaudeji Altar. Meet Lamar as Maras told you.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan Fragment dengan bentuk yang sama di Gaudeji altar. Pergi temui Lamar seperti yang Maras bilang kepada kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: The land Goddess Austeja used to oversee is full of holy energy. Go to Palama Cliff and put the orb made of ashes near Austeja's altar to recharge its energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Daerah dimana Goddess  Austeja biasa menggunakan kekuatan magisnya. Pergilah ke Parama cliff dan letakkan marble of remnant di dekat altar Austeja untuk mengisi energinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Arunas, the secretary of the baron is very tired and wants your help. Talk to Arunas.
Philip's Soldiers: Arunas, sekretaris baron sangat kelelahan dan meminta bantuanmu. Bicara dengan Arunas.

Philipas' Soldier: Arunas, the secretary of the baron wants you to check the strange energy and the crops. Go investigate the place where Arunas pointed.
Philip's Soldiers: Arunas, sekretaris baron ingin kamu memeriksa strange energy dan crops. Pergi selidiki tempat yang ditunjuk Arunas.

Philipas' Soldier: There's some strange energy, but it seems nothing special is going on. Tell Arunas that there's nothing special.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada energi yang aneh, tetapi sepertinya tidak ada yang spesial. Katakan pada Arunas tidak ada yang spesial.

Philipas' Soldier: There's no strange energy as Arunas told you, but Arunas still looks tired. Talk with Arunas.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak ada Energi Aneh yang Aruna bilang kepada kamu, Tetapi Arunas masih terlihat lelah. Bicara dengan Arunas.

Philipas' Soldier: Start the ritual to eliminate the strange aura
Philip's Soldiers: Mulai ritual untuk menyingkirkan Strange Energy

Philipas' Soldier: Arunas requested you to do the ritual to eliminate the strange energy. Pile up the magic circle where there's strange energy and burn the spell doll.
Philip's Soldiers: Arunas meminta kamu untuk melakukan ritual untuk menyingkirkan strange energy. Tumpukkanmagic field dimana ada energi aneh dan bakar Spell Doll.

Philipas' Soldier: You burnt the spell doll, but strangely the crops withered. Report this to Arunas.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu membakar spell doll, Anehnya Tanaman menjadi layu. Laporkan ini kepada Arunas.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Wizard Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: Wizard Rimas needs your help. Talk to Wizard Rimas.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimas membutuhkan pertolonganmu. Bicara dengan Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the magic circle that needs to be enhanced
Philip's Soldiers: Cari Magic Field yang butuh ditingkatkan

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the magic circle that needs to be enhanced among the magic circles that are blocking the strange energy.
Philip's Soldiers: Cari Magic Field yang butuh ditingkatkan diantara magic fields yang memblokir Strange energy.

Philipas' Soldier: Eliminate the strange crystals
Philip's Soldiers: Singkirkan Strange crystal

Philipas' Soldier: Strange crystals have come out from the magic circle. This magic circle is working properly so let's just eliminate the strange crystals.
Philip's Soldiers: Strange Crystals telah muncul dari Magic Field. Magic Field ini bekerja dengan baik jadi hancurkan Strange Crystals.

Philipas' Soldier: Check the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa magic field

Philipas' Soldier: You've eliminated the strange crystals. Check the magic circle again.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menghancurkan strange crystals. Periksas Magic Field lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Look closely at the other magic circles
Philip's Soldiers: Lihat baik baik Magic Field yang lain

Philipas' Soldier: You should find the weak magic circles and enhance them. Look for the magic circles that are not working properly.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus menemukan Magic Field yang lemah dan perkuat. Cari Magic Field yang tidak berfungsi.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the magical power of the monsters and bury them near the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Magical Power of the Monsters dan kubur mereka didekat Magic Field

Philipas' Soldier: In order to enhance the magic circles, you should put the magical power into the bottles and bury them near the magic circles. Each bottle could only contain one kind of magical power.
Philip's Soldiers: dalam rangka meningkatkan magic fields, kamu harus meletakkan magical power kedalam Botol dan kubur mereka di dekat magic field. Setiap botol seharusnya mengandung satu magical powder.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Wizard Rimas
Philip's Soldiers: Laporkan ke Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: You have enhanced the magic circles. Return to Wizard Rimas and report.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah meningkatkan magic field. Kembali ke Rimas dan laporkan

Philipas' Soldier: Rimas told you that there are lots of other things to care about besides the magic circles. Talk to Wizard Rimas.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimas berkata kepada kamu banyak hal lain yang harus diperhatikan selain magic field. Bicara kepada Rimas

Philipas' Soldier: Protect the storage from monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Lindungi Gudang dari para Monster

Philipas' Soldier: Wizard Rimas told you that the monsters are going after the storage where the fuel of the power generator is stored. Help Wizard Rimas.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimas berkata kepada kamu para monster menuju gudang dimana bahan bakar untuk power generator terkumpul. Tolong bantu Rimas.

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated the monsters that were about to attack the storage. Tell Rimas about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mengalahkan monster yang mau menyerang gudang. Beritahu Rimas tentang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems there are more magic circles besides the ones that Wizard Rimas told you about. Get closer to the magic circles to look more carefully.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya magic field lebih banyak dari yang Rimas katakan. Mendekat ke magic fields untuk melihat lebih teliti.

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circle is vibrating strangely unlike a while ago. Return to Wizard Rimas.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic field bergetar aneh beda dengan yang sebelumnya. Pertama, Kembali ke Rimas dan tanya.

Philipas' Soldier: Sprinkle the Opaque Purification Liquid on the magic circles
Philip's Soldiers: Taburkan murky purification liquid pada magic fields

Philipas' Soldier: Take the Opaque Purification Liquid that Wizard Rimas gave you and pour it on the magic circle. You don't know why an evil aura would enhance the magic circles, but let's get some more information by doing what he told you.
Philip's Soldiers: Ambil Murky Purification Liquid yang rimas berikan kepada kamu dan taburkan ke magic field. Kamu tidak tahu mengapa vicious energy memperkuat magic field , tetapi mari dapatkan indari asi dengan melakukan apa yang dia suruh.

Philipas' Soldier: Check the magic circles again
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa magic field lagi

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circles will now be enhanced since you sprinkled the Opaque Purification Liquid that Rimas gave to you. Let's take a look at it again.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang Magic field diperkuat semenjak kamu menaburkan murky purification liquid yang Rimas berikan kepada kamu. Mari lihat sekali lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: When the magic circle was about to be enhanced, the monsters suddenly rushed in! It seems that they are lured to the Opaque Purification Liquid. Go defeat the monsters first.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat magic field sedang diperkuat, para monster tiba tiba menyerang! Kelihatannya mereka tertarik dengan murky purification liquid. Kalahkan para monster terlebih dahulu.

Philipas' Soldier: This magic circle strongly wants the monsters. Bring the monsters near the magic circles and defeat them.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic field sangat menginginkan para Monster. Pancing para monster ke dekat magic field dan kalahkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Baron Secretary Benius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Veknews

Philipas' Soldier: Baron Secretary Benius is looking for something desperately. Talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Veknews putus asa mencari sesuatu. Bicara kepada Veknews.

Philipas' Soldier: Search for the Manticen
Philip's Soldiers: Cari Manticen

Philipas' Soldier: Baron Secretary Benius told you to search for the Manticen near the brewery. Look for Manticen near the brewery with the meats.
Philip's Soldiers: Veknews berkata kepada kamu untuk mencari Manticen di dekat brewery.Cari Manticen di dekat brewery dengan daging.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Baron Secretary Benius
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Veknews

Philipas' Soldier: You had no other choice, but to defeat Manticen since it was trying to eat a person. Return to Baron Secretary and talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak punya pilihan lain, Selain mengalahkan Manticen semenjak dia mencoba memakan manusia. Kembali ke Veknews dan bicara.

Philipas' Soldier: Investigate the suspicious area
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa suspicious area

Philipas' Soldier: An object that looks like the head part of the sculpture is halfway buried under the ground. Go there and dig it out.
Philip's Soldiers: Objek yang mirip dengan bagian Sculpture terkubur setengah kedalam. Pergi kesana dan gali.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the head of the statue
Philip's Soldiers: Gali bagian kepala dari sculpture

Philipas' Soldier: It is strange that there is the head of a sculpture in this kind of place. Dig it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sungguh aneh bahwa ada kepala patung di tempat seperti ini. Ayo gali.

Philipas' Soldier: Investigate the old chest
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa Old Box

Philipas' Soldier: You can see the old chest. Get near it and open it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bisa melihat old box. Dekati dan buka.

Philipas' Soldier: Break the chest
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan peti

Philipas' Soldier: As you tried to open the chest, monsters appeared and intervened. Avoid the attacks of the monsters and break the chest to open it within the time frame.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu mencoba membuka peti, para monster muncul dan mencoba mengganggu. Hindari serangan para monster dan hancurkan peti untuk membukanya dengan jangka waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: Investigate the Wooden Wine Cask
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa wooden alcohol container

Philipas' Soldier: It is strange to see the wooden wine cask at the place like here where there aren't not many people around. Go near it and look at it closely.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini aneh melihat wooden alcohol container ditempat seperti ini dimana tidak ada begitu banyak orang disekitar sini. Dekati dan lihat dengan jelas.

Philipas' Soldier: Make the wooden hammer and open the wine cask.
Philip's Soldiers: Buat wooden hammer dan buka alcohol container.

Philipas' Soldier: The wine cask could contain fragile objects, so it should not be carelessly opened. Gather some materials nearby that could be used to make a wooden hammer and open the wine cask.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu membukanya dengan tidak hati hati, barang yang ada didalam mungkin akan rusak jadi hati hati. Cari beberapa material yang bisa digunakan menjadi wooden hammer dan buka Container.

Philipas' Soldier: There is a sculpture stuck on the ground that looks like wings. Get closer to it and look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada patung yang nyangkut ditanah yang terlihat seperti sayap. Dekati dan lihat baik baik.

Philipas' Soldier: Joana remembered something about the fragment. Talk to Joana about the sculpture.
Philip's Soldiers: Yoana mengingat sesuati tentang Fragment. Bicara kepada Yoana tentang Sculpture

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain some Sticky Sap
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan beberapa sticky fluid

Philipas' Soldier: Joana wants to glue the sculpture together. Obtain some Sticky Sap from the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Yoana ingin menempelkan semua sculpture. Cari stick liquid dari monster disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand it over to Joana
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan kepada Yoana

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained the Sticky Sap from the monsters. Hand it over to Joana.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan sticky fluid dari monster. Berikan kepada Yoana.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect %s from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan %s dari para monster

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain Sticky Sap from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Obtain sticky fluid dari  the monsters

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Joana still has some request. Talk to Joana.
Philip's Soldiers: Kelihatannya Yoana masih mempunyai sesuatu. Bicara kepada Yoana.

Philipas' Soldier: Yoana wants to find out the true nature of the strange energy that exists near the Ramus intersections. Reduce the HP of the monsters in half and take them to the lower side of the magic circles where the strange energy is coming from.
Philip's Soldiers: Yoana ingin tahu perilaku strange energy yang ada didekat Ramus intersections. Kurangi HP monsters setengah dan bawa mereka ke lower side of the magic fields dimana strange energy berada.

Philipas' Soldier: The energy may not be bad since the monsters are disappearing. Tell this to Joana.
Philip's Soldiers: Energi mungkin tidak begitu buruk semenjak para monster telah menghilang. Laporkan kepada Yoana.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Varas
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara kepada Baras

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Varas needs your help. Talk to Varas.
Philip's Soldiers: Kelihatannya baras membutuhkan pertolonganmu. Bicara kepada Baras

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the magic circle
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan magic field

Philipas' Soldier: Pile up the logs on the magic circle and light them to burn the magic circle. You can increase the life of the fire by using kindling from the monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Tumpukkan logs di magic field dan bakar magic field. Kamu bisa meningkatkan nyala api dengan mendpatkan kindlings dari para monster.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to Varas
Philip's Soldiers: Laporkan kepada Baras

Philipas' Soldier: You've burnt the magic circle successfully. Return to Varas and report.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu Berhasil membakar magic field. Kembali kepada Baras dan laporkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Varas told you that there are more magic circles. Talk to Varas again.
Philip's Soldiers: Baras memberi tahu bahwa ada lebih banyak Magic Field. Bicara dengan Baras lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the Goddess Statue from Joana
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan statue of the Goddess dari Yoana

Philipas' Soldier: Varas told you that you would be able to eliminate the magic circles easily using the mighty power of the Goddesses. Obtain the Goddess Statue from Joana.
Philip's Soldiers: Baras mengatakan kamu bisa mengalahkan magic field dengan mudah menggunakan kekuatan dari para Goddess. Temukan Statue of the Goddess dari Yoana.

Philipas' Soldier: Put the statue of the Goddess on the magic circle at Talia trail.
Philip's Soldiers: Letakkan Statue of the Goddess di Magic Field yang ada di Talia Trail.

Philipas' Soldier: Check the nearby crops
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa Tanaman sekitar

Philipas' Soldier: As you put the statue of the goddess on the magic circle, the magic circle disappeared with the Goddess Statue. Check the status of the crops that Varas was worried about.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu meletakkan Statue of the Goddess di Magic Field, Magic Field menghilang dengan Statue of the Goddess. Periksa keadaan tanaman yang dikhawatirkan Baras.

Philipas' Soldier: The crops became alive again. With the power of the Goddess Statue, the magic circles have disappeared and the crops became alive again. Report this to Varas.
Philip's Soldiers: Tanaman menjadi subur kembali. Dengan kekuatan Statue of the Goddess, magic fields telah menghilang dan tanaman  menjadi hidup kembali. Laporkan ini kepada Baras.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Jugas
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara kepada Jugas

Philipas' Soldier: There's a farmer who needs your help. Talk to Jugas.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada seorang petani yang membutuhkan kamu. Bicara kepada Jugas.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the sack of grain
Philip's Soldiers: Cari sacks of the grains

Philipas' Soldier: Jugas wants you to retrieve the sacks of grain from the monsters. Look for the sacks of grain from the nearby monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Jugas ingin kamu mengambil Sacks of the Grains dari para Monster. Cari sacks of the grains dari monster disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Give it to Jugas
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan kepada Jugas

Philipas' Soldier: You've found the sack of grain. Give it to Jugas.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan semua sacks of the grains. Berikan kepada Jugas.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve the sack of grain from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Ambil sacks of the grains dari para monster

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the Wooden Rods
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan wooden sticks

Philipas' Soldier: Horacius told you that he needs many Wooden Rods to make weapons. Obtain some sticks from the nearby fences.
Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus berkata kepada kamu bahwa dia membutuhkan wooden stick yang banyak untuk membuat senjata. Cari stick dari dari pagar terdekat.

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained enough Wooden Rods. Hand them over to Horacius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan wooden sticks. Berikan kepada Horaceus.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Horacius has many things to do. Talk to Horacius again.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Horaceus mempunyai banyak hal yang harus dilakukan. Bicara kepada Horaceus lagi

Philipas' Soldier: Collect Soft Leather from monsters nearby
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan leather dari monster disekitar

Philipas' Soldier: Let's collect Soft Leather to help Horacius. You can obtain them from the monsters nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Mari kumpulkan leather untuk menolong pekerjaan Horaceus. Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari monster disekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained enough Soft Leather. Hand them over to Horacius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan Leather. Berikan kepada Horaceus.

Philipas' Soldier: Horacius still has many things to do. Talk to Horacius.
Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus masih mempunyai banyak hal yang harus dilakukan. Bicara kepada Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the poison in the pot
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Racun yang berada di pot

Philipas' Soldier: Put the pot for poison that Horacius gave to you on the ground. Lure the monsters near the pot and defeat them to collect the poison.
Philip's Soldiers: Letakkan pot beracun yang Horaceus berikan kepada kamu di tanah. Pancing monster disekitar pot dan kalahkan mereka untuk mengumpulkan Poison.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand over the collected poison
Philip's Soldiers: Berikan Poison yang dikumpulkan

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained the poison successfully. Hand it over to Horacius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu berhasil menemukan Poison. Berikan kepada Horaceus

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that Horacius has the last request. Talk to Horacius again.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Horaceus mempunya permintaan terakhir. Bicara kepada Horaceus lagi

Philipas' Soldier: Borrow some farming tools from the farmers
Philip's Soldiers: Meminjam beberapa alat bertani dari para petani

Philipas' Soldier: Horacius told you that he needs many farming tools that will be used as weapons. He can't move since he is changing the tools that he accumulated so far so ask the nearby farmers if you could get some farming tools.{nl}{nl}Horacius told you that since there aren't many weapons, we should fight even with the farming tools. Ask the farmers nearby if you could obtain some farming tools from them.
Philip's Soldiers: Horaceus berkata kepada kamu bahwa dia membutuhkan banyak alat alat bertani yang akan digunakan sebagai senjata. Dia tidak bisa bergerak karena dia mengganti peralatan yang dia akumulasikan jadi tanyakan kepada para petani jika kamu bisa meminjam peralatan bertani.{nl}{nl}Horaceus berkata semejak kita tidak mempunyai cukup senjata, kita harus melawan meskipun menggunakan peralatan bertani. Tanya kepada para petani apakah kamu bisa meminjam peralatan bertani dari mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Tauras needs you. Talk to Tauras.
Philip's Soldiers: Tauras membutuhkanmu. Bicara kepada Tauras

Philipas' Soldier: Collect Uprooted Nioles from Riaum Hill
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Nioles dari Riaum mound

Philipas' Soldier: Tauras told you to pull out Nioles from Riaum Hill. They are valuable as food, and can be used in medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: Tauras berkata untuk menarik keluar Nioles yang akan menggantikan makanan di Riaum Mound. Tetapi, Mereka berharga seperti makanan saat kamu mendapatkan akarnya jadi tolong berhati hati.

Philipas' Soldier: Give them to Tauras
