Philipas' Soldier: I want to help purify the Thorn Forest, but I lack the strength.{nl}Can you eliminate some of the Tree Ghouls bothering the soldiers?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin menolong purify the Thorn Forest, tetapi aku kekurangan kekuatan.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengalahkan beberapa Tree Ghouls yang mengganggu para prajurit?

Philipas' Soldier: My body continues to feel heavy... It would be nice if he came to purify the baron's farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Tubuhku terus menerus menjadi berat... Akan lebih baik jika dia kemari untuk memurnikan pertanian baron.

Philipas' Soldier: Sir Baron is trying his best to purify this farm. {nl}The workers sometimes say weird stuff but don't mind them.
Philip's Soldiers: Sir Baron berusaha yang terbaik untuk purify kebun ini. {nl}Para pekerja kadang berkata buruk soal dia tetapi abaikan saja.

Philipas' Soldier: Everybody's working on the farm. No exceptions.{nl}Ignore all those nonsense rumors. What do those idiots know?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Semua orang bekerja di kebun. Tidak ada pengecualian. {nl}Abaikan rumor yang tidak masuk akal. Apa yang orang idiot itu tahu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The baron is busy trying to appease the workers. {nl}Why do they have so much doubt about something they don't know.
Philip's Soldiers: baron sibuk mencoba menenangkan para pekerja. {nl}Mengapa mereka sangat ragu tentang sesuatu yang mereka bahkan tidak tahu.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron is a very good person. {nl}He made a power source with magic that purges his own farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Baron adalah orang yang sangat baik. {nl}Dia membuat sumber tenaga dengan sihir yang membersihkan kebun dia sendiri.

Philipas' Soldier: Hey. Have you seen a big monster escape? {nl}If it's true, then this is a big problem.
Philip's Soldiers: Hey. Apakah kamu melihat monster besar kabur ? {nl}Jika itu benar, ini adalah masalah besar.

Philipas' Soldier: Where the hell did such a big monster go? {nl}This is dangerous...
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi kemana monster yang besar itu? {nl}Ini berbahaya...

Philipas' Soldier: Ah. Don't worry, it's okay.{nl}Just don't tell anyone about this.
Philip's Soldiers: Ah. Jangan khawatir, tidak apa apa. {nl}ngomong ngomong, jangan beritahu siapapun.

Philipas' Soldier: I should've just left it alone... {nl} Ah, I was talking to myself so don't worry.
Philip's Soldiers: Seharusnya aku meninggalkannya sendiri... {nl} Ah, Aku berbicara dengan diriku sendiri jadi jangan khawatir.

Philipas' Soldier: I mean what the baron is doing should be obvious, but I'm not sure what it is.
Philip's Soldiers: Maksudku apa yang dilakukan Baron haruslah jelas, tetapi aku tidak yakin itu apa.

Philipas' Soldier: The only person here who would carelessly destroy the statue is the baron. Unless he received orders to break the statue.
Philip's Soldiers: Satu satunya orang yang menghancurkan statue dengan sembarangan adalah Baron. Kecuali dia menerima perintah untuk menghancurkan statue.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm thinking that it could be something from the original farm that is corrupting it, no?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku berpikir itu berasal dari sesuatu yang menghancurkan kebun, tidak?

Philipas' Soldier: I wonder what the baron told the Revelator.{nl}Purify? That's ridiculous.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya Baron berbicara kepada Savior.{nl}Purify? Itu konyol.

Philipas' Soldier: Can you keep this a secret from the others?{nl} 'Cause if this reaches the baron's ears, all will be in vain.
Philip's Soldiers: Bisakah kamu menjaga rahasia ini dari yang lainnya?{nl} 'Karena jika hal ini sampai terdengar ke Baron, semua akan sia sia.

Philipas' Soldier: Never listen to anything the baron says.{nl} He's just a greedy old man.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan pernah mendengarkan apapun dari Baron.{nl} Dia hanya orang tua yang serakah.

Philipas' Soldier: Come... Come on! Give it!
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo... Ayolah! Berikan padaku!

Philipas' Soldier: Do not bother the placed food piles.{nl} They should have shuffled over here by now... just keep watching.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan repot repot meletakkan makanan ditempat.{nl} Mereka seharusnya sudah disini sekarang... Tetap waspada.

Philipas' Soldier: My son stole from a pile of food that was mixed with Holy Water.{nl}Over time, all of the curse's energy within him should be released.
Philip's Soldiers: Anak ku mencuri dari makanan yang dicampur dengan Holy Water.{nl}Beberapa Waktu, semua energi jahat yang berada didalam dirinya seharusnya sudah hilang.

Philipas' Soldier: Strangely, we always lack manpower. {nl}Of course, the laziness of the workers here adds to it. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Anehnya, kita terus kekurangan bantuan. {nl}tentu saja, kemalasan para pekerja bertambah. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But if the crystal isn't present, it means there is a problem. {nl}You just have to gather the power of monsters with this pot and then bury it near the spell circle.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi jika crystal tidak muncul, berarti itu menjadi masalah. {nl}Kamu hanya perlu menggabungkan sihir monster didalam pot ini dan kubur di dekat spell circle.

Philipas' Soldier: This is Baron Allerno's farm. {nl}The baron is trying to purify the farm so don't bug him.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini Baron Allerno's farm. {nl}Baron berusaha purify perkebunan jadi jangan diganggu.

Philipas' Soldier: This year's harvest is also bountiful and the weather is warm.. {nl}If not for the strange aura, then this would be the best farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Panen tahun ini banyak dan cuaca juga hangat.. {nl}Jika bukan untuk strange aura, lalu ini adalah perkebunan terbaik.

Philipas' Soldier: Huh? You killed it because it tried to eat people? {nl}Ah.. well then, nevermind. I will report it to the baron myself.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa? Kamu membunuhnya karena dia mencoba membunuh manusia? {nl}Ah.. jadi, tidak masalah. Aku sendiri yang akan melaporkannya kepada Baron.

Philipas' Soldier: If you use the pot near monsters, poison will be collected in the pot. {nl}Give it to me when enough poison is gathered.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu menggunakan pot dari monster, racun akan dikumpulkan didalam pot. {nl}Berikan padaku jika semua racun telah dikumpulkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Baron Secretary Andol's Journal
Philip's Soldiers: Baron Secretary Andol's Journal

Philipas' Soldier: The wizard who claimed to have come from the Mage Tower earned the baron's favor. {nl}But I'm sure that wizard is planning something absurd that I don't know much of. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Wizard yang mengaku datang dari Maze Tower mendapatkan bantuan dari baron. {nl}Tetapi aku yakin wizard merencanakan sesuatu yang aneh yang aku tidak tahu banyak. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: There is a wonder medicine of eternal youth and immortality? {nl}Isn't that something only within the domains of the goddess. {nl}What is it that the wizard is trying to get out of tricking the baron. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: apakah ada obat awet muda dan keabadian ?? {nl}bukankah itu adalah sesuatu yang hanya ada didaerah Goddess?. {nl}Apa yang Wizard coba lakukan dengan mengelabui Baron. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: He started to suppress the divine aura, calling it strange, and then began to call in an evil aura. {nl}A hole leading to the other world.. {nl}All the experiments in the farm were for that hole, betraying the goddess..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dia mulai menekan divine aura menyebutnya aneh dan mulai menyebutnya lagi Aura yang jahat. {nl}Semuanya menuju ke dunia yang lain.. {nl}Semua experiment di kebun adalah, untuk mengkhianati para Goddess..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But the baron was already blinded with eternal life and pushed many soldiers into that hole.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi Baron sudah dibutakan oleh hidup yang abadi dan mendorong banyak prajurit ke lubang itu.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know what the baron is working towards. {nl}But I'm sure of one thing, that it is ruining the farm.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahu yang dikerjakan baron untuk siapa. {nl}Tetapi aku yakin satu hal, untuk mengacaukan kebun.

Philipas' Soldier: I stacked up firewood in front of the magic circle. But it has a protective shield,{nl} so even if you light it, the fire will fade out quickly.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menumpukkan kayu bakar didepan magic circle. {nl}Tetapi ada pelindung jadi jika kamu menyalakan api akan cepat mati. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The only problem is whether the magic circles are good or bad. {nl}At least this is better than kowtowing to the baron.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah masalah meskipun magic circle baik atau jahat. {nl}tetapi, ini lebih baik daripada memohon kepada Baron.

Philipas' Soldier: To do this right, we need to gather all the clues. {nl}Only then can we persuade the tenant farmers.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk melakukan hal tersebut, kita harus mengumpulkan semua bukti. {nl}Lalu kita bisa membujuk penyewa kebun.

Philipas' Soldier: What do you think? About those magic circles. {nl}Do you think that will really purify our farm?
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana menurutmu? Maksudku semua magic circle. {nl}Apakah kamu pikir itu benar benar purify kebun kita ?

Philipas' Soldier: Does this farm look peaceful to you? {nl}Well then, you are looking at it wrong.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah perkebunan ini terlihat damai bagi mu? {nl}Lalu kamu melihatnya dengan salah.

Philipas' Soldier: We were able to be fully prepared with your help. {nl}Thank you very much.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita bisa bersiap karena pertolonganmu. {nl}Terima kasih banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: Strangely, I feel sluggish and tired.. {nl}How about you? Are you okay?
Philip's Soldiers: Anehnya, Aku merasa lesu dan lemah.. {nl}Bagaimana denganmu? Apakah kamu baik baik saja?

Philipas' Soldier: The magic circles have to power up for the spell power source to work properly. {nl}Only then will the portal.. I mean the purification will take place.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic circle harus bertambah untuk spell power supaya power source bekerja dengan baik. {nl}Lalu portalnya.. Maksudku purify akan bekerja.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh this.. Hold on.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh ini.. Tunggu dulu.

Philipas' Soldier: We have to take care of it before it falls into Naktis' hands. {nl}Please get back the Holy Relic of Salvation from the demons.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus mengurusnya sebelum jatuh ketahan Naktis. {nl}Tolong rebut kembali holy relic of salvation dari para Demon.

Philipas' Soldier: But that wasn't easy because of the dimensional crack. {nl}The demons keep crossing over through the dimensional crack.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi itu tidak mudah karena celah. {nl}Para Demon terus datang dari Celah tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: Zydrone is keeping Blut by all means. {nl}But we don't know how long it will hold with our powers alone.
Philip's Soldiers: Zydrone menyimpan Blut . {nl}Tetapi kita tidak tahu sampai kapan itu akan bertahan dengan kekuatan kita sendiri.

Philipas' Soldier: We have to weaken the Blut's influence. {nl}Please get the Mark of Blut from Blut's aids in Viejauler Basecamp.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus melemahkan pengaruh Blut. {nl}tolong dapatkan Mark of Blut dari Blut di Viejauler basecamp.

Philipas' Soldier: By the way, Blut seems to be proud of what happened to Hauberk because of him. {nl}He was in a group that targeted the strongest and Hauberk was at the top of their list. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ngomong ngomong, Sepertinya Blut bangga dengan apa yang terjadi pada Hauberk karena dia. {nl}Ada sebuah grup yang mengikuti kekuatan yang sangat besar dan Hauberk dan Hauberk berada di tengah tengah mereka. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Blut thought that he was presumptuous and told that to Giltine. {nl}That is why he was torn by Helgasercle.
Philip's Soldiers: Blut berpikir itu adalah sombong dan memberikannya kepada Giltine. {nl}itulah kenapa dirobek oleh Helgasercle.

Philipas' Soldier: You are the one Goddess Vakarine was talking about. {nl}Good work. Eveything will go as Goddess Vakarine plans.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamulah orangnya yang dibicarakan Goddess Vakarine. {nl}Kerja Bagus. Semuanya akan berjalan dengan apa yang direncanakan Goddess Vakarine.

Philipas' Soldier: Blut is locked up behind this wall. {nl}Now, we have to take it down at once. Are you ready?
Philip's Soldiers: Blut dikunci dibalik dinding ini. {nl}Sekarang, kita harus mengalahkan dia untuk selamanya. Apakah kamu siap?

Philipas' Soldier: I we didn't take down Blut here, Vakarine would have fallen with it. {nl}Go to Demon Prison 2nd Area. Arune is waiting for you.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak membawa Blut kesini, Vakarine Akan jatoh dengan itu. {nl}Pergi ke Velnias Prison 2nd Area. Arune menunggu kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: The demons that lost Blut are causing a rampage. {nl}If they break the barrier of the Goddess and escape to the outside world, then it will be a great disaster.
Philip's Soldiers: Demon yang kehilangan Blut membuat kekacauan. {nl}Jika mereka menghancurkan pertahanan Goddes dan kabur ke dunia luar, maka itu akan menjadi masalah besar.

Philipas' Soldier: Good work. {nl}It's a relief that those demons did not notice the barrier weakening.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. {nl}Itu melegakan para demon tidak memperhatikan pelindung yang melemah itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Human exploration teams came in from the outside world in the past. {nl}Unfortunately, they died before we could do anything. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Human exploration team datang dari dunia lain di masa lalu. {nl}Sayangnya, mereka mati sebelum bisa melakukan apa apa. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I want to at least find their keepsakes to comfort them. {nl}But it's not easy because the demons took them as trophies.
Philip's Soldiers: Setidaknya aku ingin mencari kenang kenangan mereka untuk menghibur mereka. {nl}Tetapi itu tidak mudah karena para demon mengambilnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Arune
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Arune

Philipas' Soldier: You're here. What a relief you're not late. {nl}The power of Demon Lord Nuaele is about to break the barrier of the Goddess. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu disini. Sangat menenangkan kamu tidak terlambat. {nl}Kekuatan Demon Monarch Nuaele akan menghancurkan pelindung Goddess. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Aldona went to fight Nuaele in hopes to last a bit more.
Philip's Soldiers: Aldona pergi bertarung dengan Nuaele.

Philipas' Soldier: The demons are crossing over through the gap in 1st Isolation Area. {nl}Closing it before Nuaele joins them will be a big help to Aldona.
Philip's Soldiers: Para demon menyebrang melalui celah yang berada di 1st Isolation Area. {nl}Tutup sebelum Nuaele bergabung dengan mereka akan merupakan pertolongan yang besar bagi Aldona.

Philipas' Soldier: Great work. {nl}With her force cut off, her vigor will also soften down.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus. {nl}Dengan kekuatan dia yang sudah dipotong, semangat dia juga akan turun.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuale is using Hauberk's Piece of Seal to entice his servants to join her forces. {nl}We can use that to strengthen Hauberk's powers.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaele menggunakan Hauberk Piece of Seal untuk menarik pengikut dia untuk bergabung dengan dia. {nl}Kita bisa menggunakan itu untuk menguatkan kekuatan Hauberk.

Philipas' Soldier: It's to retrieve back the Marks that Hauberk gave his servants. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.
Philip's Soldiers: ini untuk menerima kembali Tanda yang Hauberk berikan ke anak buahnya. {nl}Pergi ke 2nd Isolation Area. Mereka pasti berkumpul disana.

Philipas' Soldier: Now Nuaele should feel it herself. {nl}That she can't escape using other's powers.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang Nuaele haris merasakannya sendiri. {nl}Dia tidak bisa kabur menggunakan kekuatan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk is a demon like them so it will be easy to read their minds. {nl}And it's even easier for souls.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk adalah demon seperti mereka jadi itu akan mudah membaca pikiran mereka. {nl}Bahkan akan lebih mudah.

Philipas' Soldier: She planned to make this prison her world from the start. {nl}If her plans succeeded, even Goddess Ausrine's powers would not have been enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia berencana untuk membuat penjara ini sebagai dunia dia dari awal. {nl}Jika rencana dia sukses, bahkan kekuatan Goddess Ausrine's tidak akan cukup.

Philipas' Soldier: What about striking the Harugals in 4th Isolation Area first? {nl}Getting rid of them will be like getting rid of Nuaele's most powerful weapon.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana dengan menyerang Harulaks di 4th Isolation Area dahulu ? {nl}Mengalahkan dia sama saja dengan mengalahkan senjata Nuaele yang paling kuat.

Philipas' Soldier: The Harugals used to be Hauberk's elite servants. {nl}But it was also them who turned over Hauberk's seal fragment to Nuaele.
Philip's Soldiers: Harukal dulunya prajurit elit Hauberk. {nl}Tetapi mereka juga yang berbalik menyerahkan Hauberk piece of seal ke pada Nuaele.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele is gone now, but there are still demons that continue her orders. {nl}They will repeat the past unless we retrieve her fragments.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaele telah pergi tetapi masih banyak demon yang menuruti perintah dia. {nl}Hal yang sama akan terus berulang kecuali kita mendaptkan fragment dia.

Philipas' Soldier: It's the demons in 4th Isolation Area. {nl}Please take what happened last time as a lesson so that this will never happen again in the future. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itu para demon di 4th Isolation Area. {nl}Tolong jadikan apa yang dulu pernah terjadi sebagai pelajaran supaya hal ini tidak terjadi lagi di masa depan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. I will destroy these fragments myself. {nl}May the blessings of the goddess be with you.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Aku akan menghancurkan fragment ini sendiri. {nl}Semoga Goddess memberkati kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele is currently performing a demon summoning ritual in her territory. {nl}But both of her arms and legs are cut off, so it will be easy to defeat her. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaele melakukan pemanggilan demon di daerah kekuasaannya. {nl}Tetapi dia lemah jadi mudah untuk mengalahkannya. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Vakarine is waiting for your help in 3rd Area. {nl}Go quickly.
Philip's Soldiers: Vakarine menunggu pertolongan kamu di 3rd Area. {nl}Cepat pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: Please help Zydrone complete the Evening Star Key. {nl}You can get the power of Dionys with that key.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong bantu Zydrone melengkapi Evening Star Key. {nl}Kamu bisa mendapatkan kekuatan Dionys dari kunci itu.

Philipas' Soldier: The power to protect from Valtruss is what is controlling the ego of Dionys. {nl}Fortunately, that power can be removed if the power of the Goddess is put in the Evening Star Key.
Philip's Soldiers: Kekuatan untuk melindungi dari Valtruss adalah yang mengendalikan ego Dionys. {nl}Sayangnya, kekuatan itu bisa disingkirkan jika kekuatan Goddes diletakkan di Evening Star Key.

Philipas' Soldier: First, close the small dimensional cracks in the Scars of Fighting Spirits. {nl}It will be difficult to perform the ritual with the waves of demons coming out from there.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama, tutup dimensional crack kecil di Scars of Fighting Spirit. {nl}Akan sulit untuk melakukan ritual dengan adanya gelombang demon yang datang.

Philipas' Soldier: Now go to Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}Protect me from the demons while I put the Goddess' power in the Evening Star Key.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang pergi ke Orualma Grand Hall. {nl}Lindungi aku sementara aku meletakkan kekuatan Goddes di Evening Star Key.

Philipas' Soldier: Here. Give this key to Aldona. {nl}He must be blocking Dionys now. Please hurry.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini. Berikan kunci ini ke Aldona. {nl}Dia pasti memblokir Dionys sekarang. Cepat.

Philipas' Soldier: Hurry, the strength of Goddess Vakarine.. {nl}Use the Evening Star Key to release the Rearda, Kasa, and Rada Seals.
Philip's Soldiers: Cepat, Kekuatan dari Goddess Vakarine.. {nl}Gunakan Evening Star Key untuk melepas Rwalda, kasa, dan Rada seal.

Philipas' Soldier: We, Kupoles, cannot block Dionys. {nl}Not even Vakarine can do anything if we are late.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami, Kupoles, tidak bisa menahan Dionys. {nl}Bahkan Vakarine tidak bisa melakukan apa apa jika kita telat.

Philipas' Soldier: We will begin to separate the power of Dionys. {nl}If we fail.. The result will be as if tens of Demon Lords are on the loose. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita akan mulai memisahkan kekuatan dari Dionys. {nl}Jika kita gagal.. Hasilnya akan sama seperti jika banyak demon kabur. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We need to approach it with caution. Let me know when you are ready.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus mendekat dengan hati hati. Beritahu aku jika kamu siap.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk ran away to the direction of Prison 4th Area, guarded by Daiva. {nl}Please return to the Goddess first. I will take care of Dionys.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk kabur kearah Prison 4th Area, dijaga oleh Daiva. {nl}Tolong berikan kepada Goddess dulu. Aku akan mengurus Dionys.

Philipas' Soldier: You are still here, so it isn't late yet. {nl}The 4th Area he ran to is like a maze. Daiva can easily chase him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu masih disini, jadi ini tidak terlalu telat. {nl}4th Area yang dia tuju seperti labirin. Daiva bisa dengan mudah mengejar dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Valtruss is defeated but its servants are still left in Oruarma Cathedral. {nl}I want you to let those demons pay for their sins.
Philip's Soldiers: Valtruss telah dikalahkan tetapi pengikutnya masih tersisa di Orualma Grand Hall. {nl}Aku ingin kamu membiarkan para demon membayar dosa dosa mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: The Grand Hall is where the Goddess recovers her powers. {nl}That is why it should always be safe from the demons. Thank you very much.
Philip's Soldiers: Grand Hall adalah tempat dimana para Goddess memulihkan kekuatannya. {nl}Itulah kenapa tempat itu selalu aman dari para demon. Terima kasih banyak.

Philipas' Soldier: Dionys is not recovering well. {nl}I think getting back the claws that have his powers might help him recover.
Philip's Soldiers: Dionys tidak pulih dengan baik. {nl}Menurutku mendatkan cakar yang memiliki kekuatannya dapat menolong dia pulih.

Philipas' Soldier: Dionys was an ordinary creation of the human world. {nl}The goddess took and cared for him when the demons cruelly toyed with him. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dionys hanya ciptaan biasa dari dunia manusia. {nl}Para Goddess mengasuh dia pada saat para demon berlaku kejam kepada dia.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Now, he is the most loyal guardian of Vakarine. {nl}Even though he lost his senses to that power, he must be in pain.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang, dia adalah pelindung Vakarine yang paling setia. {nl}Meskipun dia kehilangan kekuatannya, dia pasti kesakitan.

Philipas' Soldier: There are many demons that ran away from Dionys' attacks near the Rearda Seal. {nl}Let's just hope that Dionys' claws are still stuck in them.
Philip's Soldiers: Banyak demon yang kabur dari serangan Dionys didekat Rwalda Seal. {nl}Kita hanya bisa berharap Dionys claw masih bersama mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Once Dionys gets back his strength, Vakarine should also recover. {nl}Aside from that, Dionys has other roles that are indispensable.
Philip's Soldiers: Dionys seharusnya mendapatkan kekuatannya untuk Vakarine supaya pulih. {nl}dan banyak hal yang Dionys harus lakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}This will be of big help to the weakened Dionys.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl}Ini akan menjadi pertolongan desar soal Dionys yang melemah.

Philipas' Soldier: The barrier in Nebilau Ruins is the weakest so they must be headed there. {nl}Follow it quickly.
Philip's Soldiers: Pelindung di Nevirau Ruins adalah yang paling lemah mereka pasti menuju kesana. {nl}Cepat ikuti mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: The girl who left the sapling, who could it have been?
Philip's Soldiers: Wanita yang meninggalkan anak pohon, Siapakah dia?

Philipas' Soldier: I just can't leave here knowing I got here through the kindness of Gina Greene. {nl}But the land is contaminated so I'm worried if I have to leave regardless.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa pergi jika aku memikirkan kebaikan dari Gina Greene. {nl}Tetapi tanahnya sudah tercemar jadi aku khawatir aku harus pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: Even someone as distant as you helped me, so I should cheer up. {nl}Those druids said they will help me so I should trust them.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan seseorang yang jauh seperti kamu membantu aku sehingga aku terhibur. {nl}Para druid berkata mereka akan menolongku jadi aku harus percaya.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't stand the corruption anymore. {nl}But at least, it's better than the farm beside us.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahan dengan polusi lagi. {nl}Setidaknya, itu lebih baik daripada Farm yang berada di samping kita.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunt Hauberk's servants at the Internal Separation Plan and gather his Soul Fragments. {nl}Our goal is to gather as much of his soul as we can.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Hauberk servants dari Inner Section dan kumpulkan soul pieces. {nl}Tujuannya adalah untuk mengumpulkan jiwa dia sebanyak mungkin.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I know the druids are trying to purify the farm. {nl}I'm just whining because of my frustrations.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tau para druid mencoba membersihkan Farm. {nl}Aku hanya mengeluh karena frustasi.

Philipas' Soldier: The druids are the ones having the hardest time. {nl}At least this area is Gina Greene's land, I wonder what they will do with the farms beside ours.
Philip's Soldiers: Para druid lah yang bekerja keras. {nl}Setidaknya area ini milik Gina Greene tetapi aku penasaran dengan apa yang akan mereka lakukan pada Farm yang ada disebelah kita.

Philipas' Soldier: All the farms I've seen so far were either corrupted by evil aura or full of monsters and can't be recovered. {nl}But I have a good feeling about this place.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua Farm yang aku lihat sudah tercemar oleh evil aura atau penuh dengan monster. {nl}Tetapi aku punya firasat baik tentang tempat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Where are you going? {nl}This is Shaton's private land.
Philip's Soldiers: Kemana kamu pergi? {nl}Ini adalah tanah pribadi Shaton.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if you have my permission, you better stay low. {nl}Mr. Shaton is sensitive now with his son's problems.
Philip's Soldiers: meskipun kamu punya izin dariku, kamu sebaiknya hati hati. {nl}Master Shaton sensitif dengan permasalahan anaknya.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if you have my permission, you have to take care of my men yourself.
Philip's Soldiers: meskpiun kamu punya izin dariku, Kamu harus mengurus pengikutku sendiri.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if you are the Revelator, you better not fool around. {nl}The pollution is not something for you to mind.
Philip's Soldiers: Meskipun kamu adalah seorang Savior, kamu sebaiknya jangan macam macam. {nl}Polusi disini bukanlah sesuatu hal yang harus kamu pikirkan.

Philipas' Soldier: A single druid is soiling the whole farm. {nl}I would have kicked him out immediately, if it wasn't for Gina Greene.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada seorang Druid mengotori Farm. {nl}Aku akan mengusirnya segera, jika bukan untuk Gina Greene.

Philipas' Soldier: This area is owned by the son of the Shaton family. {nl}Although, it is run by Shaton himself now.
Philip's Soldiers: Area ini sebenarnya perkebunan anak keluarga Shaton. {nl}Meskipun sekarang dijalankan oleh Shaton sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: The degree of corruption in this farm is too much. {nl}Ellie better know what's she's doing..
Philip's Soldiers: Tingkat pencemaran di Farm ini terlalu banyak. {nl}Elly harus melakukannya dengan baik..

Philipas' Soldier: I have no idea how I will persuade the owner of Shaton. {nl}I've heard that he is really stubborn.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahu bagaimana caraku membujuk pemilik Shaton. {nl}Kudengar dia amat keras kepala.

Philipas' Soldier: Clearly, the farm is very different from before. {nl}What could have happened?
Philip's Soldiers: Jelas sekali, pertanian ini sangat berbeda dari sebelumnya. {nl}Apa yang terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: Tenant Farmer Weiss
Philip's Soldiers: Tenant Farmer Veis

Philipas' Soldier: Even if Shaton changes his mind now, it's too late for me. {nl}Unless some miracle by the goddess happens, how can this insane amount of corruption be purified?
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan jika Sir Shaton mengubah pikirannya, Itu sudah terlambat. {nl}Kecuali jika keajaiban dari Goddess terjadi, bagaimana bisa polusi ini bisa dibersihkan.

Philipas' Soldier: The corruption is getting worse and worse. {nl}I don't know how to persuade him anymore.. I just hope he'll listen to you.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pencemaran semakin buruk. {nl}Aku tidak tahu bagaimana lagi caranya membujuk dia..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Now he's trying to escape using the body of his servant. {nl}Let's look for him by getting rid of the demons that contain Hauberk. Until he gives up.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang dia mencoba kabur menggunakan tubuh pengikutnya. {nl}Ayo kita cari dengan mengalahkan demon yang mengandung Hauberk. Sampai dia menyerah.

Philipas' Soldier: Your lead was a big help. {nl}I wonder if this is all the guidance of the goddess..
Philip's Soldiers: Kepemimpinan kamu adalah pertolongan besar. {nl}Aku ingin tahu apakah ini semua bimbingan dari Goddess..

Philipas' Soldier: I plan to study the mysterious seedlings from now on. {nl}A wide range of purification, isn't that wonderful?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merencanakan untuk mempelajari tentang anak pohon yang misterius dari sekarang. {nl}Pembersihan skala besar, bukankah itu menakjubkan?

Philipas' Soldier: This farm belongs to my son. {nl}I will protect it until my son returns.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertanian ini milik anak ku. {nl}Aku akan melindunginya sampai anak ku kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: That druid sure is noisy. {nl}What does he know, to keep on talking..
Philip's Soldiers: Para druid tentu sangat berisik. {nl}Apa yang mereka tahu sampai berbicara sangat keras..

Philipas' Soldier: I thought this farm would be able to replace my son. {nl}Now.. I have to let go.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir pertanian ini akan menggantikan anak ku. {nl}Sekarang.. Aku harus melepaskannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Please tell the druid that I am sorry. {nl}I'm sure my daughter will take good care of the rest.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong katakan pada druid aku meminta maaf. {nl}Aku yakin anak ku akan mengurusnya dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sorry. There is nothing more I can say. {nl}If only my brother was alive..
Philip's Soldiers: Aku minta maaf. Tidak ada lagi yang bisa aku katakan. {nl}Hanya jika kakak ku masih hidup..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm glad that he seems to have returned to his former self. {nl}Do you believe my brother made it to the hands of the goddess safely?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku senang sepertinya dia telah kembali ke ayahnya. {nl}Kamu pikir kakak ku akan pergi ke tangan Goddess dengan selamat ?

Philipas' Soldier: I'm going to give up grape farming and improve the treatment of the tenant farmers. {nl}I think my brother would have done the same.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan menyerahkan perkebunan anggur dan meningkatkan pengobatan para petani. {nl}Menurutku kakak ku akan melakukan yang sama.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm fine as long as the owner pays me but I'm sure others have gone crazy because of the evil aura. {nl}Growing grapes in a contaminated farm that no one can eat.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak apa apa selama pemiliknya membayarku tetapi aku yakin yang lainnya menjadi gila karena evil aura. {nl}Menumbuhkan anggur di kebun yang terkontaminasi yang orang orang tidak bisa makan

Philipas' Soldier: Everyone has their own story, don't they? {nl}Sir Shaton, and this farm too.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua orang memiliki cerita sendiri, iya kan. {nl}Sir Shaton dan perkebunan ini juga.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks for a while ago. {nl}I didn't want to stay in that terrible place any longer.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih untuk beberapa saat lalu. {nl}Aku tidak ingin tinggal di tempat mengerikan itu lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe the druids were right. {nl}We don't really have to go through all this if we can purify the farm, right?
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin para druid benar. {nl}Kita tidak perlu melewati ini jika kita bisa membersihkan perkebunan, iya kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Some weird sacks keep coming from other farms. {nl}But we have orders from the baron so we have to clean them up.
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa karung aneh muncul dari perkebunan lain. {nl}Tetapi itu perintah baron jadi kita harus membersihkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: I really don't know anything about it. {nl}A man, inside? They must have gotten something wrong.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat tidak tahu tentang itu. {nl}Seorang pria didalam? Mereka pasti salah.

Philipas' Soldier: Since that day, the demons have become those that deserve to die.
Philip's Soldiers: Semenjak hari itu, demon telah menjadi sesuatu yang harus mati.

Philipas' Soldier: What a mess.{nl} Back then, I have carried out orders like this handling the sacks. I really don't know what happened.
Philip's Soldiers: Berantakan sekali.{nl} Meskipun, Aku telah menerima perintah langsung untuk mengurus langsung tas, Aku tidak tahu apa yang terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: The dimensional crack belongs to you.{nl} Please deal with the other demon souls.
Philip's Soldiers: Celah yang tercemar milik kamu.{nl} Tolong urus demon souls.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you see something strange? {nl} Don't mind it. The baron will handle everything.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu melihat sesuatu yang aneh? {nl} Jangan pedulikan. Baron akan mengurus semuanya.

Philipas' Soldier: I have never seen an evil aura on the farm, why does my body feel so heavy? {nl}Is it really like the baron says, because of the strange aura..?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak pernah melihat kekuatan jahat di perkebunan, kenapa aku merasa tubuhku sangat berat? {nl} Benarkah, Seperti yang dikatakan baron, karena jiwa yang aneh..

Philipas' Soldier: Demon Lord Hauberk.. His final days were dismal as he was torn and betrayed.
Philip's Soldiers: Demon Lord Hauberk.. Hari hari terakhirnya suram karena dia dikhianati

Philipas' Soldier: Even though the large dimensional crack has disappeared, there are still a lot of demons who came in from there.{nl}We will correct the mistakes of the past.
Philip's Soldiers: Meskipun celah kontaminasi yang besar telah menghilang, tetapi masih banyak demon datang dari celah tersebut.{nl}Kita akan menangani kesalahan dulu.

Philipas' Soldier: Recently, I got sick and drowsy.{nl}It seems the crops are not better than last year.
Philip's Soldiers: Belakangan ini, Aku sakit.{nl}Kelihatannya hasil panen tidak sama seperti tahun lalu.

Philipas' Soldier: What can I say. I don't hate the soldiers and the crops aren't bad..{nl}But somehow, I don't feel good.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang bisa aku katakan. Aku tidak membeci prajurit dan hasil panen tidak buruk..{nl}Entah bagaimana, Aku tidak merasa sehat.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you.{nl}We will collect the sealed Hauberk's power and take it to the Goddess.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih.{nl}Kita akan mengumpulkan kekuatan Hauberk dan menyerahkannya kepada Goddes.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Goddess is waiting for you to Priosn District 5.{nl}Let's move on.
Philip's Soldiers: Goddess menunggu kamu di Prison District 5.{nl}Ayo bergerak.

Philipas' Soldier: We don't know whether the Goddess is okay or not, but we need to show them a sample.{nl}Can you collect the Demon's Tooth in Hradeti Crossroads?
Philip's Soldiers: Kami tidak tahu apakah Goddes iya atau tidak, tetapi kita membutuhkan untuk menunjukan mereka sebuah sampel.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengumpulkan demon tooth di Heuradeti Instersection?

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk..{nl}His life is too pitiful, but it should be removed.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hoberg..{nl}Hidupnya terlalu sedih, tetapi itu seharusnya disingkirkan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Well. We came here because of you.{nl}We are holding the ceremony to close the corrupted gap, you need to be completely ready.
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm. Kita datang kesini karena kamu.{nl}Kita mempunyai upacara untuk menutup celah yang tercemar, Kamu harus benar benar siap.

Philipas' Soldier: Receive the Evening Star Rune.{nl}Let's collect the Demon's Soul to use it and collected corrupted gap.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima General RUne.{nl}Mari kumpulkan demon soul untuk digunakan dan kumpulkan contaminated gap.

Philipas' Soldier: You have to go to the Rankina Isolation District, Ishsula Broken District and Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}If you defeat the demon by using the Evening Star Rune, We will save the soul.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus menuju Rankina Isolation District, Ishsula Broken District dan Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}Jika kamu kalahkan demon menggunakan General Rune, Kami akan menyelamatkan Soul

Philipas' Soldier: I also want you to collect the demons' Sealing Tokens at the Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}Those wield a large amount of power as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin kamu mengumpulkan seal symbol of demon di Hehmastar Isolation District.{nl}Itu mempunyai kekuatan yang besar juga.

Philipas' Soldier: It's obviously true that all demons should be defeated.{nl}Ever since Medzio Diena, the demons can never be forgiven.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini jelas benar bahwa semua demon harus dikalahkan.{nl}Semenjak Hari Divine Tree, demon tidak bisa dimaafkan.

Philipas' Soldier: It's not allowed for humans to enter. {nl}But, you are allowed by the Goddess.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak diizinkan Manusia untuk masuk. {nl}Tetapi, kamu diizinkan oleh para Goddess.

Philipas' Soldier: I was waiting for you by Aldona's orders.{nl}But, please hold on a bit as I'm still not ready.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menunggu kamu dengan Aldona order.{nl}Tetapi, tolong tunggu karena aku masih belum siap.

Philipas' Soldier: Though the Demon Lord has disappeared, peace is not meant to come to this place.{nl}Only by defeating all of the demons will true peace come.
Philip's Soldiers: Meskipun Master Demon menghilang, bukan berarti kedamaian telah datang.{nl}Ini benar benar damai dengan mengalahkan semua Demon.

Philipas' Soldier: This demon prison is not related with any world..{nl}A new disaster would befall upon the human world, if these areas fall to the demons.
Philip's Soldiers: Demon Prison ini tidak berhubungan dengan semua dunia..{nl}Dunia manusia akan terkena bencana baru, jika daerah ini jatuh ketangan demon.

Philipas' Soldier: Dionys..He is one of the beings who knows Vakarine.{nl}So, He can endure the pain himself.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dionys..Dia adalah orang yang tahu tentang Vakarine.{nl}Jadi, Dia bisa menahan rasa sakit sendiri.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Goddess' barrier should be complete if Vakarine recovers quickly.{nl}Until then, the corrupted gap appears continuously.
Philip's Soldiers: Pelindung Goddess's  harusnya selesai jika Vakarine pulih dengan cepat.{nl}Sampai, celah yang tertular muncul secara berkala.

Philipas' Soldier: This prison has been made by Goddess Ausrine.{nl}Vakarine regularly visited to check here.
Philip's Soldiers: Penjara ini dibuat oleh Goddess Ausrine.{nl}Biasanya Vakarine berkunjung kesini.

Philipas' Soldier: Even the Kupoles won't be able to take care of Dionys.{nl}Quickly, please complete the Evening Star Key.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebenarnya, Kupole tidak mengurus Dionys.{nl}Cepat, tolong lengkapi General Key.

Philipas' Soldier: Is the Evening Star Key still not ready?
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah General key masih belum siap?

Philipas' Soldier: Oh..my poor Dionys..I'm so sorry for giving you this big burden.
Philip's Soldiers: Oh..Dionysku yang malang..Aku minta maaf karena memberikan beban yang besar.

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator. You cannot close the dimensional cracks unless you can get Dionys back.{nl}I ask you in the name of the goddess for him.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior. Kamu tidak bisa menutup dimensional crack kecuali jika kamu bisa mendapatkan kembali Dionys.{nl}Aku memintamu dengan nama Goddess untuknya.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk.. I'm expecting it already.
Philip's Soldiers: Hoberg..Aku sudah menduga.

Philipas' Soldier: I could not say the truth because you were close with Hauberk.{nl}Please forgive me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa mengatakan yang sejujurnya karena kamu dekat dengan Hoberg.{nl}Tolong maafkan aku.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk is also siner.{nl}You don't need to be sympathetic.
Philip's Soldiers: Hoberg juga pendosa.{nl}Kamu tidak perlu merasa kasihan.

Philipas' Soldier: I only learned it from you..{nl}That we should have listened to Laima's warning from the very beginning.
Philip's Soldiers: Melihat dari kamu.{nl}Kita harus harus mendengarkan peringatan Laima ini dari pertama.

Philipas' Soldier: There were many sacrifices.{nl}The damage of the prison is still deep as an effect of the dimensional crack.
Philip's Soldiers: Banyak sekali pengorbanan.{nl}Kerusakan di penjara masih banyak karena efek dari celah yang tercemar.

Philipas' Soldier: Good job.{nl}Let's use this symbol to increase Hauberk's soul.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerja bagus.{nl}Mari gunakan simbol ini untuk meningkatkan Hoberg's soul.

Philipas' Soldier: It's almost ready.{nl}I ask you to please do it, while me and Kupole are closing the corrupted gap.
Philip's Soldiers: It's almost ready.{nl}Aku bertanya kepada mu tolong lakukan, sementara aku dan Kupole menutup celah yang tercemar.

Philipas' Soldier: Ever since we closed the dimensional crack, the demons have been assembling.{nl}But I'm powerless to move..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Semenjak kita menutup dimensional crack, para Demon sudah berpencar.{nl}Tetapi aku tidak kuat untuk bergerak..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: In the future, the demons must never be allowed to gather in the same place.{nl}Defeat the demons in Vanaga Monitor District.
Philip's Soldiers: Di masa depan, Para demon harus dicegah untuk berkumpul di tempat yang sama.{nl}Kalahkan para demon di Vanaga Monitor District.

Philipas' Soldier: Demons are trying to expand their power using the disaster spirit.{nl}Even after overcoming the current disaster, the peace is still far away.
Philip's Soldiers: Para demon berusaha memperluas kekuatannya dengan disaster spirit.{nl}Bahkan setelah mengatasi bencana saat ini, kedamaian masih terasa sangat jauh.

Philipas' Soldier: The crack will open again if we, the Kupoles, don't keep our eyes on it.{nl}I hope that we can find the Goddess Laima as soon as possible..
Philip's Soldiers: Celah akan terbuka kembali jika kita, Kupoles, tidak memperhatikannya.{nl}Aku harap kita bisa menemukan Goddess Laima secepatnya..

Philipas' Soldier: I've been hearing that Dionys is in pain due to his slow recovery.{nl}Can you collect some empty souls from the demons in Pasaru Isolation District?
Philip's Soldiers: Ada yang mengatakan Dionys kesakitan karena pemulihan yang lambat.{nl}Bisakah kamu mengumpulkan empty souls of demon di Pasaga Isolation District.

Philipas' Soldier: If Dionys recovers completely, the Goddess can reduce the burden.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Dionys sudah pulih, para Goddess bisa meringankan beban.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you.{nl}If Dionys recovers completely, It's because of you.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih.{nl}Jika Dionys sudah sembuh, Itu karena kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: The small dimensional cracks are again been carving away at us.{nl}But we don't know why because now we're focusing on the stabilization.
Philip's Soldiers: Celah kecil yang tercemar menjauh dari kita.{nl}Tetapi, Kita tidak tahu karena kita fokus menstabilkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Can you deal with the corrupted gap in Gavara Isolation District?
Philip's Soldiers: Bisa kah kamu mengurus celah kecil di Gabara Isolation District?

Philipas' Soldier: We really owe you one.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita sangat berhutang kepada kamu

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you.{nl}I will make sure I do everything possible to prevent another dimensional crack.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima Kasih.{nl}Aku akan mencari cara untuk menghindari membuka celah kecil itu.

Philipas' Soldier: How long can Aldona keep..
Philip's Soldiers: Berapa lama Aldona akan bertahan..

Philipas' Soldier: If Vakarine had received the Laima's warning in advance..{nl}Would the situation be better than what it is now?
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Vakarine telah menerima peringatan dari Laima..{nl}Situasi sekarang sudah membaik kan?

Philipas' Soldier: I received land from Gytis, but it's infested.{nl}The Ridimeds are the problem, but what can I do with just a hoe and pick?
Philip's Soldiers: Meskipun aku menerima tanah dari Gitise tetapi itu semua kotor.{nl}Terutama, Ridimed. Tetapi, apa yang bisa dia lakukan dengan pick yang baru dia dapatkan?

Philipas' Soldier: With the demons being unhindered by the weakening seal..{nl} And the villagers' thirst for action, we could be inviting disaster.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan memancing demon ke evil stone sementara karena segel melemah.

Philipas' Soldier: For now, we can compose ourselves a bit.{nl}Sorry for the late welcome, I am Goddess Austeja's priest Raeli.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk sekarang, kita dapat sedikit meyakinkan diri kita.{nl}Maafkan karena telat memperkenalkan diri, Aku adalah Goddess Austeja's priest Raeli.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Goddess Austeja has sealed sources of evil energy at two locations.{nl}However, the seals are getting weakened by the continuous attacks from the demons.
Philip's Soldiers: Goddess Austeja menyegel dua tempat sumber kejahatan.{nl}Tapi, tempat penyegelan menjadi lemah akibat serangan monster.

Philipas' Soldier: How can you.. there are hidden monsters.{nl}But, It's really good you are okay.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana bisa kamu..ada banyak sekali monster yang bersembunyi.{nl}Yang penting kamu baik-baik saja.

Philipas' Soldier: The story of that mysterious girl..{nl}We don't know if it is a clue to purifying this land.
Philip's Soldiers: Kisah gadis misterius..{nl}Kita tidak pernah tahu petunjuk cara membersihkan semua tempat.

Philipas' Soldier: This farm's owner is Gina Greene.{nl}They kindly lend this farm to us who lost the land since Medzio Diena.
Philip's Soldiers: Pemilik farm ini adalah Gina Green.{nl}Mereka berbaik hati mengizinkan kami yang kehilangan rumah untuk tinggal disini sejak day of Divine Tree.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm getting annoyed.{nl}I want the druids to defeat the monsters, but they are just looking at that tree.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku marah.{nl}Aku ingin para Druid membasmi monster-monster itu, tapi mereka hanya memperhatikan pohon.

Philipas' Soldier: Klaipeda is trying to increase its food distribution rate.{nl}With the goddesses gone, we don't expect a great outcome.
Philip's Soldiers: Klaipeda ingin mencoba meningkatkan jumlah makanan yang tersalurkan.{nl}Karena Goddess telah pergi dan kita tidak bisa memperkirakan apa yang akan terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: That's really appreciated.{nl}Firstly, collect the remains of Tama. I have something to check.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu sangat mengesankan.[nl}Pertama, kumpulkanlah remains of Tama. Ada yang ingin aku periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Strange. I assumed this wouldn't yield anything, but these actually seem mixed with earth's aura.{nl}In order to know more, we need something strongly exposed to the earth's aura here. Can you help me?
Philip's Soldiers: Aneh. Aku pikir kita harus menyerah, tapi sepertinya telah tercampur dengan spirit lain.{nl}Untuk mengetahui hal ini, kita membutuhkan sesuatu seperti menerima earth spirit. Bisakah kamu membantuku?

Philipas' Soldier: Please take some roots of the grapevines at Avarza Grape Farm.{nl}Three roots will probably be enough.
Philip's Soldiers: Ambillah grape vine's root di Abarza Grape Farm.{nl}Mungkin, 3 roots tidaklah cukup.

Philipas' Soldier: Be careful, poison can spray out if you handle it wrong.{nl}Hidden monsters might also appear.
Philip's Soldiers: Hati-hati, racun akan muncul jika kamu salah sentuh.{nl}Mungkin, monster yang bersembunyi akan muncul.

Philipas' Soldier: Well. Some sort of holy aura is spreading across the ground.{nl}Thanks to your efforts, we might not give up on this farm after all.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sesuatu seperti divine spirit tersebar didalam tanah.{nl}Aku menjaga Garden ini karena kamu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Nevertheless, I don't know exactly what this aura is.{nl}It's too weak. Maybe the druids could know something.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, aku tidak mengetahui dengan jelas tipe-tipe of spirit karena mereka terlalu lemah.{nl}Mungkin, Druid bisa mengetahuinya.

Philipas' Soldier: No matter what you have planned, If you don't have any permission, It is better for you to leave from here.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak peduli apa yang kamu rencanakan, jika kamu tidak memiliki izin, akan lebih baik jika kamu pergi dari sini.

Philipas' Soldier: What? Whoever you are, you cannot enter here.{nl}However, depending on what you can do.. I can allow it, Do you get me?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa? Siapapun dirimu, kamu tidak boleh masuk kemari.{nl}Tapi, mungkin saja, tergantung dirimu..Mengerti?

Philipas' Soldier: I swear somebody's guilty of embezzlement, but I can't find evidence. {nl}It should be a brown bag of grain. If you see one, take it quickly and return to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Mengapa kita tidak menemukan apapun padahal kita sudah yakin mereka mencurinya.{nl}Ini adalah kantung gandum coklat. Ambil lah jika kamu mengerti.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you see the people who have been infected by the poison?{nl}The soldiers said that place is near..
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu melihat orang yang terluka karena racun?{nl}Kata Soldiers tempatnya tidak jauh..

Philipas' Soldier: Get back here as soon as you're done defeating the Stumpy Trees at Zole Farmland.{nl}I won't ask for anything more if you can do this.
Philip's Soldiers: Kembalilah setelah mengalahkan Short Tree of Jole Farm.{nl}Aku tidak akan meminta kepadamu, jika kamu melakukannya.

Philipas' Soldier: He's surely out of his mind, ordering us to pick the spoiled grape vines.{nl}The missing son of the Shaton family must be the reason..
Philip's Soldiers: Dia pasti sudah kehilangan akal, karena perintahnya adalah untuk memetik polluted grape vines.{nl}Bagaimanapun, hilangnya anak laki-laki keluarga Shaton adalah salah satu alasannya..

Philipas' Soldier: Please spray this potion at the grape vines. Don't let the soldiers see you.
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi semprotkanlah sesuai porsi yang kuinginkan kepada grape vines tanpa diketahui oleh soldiers.

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters appear near the bush.{nl}More monsters appear by shaking it.
Philip's Soldiers: Para monster muncul didekat semak semak.{nl}Banyak monster yang keluar.

Philipas' Soldier: I am almost done.{nl}I am going to move to the suburbs of Klaipeda, because I've heard they're looking for tenant farmers there.
Philip's Soldiers: Hampir selesai.{nl}Aku memiliki ide untuk pindah ke Klaipeda, aku dengar mereka menginginkan penyewa.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeating the monsters will only temporary help. Those monsters will come again soon.{nl}But how can I think like that in a situation like this?
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkanlah monster sekali saja.  Monster berikutnya akan segera muncul.{nl}Tapi, bagaimana aku bisa berpikir dalam situasi seperti ini?

Philipas' Soldier: Shaton is just too stubborn.{nl}But even if I know how he feels..
Philip's Soldiers: Shaton terlalu keras kepala.{nl}Aku bahkan tahu isi pikirannya..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm sorry, but if you don't have any business here then please leave this farm.{nl}If my father is angry with you, you might be kicked out.
Philip's Soldiers: Maafkan aku, tapi jika kamu tidak memiliki pekerjaan lebih baik pergi dari sini.{nl}Jika ayah marah, bisa saja kamu diusir.

Philipas' Soldier: Even though the demons attack here, I will never run away from this place.
Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan walau demon menyerang, aku tidak akan pernah pergi dari sini.

Philipas' Soldier: You have 'ideas' too?{nl}Get out. I don't want to hear it.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa kamu memiliki ide?{nl}Pergi. Aku tidak mau mendengarkan.

Philipas' Soldier: I will believe my master even though he has made a wrong choice.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku percaya bahkan Master pun bisa mengambil keputusan yang salah.

Philipas' Soldier: If it weren't for the money, I would never work on a spooky farm like this.{nl}It would be too much for me.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika uangnya bukan untukmu, aku tidak akan bekerja di farm yang aneh ini.{nl}Ini adalah obsesi yang besar.

Philipas' Soldier: So you're here to put me back in your little pocket eh..{nl}Don't make me laugh. There is nothing to discuss between us!
Philip's Soldiers: Rasanya bagai aku hanyalah batu kecil dalam kantung..{nl}Lucu sekali. Tentu saja bukan!

Philipas' Soldier: From the beginning, all of you were the same..{nl}I have been fooled.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sejak awal, kalian memang sama saja..{nl}Aku memang bodoh.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But, can you stand against my current form now?!
Philip's Soldiers: Namun, kamu harus bertarung denganku sekarang!

Philip's Soldiers: Shaking/STANDSHAKE/3/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/The paper fell!#5

Philip's Soldiers: Igniting/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philip's Soldiers: Looking/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/SSN_HATE_AROUND

Philipas' Soldier: Explaining theGoddess Statue in Forest Prayer
Philip's Soldiers: Menjelaskan Goddess Statue di Forest Prayer

Philipas' Soldier: I will go to the Small Hall
Philip's Soldiers: Katakan aku akan pergi Small Hall

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Bury the pot passed by Rimas to contain the monster's evil spirit in front of magic circle!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Kuburkan pot yang diberikan Limas untuk mengurung monster's evil spirit di depan magic circle!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Waiting the monster/SITABSORB/2TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Tunggulah sang monster/SITABSORB/2TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice//!/The monster's attack will be starting!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Serangan monster akan dimulai!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/The magic circle rings with strange sounds#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Magic circle rings mengeluarkan suara aneh#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/The magic circle seems to be working fine now#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Magic circle sepertinya bekerja dengan baik#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/The magic circle seems to work! #5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Magic circle bekerja! #5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Be careful with it, it seems to be destroyed.{nl}Back to create the hammer to destroy the liquor barrel
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Berhati-hatilah, sepertinya akan hancur.{nl}Kembali lah untuk membuat hammer demi menghancurkan liquor barrel

Philipas' Soldier: Destroying/GROPE2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan/GROPE2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/The lower half of the body appeared after destroying the container!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Found the seed pouch of Tenant Farmer Weiss. Take it to him.

Philipas' Soldier: Our comrades who were attacked by the Petrifying Frost weeks ago are here. {nl}We did not receive support after the world turned like this so we had no choice but to leave them and wait. {nl}But the monsters are now attacking those that are petrified. Those damn monsters!
Philip's Soldiers: Teman-teman kami telah diserang Stone Frost seminggu lalu disini. {nl}Kami sama sekali tidak dibantu setelah dunia menjadi seperti ini maka kami tidak memiliki pilihan selain lari dan menunggu. {nl}Tetapi para monsters yang menyerang bisa memberi status petrify. Monsters sialan!

Philipas' Soldier: To block the source of danger, we have to strike them before they make their move. {nl}Go to Drasos Chapel Ruins and defeat them.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk menghentikan sumber bencana, kami mesti menyerang mereka terlebih dulu sebelum mereka bergerak. {nl}Pergilah ke Drasa Chapel Ruins and Kalahkanlah mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: We have to go to Ruklys base in the Fortress of the Land, in order to get detailed information. {nl}But the Royal Army is blocking the entrance. We can't get in. {nl}Though there is a way around..
Philip's Soldiers: Kita mesti pergi menuju Ruklys base, Fort of the Land, untuk memperoleh info lengkap. {nl}Namin Royal Army memblok pintu masuknya. Kami tidak dapat lewat. {nl}Meski ada jalan lain..

Philipas' Soldier: I'm a wizard who can't use magic. I feel pathetic.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku adalah wizard yang tidak dapat menggunakan magic. Aku merasa sedih.

Philipas' Soldier: Antares... He used to be a great wizard.
Philip's Soldiers: Antares.. Dia dulu merupakan wizard termasyhur.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't return like this...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak dapat kembali seperti ini...

Philipas' Soldier: My mission... My brother...
Philip's Soldiers: Misiku... Saudaraku...

Philipas' Soldier: He made the traps very meticulously even when he was not in his right mind. {nl}I hated him even when he was sane.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia membuat perangkap dengan sangat detil walaupun sedang tidak waras. {nl}Aku membencinya walaupun sewaktu dia masih waras.

Philipas' Soldier: Find the last valve in the central control room. {nl}If we destroy this, it will be safe no matter what Antares does.
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan katup terakhir di central control room. {nl}Jika kita menghancurkannya, keadaaan akan menjadi aman tidak pedui apapun yang Antares lakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: That night... I hid in the grass and watched everything. {nl}In the end, everyone pointed their weapons at each other. And to think they were such close friends before..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Malam itu.. Aku bersembunyi di rerumputan dan melihat semuanya. {nl}Pada akhirnya, Mereka saling mengarahkan senjata ke arah satu sama lain. Padahal sebelumnya mereka berteman baik..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I realized after death that my colleagues' betrayals were because of the curse. {nl}This thing is now useless to me.. Thank you.
Philip's Soldiers: Setelah mati aku baru sadar kalau teman-temanku berkhianat akibat kutukan. {nl}Saat ini semuanya sia-sia bagiku.. Terima kasih.

Philipas' Soldier: A monster in disguise as Goddess Statue. I pity the souls. {nl}Now the souls may rest in peace. This is all thanks to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Monster yang menyamar menjadi Goddess Statue. Aku merasa kasihan dengan jiwanya. {nl}Sekarang jiwa-jiwa bisa istirahat dalam damai. Semuanya berkat kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: They made the tower such a mess. This is unforgivable.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka mengacaukan keadaan tower. Aku tidak bisa memaafkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: You better be careful. {nl}Why do you fathom the wizards once loyal here ran away?
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kamu hati-hati. {nl}Kau pikir mengapa para wizard juga melarikan diri?

Philipas' Soldier: We can help Goddess Gabija if we have the Jewel of Prominence.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita dapat menolong Goddess Gabija kalau kita mempunyai Prominence Jewel.

Philipas' Soldier: With the Transport Magic Circles destroyed, we'll have to go floor by floor.
Philip's Soldiers: Karena trasport magic circle hancur, Kita harus menghadapinya.

Philipas' Soldier: I think I can remember something... But first, it's important to go to the goddess.
Philip's Soldiers: Kurasa aku dapat mengingat sesuatu.. Tapi pertama-tama aku harus menghadap Goddess.

Philipas' Soldier: Uhg, my head aches... {nl}Maybe it's because of Antares...
Philip's Soldiers: Uhg, sakit kepalaku.. {nl}Mungkin ini karena Antares..

Philipas' Soldier: We can only assume that the monsters were drawn to the magic circle. {nl}The magic circle is pressing down the divine power of the altar.. something like that.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita hanya bisa menduga kalau monster-monster tenggelam dalam magic circle. {nl}Magic circle menekan kekuatan suci altar.. Semacam itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Rashly approaching the magic circle will only hurt you. {nl}Be sure to destroy the magic circle using the Magic Stone of Blessings.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika sembarangan mendekati magic circle kamu bisa terluka. {nl}Pastikan kalau magic circle hancur menggunakan Magic Stone of Blessings.

Philipas' Soldier: Have you seen the sacks of grain the monsters stole from me? {nl}Please get me back my sacks of grain. I have to pay the farm rent.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu melihat grains bag-ku yang dicuri oleh monster? {nl}Tolong dapatkan kembali grains bag-ku. Aku harus membayar sewa lahan.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}If that doesn't happen, we have no choice but to stand up againt the plundering body. {nl}Moreover, the plundering process destroys the authority of the goddess and if the objective of plunder is human's greed over something, then it is something to be angry about.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Jika tidak, Kita tidak punya jalan lain selain melawan penjarah. {nl}Terlebih lagi, Menjarah itu melawan kekuasaan Goddess dan apabila hanya untuk kepentingan pribadi maka itu harus dihukum.

Philipas' Soldier: So the Chapparition was behind the curse. {nl}Naktis' curse alone was more than enough already. That's a relief. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi dalang dibalik kutukan ini adalah Chapparition. {nl}Naktis' curse saja sudah menyulitkan. Tapi ini cukup menjelaskan. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This is another separated space, neither the world of humans nor demons. {nl}The demons who are harmful to the world are imprisoned here. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah dimensi yang berbeda, Bukan dunia manusia ataupun iblis. {nl}Para iblis yang ingin menyiksa manusia dipenjara disini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Demons are crossing over through the gap in 1st Isolation Area. {nl}It will be of great help to Aldona if you can block them before they join Nuaele.
Philip's Soldiers: Para iblis menyebrang melalui celah di 1st Isolation area. {nl} Aldona bakal sangat terbantu apabila kamu bisa menahan mereka sebelum mereka bergabung dengan Nuaelle.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk is getting back the Marks he gave to his servants. {nl}Go to 2nd Isolation Area. They must be gathered there.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk mengambil kembali Marks yang dia berikan pada pelayannya. {nl}Pergilah ke 2nd Isolation Area. Mereka pasti berkumpul disana.

Philipas' Soldier: How about striking the Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area? {nl}Getting rid of them would mean getting rid of some of Nuaele's most powerful weapons.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana kalau menyerang Harugal di 4th Isolation area? {nl}Menyingkirkan mereka artinya menyingkirkan salah satu senjata Nuaelle yang terkuat.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele may be gone but her remnants are gathering in the 1st Isolation Area. {nl}They intend to continue her will. Please get rid of the demons to dissuade them.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaelle mungkin sudah tiada namun remnants-nya masih ada di 1st Isolation Area. {nl}Mereka bertujuan untuk meneruskan tekad tuannya. Mohon singkirkan iblis hingga ke akarnya.

Philipas' Soldier: They are the demons of the Fourth Isolation Area.{nl}Let this be a lesson for them, so that it won't happen again. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itu adalah demon di 4th Isolations Area.{nl}Jadikan ini sebagai pelajarann agar kejadian yang sama tidak terulang lagi. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The goddess had to make a painful decision. {nl}Dionys was like family but she decided to seal the power in him until the prison stabilizes.
Philip's Soldiers: Goddess harus membuat keputusan yang berat. {nl}Dionys seperti keluarga namun dia memutuskan untuk menyegel kekuatannya sampai Prison stabil.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk ran towards 4th Demon Prison which is protected by Daiva. {nl}First, you should return to the Goddess. I will look after Dionys.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk lari ke arah 4th Velnias Prison yang dilindungi oleh Daiva. {nl}Pertama-tama, Kamu harus kembali ke Goddess. Aku akan menjaga Dionys.

Philipas' Soldier: We got Hauberk but now his servants are the problem. {nl}We don't know what they will do.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita mendapatkan Hauberk namun yang merepotkan adalah pelayannya. {nl}Kita tidak tau apa yang mampu mereka lakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you. {nl}If Dionys recovers well, it will be all thanks to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. {nl}Jika Dionys bisa pulih, Itu berkat bantuan kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: The Curse of Gluttony prevents you from digesting food when you eat it. {nl}That's why it makes you hungry all the time. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Curse of Gluttony mencegah kamu mencerna makanan saat kamu memakannya. {nl}Karena itu kamu akan selalu merasa lapar. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We just need to exterminate all the monsters that interfere with the making of the Gateway Route of the Great King.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus membasmi semua monster yang menghalangi rute Gateway of Great King.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard that the hardness and the elasticity of the wood sticks of Firent at Nefritas Cliffs is good.{nl}You can get the rope to tie those sticks from Red Pantos Archers. Please get me those first.
Philip's Soldiers: Kudengar tingkat kekerasan dan kekenyalan wood sticks di Firent at Nefritas Cliffs itu bagus.{nl}Kamu bisa mendapatkan tali untuk mengikat kayu-kayu itu dari Red Pantos Archers. Pertama-tama bawakan dulu itu kesini.

Philipas' Soldier: Our only way right now is to find a solution to each curse one by one. {nl}Just like how every sickeness has a different cure.
Philip's Soldiers: Satu-satunya jalan saat ini adalah mencari solusi untuk setiap kutukannya. {nl}Sama seperti obat yang berbeda untuk penyakit yang berbeda.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you for everything until now but I can't leave my family to starve.. {nl}I have no choice but to leave if the evil energy stays in the garden.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih atas semua pertolonganmu namun aku tidak bisa meninggalkan keluargaku yang kelaparan.. {nl}Aku tidak punya pilihan lain selain kabur jika kekuatan jahat menyerang lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: This is the vineyard of my brother.{nl}My father runs it for him. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini adalah kebun anggur milik kakakku. {nl}Ayah mengolahnya untuk dia. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Placing bait/CAMPFIRE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Placing bait/CAMPFIRE_LOOP/3/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/The crystal was destroyed when you destroyed all the cores. #5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Crystal hancur saat kamu menghancurkan semua intinya. #5

Philipas' Soldier: Lighting fire/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Lighting fire/FIRE/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/You must destroy the cores of the monsters! {nl}Defeat the monsters!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Kamu harus menghancurkan inti dari monster! {nl}Kalahkan para monster!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Get sheets of scriptures from the monsters!#7
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Dapatkan sheets of scriptures dari para monsters!#7

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/You must get Cold Fluid from monsters and spray it on the altar!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Kamu harus mendapatkan cold fluid dari monster dan menyebarkannya ke altar!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/The Goddess Statue was fake! Defeat the Sparnashorn#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Goddess Statue itu palsu! Kalahkan para Sparnashorn#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Nothing is happening to the Goddess Statue.{nl}Go to Sculptor Tesla in Siauliai West Woods #3
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Tidak ada yang terjadi pada Goddess Statue.{nl}Pergilah ke Sculptor Tesla di Siauliai West Woods #3

Philipas' Soldier: Fetching water/SITWATER_LOOP/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Fetching water/SITWATER_LOOP/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/The Goddess Statue started being attacked when you worshiped it.{nl}Get rid of the thorn vines and protect the Goddess Statue from the monsters' attacks.#6
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Goddess Statue mulai diserang disaat kamu menghormatinya.{nl}Singkirkan para thorn vines dan lindungi Goddess Statue dari serangan monster.#6

Philipas' Soldier: Checking the gravestone/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Memeriksa gravestone/LOOK/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/Gathered the pieces of painting and inserted it in the frame!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Mengumpulkan pieces of painting dan memasukkannya ke dalam frame!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/Found an old handkerchief in the box.#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Menemukan old handkerchief di dalam box.#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/Found the pot!{nl}Now it's time to place the pot under Tree of Brothers!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Menemukan potnya!{nl}Saatnya menempatkan potnya dibawah Tree of Brothers!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/Velochard that was guarding the hidden space appeared!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Velochard yang melindungi hidden space telah muncul!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Opening the box/KICKBOX/1/TRACK_AFTER/None
Philip's Soldiers: Membuka box/KICKBOX/1/TRACK_AFTER/None

Philipas' Soldier: Checking../LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Memeriksa../LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Checking the altar/LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Memeriksa altar/LOOK_SIT/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Of Father, by Father (1)
Philip's Soldiers: Of father, by father(1)

Philipas' Soldier: Of Father, by Father (2)
Philip's Soldiers: Of father, by father(2)

Philipas' Soldier: The Weak Owl Sculpture wants to give the scent of its hometown as a gift to the dead soldiers who has followed its guide. Gather Butterfly Fragrance from the bushes at Butterfly Tomb.
Philip's Soldiers: Owl yang lemah ingin memberikan sesuatu yang berbau kampung halaman sebagai hadiah kepada dead soldier yang telah mengikuti bimbingannya. Kumpulkan butterfly scent dari vines di butterfly grave.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Demon Lord Taumas
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkanlah Demon Monarch Taumas

Philipas' Soldier: Demon Lords have appeared and are aiming for the weakened Seal Tower. Defeat Demon Lord Taumas.
Philip's Soldiers: Demon Monarch muncul dan mengincar Seal Tower yang melemah. Kalahkan Demon Monarch Taumas.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Demon Lord %s
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Demon Monarch %s

Philipas' Soldier: Get %s from Kepo
Philip's Soldiers: Mendapatkan %s dari Kepo

Philipas' Soldier: Julius turned into Draperiun after seeing the Orgel. Calm down the Draperiun by draining its HP to less than 10% and try to persuade it again.
Philip's Soldiers: Julius berubah menjadi Draperiun setelah melihat orgel. Tenangkan Draperiun dengan mengurangi HP-nya hingga kurang dari 10% lalu bicara lagi dengan dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Light the Tree Root Crystal on fire
Philip's Soldiers: Light Tree Root Crystal on fire

Philipas' Soldier: The Tree Root Crystal reacted weirdly and is polluting its surroundings! Defeat the monsters first and find the scattered Tree Root Crystal Cores.
Philip's Soldiers: Tree Root Crystal bereaksi aneh dan mencemari lingkungan sekitarnya! Kalahkan para monster lebih dulu lalu kumpulkan scattered cores di Tree Root Crystal.

Philipas' Soldier: Test if Gracius' Reagent is effective. Carefully approach a monster and use the Reagent.
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo periksa apakah Gracius' drug bisa bekerja. Dekati monster lalu gunakan drug.

Philipas' Soldier: A page of scripture was dropped on the altar. Find the rest of the pages from nearby monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebuah halaman scripture terjatuh di altar. Temukan sisa halamannya dari monster yand ada di sekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the soul
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan soul

Philipas' Soldier: You were able to defeat Merge. Talk to the soul that appeared on the altar.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengalahkan Merge. Bicara dengan soul yang muncul di altar.

Philipas' Soldier: Get monster's fluid from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan monster's fluid dari para monster

Philipas' Soldier: This sanctuary also seems contaminated. Go to Pardoner Master for advice. You can move to Fedimian Outskirts easily if you buy the scroll from beside the stand.
Philip's Soldiers: Sanctuary ini kelihatannya telah tercemar. Dengarkan saran dari Pardoner Master. Kamu dapat berpindah ke Fedimian Outskirts dengan mudah jika membeli scroll dari toko yang ada.

Philipas' Soldier: Velochard has been defeated and a treasure chest appeared! Open it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkanlahed Velochard dan treasure chest telah muncul! Ayo buka.

Philipas' Soldier: Use the portal in Pasala Altar and go to the room with the revelation. You need to pass Maven's final test to get the revelation.
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan portal dalam Parasa Altar dan pergi ke room dengan revelation. Untuk mendapatkan revelation kamu harus lulus final test of Mayvern.

Philipas' Soldier: Baron Secretary Arunas wants you to check the crops and a 'strange aura'. Move to the area marked on the map and check for a strange aura. Then pull out the crops nearby and check them.
Philip's Soldiers: Baron secretary Arunas memintamu untuk memeriksa tanaman dan kekuatan yang aneh. Pergi ke area Arunas dan periksa. Pergi ke area yang ditandai di map. Lalu kumpulkan tanaman disekitar untuk pemeriksaan.

Philipas' Soldier: This magic circle strongly wants monster energy. Lure monsters over the magic circle and defeat them.
Philip's Soldiers: Magic circle ini sangat menginginkan monster. Bawa monster ke magic circle lalu kalahkan monsternya.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Audra asked for your help to defeat the demons that are performing rituals at the Rituala Assembly Area to help Demon Lord Blut escape.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Audra memintamu untuk mengalahkan iblis yang melakukan ritual dalam Rituala Assembly Area untuk membantu Demon Monarch Blut melarikan diri.

Philipas' Soldier: You've interrupted the ritual for Blut's escape. Go back and report to Kupole Audra at the Corridor of Monitor.
Philip's Soldiers: Halangi ritual Blut's escape. Kembai dan laporkan ke Kupole Audra of Velnias Prison jail cell area.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Audra says you need to weaken Blut's influence. Steal Blut's Mark from the demons in Bjaurer Hideout.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Audra berkata kalau kamu harus mengurangi pengaruh Blut. Curi Blut's Mark dari iblis dalam Viejaulo Base.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Audra says the power gathered by Blut can only be controlled by Hauberk. Help Hauberk absorb the power of Blut from the Blut Altar in Concentrated Management Area.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Audra berkata bahwa kekuatan yang dikumpulkan oleh Blut hanya bisa dikendalikan oleh Hauberk. Bantu Hauberk menyerap kekuatan Blut dari Blut Altar di Concentrated Control Area.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Arune says you need to stem the power of Demon Lord Nuaele to stabilize the goddess' barrier. Defeat Nuaele's subordinates.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Arune berkata kalau kamu ingin membuat barrier of Goddess stabil kamu harus mematahkan kekuatan Demon Monarch Nuaelle. Kalahkan pengikut Nuaelle.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele's subordinates are defeated. Go back and report to Kupole Arune.
Philip's Soldiers: Mengalahkan pengikut Nuaelle. Kembali dan laporkan ke Kupole Arune.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the demons of the 1st Isolation Area
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan demon di 1st Isolation Area

Philipas' Soldier: Some of Nuaele's demons used to be Hauberk's demons who've received empowered Marks from Hauberk before. Defeat Nuaele's demons in the 2nd Isolation Area and get Hauberk's Marks back.
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa diantara pengikut Nuaelle dulunya adalah pengikut Hauberk yang mendapatkan kekuatan Mark of Hauberk. Kalahkan pengikut Nuaelle di 2nd Isolation Area dan dapatkan Mark of Hauberk.

Philipas' Soldier: Use Hauberk's seal fragment to suppress the demons in the 3rd Isolation Area and find out Nuaele's plans.
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan piece of seal untuk menekan kekuatan demon di 3rd Isolation Area dan cari tau rencana Nuaelle.

Philipas' Soldier: Found out Nuaele's plans. Tell Kupole Aurne about Nuaele's plans.
Philip's Soldiers: Ketahui rencana Nuaelle. Ceritakan pada Kupole Aurne mengenai rencana Nuaelle.

Philipas' Soldier: Figured out the plans of Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune on what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Telah mengetahui rencana Nuaelle. Bicara dengan Kupole Arune mengenai langkah selanjutnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Arune suggested defeating the strongest and most loyal servants of Nuaele. Defeat the Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Arune menyarankan untuk membunuh pelayan Nuaelle yang paling kuat dan setia. Kalahkan Harukals di 4th Isolation Area.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated the Harugals. Talk to Kupole Arune again.
Philip's Soldiers: Berhasil mengalahkan Harukals. Kembali ke Kupole Arune.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Harugals in the 4th Isolation Area
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Harukals di 4th Isolation Area

Philipas' Soldier: You're prepared to defeat the Demon Lord Nuaele. Talk to Kupole Arune.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah siap untuk mengalahkan Demon Monarch Nuaelle. Bicara kepada Kupole Arune.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Demon Lord Nuaele
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Demon Monarch Nuaelle

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele is gone from Demon Prison and to stabilize it Kupole Arune asked you to defeat the remaining demons in 1st Isolation Area.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaelle telah menghilang dari Velnias Prison, Kupole Arune memintamu untuk menghabisi demon yang tersisa dalam 1st Isolation Area agar area kembali stabil.

Philipas' Soldier: There are demon monsters left in 4th Isolation Area that are still following Nuaele's orders because of her fragments. Kupole Arune asked you to defeat those monsters and retrieve the fragments.
Philip's Soldiers: Masih ada monster yang tersisa dalam 4th Isolation Area yang masih mengikuti perintah Nuaelle karena fragments Nuaelle. Kupole Arune memintamu untuk mengalahkan monster-monster itu dan dapatkan fragments.

Philipas' Soldier: Kateen Forest Entrance is relatively safe but don't think of going in any further.
Philip's Soldiers: Katyn Forest Entrance biasanya aman namun sebaiknya kamu tidak pergi lebih jauh.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron is trying his best to purify this farm. {nl}The workers sometimes say weird stuff but don't mind them.
Philip's Soldiers: Sir Baron berusaha keras untuk memperbaiki lahannya. {nl}Para pekerja terkadang mengatakan hal-hal aneh namun jangan pedulikan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: It would be best if I went myself, but I'm in no position to leave my place now. {nl}Please purify the sanctum using this Holy Water for now. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya aku pergi sendiri namun saat ini aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempatku. {nl}Tolong murnikan sanctuary menggunakan holy water ini. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I want to see my son healthy soon. {nl}It's a pain waiting for him to spit out the energy of the evil curse.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku ingin melihat anakku kembali seperti semula. {nl}Melihat dia mengeluarkan kekuatan jahat begitu menyakitkan bagiku.

Philipas' Soldier: It's all the same for farmers and soldiers. {nl}One side works and the other manages it.
Philip's Soldiers: Semuanya sama bagi farmer soldiers. {nl}Satu pihak bekerja dan pihak lainnya mengatur.

Philipas' Soldier: The power source needs nature's strength,{nl}and what would be the most suitable for that at the moment?{nl}The crops that fill the warehouse.
Philip's Soldiers: Sumber kekuatannya memerlukan kekuatan alami. Apa yang paling cocok untuk itu saat ini? {nl}Tanaman yang tumbuh dalam gudang. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Even if what the baron really wants is purification. {nl}It doesn't mean we need to bear losing colleagues and expensive farm rent fees. {nl}
