Philip's Soldiers: Bahkan kalaupun yang diinginkan Sir Baron adalah pemurnian. {nl}Tidak berarti kita harus kehilangan rekan kerja dan biaya sewa lahan yang mahal. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Lastly.. The monsters constantly preying on the food storage is a problem. {nl}There is a fellow guarding that place, but it's dangerous all the time.
Philip's Soldiers: Terakhir.. Masalahnya adalah para monster terus-menerus menyerang gudang makanan. {nl}Ada teman yang menjaga tempat itu namun bahaya mengintai sepanjang waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: The baron has a bad reputation for the things he has done. {nl}And the strange things that are happening nowadays... I'm sure something fishy is going on. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Baron memiliki reputasi buruk atas perbuatannya. {nl}Dan kejadian yang berlangsung belakangan ini.. Aku yakin ada sesuatu yang salah. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What about getting kindling from the Orange Dandels around here, and continuously lighting it?
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan saja kayu dari Dandels di sekitar dan bakar.

Philipas' Soldier: It's not easy to get samples. {nl}I don't have enough time to research them either.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak mudah untuk mencari sample. {nl}Aku juga tidak punya waktu banyak untuk meneliti.

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm, even if it's not the Church's order, shouldn't the Great Cathedral be restored first... {nl}Wouldn't we be able to find the answer to the curse more easily then?
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm, Walaupun itu perintah Church, Seharusnya Cathedral terlebih dulu dipulihkan.. {nl}Setelah itu kita dapat dengan mudah menemukan cara melawan kutukan, Betul?

Philipas' Soldier: Our mission initally was to manage and look over the prison. {nl}But now, we take Goddess Vakarine's orders to block the demons and close the gap.
Philip's Soldiers: Pada awalnya misi kami adalah untuk menjaga dan mengatur penjara. {nl}Tapi sekarang, Kami menerima perintah Goddess Vakarine untuk menahan demon dan menutup celah.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk just passed by this way. {nl}I'm sure he's trying to escape through the Goddess' barrier that isn't fully restored.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk baru saja melewati tempat ini. {nl}Aku yakin dia berusaha kabur lewat Goddess' Barrier yang belum pulih sepenuhnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Hauberk is also a sinner. {nl}You don't need to sympathize with him.
Philip's Soldiers: Hauberk juga pendosa. {nl}Kamu tidak perlu merasa simpati kepada dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Just as I thought. The Monster Suppressor was the problem. {nl}It was to stop the monsters from multiplying but it almost messed up the crops too.
Philip's Soldiers: Sudah kuduga. Masalahnya ada pada Monster Suppressor. {nl}Tujuannya adalah untuk mencegah berlipat-gandanya monster namun dia juga merusak tanaman.

Philipas' Soldier: The bees are a problem but the monsters that came in from the other forests are a bigger problem. {nl}I'm sure they are here for the honey. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Para lebah merupakan masalah namun monster yang masuk melalui hutan lain adalah masalah yang lebih besar. {nl}Aku yakin mereka mengincar madu. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Are you the one Joseph went to find? {nl}Well, it doesn't matter even if you're not. {nl}If you don't help us, then you're no different from the other Revelators who ran away. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu orang yang dicari Joseph? {nl}Hmm, Tidak masalah kalau bukan. {nl}Kalau kamu tidak membantu kami maka kamu tidak ada bedanya dengan Saviours lain yang kabur. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: There must be fine documents still left in the deeper area of the Great Cathedral... {nl}I feel bad about not being able to see it.
Philip's Soldiers: Pasti ada dokumen berharga yang tertinggal di deeper area of Cathedral.. {nl}Aku merasa bersalah karena tidak mampu melihatnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm making medicine to cure the cursed pilgrim. {nl}I'm almost done but it's really difficult to get thistles.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku membuat obat-obatan untuk mengobati para peziarah. {nl}Aku hampir selesai namun sulit untuk mendapatkan thristles.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Whether you have business here or not, you better leave this place if you don't have permission.
Philip's Soldiers: Ada urusan atau tidak, Sebaiknya kamu pergi dari tempat ini kalau tidak punya izin.

Philipas' Soldier: You might as well leave if you're going to talk about 'corruption'. {nl}If not... there is another way for you to get permission from me.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya kamu pergi saja kalau kamu ingin bicara soal pencemaran dan pengobatannya. {nl}Kalu kamu masih keras kepala.. Ada cara lain untuk mendapatkan ijin dariku.

Philipas' Soldier: If you want something, you're going to have to give something. {nl}Did you think I'd let you enter for free?
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau ingin sesuatu maka kamu harus memberikan sesuatu. {nl}Kamu kira ijinku gratis?

Philipas' Soldier: It will be better for you to explain it rather than me. {nl}After all, you were the reason Shaton threw away his obsession.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bisa menjelaskannya lebih baik dariku. {nl}Lagipula, Kamulah alasan mengapa Shaton membuang segala obsesinya.

Philipas' Soldier: You were the one ransacking their nest, so it was on you. {nl}But I also have a reputation, so I will reward you for it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu yang mengacaukan sarangnya maka itu tanggung jawab kamu. {nl}Tapi aku juga memiliki reputasi jadi aku akan memberi hadiah untukmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Better return quickly
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya cepat kembali

Philipas' Soldier: Better meet the priest
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya temui priest

Philipas' Soldier: The Revelators come First
Philip's Soldiers: Melayani Saviors didahulukan

Philipas' Soldier: Better stand back as it's dangerous
Philip's Soldiers: Lebih baik mundur karena berbahaya

Philipas' Soldier: Better give up as it's dangerous
Philip's Soldiers: Menyerahlah karena ini bahaya

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/The magic circle strengthened when you removed the 4 crystals!!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Magic circle diperkuat ketika kamu memindahkan 4 crystals!!#5

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/!/You must gather the spell of monsters in the pot and bury it in front of the magic circle.#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/!/Kamu harus mengumpulkan mantra monster dalam pot dan kubur di depan magic circle.#5

Philipas' Soldier: Breaking the container/HAMMERING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Mematahkan container/HAMMERING/2/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Better do it yourself
Philip's Soldiers: Sebaiknya lakukan sendiri

Philipas' Soldier: Brewer Dorjen is angry because he was stopped from burning the forest. {nl}Try to calm Dorjen down.
Philip's Soldiers: Brewer Dorjen marah karena dihentikan saat membakar hutan. Coba tenangkan Dorjen.

Philipas' Soldier: If they're not after the honey, then there's only one thing possible. Check Bichiu Altar, where monsters have been gathering.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika madu yang mereka incar maka hanya ada satu alasannya. Periksa Baciu Altar tempat para monster.

Philipas' Soldier: The Tree Root Crystal reacted strangely and corrupted its surroundings! First, defeat the monsters nearby and find the scattered Tree Root Crystal Cores.
Philip's Soldiers: Tree Root Crystal bereaksi aneh dan mencemari lingkungan sekitarnya! Pertama, Kalahkan monster disekitar Tree Root Crystal Cores.

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters came out when you worshiped at the sanctum. Defeat the monsters first.
Philip's Soldiers: Monsters berhamburan keluar disaat kamu menghormati Goddess. Kalahkan dulu monster-monster tersebut.

Philipas' Soldier: Royal Survey Corps Ukert seems to have sensed something. Talk to Ukert again.
Philip's Soldiers: Royal Investigation member Yukurt kelihatannya menyadari sesuatu. Bicara lagi dengan Yukurt.

Philipas' Soldier: Get the secret hint from the platform in Meile Oratorium and obtain the Holy Relic of Mercy. If you have difficulty solving the secret, call on Aurelius' Spirit and ask him for help.
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan petunjuk rahasia dari platform di dalam Memile Library dan temukan holy artifacts of mercy. Kalau kamu kesulitan memecahkan rahasianya, Panggil soul of Aurelius dan minta pertolongannya.

Philipas' Soldier: It's curious that a wine cask is lying off the beaten path. Go and take a look at it.
Philip's Soldiers: Sebuah wooden liquir barrel yang ada di jalan yang rusak ini mencurigakan. Coba periksa.

Philipas' Soldier: Joana wants to find out what the strange aura near Ramus Crossroads is. Attack the monster to drop its HP below 50%, then bring it to the strange aura below the magic circle and interact with it.
Philip's Soldiers: Joana memintamu memeriksa aura aneh yang ada di dekat Ramus Crossroad. Serang monster untuk mengurangi HP dibawah 50% lalu bawa ke aura aneh dibawah magic circle dan coba bicara dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Goddess Vakarine's strength alone is not enough to close the dimensional crack. Talk to Goddess Vakarine.
Philip's Soldiers: Kekuatan Goddess Vakarine saja belum cukup untuk menutup gap of contamination. Bicara dengan Goddess Vakarine.

Philipas' Soldier: Nuaele is gone from Demon Prison and to stabilize it, Kupole Arune asked you defeat the remaining demons in 1st Isolation Area.
Philip's Soldiers: Nuaelle telah hirang dari Velnias Prison, Kupole Arune memintamu untuk mengalahkan monster di 1st Isolation Area agar areanya kembali stabil.

Philipas' Soldier: I really want to help the soldiers who are trying to clear the Thorn Forest,{nl} but sadly I just don't have the means to.{nl} Could you do something about the Treegools that are harassing the soldiers?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat ingin membantu para tentara di Forest of Thorns, Tapi sedihnya aku tak mampu.{nl} Apakah kamu bisa mengatasi Treegul(?) yang menyakiti para tentara?

Philipas' Soldier: It's dangerous here, get back to the town.{nl} What are the soldiers even doing.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Disini berbahaya, Kembalilah ke kota.{nl} Apa yang sedang dilakukan para tentara.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ah, so you're the Revelator? {nl} I have a problem, but with you here it might not be so bad. {nl} Mind if I borrow some of your time?
Philip's Soldiers: Ah, Kamu Savior? {nl} Walau memalukan, Namun aku beruntung. Boleh kuminta waktumu sebentar?

Philipas' Soldier: You are aware that we are the unit sent out to take care of the Gaigalas?{nl} Recruit! Take this report to Commander Wallace.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tau kalau kami adalah pasukan yang dikirim untuk mengatasi para Gygalos?{nl} Recruit! Laporkan ini ke Commander Williams.

Philipas' Soldier: If we get rid of Gaigalas, we can smooth things out with them.{nl}Please make your way to the Worrying Owl.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kita berhasil menyingkirkan Gygalos kita dapat membuat semuanya lebih lancar.{nl}Mohon pergi ke worried owl.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunter Tracking Leader Mintz
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter Reconnaisance leader Minz

Philipas' Soldier: What a pain in the ass.{nl} How do we convince those monks...
Philip's Soldiers: Menyebalkan.{nl} Bagaimana cara meyakinkan para biksu iniâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: Hey you, have you ever seen the one called Evoniphon?
Philip's Soldiers: Hei kamu, Pernah lihat "Ebony Pony"?

Philipas' Soldier: I hope this that was the end of it.{nl}It seems that we Hunters have a bad reputation around these parts.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harap ini yang terakhir.{nl}Kelihatannya kita para Hunter punya reputasi yang buruk di sekitar sini.

Philipas' Soldier: Are things going smoothly?{nl}I'm hoping to hear good things in the near future.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa semuanya berjalan dengan lancar?{nl}Kuharap dalam waktu dekat ini aku dapat mendengar kabar yang bagus.

Philipas' Soldier: Please help our Natasha.{nl}She's a good girl, if a bit inexperienced...
Philip's Soldiers: Kumohon bantu Natasha.{nl}Dia adalah gadis yang baik, namun kurang pengalaman...

Philipas' Soldier: Hopefully this can be resolved without causing a conflict with the monks.{nl}I trust you in taking this matter appropriately.
Philip's Soldiers: Kuharap hal ini dapat diselesaikan tanpa memicu konflik dengan para monks.{nl}Aku yakin kamu dapat mengatasi hal ini dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: For the most part, do try and appease the monk's demands.{nl}We'll assist you wherever we can.
Philip's Soldiers: Cobalah untuk menerima semua tuntutan monk.{nl}Kami akan membantu kamu semampu kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm glad to hear that Natasha is doing well.{nl} I wish you the best at Raoki Swamps.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku senang mendengar Natasha baik-baik saja.{nl} Kudoakan yang terbaik bagimu di Raoki Swamps.

Philipas' Soldier: Good. So finally the time to retrieve the monastery.{nl}We will be using our power in a such a long time.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus. Saatnya merebut kembali monastery.{nl}Sudah sekian lama sejak kita menggunakan kekuatan.

Philipas' Soldier: We've reached this far with your help, Revelator.{nl}Now we just to have to hope that Evoniphon gets taken care of well. Let's go.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita bisa sejauh ini karena kamu, Savior.{nl}Saat ini kita tinggal berharap kalau Evoniphon bisa ditangani dengan baik. Ayo pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: Senior Monk Potos
Philip's Soldiers: Senior Monk Potos

Philipas' Soldier: What brought you here?{nl}With the circumstances not heading to the way they used to be, we will try our best to help you.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang membawamu kemari?{nl}Karena kondisinya sudah membaik, Kami akan coba membantu kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: I am sorry if you've come here to visit the monastery.{nl}We are like this since the monsters rushed in.
Philip's Soldiers: Maaf karena merepotkanmu datang kesini mengunjungi monastery.{nl}Ini sudah terjadi semenjak para monster menerobos masuk.

Philipas' Soldier: The goddesses have taught us to greet everyone with warmth.{nl}Due to the difficulty we are having at the moment, we weren't able to greet the Hunters warmly. I regret this..
Philip's Soldiers: Goddesses telah mengajarkan kita untuk menyapa semua orang dengan hangat.{nl}Karena kesulitan kami saat ini, Kami tidak bisa menyambut Hunters dengan kehangatan. Aku merasa bersalah..

Philipas' Soldier: If that trap was set up by Evoniphon, I will stand by the Hunters' side.{nl}Whatever excuses you make, they cannot be compared with the pain of our brothers.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Evoniphon yang membuat jebakan itu, Aku akan memihak Hunter.{nl}Apapun alasannya, Tidak bisa dibandingkan dengan penderitaan saudara kami.

Philipas' Soldier: Brother Marko is at Viltis Forest and Goss is at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Without their support, it is impossible to persuade the abbot.
Philip's Soldiers: Brother Marko ada di Viltis Forest dan Guus ada di Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Tanpa bantuan mereka, Maka mustahil untuk meyakinkan the abbot.

Philipas' Soldier: I support the Hunters, but I don't know what the other senior monks are thinking.{nl}However, I don't think it would be a problem if we get hard evidence.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mendukung Hunters, Tapi aku tidak tau apa yang dipikirkan monk lainnya.{nl}Namun, Aku pikir tidak masalah kalau kita mempunyai bukti.

Philipas' Soldier: Monk Wiley
Philip's Soldiers: Monk Wiley

Philipas' Soldier: My heart aches to see my brothers suffer in pain.{nl}I am doing my best to take care of them, but I am somewhat scared.
Philip's Soldiers: Hatiku sakit melihat saudaraku kesakitan.{nl}Aku melakukan yang terbaik untuk menjaga mereka, Namun entah kenapa aku takut.

Philipas' Soldier: For me, my brothers come first instead of the Hunters or the monastery.{nl}I am praying to the goddesses, so that they can recover as soon as possible.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Untukku, Saudara lebih penting dibandingkan Hunters atau monastery.{nl}Aku berdoa kepada Goddesses, Agar mereka cepat sembuh.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Hunter Reina
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter Reina

Philipas' Soldier: You should be careful when you are crossing this forest.{nl}There are traps everywhere.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus berhati-hati saat menyebrangi hutan.{nl}Ada jebakan dimana-mana.

Philipas' Soldier: You don't seem like a monk... Do you know anything about Evoniphon?{nl}I heard they created a mess near the farm in Klaipeda.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak terlihat seperti seorang monk... Apa kamu tau sesuatu mengenai Evoniphon?{nl}Aku dengar mereka mengacau di sekitar farm di daerah Klaipeda.

Philipas' Soldier: Even after taking this antidote, the paralysis doesn't fade away.{nl}But, as a Hunter, I cannot go back until I finish my task.
Philip's Soldiers: Penawarnya sudah diminum namun kelumpuhan ini belum hilang.{nl}Tapi sebagai Hunter, Aku tidak bisa kembali sebelum menyelesaikan tugasku.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know how many people are suffering because of Evoniphon.{nl}To put this in other words, Evoniphon is 'so great'.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tau sudah berapa banyak orang yang menderita karena Evoniphon.{nl}Dengan kata lain, Evoniphon terlalu 'hebat'.

Philipas' Soldier: Senior Monk Marko
Philip's Soldiers: Senior Monk Marko

Philipas' Soldier: The abbot is trapped in the monastery, where it is full of monsters, but mentioning Evoniphon..{nl}They shouldn't be that rude. Don't you think so?
Philip's Soldiers: Monk kepala terjebak di dalam monastery, yang dipenuhi monster, tapi menyebut Evoniphon..{nl}Mereka seharusnya tidak sekasar itu, Kamu juga berpikir begitu kan?

Philipas' Soldier: If you are going to talk about the Hunters, I refuse to listen.{nl}They are rude people.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu mau bicara soal Hunter, Aku tidak mau dengar.{nl}Mereka orang-orang yang kasar.

Philipas' Soldier: He barely walked here and then fainted.{nl}I think he is breathing for now...
Philip's Soldiers: Dia susah payah berjalan kesini kemudian pingsan.{nl}Aku pikir saat ini dia masih bernafasâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: Boros! Wake up, Boros!
Philip's Soldiers: Boros! Bangun, Boros!

Philipas' Soldier: I regret that I was being so harsh to the Hunters til now.{nl}I hope my decision helps the Hunters
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menyesal telah terlalu keras pada para Hunter sampai saat ini.{nl}Kuharap keputusanku dapat membantu para Hunter

Philipas' Soldier: You should persuade Goss at Laukyme Swamp.{nl}But, since you don't have the decisive proof about Evoniphon... I can't guarantee the withdrawl of the protection.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus meyakinkan Guus yang ada di Laukyme Swamp.{nl}Namun, Kamu tidak punya bukti mengenai Evoniphon... Aku tidak dapat menjamin perlindungannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunter Natasha
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter Natasha

Philipas' Soldier: Persuading someone is so hard.{nl}I hope someone helps me...
Philip's Soldiers: Meyakinkan seseorang itu sulit.{nl}Kuharap seseorang dapat membantukuâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: I wonder how Captain Mintz would react if he was in my situation..
Philip's Soldiers: Kira-kira bagaimana Captain Mintz akan bertindak jika mengalami keadaan seperti saat ini..

Philipas' Soldier: Help whatever you could on what they are trying to do.{nl}We, Hunters would help as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantulah semampu kamu.{nl}Kami, Hunter juga akan membantu.

Philipas' Soldier: I should have suggested to help retrieving the monastery from the first place.{nl}I wasn't patient.
Philip's Soldiers: Seharusnya sejak awal aku menyarankan untuk mengambil alih monastery.{nl}Saat itu aku buru-buru.

Philipas' Soldier: I will take care for him so don't worry too much, but go to Laukyme Swamp.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir aku akan mengatasi dia, Kamu pergi saja ke Laukyme Swamp.

Philipas' Soldier: You can go to Laukyme Swamp by going up Glade Hillroad again.{nl}Please report to Hunter Tracking Leader Mintz on your way back.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk ke Laukyme Swamp kamu harus melewati Glade Hillroad lagi.{nl}Harap laporkan ke Hunter Tracking Leader Mintz dalam perjalanan kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunter Bastille
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter Bastille

Philipas' Soldier: Are you heading to Tyla Monastery?{nl}The monsters there are already worshiping.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu mau ke Tyla Monastery?{nl}Monster disana sudah mulai menghormatinya.

Philipas' Soldier: Careless, careless.{nl}I was so careless...
Philip's Soldiers: Ceroboh.{nl}Aku sudah cerobohâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: Monk Chad
Philip's Soldiers: Monk Chad

Philipas' Soldier: Please do not get close to those Hunters.{nl}They are incredibly rude people.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong jangan dekati para Hunters itu.{nl}Mereka orang-orang yang kasar.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't like the Hunters at all.{nl}I hope they wouldn't change their minds because we are protecting Evoniphon.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sama sekali tidak suka sama Hunter.{nl}Aku harap mereka tidak merubah pikiran mereka karena kita melindungi Evoniphon.

Philipas' Soldier: Senior Monk Goss
Philip's Soldiers: Senior Monk Goss

Philipas' Soldier: If you are the pilgrim who came to see Tyla Monastery, I am so sorry.{nl}We lost the place to the monsters...
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu ingin berziarah ke Tyla Monastery, Mohon maaf.{nl}Kami sudah kehilangan tempat itu, Karena monsterâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know what the goddesses would say if she sees this...{nl}Gloomy...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tau Goddess akan berkata apa jika melihat semua ini...{nl}Suramâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: This is all I know about Evoniphon.{nl}I think there weren't anything special besides that.
Philip's Soldiers: Hanya ini yang aku ketahui tentang Evoniphon.{nl}Kurasa tidak ada hal yang spesial selain ini.

Philipas' Soldier: If you need to more about Evoniphon, please ask me anytime.{nl}I will answer everything I know about Evoniphon.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu ingin tau lebih banyak tentang Evoniphon, Tanyakan saja padaku kapanpun kamu mau.{nl}Aku akan beritau semuanya mengenai Evoniphon.

Philipas' Soldier: Finally, we are near Tyla Monastery.{nl}We want to attack, but we should also think about the monks.
Philip's Soldiers: Akhirnya kita sudah dekat dengan Tyla Monastery.{nl}Kita ingin menyerang namun kita harus memikirkan soal Monk yang ada disana.

Philipas' Soldier: To defeat Evoniphon, we will do anything.{nl}To the ones who are from the tower of the stars, Evoniphon is a such creature.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami akan melakukan apapun untuk mengalahkan Evoniphon.{nl}Evoniphon begitu menakutkan bagi seseorang yang berasal dari tower of the stars.

Philipas' Soldier: Monk Jones
Philip's Soldiers: Monk Jones

Philipas' Soldier: The moment now seems like a short nightmare.{nl}We were studying scriptures and drawing water at the monastery not long ago.
Philip's Soldiers: Situasi saat ini seperti mimpi buruk.{nl}Belum lama ini kami sedang mempelajari scriptures dan simbol air.

Philipas' Soldier: I know that I am pathetic since I was forced out by the monsters...{nl}But, I am worried more about the abbot who is praying at the prayer room without knowing anything.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tau aku menyedihkan karena aku disingkirkan oleh para monster...{nl}Namun, Aku lebih khawatir dengan Monk kepala yang sedang berdoa tanpa mengetahui yang terjadi.

Philipas' Soldier: Monk Jeffrey
Philip's Soldiers: Monk Jeffrey

Philipas' Soldier: A long time ago, this forest used to be completely packed with thorns just like Sirdgela Forest.{nl}After the purification, we all thought the monsters were eliminated.. But that was just an illusion.
Philip's Soldiers: Dulu, Hutan ini penuh dengan duri seperti di dalam Sirdgela Forest.{nl}Setelah pemurnian, Kami pikir semua monster telah dibasmi.. Tapi ternyata itu hanya ilusi.

Philipas' Soldier: I just want to know where all these monsters came from.{nl}After the purification, the only monsters were the ones that lost their ways.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku hanya ingin tau darimana monster-monster itu berasal.{nl}Setelah pemurnian. Satu-satunya monster adalah mereka yang kehilangan arah.

Philipas' Soldier: Hey! Wake up!{nl}Can you hear my voice?
Philip's Soldiers: Hei! bangun!{nl}Apakah kamu bsia mendengar suaraku?

Philipas' Soldier: He is fainted, but fortunately he is breathing.{nl}But, the fracture is serious.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia pingsan namun untungnya dia masih bernafas.{nl}Namun, Patah tulangnya fatal.

Philipas' Soldier: Evoniphon, you cheap...
Philip's Soldiers: Evoniphon, kamu rendahan...

Philipas' Soldier: Fortunatly, his inner organs seem alright.{nl}But, I can't cure him by transporting him to other places.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, Organ dalamnya selamat.{nl}Tapi aku tidak bisa menyembuhkan dia dengan memindahkannya ke tempat lain.

Philipas' Soldier: I am going to take care of the outer edge of the monastery.{nl}In the name of the goddesses, I wish you the good luck.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mengatasi sudut luar monastery.{nl}Atas nama Goddesses, Aku mendoakanmu yang terbaik.

Philipas' Soldier: We are all ready here.{nl}Although I can't participate in saving the abbot, I will do my best here.
Philip's Soldiers: Semua yang ada disini sudah siap.{nl}Walaupun aku tidak bisa ikut menyelamatkan Monk kepala, Aku tetap akan melakukan yang terbaik disini.

Philipas' Soldier: The prayer room where the abbot is located is safe.{nl}But, we should save him anyways.
Philip's Soldiers: Ruang doa tempat Monk kepala sudah aman.{nl}Namun kita tetap harus menyelamatkan dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Our preparations are done here.{nl}If you are ready, tell Goss.
Philip's Soldiers: Persiapan disini sudah selesai.{nl}Bilang Guus kalau kamu sudah siap.

Philipas' Soldier: You will act with me and Goss.{nl}If you are finished, tell Goss.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan beraksi bersama aku dan Guus.{nl}Bilang ke Guus kalau kamu sudah selesai.

Philipas' Soldier: Hunters can move whenever they want.{nl}I will do my best for the first time in a long time.
Philip's Soldiers: Hunter dapat bergerak kapanpun mereka mau.{nl}Setelah sekian lama, Aku akan bertindak dengan seluruh kemampuanku.

Philipas' Soldier: Moheim is smart so he should've hid the crystal sphere well.
Philip's Soldiers: Moheim itu pintar jadi dia bisa bersembunyi dengan baik dibalik crystal sphere.

Philipas' Soldier: You can't open it outside without the crystal sphere.{nl}Unless the abbot opens it himself...
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu tidak dapat membukanya dari luar tanpa crystal sphere.{nl}Kecuali Monk kepala membukanya sendiriâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: It's so good to hear that you are okay.{nl}While you are getting the crystal sphere, we should get ready to rescue the abbot.
Philip's Soldiers: Senang mendengar kamu baik-baik saja.{nl}Selagi kamu mencari crystal sphere, kita harus bersiap untuk menyelamatkan Monk kepala.

Philipas' Soldier: I would've bled a lot if it weren't you.{nl}The goddesses must have helped me.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan kesulitan jika tidak ada kamu.{nl}Ini pasti berkat pertolongan Goddesses.

Philipas' Soldier: Fortunately, the abbot seems to know nothing.{nl}I guess that's better. Anyways, the issues have been resolved.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, Monk kepala kelihatannya tidak mengetahui apapun.{nl}Kurasa itu lebih baik. Lagipula, Masalahnya sudah diselesaikan.

Philipas' Soldier: I am less worried to find out the abbot is okay.{nl}Now what should we do about Evoniphon...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sedikit lega setelah mengetahui kalau Monk kepala baik-baik saja.{nl}Selanjutnya apa yang harus kita lakukan dengan Evoniphonâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: I am discussing with the abbot.{nl}Please wait beside Mintz for a while.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sedang membicarakannya dengan Monk kepala.{nl}Sementara itu, Tunggulah di sekitar Mintz.

Philipas' Soldier: We haven't finished discussing yet.{nl}Please wait little more.
Philip's Soldiers: kita belum selesai berdiskusi.{nl}Tunggu sebentar lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: You will leave soon. May the goddesses bless you.{nl}Come to Tyla Monastery sometimes.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu akan segera berangkat. Semoga Goddesses memberkati kamu.{nl}Berkunjunglah ke Tyla Monastery kapan-kapan.

Philipas' Soldier: I regret a bit since we should have allied together in the first place.{nl}I guess I forgot the lessons of the goddesses for a while.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sedikit menyesal, Seharusnya sejak awal kita sudah berteman.{nl}Kurasa aku telah melupakan ajaran Goddesses.

Philipas' Soldier: It is so fortunate that the abbot is okay.{nl}I... feel like crying.
Philip's Soldiers: Untung Monk kepala baik-baik saja.{nl}Aku... Sepertinya ingin menangis.

Philipas' Soldier: I kinda expected that he would be alright since he was in the prayer room...{nl}But seeing him okay with my own eyes comforts me more.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah menduga kalau dia akan baik-baik saja karena dia ada di ruang doa...{nl}Namun melihat dia secara langsung dalam kondisi baik membuatku sangat lega.

Philipas' Soldier: Please wait beside Mintz for a while.{nl}I should explain everything so it may take little time.
Philip's Soldiers: Tunggulah sebentar disebelah Mintz.{nl}Aku harus menjelaskan semuanya jadi ini pasti butuh waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: I've heard about Evoniphon's letter from Goss.{nl}Please wait little more since everything fits the situation.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku telah mendengar mengenai surat Evoniphon dari Guus.{nl}Saat ini kondisinya sudah membaik jadi tunggulah sebentar lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: We've retrieved the monastery and the Hunters fulfilled what they wanted...{nl}These are all blessings of the goddesses.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita telah berhasil mengambil alih monastery dan para Hunter telah mendapatkan apa yang mereka inginkan...{nl}Ini semua adalah berkat Goddesses.

Philipas' Soldier: Without your help, I am sure that it would've not gone so easy.{nl}I've heard the stories of many Revelators before, but you are the only one I saw in person.
Philip's Soldiers: Tanpa bantuanmu, Aku yakin hal itu tidak akan berjalan dengan mudah.{nl}Dari semua kisah Saviors yang pernah kudengar, Kamu satu-satunya yang aku saksikan secara langsung.

Philipas' Soldier: Monk Moheim
Philip's Soldiers: Monk Moheim

Philipas' Soldier: It's so good that we've retrieved the monastery...{nl}But it's a mess.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita berhasil mengambil alih monastery...{nl}Namun semuanya sudah kacau.

Philipas' Soldier: Should we get rid of the monsters first or clean this place first...{nl}That's the problem we are facing at the moment.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang harus kita lakukan lebih dulu, Membasmi para monster atau membersihkan tempat ini...{nl}Inilah masalah kita saat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Now is the best chance to get Evoniphon.{nl}We are surrounding the monastery so I guess even he would not be able to sneak out.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang saat yang tepat untuk menangkap Evoniphon.{nl}Kita sudah mengelilingi monastery jadi dia tidak punya celah untuk kabur.

Philipas' Soldier: You saw Evoniphon?{nl}He is not here. We better go down a bit more.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu lihat Evoniphon?{nl}Dia tidak ada disini. Sebaiknya kita turun lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Please pray so that we could get Evoniphon.{nl}I wish you the good luck.
Philip's Soldiers: Berdoalah supaya kita bisa menangkap Evoniphon.{nl}Semoga beruntung.

Philipas' Soldier: Don't worry Revelator. Just go on your way. The people here are just fainted temporarily.{nl}I hope to see you next time for something better instead of Evoniphon.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir Savior. Pergilah. Orang-orang disini hanya pingsan.{nl}Aku harap nanti kita bisa bertemu lagi dalam keadaan yang lebih baik dari saat menghadapi Evoniphon.

Philipas' Soldier: I lost many colleagues from Petrifying Frost here.{nl}I don't understand why I am here to support a newbie Chronomancer here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah kehilangan banyak kawan dari Stone Frosts disini.{nl}Aku tidak mengerti kenapa aku harus ada disini membantu Chronomancer newbie.

Philipas' Soldier: On top of that, we don't know when those violent monsters would attack here.{nl}I don't care what you do, I just hope those monsters get taken care of.
Philip's Soldiers: Diatas itu semua, Kita tidak tau kapan monster-monster kejam itu akan menyerang disini.{nl}Aku tidak peduli apa yang kamu lakukan, Aku hanya mau kamu menangani monster-monster itu.

Philipas' Soldier: We are still sad that we lost our colleagues.{nl}It is very unfortunate that we should take care of that woman in this time.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita masih berduka karena kehilangan teman seperjuangan.{nl}Sialnya saat ini kita juga harus menjaga gadis itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks. We can stay safe here for some time.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih. Kita bisa tinggal disini untuk sementara waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: Our comrades who were attacked by Petrifying Frost... they are just left there without avoiding the rain and the wind.{nl}On top of that, we have a limited support... We have no choice, but to wait.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Teman kita yang diserang oleh Stone Frosts... Mereka berangkat kesana tanpa mempedulikan badai.{nl}Terlebih lagi, kita kekurangan bantuan... Tidak ada pilihan lain bagi kita selain menunggu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But those damn monsters! They are attacking our colleagues.{nl}Please. Could you be with our colleagues to protect them for a while?
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi monster-monster terkutuk itu! Mereka menyerang teman-teman kami.{nl}Tolong. Bisakah kamu tinggal bersama teman kami sebentar untuk melindungi mereka?

Philipas' Soldier: My old friend, Galen is one of the victims.{nl}Please protect him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kawan lama-ku, Galen adalah salah satu korban.{nl}Tolong lindungi dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much.{nl}I hope the reinforcement comes soon so he could return to his family even if he is petrified.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak.{nl}Aku harap bantuan akan segera datang jadi dia bisa kembali ke keluarganya walaupun dia sudah lumpuh.

Philipas' Soldier: We didn't treat them badly, but they betrayed us.{nl}Dico Thieves stole the supplies from us.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kami tidak pernah menyakiti mereka, Namun mereka mengkhianati kami.{nl}Dico Thieves mencuri persediaan kami.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: They must have taken them to Drasos Chapel Ruins, but since I can't leave this place, I guess we all gonna die.{nl}I am sorry, but can you retrieve the supplies that were stolen by the thieves?
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka pasti membawanya ke Drasa worship ruins, tapi mungkin kita semua akan mati karena kita tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini.{nl}Maaf, Bisakah kamu mendapatkan kembali persediaan yang dicuri oleh mereka?

Philipas' Soldier: A few decades ago, the thieves attacked the guard camp or stole the supplies secretly.{nl}They were punished for doing so, but I guess they forgot about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Beberapa dekade lalu, para pencuri menyerang guard camp atau mencuri persediaan secara diam-diam.{nl}Mereka sudah dihukum atas kelakuan mereka itu namun kurasa mereka tidak kapok.

Philipas' Soldier: They lured us in front of them and stole the goods from behind.{nl}We should set something up, but our chiefs are fighting against the Knights of Kaliss. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka memancing kita ke depan lalu mengambil persediaan yang ada di belakang.{nl}Kita harus berbuat sesuatu sebelum para pemimpin melawan Knights of Kaliss. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We have one more trouble.{nl}I mean Sabina, who is a Knight of Kaliss.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita punya satu masalah lagi.{nl}Maksudku Sabina, Yang merupakan Knight of Kaliss.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: They are insisting that they would not go back until they find the damaged artifacts.{nl}We can't get out from this place so I don't know what they want us to do...
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka bersikeras untuk tidak kembali sebelum mendapatkan artifak yang rusak.{nl}Kita tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini jadi aku tidak tau apa yang mereka inginkanâ€¦

Philipas' Soldier: The city that was destroyed a few hundreds years ago has no assets or no people to protect.{nl}I rather feel like protecting a historical site. Even tomb thieves are here.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak ada apapun yang berharga dari kota yang telah hancur ratusan tahun lalu.{nl}Aku merasa seperti melindungi situs bersejarah. Bahkan perampok makam ada disini.

Philipas' Soldier: Now, I just hope Sabina stays calm.{nl}We don't want to be like them here because of the Petrifying Frost.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarangm Aku hanya berharap Sabina tetap tenang.{nl}Kita tidak ingin menjadi seperti mereka karena Stone Frosts.

Philipas' Soldier: It's not an easy thing to ditch the Royal Army Guards.{nl}I want to know the truth here. The truth which the soldiers really hate about.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Menyingkirkan tentara kingdom bukanlah tugas yang mudah.{nl}Aku ingin tau apa yang sebenarnya terjadi disini. Kenyataan yang dibenci oleh para tentara.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I need your help since you don't seem to belong to any side.{nl}Could you make rubber copies of the records that are remaining here?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku butuh bantuanmu karena kelihatannya kamu tidak memihak siapapun.{nl}Apakah kamu bisa membuat rubber copies dari catatan yang masih tersisa disini?

Philipas' Soldier: These are the records from the time when the Fortress of the Land collapsed.{nl}We could maybe know more about the Fortress of the Land from the headquarter of Ruklys.
Philip's Soldiers: Catatan ini berasal dari masa fortress of the earth runtuh.{nl}Kita mungkin bisa mengetahui lebih banyak tenrang fortress of the earth dari headquarter of Ruklys.

Philipas' Soldier: But, the Fortress of the Land can't be entered because the Royal Army Guards are restricting the access.{nl}Even the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Namun, Fortress of the Earth tidak dapat dimasuki karena tentara kingdom membatasi akses untuk masuk kesana.{nl}Bahkan ada Knights of Kaliss.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe... we could restore the time of the portal that was used when we retreated from the Fortress of the Land.{nl}It is dangerous from this point on so if you are going to quit, please tell me now.
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkinâ€¦ Kita dapat mengulang waktu dari portal yang telah digunakan saat kita mundur dari fortress of the earth.{nl}Ini akan berbahaya jadi kalau kamu ingin berhenti, katakanlah dari sekarang.

Philipas' Soldier: What we are planning right now could lead us to the gallows.{nl}Please keep it secret.
Philip's Soldiers: Rencana kita ini berbahaya, Kita bisa dibunuh kalau ketahuan.{nl}Tolong rahasiakan hal ini.

Philipas' Soldier: When we were in the era of Premier Eminent, we were supported by the superior troops, lots of supplies and etc.{nl}But, 600 years have passed after Premier Eminent died.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pada era Premier Eminent, Kami didukung oleh prajurit terkuat dan persediaan tak terbatas.{nl}Namun, 600 tahun telah berlalu sejak Premier Eminent mati.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: No matter how large the rebellion was, after experiencing Medzio Diena, our support waned. If anything, it's a question of whether we must remain here. For 600 years?
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak peduli sebesar apapun pemberontakan yang terjadi, Setelah Medzio Diena, dukungan kami melemah. Pertanyaannya adalah apakah karena itu kita harus menetap disini. Selama 600 tahun?

Philipas' Soldier: I heard the Dico Thieves were well known thieves.{nl}I heard that they were separated on Medzio Diena... Anyways... what they are doing is like what bandits are doing.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dengar Dico Thieves terkenal.{nl}Kudengar mereka terpisah di Medzio Diena... Lagipula... Kelakuan mereka seperti bandit.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I also know that there are thieves called Amanda Thieves. They were quiet.{nl}I want to know if they really exist or not since I never saw them before.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku juga tau kalau ada pencuri yang disebut Amanda Thieves. Mereka tidak menonjolkan diri.{nl}Aku ingin tau apakah mereka benar-benar ada karena aku tidak pernah melihat mereka.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Both of them are criminals that we should catch when we receive more reinforcements.{nl}Especially, Dico Thieves.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka semua adalah penjahat yang harus kita tangkap sebelum bantuan datang.{nl}Terutama, Dico Thieves.

Philipas' Soldier: We are observing what the researchers of the Knights of Kaliss are doing, and while pretending to be their guards.{nl}Sabina was one of them.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita sedang mengawasi apa yang sedang dilakukan peneliti Knights of Kaliss, selagi menyamar sebagai pengawal mereka.{nl}Sabina adalah salah satu dari mereka.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: They disappear and appear again using the artifacts that are remaining in the city so I have troubles chasing after them.{nl}But, were Chronomancers the people who investigate the portals?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka menghilang lalu kembali muncul menggunakan artifak yang merupakan sisa kota jadi aku kesulitan menangkap mereka.{nl}Tapi, Bukannya Chronomancers yang bertugas meneliti portal?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I really appreciate for your kindness, but it's not going to be easy. If it was easy, we would've found them already.{nl}I don't know why, but the monsters ate the artifacts.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku menghormati niat baikmu tapi ini tidak mudah. Kalau mudah mereka pasti sudah tertangkap.{nl}Aku tidak tau kenapa tapi para monster memakan artifaknya.

Philipas' Soldier: This place is the cursed city of the traitor, Ruklys.{nl}It has been cursed with the Petrifying Frost since the end of the rebellion.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat ini adalah kota terkutuk dari pengkhianat, Ruklys.{nl}Telah dikutuk dengan Stone Frost sejak pemberontakan berakhir.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We will permit your entry since the Knights of Kaliss requested us to do so,{nl}but please remain at places where we can keep an eye on you.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami mengijinkan kamu untuk masuk karena Knights of Kaliss yang meminta,{nl}Tapi tolong jangan jauh-jauh dari pengawasan kami.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know how great you were in the past,{nl}but you have to follow the rules of the kingdom here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tau seberapa hebat kamu di masa lalu,{nl}Tapi di tempat ini kamu harus mematuhi peraturan kingdom.

Philipas' Soldier: Benas asked us to secure the route that connects to the Fortress of the Land.{nl}Ah, he is the ruler of the kingdoms soldiers in this region.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Benas meminta kami untuk mengamankan rute menuju fortress of the earth.{nl}Ah, dialah yang memimpin pasukan kingdom di area ini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you could defeat the monsters in the ruins, that will be the way to contribute to the goddesses and the kingdom.{nl}Of course, I promise you some rewards in return.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mungkin kamu dapat memberikan konribusi untuk Goddesses dan kingdom jika kamu berhasil mengalahkan monster-monster dalam ruins.{nl}Tentu saja aku juga akan memberikan hadiah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It will not be bad to show us a good impression.{nl}Because this land is ruled by the Royal Army Guards.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak ada ruginya menunjukkan etikad baik kepada kami.{nl}Karena tanah ini dikuasai oleh kingdom soldiers.

Philipas' Soldier: It wasn't done by the thieves. We are moving the objects to places where they could be utilized.{nl}It will be way better than them disappearing from here.
Philip's Soldiers: Bukan pencuri yang melakukan ini. Kami memindahkan barang-barang ke tempat yang lebih bernilai.{nl}Ini jauh lebih baik daripada melarikan diri.

Philipas' Soldier: Not bad.{nl}I guess the rumors don't always get exaggerated.
Philip's Soldiers: Lumayan.{nl}Kurasa rumornya tidak berlebihan.

Philipas' Soldier: We are activating the detectors here because of irregular Petrifying Frost that are blowing,{nl}but, there are no soldiers who could check that due to a recent battle.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita sedang mengaktifkan alat pendeteksi disini karena adanya irregular Stone Frosts yang berhembus,{nl}tapi tidak ada tentara yang dapat memeriksa karena sedang ada pertempuran.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: So if you could do that for us, that will show us {nl}your loyalty to the kingdom and continue our efforts.
Philip's Soldiers: kalau kamu bisa melakukannya untuk kami,{nl}Itu akan menjadi bukti kesetiaan terhadap kingdom dan kamu bisa melanjutkan tekadmu.

Philipas' Soldier: There are monsters who try to go after the soldiers who maintain the device.{nl}Be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Disana ada monster yang menyerang para tentara yang sedang menjaga device.{nl}Hati-hati.

Philipas' Soldier: The Petrifying Frost are to be blown from the two places.{nl}I heard you are a quite famous Revelator. Aren't you?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Stone Frosts berhembus dari dua tempat.{nl}Kudengar kamu adalah Savior yang cukup terkenal. Benarkah?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: From some time ago, more soldiers are being attacked by Sparnashorn near the detectors.{nl}If you are the one from the rumor, you would be able to face against that monster.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sejak beberapa waktu lalu, ada lebih banyak tentara yang diserang oleh Sparnashorn di dekat detectors.{nl}Kalau rumor itu benar, Seharusnya kamu bsia mengatasi monster-monster disana.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Those soldiers are the ones who survived the Petrifying Frost and Sparnashorn.{nl}They can't fight against Sparnashorn since they paralyzed from fear. {nl}In this state they have no chance of defeating Sparnashorn.
Philip's Soldiers: Para tentara itu adalah mereka yang berhasil bertahan dari Stone Frosts dan Sparnashorn.{nl}Mereka tidak bisa melawan Sparnashorn karena mereka sudah buta akibat ketakutan. Mereka juga tidak bisa menang melawan Sparnashorn.

Philipas' Soldier: The Petrifying Frost has been delayed a bit.{nl}Whatever we do, there is no way to block the punishments that were brought by Ruklys.
Philip's Soldiers: Stone Frosts sedikit melambat.{nl}Apapun yang kita lakukan, Tidak ada yang bisa menghentikan kutukan Ruklys.

Philipas' Soldier: Now the only thing that remains is Sparnashorn... Defeat it quickly and get out of there.{nl}Even a great Revelator like you can not withstand the Petrifying Frost.
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang yang tersisa hanya Sparnashorn... Kalahkan dia lalu pergi dari sini.{nl}Bahkan Savior hebat seperti kamu tidak dapat bertahan dari Stone Frosts.

Philipas' Soldier: Retreating is also a tactic, but we can't always do it.{nl}We should finish it when we have an volunteer who is loyal and competent like you.
Philip's Soldiers: Mundur juga merupakan taktik, namun kita tidak bisa selalu seperti itu.{nl}Kita harus menyelesaikannya saat kita memiliki sukarelawan yang setia seperti kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Hearing that it was defeated is the most hopeful story I've heard in years. {nl}Now I better let the troops rest first and tell them the good news.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia berhasil dikalahkan! Ini adalah cerita paling penuh harapan yang dari semua yang pernah kudengar sampai saat ini. {nl}Saat ini sebaiknya aku membiarkan para tentara beristirahat dulu setelah itu aku akan menyampaikan kabar baik ini kepada mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Although I don't know you, I am glad to see you.{nl}It's good to be acquainted with someone here. Everyone should help each other out.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun aku tidak mengenal kamu, Namun aku senang bisa melihatmu.{nl}Saling mengenal adalah hal yang baik. Kita harus saling menolong sesama.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: For example, help cleaning the monsters at our workplace.{nl}The gathering place. What do you think? Can you help us?
Philip's Soldiers: Contohnya, Membantu membasmi para monster yang ada di tempat kerja kami.{nl}Tempat kami berkumpul. Bagaimana menurutmu? Kamu bisa membantu kami?

Philipas' Soldier: The kind of work I do is business secret so I can't tell you what it is.. {nl}No one owns these things anyway. Finders keep them if them if they need them.
Philip's Soldiers: Pekerjaanku adalah bisnis rahasia jadi aku tidak bisa memberitau kamu.. {nl}Lagipula ini tidak ada yang punya. Finders menyimpannya untuk mereka jika mereka membutuhkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: That fast? Have you not missed any of the monsters?{nl}Ahah. Those coward Royal Army Guards won't get near here so don't worry.
Philip's Soldiers: Secepat itu? Apakah tidak ada monster yang terlewatkan?{nl}Ahah. Para tentara kindgom pencecut itu tidak akan mendekati tempat ini jadi jangan khawatir.

Philipas' Soldier: You want to know how I got here? {nl}It's all because I have connections. There are some Royal Army Guards who buy claws of the monsters to raise their work records.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mau tau bagaimana aku bisa sampai disini? {nl}Itu karena aku punya koneksi. Ada sejumlah tentara kingdom yang membeli claw untuk meningkatkan kinerja mereka.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But actually, I don't want to be around those monsters. Especially here.{nl}If you could get me those claws, we will become really good friends.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi sebenarnya aku tidak ingin berada di sekitar monster-monster itu. Terutama disini.{nl}Kalau kamu bisa mendapatkan claw itu untukku, Kita bisa menjadi teman baik.

Philipas' Soldier: I think you are misunderstanding something.{nl}We are archaeologists, not thieves.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku rasa kamu salah paham.{nl}Kami adalah arkeolog, Bukan pencuri.

Philipas' Soldier: Thank you so much friend.{nl}Though this seems quite polished.
Philip's Soldiers: Terima kasih banyak kawan.{nl}Walaupun ini kelihatannya cukup dipoles.

Philipas' Soldier: I will tell you something. You better not think about getting something here.{nl}Aside from us, there is the outrageous Dico Thieves.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Akan kuberitau sesuatu kepadamu. Kamu sebaiknya tidak berpikir untuk mengambil sesuatu dari sini.{nl}Selain kami disini juga ada Dico Thieves.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I don't want to see them more than those Royal Army Guards.{nl}The goods they brought here from outside are piled up at the entrance route of the outer wall... {nl}What would occur if they all disappear?
Philip's Soldiers: Kingdom soldiers lebih baik dibanding mereka.{nl}Barang-barang curian mereka menumpuk di entrance route of the outer wall... {nl}Apa akibatnya kalau mereka menghilang?

Philipas' Soldier: I took a sneak peek, but it seems they haven't returned yet.{nl}Move fast.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah mengintip, kelihatannya mereka belum kembali.{nl}Cepatlah bergerak.

Philipas' Soldier: Seems like Dico Thieves are planning to do their business bigger than I thought. {nl}That's an enormous amount. Do you think they also have connections with the kingdom army?
Philip's Soldiers: Kelihatannya Dico Thieves berencana memperbesar bisnis mereka lebih dari dugaanku. {nl}Jumlahnya besar sekali. Apa kamu pikir mereka memiliki hubungan dengan tentara kingdom?

Philipas' Soldier: The terrible scene you can see in this city are the results of the rebellion that was carried out by Ruklys and the citizens 600 years ago.{nl}The Petrifying Frost that started to blow after suppressing the rebellion turn everything into stones.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Pemandangan buruk yang kamu lihat di sepanjang kota ini adalah akibat pemberontakan yang didalangi oleh Ruklys dan para penduduk 600 tahun yang lalu.{nl}Stone Frosts yang mulai berhembus sejak pemberontakan berakhir merubah semuanya menjadi batu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The kingdom would've been destroyed already if Premier Eminent wasn't present.{nl}If he was still alive... We may have got over these hard times sooner.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika tidak ada Premier Eminent, Kingdom sudah hancur.{nl}Kalau dia masih hidup... Mungkin kita bisa menyelesaikan masalah ini lebih cepat.

Philipas' Soldier: That's the scary wind that turns everything into stones.{nl}After Medzio Diena, the occurrence of the wind varied irregularly.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itu adalah angin menakutkan yang mampu mengubah semuanya menjadi batu.{nl}Setelah Medzio Diena, Angin itu muncul tanpa bisa ditebak.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Once you encounter the curse of the Petrifying Frost, you can't restore it.{nl}The sin of the traitor, Ruklys is that heavy.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sekali kamu terkena kutukan Stone Frosts, Kamu tidak akan pulih.{nl}Dosa sang pengkhianat Ruklys, memang seberat itu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Knights of Kaliss is trying to find a remedy...{nl}The curse continued for 600 years. I don't think there's a remedy.
Philip's Soldiers: The Knights of Kaliss berusaha mencari obatnya...{nl}Kutukannya berlanjut hingga 600 tahun. Aku pikir tidak ada obat untuk kutukan ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Sparnashorn appears with the wind of Petrifying Frost.{nl}To avoid the exhausted soldiers not get involved with it, we should avoid them fighting against Sparnashorn.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sparnashorn muncul seiring dengan angin Stone Frosts.{nl}Para tentara yang sudah kelelahan harusnya tidak boleh terlibat hal ini, Kita harus mencegah agar mereka tidak melawan Sparnashorn.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If we could eliminate the weak Petrifying Frost with this absorbing scroll at the great square, we may delay the time a bit.{nl}We would be able to lure Sparnashorn to the old market when the next Petrifying Frost blow.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kita bisa menghancurkan Stone Frosts yang melemah menggunakan absorbing scroll yang ada di great square, mungkin kita bisa menambah waktu.{nl}Mungkin kita bisa memancing Sparnashorn ke old market ketika Stone Frosts selanjutnya berhembus.

Philipas' Soldier: I've a friend who's supposed to come here but he's nowhere to be found.{nl}I think something happened.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku punya teman yang seharusnya datang kemari namun dia tidak bisa ditemukan dimanapun.{nl}Sepertinya telah terjadi sesuatu.

Philipas' Soldier: He is hiding among the guards near the great square.{nl}This water bottle has a code on it. If you give it to the guards, he'll know and talk to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia bersembunyi diantara para penjaga di sekitar great square.{nl}Water bottle ini memiliki kode. Kalau kamu bicara dengan para penjaga, Maka salah satu dari mereka akan tau kode ini.

Philipas' Soldier: He is hiding among the guards.{nl}This water bottle has a code on it. If you give it to the guards, he'll know and talk to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia bersembunyi diantara para penjaga di sekitar great square.{nl}Water bottle ini memiliki kode. Kalau kamu bicara dengan para penjaga, Maka salah satu dari mereka akan tau kode ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Hush! Lower your voice. It will be the end of both of us if we get caught.{nl}Did that stupid Juvertas send you here?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Huss! Pelankan suaramu. Kita berdua akan berakhir kalau ketahuan.{nl}Apakah si Juvertas bodoh itu yang mengirim kamu kesini?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I told him many times that I'd go back if I'm done with my work here.{nl}There is a big problem here actually.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku kan sudah bilang berulang kali kalau aku akan kembali setelah pekerjaanku disini selesai.{nl}Sebenarnya disini sedang ada masalah besar.

Philipas' Soldier: Our family can't come into the city from outside.{nl}We can't bring in my family without the troops knowing.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Keluarga kami tidak dapat masuk ke kota.{nl}Kami tidak dapat membawa mereka masuk tanpa ketahuan penjaga.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I'm going to make big fuss at the great square. I'm going to call in Saltistter that are roaming around the area. {nl}In order to do this, you need to gather scented stone powder from the monsters. Can you do it?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membuat kekacauan besar dalam great square. Aku akan memanggil Saltistter yang ada di sekitar sini. {nl}Untuk melakukan hal ini kamu harus mengumpulkan scented stone powder dari para monster. Kamu bisa melakukannya?

Philipas' Soldier: Our families should have passed this place earlier than the kingdom army. {nl}But Retia hurried things when the Petrifying Frost swept by some time ago so we weren't able to.
Philip's Soldiers: Seharusnya keluarga kami sudah sampai kesini lebih dulu dari kingdom army. {nl}Tapi Retia terburu-buru saat Stone Frosts bertiup jadi kami tidak dapat melakukannya.

Philipas' Soldier: If you pour this here, you will soon see the Saltistter show up its huge body itself.{nl}But that is not our plan.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu menyebarkannya disini, Saltistter akan langsung muncul.{nl}Tapi bukan itu rencana kita.

Philipas' Soldier: We should not make this place a battlefield. Then our families can't pass through.{nl}Let's rub this powder onto the Rambears that appear at the great square.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak boleh menjadikan tempat ini sebagai medan tempur. Karena keluarga-ku tidak akan bisa masuk.{nl}Ayo kita usapkan poweder ini ke Rambears yang muncul di great square.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Then Saltistter will attack Rambears. {nl}Retia will not just stand and watch her area be invaded like that.
Philip's Soldiers: Lalu Saltistter akan menyerang Rambears. {nl}Retia tidak akan tinggal diam melihat areanya diserang seperti itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Our families come from various areas.{nl}I was also once a junior officer with dreams to become a strategist.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Keluarga kami berasal dari berbagai area.{nl}Dulu aku adalah petugas junior yang bermimpi untuk menjadi strategist.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Of course, it was before the area I was assigned to completely disappeared from the map on Medzio Diena.
Philip's Soldiers: Tentu saja, Itu sebelum area tempatku bertugas menghilang dari peta Medzio Diena.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you use everything?{nl}Then now it's time to get busy!
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu sudah menggunakan semuanya?{nl}Sekarang saatnya membuat mereka sibuk!

Philipas' Soldier: Go to Retia and tell her that Saltistter is coming here.{nl}She won't believe it but I can already feel the Saltistter running at us. {nl}Hurry!
Philip's Soldiers: Pergilah kepada Retia dan bilang kalau Saltistter sedang menuju kesini.{nl}Dia tidak akan percaya tapi aku sudah bisa merasakan kalau Saltistter sedang berlari kearah sini. {nl}Cepatlah!

Philipas' Soldier: You just have to tell her that Saltistter is coming.{nl}There is no reason for her to suspect us.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu hanya perlu bilang kepadanya kalau Saltistter sedang datang.{nl}Tidak ada alasan baginya untuk mencurigai kita.

Philipas' Soldier: Our families passed through this place without any problems.{nl}Since you are still being trusted by our Royal Army Guards, you will not be discovered.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: keluarga-ku berhasil melewati tempat ini tanpa ada masalah.{nl}Saat ini kamu masih dipercaya oleh tentara kingdom, Jadi kamu tidak akan ketahuan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This city... you will find many interesting truths if you continue your journey in this area.{nl}And you may also meet our families.
Philip's Soldiers: Kota ini... Kamu akan menemukan banyak kenyataan menarik jika terus bertualang disini.{nl}Dan kamu juga bisa bertemu dengan keluarga-ku.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't want to be here either.{nl}I would not be here if I didn't receive the orders to support the Knights of Kaliss...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku juga tidak ingin berada disini.{nl}Aku tidak akan ada disini kalau aku tidak mendapatkan perintah untuk membantu Knights of Kaliss...{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Kostas has not come back for days so I can't leave this place.{nl}Also the monsters are running wild so I can't just stay still.
Philip's Soldiers: Kostas belum kembali sejak beberapa hari lalu jadi aku tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini.{nl}Para monster juga sedang mengamuk jadi aku tidak bisa diam saja.

Philipas' Soldier: We have to be here until Kostas comes back.{nl}There are lot of things to do, so I hope he comes back soon.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus tetap disini sampai Kostas kembali.{nl}Masih banyak yang harus dilakukan jadi kuharap dia cepat kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: The officers don't like the Knights of Kaliss. {nl}As for lower rank guards like me, the Knights of Kaliss give us supplies and supports so there's no reason for us to hate them.
Philip's Soldiers: Para officer tidak menyukai Knights of Kaliss. {nl}Bagi penjaga rendahan sepertiku, Knights of Kaliss sudah memberikan bantuan dan juga persediaan jadi tidak ada alasan untuk membenci mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: If we can find the Symbol of Silt, then we would be able to enter the area without any problems.
Philip's Soldiers: kalau kita dapat menemukan Symbol of Silt, Kita akan bisa memasuki area itu tanpa kesulitan.

Philipas' Soldier: I can't hear anything from Kostas.{nl}Ah... I don't know how I should report.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak mendengar apa apa dari kostas.{nl}Ah... Aku tidak tahu bagaimana harus melapor.

Philipas' Soldier: The Royal Army Guards, the Knights of Kaliss, and we graverobbers are forming an excellent balance.{nl}That's why people can at least walk around.. Before that, this place was not a place to stay.
Philip's Soldiers: Kerajaan para prajurit, Knights of Kaliss, dan kita graverobbers membentuk keseimbangan.{nl}Itulah mengapa orang orang bisa setidaknya berjalan disekitar.. Sebelum itu, tempat ini bukanlah tempat untuk tinggal.

Philipas' Soldier: Much of the city remained in its original form 600 years after the misfortune due to Petrifying Frost.{nl}One of my missions here is to clear the records of rebels remaining here.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Banyak kota tetap dalam bentuk aslinya 600 tahun setelah bencana karena Stone Frosts.{nl}Salah satu misiku disini untuk menghapus jejak para pemberontak disini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I can't leave my post since Kostas is not here.{nl}You can find many records if you look around the trade area so I want you to take care of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa meninggalkan pos ku karena Kostas tidak disini.{nl}Kamu bisa menemukan jejak jejak jika kamu mencari di sekitar trade area jadi aku ingin kamu menyingkirkan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Don't mind what's written on the records. {nl}It's all nonsense.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir apa yang tertulis di catatan. {nl}Itu semua tidak masuk akal.

Philipas' Soldier: I have to escort, clean up, and guard. I wonder how they are expecting me to do everything alone. {nl}It's a good thing you came to help.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku harus mengawal, membersihkan, dan melindungi. Aku bertanya-tanya bagaimana mereka mengharapkan aku untuk melakukan segala sesuatu sendiri. {nl}Untung kamu datang untuk menolong.

Philipas' Soldier: It is an old story,{nl}but many Royal Army Guards came to this place to do a preliminary check to support for the research on the Knights of Kaliss.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Itu cerita lama,{nl}tetapi banyak prajurit kerajaan datang ke tempat ini memulai pengecekan awal untuk mendukung riset Knight of Kaliss.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But, unlike their expectations, the Petrifying Frost were waiting for them.{nl}They died there... I want to get their keepsakes, but it's hard...
Philip's Soldiers: tetapi, tidak seperti harapan mereka, Stone Frosts telah menunggu mereka.{nl}Mereka mati disini... Aku ingin mendapatkan kenang kenangan mereka, tetapi itu sulit...

Philipas' Soldier: The authorities do not take it well that tens of soldiers were sacrificed for support activities. {nl}That's why the kingdom army and the Knights of Kaliss have become distant.
Philip's Soldiers: Pihak berwenang tidak menanggapi dengan baik bahwa banyak tentara yang dikorbankan untuk mendukung penelitian. {nl}Itu sebabnya tentara kerajaan dan Ksatria Kaliss telah menjadi jauh.

Philipas' Soldier: Good thing I was off duty that day.. I don't even want to think about it.{nl}I will deliver this to the families of the deceased.
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya aku tidak bekerja pada hari itu.. Aku bahkan tidak mau memikirkan soal itu.{nl}Aku akan memberikan ini kepada keluarga almarhum.

Philipas' Soldier: Gofden...{nl}The Silt Certificate... Ah sorry I talked alone in front of you.{nl}When you are carrying this, you will not receive the curse of the Petrifying Frost. Don't you think it's amazing?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Gofden...{nl}Sertifikat Silt... Ah maaf aku berbicara sendiri didepan kamu.{nl}Saat kamu membawa ini, kamu tidak akan menerima kutukan dari Stone Frosts. Menakjubkan bukan ?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: People say you go around to save the world according to the will of goddess?{nl}Then you could save also save this city!
Philip's Soldiers: Orang bilang kamu pergi berpetualang untuk menyelamatkan dunia karena kehendak Goddess ?{nl}Kamu pun bisa menyelamatkan kota ini!

Philipas' Soldier: Our employer does not support us any other funds besides the research funds to revive the city.{nl}That's why the wizards like me, who want to come up with some results are researching while avoiding the eyes of the Royal Army Guards and the Knights of Kaliss.
Philip's Soldiers: Majikan kami tidak mendukung kami setiap ada dana lain selain dana penelitian untuk menghidupkan kembali kota.{nl}Itulah kenapa para Wizard menyukai kita, siapa yang mau dengan beberapa hasil yang meneliti sambil menghindari pengawasan tentara kerajaan dan Ksatria Kaliss.

Philipas' Soldier: This will be enough.{nl}Good. Let's combine this with the Symbol of Silt.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sudah cukup.{nl}Bagus. Mari menggabungkan ini dengan Symbol of Silt.

Philipas' Soldier: We've succeeded the combination... but I can't predict how effective this would be.{nl}I will give you the Symbol of Silt so try using it on the monsters in this area.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita telah berhasil menggabungkan... Tetapi aku tidak bisa menebak betapa efektifnya ini.{nl}Aku akan memberikan kamu Symbol of Silt coba gunakan itu kepada monster di area ini.

Philipas' Soldier: If it's effective, then something would react to it.{nl}Maybe since the effects for the Petrifying Frost disappeared, it could take little faster. Anyways, I am counting on you.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika efektif, akan ada yang bereaksi.{nl}Mungkin semenjak efek untuk Stone Frosts menghilang, itu mungkin memakan waktu sedikit cepat. Ngomong ngomong, Aku berharap padamu.

Philipas' Soldier: Since I handed over the Symbol of Silt to you, I am gonna be dead when the Petrifying Frost blow here.{nl}Please finish the task as quickly as possible.
Philip's Soldiers: Semenjak aku memberikan kamu Syombol of Silt kepadamu, Aku akan mati jika Stone Frosts disini.{nl}Tolong selesaikan misi ini secepat mungkin.

Philipas' Soldier: So it was effective right?{nl}Then now, I will amplify it!
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi itu efektif kan ??{nl}Sekarang, Aku akan memperkuatnya!

Philipas' Soldier: Ah... I almost forgot.{nl}Even if I amplify the Symbol of Silt with the reacting stone, the power doesn't last eternally.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ah... Aku hampir lupa.{nl}Jika aku memperkuat Symbol of Silt dengan Reacting STone, kekuatannya tidak berlangsung lama.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Good, good... I will activate it only when the Petrifying Frost blow.{nl}I should obtain the detector somewhere.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus, bagus... Aku akan mengaktifkannya hanya pada saat Stone Frosts meledak.{nl}Aku harus menemukan detector disuatu tempat.

Philipas' Soldier: If you could bring me the detector, I will do the rest.{nl}You've contributed a lot in this experiment so I will give you the effects of the Symbol of Silt.{nl}Although it would not last long...
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu bisa membawakan detektor, aku akan melakukan sisanya.{nl}Kamu telah berkontribusi banyak di eksperimen ini Aku akan memberikan efek Symbol of Silt.{nl}Meskipun itu tidak bertahan lama...

Philipas' Soldier: There were experiments in the past.{nl}At Roxona Reconstruction Agency, there was a separate laboratory to research on the curse of the Petrifying Frost.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada eksperimen dimasa lalu.{nl}di Roxona Reconstruction Agency, ada laboratorium yang terpisah untuk meneliti kutukan dari Stone Frosts.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But then demons rushed in...{nl}Most of them were killed by the demons or became petrified on the experimental devices.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi para demon menyerang...{nl}Sebagian dari mereka terbunuh oleh Demon atau membatu di Experimental Devices.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This Symbol of Silt... it reminds me of many things.{nl}It was too bad since the results of the experiments were appearing at that time.
Philip's Soldiers: Symbol of Silt ini... Itu mengingatkanku akan banyak hal.{nl}sayang sekali semenjak hasil dari experimen menghilang pada saat itu.

Philipas' Soldier: They told me to protect the objects that are gathered at Gerove Workshop Site.{nl}Do you think this makes sense? Why don't they ask the monsters to protect it instead?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka berkata padaku untuk melindungi objek yang berkumpul di sekitar Gerove Workshop Site.{nl}Apakah kamu pikir ini masuk akal? Kenapa mereka tidak meminta para monster untuk melindungi ?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Ah! We should just do it like that.{nl}Hey, could you help me a bit?
Philip's Soldiers: Ah! Kita harus melakukannya seperti itu.{nl}Hey, bisakah kamu menolongku sedikit?

Philipas' Soldier: It's a good thing the cowardly Dico Thieves did not reach here yet.{nl}Things are limited but people are coming in flocks to take them away..
Philip's Soldiers: Itu hal bagus pencuri Dico belum sampai kesini.{nl}ada hal terbatas tetapi orang orang datang untuk mengambilnya..

Philipas' Soldier: If it's cleared up that much, then looks like I can start already.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika itu sudah selesai, lalu sepertinya aku bisa memulainya.

Philipas' Soldier: There are some boxes that our thieves left at Gerove Workshop.{nl}When you rub Bellas grass onto them, the monsters would rush in.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada beberapa peti yang pencuri tinggalkan di Gerove Workshop.{nl}Saat kamu mengoleskan Bellas Grass ke mereka, Para monster akan menyerang.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But, you gotta be careful.{nl}The monsters would not treat you preciously so run away after attacking them a little.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi, kamu harus berhati hati.{nl}Para monster tidak akan memperlakukan kamu dengan baik jadi menjauh setelah menyerang mereka sedikit.

Philipas' Soldier: I think I can leave this place for a while because of you.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku pikir aku bisa meninggalkan tempat ini sementar karena kamu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You haven't seen Dico Thieves right?{nl}In fact, I haven't seen them as well, but Amanda told you to be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu belum melihat Pencuri Dico kan ?{nl}Kenyataannya, Aku juga belum melihatnya, tetapi Amanda berkata untuk berhati hati.

Philipas' Soldier: Please take care of the monsters in the military district while I prepare the test. {nl}We should not be caught or interfered.
Philip's Soldiers: Tolong singkirkan Monster di Military District sementara aku menyiapkan tes. {nl}Kita tidak boleh tertangkap atau terganggu.

Philipas' Soldier: It's relatively safe on top of the fortress.{nl}There are monsters and thieves swarming if you leave this place.{nl}Of course, the Royal Army Guards as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Itu relativ aman di atas fortress.{nl}Ada monster dan pencuri berkeliaran di tempat ini.{nl}Tentu saja, prajurit kerajaan juga.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't like it, having to guard here with the Knights of Kaliss around.{nl}You will never understand what it feels like to guard here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak menyukainya, harus menjaga disini dengan Knights of Kaliss berkeliaran.{nl}Kamu tidak akan tahu rasanya menjaga disini.

Philipas' Soldier: Until now, I am sure that you've only seen the artifacts that stopped their time.{nl}But, it will be different from this point on since I came here.
Philip's Soldiers: Sampai sekarang, Aku yakin kamu hanya melihat artifak yang memberhentikan waktu mereka.{nl}Tetapi, ini akan berbeda dari sekarang semenjak aku disini.

Philipas' Soldier: I will proceed the test from up here.{nl}Please go to the portal and activate it.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan melanjutkan tes dari atas sini.{nl}Tolong pergi ke portal dan aktifkan itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Don't worry too much.{nl}Everything is just your memories at then so they won't do any harms to you.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan khawatir terlalu banyak.{nl}Semuanya hanya dalam kenangan kamu jadi mereka tidak akan mencelakakan kamu.

Philipas' Soldier: I am sorry. Aren't you hurt somewhere?{nl}I didn't know it would go over my expectations.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku minta maaf. Apakah kamu terluka?{nl}Aku tidak mengira itu akan melebihi ekspektasiku.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What was that... demons? Are they really demons?{nl}I have no way of knowing. I guess I will have to tune up the portal that leads to the Fortress of the Land.
Philip's Soldiers: Apa itu... Demon? Apakah mereka benar benar Demon?{nl}Aku tidak mungkin tahu. Aku kira aku akan memperbaiki portal yang menuju ke Earth Fortress.

Philipas' Soldier: It is little dangerous... but, I want to suggest a deal to you.{nl}We are actually cooperating with Amanda thieves. Yes. I know it's insane.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini sedikit berbahaya... tetapi, Aku ingin membuat penawaran kepada kamu.{nl}Kita sebenarnya bekerja sama dengan Pencuri Amanda. Ya. Aku tahu itu gila.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: To obtain what you want, you should take this risk.{nl}Just help Amanda thieves to enter into the city.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk menemukan yang kamu inginkan, kamu harus berani mengambil resiko.{nl}Tolong Pencuri Amanda memasuki kota.

Philipas' Soldier: Would dead people come back if the curse is cured in this city?{nl}No, but the times after now are more important.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah orang yang sudah mati akan kembali jika kutukan dikota ini dihilangkan?{nl}Tidak, tetapi waktu setealh sekarang lebih penting.

Philipas' Soldier: We feel like we are risking our lives every seconds.{nl}But we continuously watch over so that nothing will go wrong.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya kita membahayakan hidup kita setiap detik.{nl}Tetapi kita terus memantau jadi tidak akan ada yang salah.

Philipas' Soldier: We're different from those Dico Thieves.{nl}If you help well this time, I will surely pay you back someday.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita berbeda dari mereka para Pencuri Dico.{nl}Jika kamu menolongku dengan baik, Aku akan membayarnya suatu saat.

Philipas' Soldier: The guards were asking what the fuss was all about so I told them about you. {nl}Everything should be alright.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Para penjaga bertanya apa yang sedang terjadi jadi aku menceritakan kepada mereka tentang kamu. {nl}Seharusnya semuanya akan baik baik saja.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: If you watch over the city from here, it feels like the time has stopped.{nl}However, many incidents are occurring everyday.{nl}{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu mengamati kota dari sini, itu terasa sepertinya waktu berhenti.{nl}Bagaimanapun, banyak kejadian terjadi setiap hari.{nl}{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We need to bring Stephonas here.{nl}He promised to get us the frost core which will help in studying the Petrifying Frost.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita perlu membawa Steponas kesini.{nl}Dia berjanji dengan kita membawakan frost core yang akan menolong mempelajari Stone Frosts.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We should empty the watermill ruins, but I might be suspected if I carry out the work...{nl}Since you are respected by the Royal Army Guards, I want you to help me.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus mengosongkan Watermill Ruins, tetapi aku mungkin menjadi tersangka jika aku meneruskan pekerjaan itu...{nl}Semenjak kamu dihormati oleh para prajurit kerajaan, Aku ingin kamu menolongku.

Philipas' Soldier: They will reduce their boundaries as they are get attacked.{nl}Or bring a huge army in...but, they won't be able to do that with the current state of the kingdom.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka akan mengurangi batasan mereka karena mereka diserang.{nl}Atau membawa pasukan yang banyakâ€¦tetapi, mereka tidak akan bisa melakukan itu dengan status mereka yang seperti itu di kerajaan.

Philipas' Soldier: Now, please lure the guards at the watermill ruins.{nl}Just tell them the monsters are going crazy at Estuary Bank Three Ways.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sekarang, tolong pancing penjaga di watermill ruins.{nl}Katakan pada mereka monster menjadi gila di Estuary Bank Three Ways.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Stephonas will pass by secretly.{nl}Of course, you will receive their respects.
Philip's Soldiers: Steponas akan melewati dengan diam diam.{nl}Tentu saja, kamu akan menerima penghormatan dari mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Rofdel will be watching from the watchtower but on a foggy day like this, it's useless.
Philip's Soldiers: Rofdel akan mengawasi dari menara pengawas tetapi di hari yang berkabut seperti ini, itu sia sia.

Philipas' Soldier: Stephonas passed through safely.{nl}He was looking for you. Go and help him.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Steponas lewat dengan aman.{nl}Dia mencari kamu. Pergi dan tolong dia.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The guards won't mention our names to Rofdel.{nl}What they have been taking until now was all against the military law.
Philip's Soldiers: Para penjaga tidak akan menybut nama kita ke Rofdel.{nl}Apa yang mereka bicarakan sekarang melanggar semua peraturan militer.

Philipas' Soldier: Have you seen the records that are remaining in this city? Didn't they feel somewhat strange...{nl}The Knights of Kaliss are collecting the records which the Royal Army Guards have not yet eliminated.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sudahkah kamu melihat jejak jejak yang tersisa di kota ini? Bukankah mereka merasa aneh...{nl}Knights of Kaliss mengumpulkan catatan yang prajurit kerajaan belum singkirkan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I have a request. Please gather the propagandas which the Royal Army Guards circulated.{nl}When we compare those with the records that we've gathered, we will find something lacking.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mempunyai permintaan. Toloong kumpulkan propaganda yang dibagikan oleh para prajurit kerajaan{nl}Saat kita membandingkan itu dengan catatan yang kita kumpulkan, kita akan menemukan sesuatu.

Philipas' Soldier: As the defeat of Ruklys became more and more concrete, the Royal Army Guards circulated the propagandas more.{nl}There must be some propagandas left in the Petrifying Frost as well.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan of Ruklys became more and more concrete, the kingdom soldiers circulated the propagandas more.{nl}There must be some propagandas left in the Stone Frosts as well.

Philipas' Soldier: They made such embarrassing stories sound like a heroic epic to the ignorant people. {nl}600 years have passed, but they are still embarrassing.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka membuat cerita yang memalukan seperti pahlawan untuk para orang orang yang tidak peduli. {nl}600 tahun telah berlalu, tetapi mereka masih memalukan.

Philipas' Soldier: You're the one who made me an opportunity.{nl}But, what the hell. I never heard there were so many guards here.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu lah satu satunya yang memberikanku peluang.{nl}Tetapi, yang benar saja. Aku tidak pernah mendengar ada banyak penjaga disekitar sini.

Philipas' Soldier: I need your help. I need a more powerful bomb.{nl}The frost core that I promised with the Knights of Kaliss is inside the body of Stone Froster.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku membutuhkan pertolonganmu. Aku butuh bom yang lebih kuat.{nl}Frost Core yang aku janjikan dengan Knights of Kaliss berada didalam tubuh Stone Froster.

Philipas' Soldier: Just do as I told you. {nl}If it's not the bomb, we can't pull out the frost core.
Philip's Soldiers: Lakukan apa yang aku katakan. {nl}Jika bukan karena bom, kita tidak bisa menarik frost core.

Philipas' Soldier: The purity level is not satisfactory.{nl}It could take some time.
Philip's Soldiers: Level pemurnian tidak memuaskan.{nl}Akan memakan beberapa waktu.
