Philip's Soldiers: Mulai saat ini, Evoniphon tidak akan dilindungi oleh Tyla Monastery dan kami meminta Evoniphon untuk segera pergi.{nl}Juga kami tidak akan terlibat dengan keputusan lain menghukumnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope the goddessess will be with you on your rest of journey.
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga Goddess memberkati perjalananmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Besides from the expulsion, we can't forgive his actions that ruined the monastery.{nl}We should find him since he should be here somewhere.
Philip's Soldiers: Selain masalah pengusiran, kita tidak bisa memaafkan tindakannya menghancurkan monastery.{nl}Kita harus menemukannya karena dia pasti ada disekitar sini.

Philipas' Soldier: He made the monastery like this due to that letter. {nl}Please be careful.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia membuat monastery seperti ini karena surat itu. {nl}Berhati-hatilah.

Philipas' Soldier: He is so cunning..{nl}The Hunters are surrounding this place so he will get caught within a short period of time.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia sangat licik..{nl}Hunter mengepung tempat ini jadi dia akan tertangkap sebentar lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: We would have had hard time without your help.{nl}Thank you so much for your efforts. I pray that the goddesses be with you on your journey.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami akan kesulitan tanpa bantuanmu.{nl}Terimakasih atas bantuanmu. Semoga Goddess memberkati perjalananmu.

Philipas' Soldier: If it wasn't for your help, the circumstances would have not been like this.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau bukan karena bantuanmu, keadaanya tidak akan seperti ini.

Philipas' Soldier: I've read it from the book before. {nl}Some smell has the power to pull the monsters.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah membaca dari buku sebelumnya. {nl}Beberapa bau bisa memancing beberapa monster.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I should've noticed when Evoniphon brought that lump... I didn't expect that would be enlarged this big...{nl}We are eliminating them as we see them, but I want you to help us as well.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Seharusnya aku tahu saat Evoniphon bawa gumpalan ituâ€¦ Aku tidak menyangka akan menjadi sebesar ini...{nl}Kami langsung menghabisi mereka saat melihatnya, tapi kami butuh bantuanmu juga.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We are luring the monsters with the smell so it won't be effective if you just destroy them.{nl}Please destroy the lumps using this liquid medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: Kami memancing dengan bau ini jadi tidak akan terpengaruh jika kamu menghancurkan mereka.{nl}Tolong hancurkan gumpalan ini dengan obat cair.

Philipas' Soldier: When I saw it, it was about the size of my palm so I don't understand how it got that big.{nl}This is all my fault...
Philip's Soldiers: Saat aku melihatnya, ukurannya sekepalan tanganku jadi aku tidak mengerti kenapa bisa sebesar ini.{nl}Ini semua salahku...

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know how long it would take to drive those monsters out...{nl}But now is the time to start.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahu berapa lama waktu yang dibutuhkan untuk memancing monster itu keluar...{nl}Tapi sekarang saatnya untuk mulai.

Philipas' Soldier: We were able to retrieve the monastery, but as you can see there are still full of monsters.{nl}Could you help us little more?
Philip's Soldiers: Kami berhasil mendapatkan kembali monastery, tapi seperti yang kamu lihat disana masih dipenuhi para monster.{nl}Bisakah kamu membantu kami lagi?

Philipas' Soldier: Orange Kowaks inside the monastery are most problematic.{nl}They are the most violent and vicious monsters among the monsters that came into the monastery.
Philip's Soldiers: Orange Kowaks didalam monastery masalah utamanya.{nl}Mereka monster kejam dan paling kuat diantara monster yang ada di monastery.

Philipas' Soldier: They are still inside.{nl}Please eliminate the monsters including them.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka masih didalam.{nl}Kalahkan semua monster.

Philipas' Soldier: The number of monsters won't increase from this point on.{nl}But, in order to eliminate them completely, we would need lots of time.
Philip's Soldiers: Jumlah monster tidak akan bertambah mulai saat ini.{nl}Tapi, untuk benar-benar mengalahkan mereka, kita butuh banyak waktu.

Philipas' Soldier: The goddesses helped us to retrieve the monastery.{nl}Lots of other sacred places are still occupied by many monsters.
Philip's Soldiers: Goddesses membantu kita mendapatkan kembali monastery.{nl}Banyak tempat suci yang masih dikuasai oleh banyak monster.

Philipas' Soldier: It's a mess. {nl}The monsters are sweeping across the monastery so the books are all scattered.
Philip's Soldiers: Kacau sekali. {nl}Monster berjaga sepanjang monastery jadi semua buku berantakan.

Philipas' Soldier: When would we able to gather all these books again and divide them into different categories...{nl}If you pick up scriptures, please bring them to me.
Philip's Soldiers: Kapan kita bisa mengumpulkan semua buku ini lagi dan membaginya menjadi kategori yang berbeda...{nl}Kalau kamu mengambil scripture, bawakan padaku.

Philipas' Soldier: You don't have to try hard.{nl}I can collect them.
Philip's Soldiers: kamu tidak harus mencobanya.{nl}Aku bisa mengumpulkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Thanks.{nl}We should be able to gather all of them again right?
Philip's Soldiers: Thanks.{nl}Kita bisa mengumpulkannya lagi kan?

Philip's Soldiers: Telah membakar Incense burner sesuai permintaan Bokor Edita. Kembalilah pada Edita.

Philipas' Soldier: Use the melting solution to the monsters at Neiveikiama Castle
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan melting solution ke monster di Nevekia Fortress

Philipas' Soldier: Report to the Alchemist Saliamonas
Philip's Soldiers: Laporkan ke Alchemist Saliamonas

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu  menggunakan melting solution pada monster seperti yang disuruh Saliamonas, tapi kamu membuat mereka mawah. Kembali ke Saliamonas.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the samples of the petrification from the monsters in Neiveikiama Castle
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan sample petrification dari monster di Nevekia Fortress

Philipas' Soldier: Saliamonas asked you to obtain the petrification samples by defeating the monsters at Neiveikiama Castle for the experiment of the new medicine.
Philip's Soldiers: Saliamonas memintamu mendapatkan sampel petrification dengan mengalahkan monster di benteng Nebekia untuk percobaan obat baru.

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected enough petrification samples as requested by Saliamonas. Let's go back to Saliamonas.
Philip's Soldiers: kamu sudah mengumpulkan cukup sampel petrification seperti yang diminta Saliamonas. Kembali ke Saliamonas.

Philipas' Soldier: Deal with elite monsters north of Neiveikiama Castle
Philip's Soldiers: Bunuh Elite Monster di Nevekia Castle bagian atas

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Tetraox, who was hiding in the altar.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Tetraox, yang bersembunyi di altar.

Philipas' Soldier: Tetraox was hiding in this altar, rather than the restrained souls of the pilgrims. Defeat Tetraox.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetraox sembunyi di altar ini,  dari jiwa-jiwa orang-orang yang tertahan. Kalahkan Tetraox.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the Tetraox that hid in the altar
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Tetraox yang sembunyi di altar

Philipas' Soldier: This sanctum also seems corrupted. Go to the Pardoner Master for advice. You can move to the Pardoner Master easily if you buy the warp scroll from the stand right beside you.
Philip's Soldiers: Tempat suci ini rusak juga. Pergi ke Pardoner Master untuk meminta saran. Kamu bisa pindah dengan ke Pardoner Master dengan mudah jika kamu membeli warp scroll dari orang yang ada di sampingmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Disciple Laius
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Disciple Laius

Philipas' Soldier: Disciple Laius is waiting for someone's help. Talk to Disciple Raius.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Laius menunggu bantuan. Bicara dengan Disciple Raius.

Philipas' Soldier: Search for the orb that can contain vigor
Philip's Soldiers: Cari orb yang dapat menyimpan vigor

Philipas' Soldier: Disciple Laius wants to complete the orb that can contain the vigor to look for the object which the master had left. {nl}First, look for the orb that can contain vigor from the box.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Laius ingin menyelesaikan orb yang dapat menyimpan vigor untuk mencari benda yang ditinggalkan master. {nl}Pertama, cari orb yang dapat menyimpan vigor dari kotak.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand it over to Disciple Laius
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan ke Disciple Laius

Philipas' Soldier: You've found an orb that can contain vigor. Take it to Disciple Laius.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah menemukan orb yang dapat menyimpan vigor. Berikan ke Disciple Laius.

Philipas' Soldier: You've created an orb that can contain vigor. Ask Disciple Laius how to use it from now on.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah membuat orb yang dapat menyimpan cigor. Tanyakan Disciple Laius cara menggunakannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Absorb vigor from the monsters
Philip's Soldiers: Serap vigor dari monster

Philipas' Soldier: In order to summon the guide stone of the wisdom, Disciple Laius told you that he would need the vigor of the dead one. Use the orb that can contain the vigor of the monsters to absorb the vigor.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk summon guide stone of the wisdom, Disciple Laius mengatakan bahwa dia mungkin membutuhkan vigor dari yang telah mati. Gunakan orb yang berisi vogor monster untuk menyerap vigor.

Philipas' Soldier: The vigor has been accumulated enough. Talk to Raius what to do with the collected vigor.
Philip's Soldiers: Vigor yang terkumpul sudah cukup. Bicara dengan Raius apa yang harus dilakukan dengan vigor yang sudah terkumpul.

Philipas' Soldier: Listen from the Disciple Laius what to do with the vigor that is collected in the orb.
Philip's Soldiers: Dengarkan petunjuk dari Disciple Laius tentang apa yang harus dilakukan dengan orb yang sudah terkumpul.

Philipas' Soldier: Inject the vigor into the crystal of the hardened astral body
Philip's Soldiers: Masukkan vigor kedalam crystal tubuh astral

Philipas' Soldier: Inject the collected vigor into the crystal of the hardened astral body at Maras Stone Cahmber to summon the guide stone of the wisdom.
Philip's Soldiers: Masukkan vigor yang terkumpul kedalam crystal tubuh astral yang mengeras ke Maras Stone Cahmber untuk summon  guide stone of the wisdom.

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mendapatkan guide stone of the wisdom. Temui Disciple Hones dan bicara dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain %s from the crystal of the hardened astral body
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan %s dari crystal tubuh astral yang mengeras

Philip's Soldiers: Minta Disciple Hones memberikan petunjuk master mana yang pergi.

Philip's Soldiers: Periksa catatan master mana yang telah pergi

Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Hones memberitahumu bahwa Disciple Laius salah paham tentang sesuatu. Untuk mengetahui yang sebenarnya, periksa beberapa catatan dari persembunyian aster.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that what Disciple Hones told you is right as you looked at the records which the master left for you. Return to Disciple Hones and talk to him again.
Philip's Soldiers: Yang dikatakan Disciple Hones padamu memang benar seperti yang terlihat pada catatan yang ditinggalkan master untukmu. Kembali ke Disciple Hones dan bicara dengannya lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Preparations for dangerous search
Philip's Soldiers: Persiapan pencarian berbahaya

Philipas' Soldier: You may listen the truths from Disciple Hones. Talk to Disciple Hones.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu bisa mendengarkan kebenaran dari Disciple Hones. Bicara dengan Disciple Hones.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect the Eyes of Truth fragments
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Eyes of Truth fragments

Philip's Soldiers: Eyes of the truth yang melihat astral body hancur karena serangan monster. Gunakan guide stone of the wisdom untuk mengalahkan monster yang mempunyai eyes of the truth dan kumpulkan fragment.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand them over to Disciple Hones
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan ke Disciple Hones

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected all fragments of the Eyes of Truth. Go see Disciple Hones and restore the Eyes of Truth.
Philip's Soldiers: kamu telah mengumpulkan semua fragment Eyes of Truth. Pergi temui Disciple Hones dan kembalikan Eyes of Truth.

Philipas' Soldier: You've completed the Eyes of Truth. Ask Disciple Hones what you should see.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menyelesaikan Eyes of Truth. Tanyakan Disciple Hones apa yang harus kamu cari.

Philipas' Soldier: Obtain the Soul Crystal by defeating Shadowgaler
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Soul Crystal dengan mengalahkan Shadowgaler

Philipas' Soldier: Disciple Hones claims that it is in the possession of mentor Shadowgaler.
Philip's Soldiers: Student Hones berkata Master ShadowGaoler yang memilikinya.

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained the Soul Crystal. Return to Disciple Hones and listen to what he has to say.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mendapatkan Soul Crystal. Kembali ke Disciple Hones dan dengarkan apa yang ia katakan.

Philipas' Soldier: Tell him about what you heard from Hones and the diary of the master.
Philip's Soldiers: Beritahu dia apa yang kamu dengar dari Hones dan diary master.

Philipas' Soldier: Spatial Magic Gem of Contract
Philip's Soldiers: Spatial Magic Gem of Contract

Philipas' Soldier: Examine the Magic Gem Fusion Device
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa Magic Gem Fusion Device

Philip's Soldiers: Menurut memo Disciple Hones, kamu harus menggabungkan tiga Spatial Magic Gem kedalam Magic Gem Fusion Device.{nl}Periksa Magic Gem Fusion Device.

Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan kembali fragment Spatial Magic Gem of Contract

Philip's Soldiers: Honas Memo : Jika telah mengumpulkan seluruh Contract's Magic Stone Fragment, pergilah ke Forgotten Priest's Grave. Kau dapat memulihkan Magic Stone pada Preserve Magic Circle yang ada di tempat itu.

Philip's Soldiers: Masukkan Spatial Magic Gem kedalam Magic Gem Fusion Device

Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Jika kamu menemukan spatial magic gem, kembali ke fusion device. Jika kamu memasukkan semua magic gems, cara untuk menemukan riset master akan terbuka.

Philipas' Soldier: Restore %s
Philip's Soldiers: Restore %s

Philip's Soldiers: Spatial Magic Gem of Promise

Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Condensed Spite

Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Spatial Magic Gem of Promise bisa ditemukan di Siaura Mine. Pertama, gunakan Soul Crystal pada monster dan kumpulkan Condensed Spite.

Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Barrier Stone di Siaura Mine

Philipas' Soldier: Hones' Memo : Destroy the barrier stone at Siaura Mine with the Condensed Spite. The Black Chaser will start pursuing you from behind, avoid it and go to the end of the mine. You will be able to find the Spatial Magic Gem of Promise there.
Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Hancurkan barrier stone di Siaura Mine dengan Condensed Spite. Black Chaser akan mulai mengejarmu dari belakang, hinda dan pergi ke ujung tambang. Kamu akan bisa menemukan Spatial Magic Gem of Promise disana.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Barrier Stone
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Barrier Stone

Philipas' Soldier: The protective layer that was protecting the Barrier Stone has disappeared. Destroy the Barrier Stone and obtain the Sealed Spatial Magic Gem.
Philip's Soldiers: Lapisan pelindung yang melindungi Barrier Stone telah muncul. Hancurkan Barrier Stone dan dapatkan Sealed Spatial Magic Gem.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve the Sealed Spatial Magic Gem by avoiding the Black Chaser
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Sealed Spatial Magic Gem dengan menghindari Black Chaser

Philip's Soldiers: Spatial Magic Gem of Offer

Philip's Soldiers: Temukan Templeshooter di Shrine of Remembrance

Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Templeshooter di Shrine of Remembrance pasti memiliki Spatial Magic Gem of Offer. Wisdom Guiding Stone akan membantumu mencari Templeshooter.

Philip's Soldiers: Temukan Templeshooter menggunakan Wisdom Guiding Stone

Philip's Soldiers: Aktifkan Magic Gem Fusion Device

Philip's Soldiers: kamu sudah mengumpulkan semua Spatial Magic Gems. Aktifkan Magic Gem Fusion Device dan membuat Completed Spatial Magic Gem.

Philipas' Soldier: Hones' Memo : When you find all three Spatial Magic Gems, go back to the fusion device. When you insert all Magic Gems, the way to find the research of the master will be opened at Laudi Tower.
Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Jika kamu menemukan semua tiga Spatial Magic Gems, kembali ke fusion device. Jika kamu memasukkan semua Magic Gems, cara menemukan riset master akan terbuka di Laudi Tower.

Philip's Soldiers: Periksa peninggalan master

Philipas' Soldier: You have obtained the inheritance of the master. Tell Disciple Hones about what have happened until now.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mendapatkan peninggalan master. Beritahu Disciple Hones tentang apa yang terjadi hingga saat ini.

Philip's Soldiers: Ingin Bicara

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan wandering spirit

Philip's Soldiers: Ada jiwa pengelana di Videntis Shrine. Tanyakan kenapa dia berkelana.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for clues nearby
Philip's Soldiers: Cari petunjuk sekitar

Philipas' Soldier: The spirit tried to say something, but it soon disappeared. Search for more clues nearby.
Philip's Soldiers: Spirit ingin mengatakan sesuatu, tapi lalu menghilang. Temukan petunjuk yang ada di sekitar.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with Kupole Vita
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Kupole Vita

Philipas' Soldier: You found Kupole Vita while she is looking for something. Ask her what she is looking for.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu menemukan Kupole Vita saat dia mencari sesuatu. Tanyakan apa yang dia cari.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for the remaining spirits and talk to them
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan spirit yang tersisa dan bicara dengannya

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Vita told you that she came to look for spirits who vanished. Look for the remaining spirits and talk to them.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Vita mengatakan bahwa dia datang untuk mencari spirit yang menghilang. Temukan spirit yang tersisa dan bicara dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for an object that the spirits were describing
Philip's Soldiers: Cari benda yang digambarkan oleh spirit

Philipas' Soldier: The vanished spirits left without saying any word. Look for an object with clues that the remaining spirits told you.
Philip's Soldiers: Spirit yang hilang pergi tanpa mengatakan apapun. Temukan benda dengan petunjuk yang dikatakan oleh spirit yang tersisa.

Philipas' Soldier: You've found the Pot of Silence that the spirits seem to have talked about. But there is some ominous energy is surrounding it, talk with Kupole Vita on how to dispose it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menemukan Pot of Silence yang dibicarakan oleh spirit. Tapi ada energi menakutkan disekitarnya, bicara dengan Kupole Vita cara menghilangkannya.

Philipas' Soldier: Eliminate the ominous energy that is condensing around the Pot of Silence
Philip's Soldiers: Hilangkan energi jahat yang mengitari sekitar Pot of Silence

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Vita told you that the ominous energy from the Pot of Silence is so powerful she can't get near it. Find the Pot of Silence at Memum Corridor and scatter Kupole Vita's Purification Powder to look for the condensed evil energy and eliminate it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Vita mengatakan bahwa energi jahat dari Pot of Silence sangat kuat dia tidak bisa mendekatinya. Temukan Pot of Silence di Memum Corridor dan sebarkan Kupole Vita's Purification Powder untuk mencari energi jahat yang terkumpul dan hancurkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Destroy the Pot of Silence
Philip's Soldiers: Hancurkan Pot of Silence

Philipas' Soldier: The ominous energy of the Pot of Silence has subsided. Now, destroy the Pot of Silence.
Philip's Soldiers: Energi jahat Pot of Silence telah hilang. Sekarang, hancurkan Pot of Silence.

Philipas' Soldier: The demonic energy around here has subsided. Now, destroy the Pot of Silence.
Philip's Soldiers: Energi jahar sekitar sini telah hilang. Sekarang, hancurkan Pot of Silence.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that rushed in
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang datang

Philipas' Soldier: While attempting to destroy the Pot of Silence, the demons rushed in. Defeat all demons that rushed in.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat mencoba menghancurkan Pot of Silence, demon masuk. Kalahkan semua demon yang datang.

Philipas' Soldier: You've destroyed the Pot of Silence. Return to Kupole Vita.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah menghancurkan Pot of Silence. Kembali ke Kupole Vita.

Philipas' Soldier: Unfree Beings
Philip's Soldiers: Unfree Beings

Philipas' Soldier: Although the Pot of Silence is destroyed, you still cannot tell what the spirits are trying to say. Ask Kupole Vita what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun Pot of Silence hacnur, kamu masih tidak tahu apa yang ingin disampakan oleh spirit. Tanyakan Kupole Vita apa yang dilakukan selanjutnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Look for spirits wishing to speak to you
Philip's Soldiers: temukan spirit yang ingin mengatakan sesuatu padamu

Philipas' Soldier: Kupole Vita told you that it would be good idea to look for other spirits and listen to what they have to say. Look for spirits hoping to share their story in detail.
Philip's Soldiers: Kupole Vita memberitahu bahwa ide yang bagus untuk mencari spirit yang lain dan mendengarkan apa yang akan mereka katakan. Cari tahu lebih lanjut sprit yang ingin menmbagi cerita mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Hand them over to the Rimos' Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Serahkan ke Rimos' Spirit

Philipas' Soldier: You've collected every skeletons binded to the contract. Return to the Rimos' Spirit.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telag mengumpulkan tengkorak yang berhubungan dengan kontrak. Kembali ke Rimos' Spirit.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with the Rimos' Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rimos' Spirit

Philipas' Soldier: The Rimos' Spirit told you that the skeletons can be purified by gathering them and cremating them. Now ask him what you should do with the gathered skeletons.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimos' Spirit mengatakan tengkorak bisa di purifikasi dengan mengumpulkan dan mengekremasinya. Sekarang tanyakan padanya apa yang harus kamu lakukan dengan tengkorak yang sudah ada.

Philip's Soldiers: Bakar Contract of Flesh

Philipas' Soldier: The Rimos' Spirit told you that in order to terminate the contract, the skeletons binded to the contract should be cremated together with the Contract of Flesh using holy powers. Look for the Contract of Flesh at Sataruti Hall and burn the contract.
Philip's Soldiers: Rimos' Spirit menatakan untuk mengalahkan contract, tengkorak yang terikat dengan contract harus dikremasi bersamaan dengan Contract of Flesh menggunakan kekuatan suci. Temukan Contract of Flesh di Sataruti Hall dan bakar contract.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to the Rimos' Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Lapor ke Rimos' Spirit

Philipas' Soldier: You've burned the skeletons binded to the contract along with the Contract of Flesh. Return to the Rimos' Spirit and talk to him.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah membakar tengkorak yang terikat dengan contract dan Contract of Flesh. Kembali ke Rimos' Spirit dan bicara dengannya.

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that you've terminated the Contract of Flesh. Now, listen to the Rimos' Spirit on what you should do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Seperti yang telah mengalahkan Contract of Flesh. Sekarang, dekarkan Rimos' Spirit tentang langkah selanjutnya.

Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Master Genie di Garubingal Burial Chamber

Philip's Soldiers: Fluttering Threads of Destiny

Philip's Soldiers: Tertulis sesuatu di atas tablet, tapi k amu tidak punya bahan untuk menulisnya. Coba lihat apakah ada sesuatu yang berguna milik Wendigo Sorcerers.

Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya ada yang tertulis diatas tablet, tapi tidak ada bahan untuk membuat catatan. Temukan bahan yang berguna dekat Wendigo Sorcerers.

Philipas' Soldier: As you looked at the tablet, the monsters suddenly rushed in. Defeat them and make rubbings of the tablet.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu melihat tablet, monster menyerang masuk. Kalahkan mereka dan buat rubbing dari tablet.

Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang menyerang masuk

Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimana Eat a Kepa

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Adrijus di The Central Sanctum

Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, itu adalah cerita saat kota dulunya dimiliki oleh manusia. {nl}Para monster lebih cepat menerapkan dari manusia.

Philipas' Soldier: We can't even find the traces of the bodies of the victims who were {nl}sacrificed on the day of Ruklys' rebellion due to Petrifying Frost.{nl}Those angry souls are deeply permeated into the city.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak bisa menemukan jejak tubuh korban yang dikorbankan pada hari pemberontakan Rukly karena Stone Frosts.{nl}Tapi, jiwa yang marah itu sangat meresap ke dalam kota.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please light the bonfire that I set at Vienti Fortress.{nl}I may get a chance to talk to the spirits.
Philip's Soldiers: Nyalakan api unggu yang aku siapkan di Vienti Fortress.{nl}Aku mungkin bisa mencari jejak ruh.

Philipas' Soldier: I've put the scent of butterflies that can be obtained from the deep inside Kateen Forest into the bonfire. {nl}It has the power to comfort the souls.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sudah meletakkan bau kupu-kupu yang bisa didapatkan dari bagian paling dalam Kateen Forest kedalam api unggun. {nl}Kekuatannya menenangkan para jiwa.

Philipas' Soldier: Even if one is in danger, if one knows that help is coming,{nl} one will have the extra energy to endure longer.
Philip's Soldiers: Walaupun seseorang dalam bahaya, jika seseorang tahu bantuan akan datang,{nl} orang lain akan mempunyai tambahan energi  untuk bertahan lebih lama.

Philipas' Soldier: A suitable end for a crazy magician. It could have been dangerous without the defensive magic.{nl}He probably operated the wrong line, without knowing the first valve was destroyed...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Akhir yang cocok untuk penyikir yang gila. Akan berbahaya tanpa pertahanan magis.{nl}Mungkin dia mengoperasikan jalur yang salah, tanpa mengetahui katup pertama hancur...{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Anyway, that's great.{nl}Since we've dealt with Antares, let's go up.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus itu.{nl}Karena kita berurusan dengan Antares, ayo pergi.

Philipas' Soldier: He was always curious about the secret of the tower.{nl}The reason why he was imprisoned was because he was too obsessed with that secret.
Philip's Soldiers: Dia selalu penasarang dengan rahasia menara.{nl}Alasan kenapa dia terkurung karena dia terlalu terobsesi dengan rahasia itu.

Philipas' Soldier: I think I can find a way if I have some Red Infrorocktor cores. {nl}I should be able to do something with those even without using magic.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bisa mencari jalannya jika aku mempunyai Red Infrorocktor cores. {nl}Aku bisa melakukan hal itu walaupun tanpa magis.

Philipas' Soldier: I am sorry, but I can't explain the details.{nl}All I can say is if we use magic, we will be discovered by the demons.
Philip's Soldiers: Maaf, aku tidak bisa menjelaskan detailnya.{nl}Yang bisa aku katakan kalau aku menggunakan sihir, kita akan menemukan para setan.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you just see that monster explode?{nl}That's definitely strange. It's as if the power of its essence is out of control.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu lihat monster itu meledak?{nl}Itu sangat aneh. Seperti kekuatan intinya lepas kendali.

Philipas' Soldier: That vibration from a while ago keeps distracting me.{nl}I hope it's nothing.
Philip's Soldiers: Getaran itu dari tadi mengalihkan perhatianku.{nl}Mudah-mudahan bukan apa-apa.

Philipas' Soldier: When the demons' attacks started becoming serious, the goddess prepared this in advance.{nl}Fortunately, the device is working alright.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat serangan demon mulai menjadi serius, Goddess kemudian menyiapkan ini.{nl}Untungnya, alat ini bekerja dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: We're almost at the final floor so we just have to press forward a little more.{nl}The goddess must be enduring more than we are.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita hampir di lantai akhir jadi kita hanya menekannya sedikit lagi.{nl}Goddess pasti lebih kuat daripada kita.

Philipas' Soldier: The Jewel of Prominence is now alright.{nl}I am... relieved.
Philip's Soldiers: Jewel of Prominence sekarang aman.{nl}Aku... lega.

Philipas' Soldier: You... you are the one Goddess Gabija is looking for!{nl}Please help me. If things continue as they are, we could lose the goddess and the Mage Tower to the demons.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu... Kamu yang dicari Goddess Gabija!{nl}Bantu aku. Jika keadaan terus seperti ini, kita bisa kehilangan Goddess dan Mage Tower ke para demon.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: In the past, the demons have aimed to take the Mage Tower.{nl}Though, we were always able to stop their attacks whenever they attacked.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Di masa lalu, para demon mengincar mengambil Mage Tower.{nl}Walaupun, kita selalu bisa menghentikan serangan mereka saat mereka menyerang.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But now it's different. Most of the wizards are either dead or have run away.{nl}Only Gabija and a few wizards are still remaining in the tower, protecting it.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi sekarang berbeda. Banyak penyihir mati atau kabur.{nl}Hanya Gabija dan beberapa penyihir yang masih ada di menara, sebagai pelindung.

Philipas' Soldier: This is the entrance to the tower.{nl}I won't be able to use magic, but I will definitely take you to Goddess Gabija.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini pintu masuk menara.{nl}Aku tidak akan bisa menggunakan sihir, tapi aku pasti akan membawamu ke Goddess Gabija.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Are you ready?
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu siap?

Philipas' Soldier: Gabija has not disappeared completely.{nl}To protect the tower from the demons, she just had to hide herself.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Gabija belum hilang sepenuhnya.{nl}Untuk melindungi menara dari para demon, dia harus sembunyi sendiri.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Because Agailla Flurry could not find her successor, she managed the tower.{nl}To protect a precious thing... she sacrificed herself.
Philip's Soldiers: Karena  Agailla Flurry tidak bisa menemukan pendahulunya, dia menyelamatkan menara.{nl}Untuk melindungi hal yang berharga... Dia mengorbankan dirinya.

Philipas' Soldier: I can do this alone.{nl}Until Gabija regains her powers again, I will maintain the tower here.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bisa melakukan ini sendirian.{nl}Hanya Gabija mendapatkan kekuatannya lagi, aku akan menjaga menara disini.

Philipas' Soldier: Okay, go to the fifth floor.{nl}Please pass the Jewel of Prominence to Gabija!
Philip's Soldiers: Okay, pergi ke lantai lima.{nl}Serahkan Jewel of Prominence ke Gabija!

Philipas' Soldier: This cannot be done without me.{nl}I will somehow manage to hold the tower up, so please pass the Jewel of Prominence to Gabija!
Philip's Soldiers: Ini tidak bisa dilakukan tanpaku.{nl}Aku akan berusaha menjaga menara, jadi berikan Jewel of Prominence ke Gabija!

Philipas' Soldier: What was that vibration?{nl}Could it be...
Philip's Soldiers: Getaran apa itu?{nl}Mungkinkah...

Philipas' Soldier: It's the vibration again!{nl}Antares... Now I know. When he exploded, the magic of the tower was disrupted.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Getaran itu lagi!{nl}Antares... Sekarang aku tahu. Saat dia meledak, sihir menara terganggu.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The tower will collapse if we leave it like this.{nl}Let's quickly go to the Magic Control Room!
Philip's Soldiers: Menara akan runtuh jika kita meninggalkannya seperti ini.{nl}Ayo cepat pergi ke Magic Control Room!

Philipas' Soldier: We should be careful from here.{nl}This floor used to be where Antares' laboratory was located.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita harus hati-hati disini.{nl}Lantai ini dulunya tempat laboratorium Antares.

Philipas' Soldier: I feel uneasy.{nl}Maybe, Antares has been released by the attacks of the demons...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku merasa tidak enak.{nl}Mungkin, Antares lepas karena serangan para demon...

Philipas' Soldier: I will do the work until Gabija retrieves her power.{nl}Go quickly!{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan bekerja sampai Gabija mendapatkan kembali kekuatannya.{nl}Cepatlah pergi!{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We have no choice.{nl}We should give up on the Transport Magic Circles, and instead destroy the monsters that are rushing in.
Philip's Soldiers: Kita tidak ada pilihan.{nl}Kita harus menyerahkan Transport Magic Circles, dan hancurkan para monster yang menyerang masuk.

Philipas' Soldier: Well done.{nl}However, this jewel is just an empty shell.{nl}You can complete it by empowering it with various materials.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus.{nl}Tapi, jewel ini kosong.{nl}Kamu bisa menyelesaikannya dengan memperkuatnya dengan bahan yang berbeda.

Philipas' Soldier: Lastly, we need to collect Flame Sources.{nl}You can obtain them from the monsters that possess the power of fire.
Philip's Soldiers: Terakhir, kita perlu mengumpulkan Flame Sources.{nl}Kamu bisa mendapatkannya dari para monster yang mempunyai kekuatan api.

Philipas' Soldier: I can feel a strange energy.{nl}It seems that the status of the Jewel of Prominence is not normal.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku bisa merasakan energi aneh.{nl}Sepertinya status Jewel of Prominence tidak normal.

Philipas' Soldier: If Antares had used that power correctly, the Mage Tower would have not turned out like this.{nl}It is such a shame.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika Antares menggunakan kekuatan itu dengan benar, Mage Tower tidak akan menjadi seperti ini.{nl}Memalukan sekali.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh yeah. There is also a diluting solution that I've ordered from the Item Merchant in Fedimian.{nl}Can you also bring that?
Philip's Soldiers: Oh yeah. Ada cairan pengencer juga yang aku pesan dari Item Merchant di Fedimian.{nl}Bisakah kamu membawa itu juga?

Philipas' Soldier: To glue stone together, we often use the sticky resin of Infrogalas Mages.{nl}But, you can't find them easily at the Namu Temple Ruins.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk menempelkan batu, kami biasanya  menggunakan damar lengket Infrogalas Mages.{nl}Tapi, sulit untuk kamu temukan di Namu Temple Ruins.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It would be easier to lure one from the sky than to try finding one without using a food box.{nl}Alternatively, you could just go to Viltis Forest.
Philip's Soldiers: Akan lebih mudah memancing yang ada di atas daripada mencoba menemukan tanpa menggunakan kotak makanan.{nl}Kalau tidak, kamu bisa pergi ke Viltis Forest.

Philipas' Soldier: When you go into the monastery, let's first secure the entrance of Prayer Room.{nl}I will leave when you are ready.
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kamu pergi ke dalam biara, amankan terlebih dahulu pintu masuk Prayer Room.{nl}Aku akan pergi jika kamu siap.

Philipas' Soldier: The old body of me can't endure as I unlocked two barriers consecutively.{nl}Shall we go to Prayer Room now?
Philip's Soldiers: The old body of me can't endure as I unlocked two barriers consecutively.{nl}Shall we go to Prayer Room now?

Philipas' Soldier: It is so fortunate to see you are okay. {nl}Now, we should move the abbot out.
Philip's Soldiers: Untung sekali kamu tidak apa-apa. {nl}Sekarang, kita harus memindahkan abbot.

Philipas' Soldier: Prayer Room can't be opened from outside unless a person comes out from the room.{nl}That's why we should endow the sacred energy into the crystal sphere of the monastery when there is an emergency to let Prayer Room know.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Prayer Room tidak bisa dibuka dari luar kecuali ada orang yang keluar dari ruangan.{nl}Karena itulah kita harus memberkari energi suci kedalam crystal sphere biara saat ada keadaan darurat akan memberitahu Prayer Room.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Moheim is in charge of the crystal sphere. {nl}He is probably around the reception room.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Moheim menjaga crystal sphere. {nl}Mungkin dia ada sekitar reception room.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The abbot in Prayer Room won't know about this.{nl}We should call him out through the crystal sphere.
Philip's Soldiers: Abbot di Prayer Room tidak akan tahu tentang ini.{nl}Kita harus memanggilnya melalui crystal sphere.

Philipas' Soldier: I will get the Activation Core
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan mengambil Activation Core

Philipas' Soldier: I will go to the Goddess
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan pergi ke Goddess

Philipas' Soldier: What are you going to do if you can't use the spell?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa yang akan kamu lakukan jika kamu tidak bisa menggunakan mantera?

Philipas' Soldier: Why the spell can't be used
Philip's Soldiers: kenapa manteranya tidak bisa digunakan

Philipas' Soldier: Notice/Read the Memo from Hones!#5
Philip's Soldiers: Notice/Cobalah baca memo yang diberikan Honest!#5

Philip's Soldiers: Dikepung Musuh

Philip's Soldiers: Reclaim the Camp (1)

Philipas' Soldier: I will bring it
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membawanya

Philipas' Soldier: I can't do that
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak bisa melakukan itu

Philipas' Soldier: Reclaim the Camp (2)
Philip's Soldiers: Reclaim the Camp (2)

Philipas' Soldier: Help collect equipments.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu mengumpulkan perlengkapan.

Philipas' Soldier: Do not help.
Philip's Soldiers: Tidak membantu.

Philipas' Soldier: Reclaim the Camp (3)
Philip's Soldiers: Reclaim the Camp (3)

Philipas' Soldier: I'm not yet ready
Philip's Soldiers: Aku belum siap

Philipas' Soldier: Reclaim the Camp (4)
Philip's Soldiers: Reclaim the Camp (4)

Philipas' Soldier: I will set up a defensive facility.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan membangun fasilitas pertahanan.

Philipas' Soldier: Reclaim the Camp (5)
Philip's Soldiers: Reclaim the Camp (5)

Philipas' Soldier: Send it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kirim.

Philipas' Soldier: Give it a thorough thought.
Philip's Soldiers: Berpikir keras.

Philipas' Soldier: Ignore it.
Philip's Soldiers: Acuhkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Persuading/TALK/0/TRACE_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Sedang mempersuasi/TALK/0/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Showing the trap/TRADE_GIVE/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None
Philip's Soldiers: Sedang memperlihatkan perangkap/TRADE_GIVE/1/TRACK_BEFORE/None

Philipas' Soldier: Showing the trap
Philip's Soldiers: Menunjukkan jebakan

Philipas' Soldier: Let's go
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo

Philipas' Soldier: Let's take a rest for a while
Philip's Soldiers: Istirahat dulu sebentar

Philipas' Soldier: Let's go to the Prayer Room
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo pergi ke Prayer Room

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 1F
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Grita di Mage Tower 1F

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 2F
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Grita di Mage Tower 2F

Philipas' Soldier: You should be able to gather the Essences of Fire when Flame Vapor is let out of the jewel. Fill the Jewel of Prominence with these essences.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu melepaskan Flame Vapor, akan mengumpulkan Essences of Fire. Penuhi Jewel of Prominence dengan bau ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 3F
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Grita di Mage Tower 3F

Philipas' Soldier: It seems that the magician Antares is loose. Defeat the Red Infrorocktor that Antares has summoned.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya penyihir Antares kalah. Kalahkan Red Infrorocktor yang di summon Antares.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Grita at Mage Tower 4F
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Grita di Mage Tower 4F

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat monsters and watch the state of the Jewel of Prominence.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster dan lihat status Jewel of Prominence.

Philipas' Soldier: The Jewel of Prominence's status is unusual. Talk to Grita again.
Philip's Soldiers: Status Jewel of Prominence aneh. Bicara dengan Grita lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Activate the Magic Stabilizer
Philip's Soldiers: Aktifkan Magic Stabilizer

Philipas' Soldier: You stabilized the Jewel of Prominence using the stabilizer but the Jewel is still emitting an unusual aura. Ask Grita what to do about it.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mensbilkan Jewel of Prominence menggunakan stabilizer tapi Jewel masih menggeluarkan aura aneh. Tanyakan Grita apa yang harus dilakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: Find the Magic Control Room
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan Magic Control Room

Philipas' Soldier: The Jewel of Prominence is stabilized but the explosion at the 3rd Floor has made the Mage Tower unstable. Go to the Magic Control Room to control the disrupted magic of the Tower.
Philip's Soldiers: Jewel of Prominence stabil tapi ledakan di 3rd Floor telah membuat Mage Tower tidak stabil. Pergi ke Magic Control Room untuk mengendalikan sihir Tower yang terganggu.

Philipas' Soldier: Protect Grita while she is stabilizing the magic.
Philip's Soldiers: Lindungi Grita saat dia menstabilkan magic.

Philipas' Soldier: Grita said we have to go to the Magic Control Room. Protect Grita while she stabilizes the magic.
Philip's Soldiers: Grita bilang kira harus pergi ke Magic Control Room. Lindungi Grita saat dia menstabilkan magic.

Philipas' Soldier: You defeated all the monsters, but the Tower is still shaking. Ask Grita what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengalahkan semua monster, tapi Tower masih bergetar. Tanyakan Grita apa langkah selanjurnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated all the monsters that threatened Grita. Ask Grita what to do next.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan semua monster yang mengancam  Grita. Tanyakan Grita langkah selanjutnya.

Philipas' Soldier: Go to Mage Tower 5F
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi ke Mage Tower 5F

Philipas' Soldier: Grita told you to give the Jewel of Prominence to the goddess while she takes care of the tower. Go to the 5th floor of the Mage Tower where the goddess is located.
Philip's Soldiers: Grita memintamu memberikan Jewel of Prominence ke Goddess saat dia menjaga tower. Pergi ke lantai 5th Mage Tower tempat Goddess berada.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Grinender that is blocking the way to the 5th Floor
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Grinender yang menghalangi jalan ke 5th Floor

Philipas' Soldier: Collect Rambear Claws
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Rambear Claws

Philipas' Soldier: Thief Hubertas asked you to get Rambear Claws to give to the Royal Army.
Philip's Soldiers: Thief Hubertas memintamu mengambil Rambear Claws untuk diberikan ke Kingdom Military.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve the Activation Core of Petrification Detector
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Activation Core Petrification Detector

Philipas' Soldier: Cryomancer Kostas says he needs the Activation Core of Petrification Detector to amplify the Mark of Silt. Examine the abandoned Petrification Detectors in Palaikai Forkroad and retrieve the Activation Core of the one that reacts to the Mark of Silt.
Philip's Soldiers: Cryomancer Kostas bilang dia membutuhkan Activation Core Petrification Detector untuk memperkuat Mark of Silt. Periksa Petrification Detectors yang ditinggalkan di Palaikai Forkroad dan dapatkan Activation Core yang bereaksi dengan Mark of Silt.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieved a usable Activation Core of Petriciation Detector. Give it to Cryomancer Kostas.
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Activation Core of Petriciation Detector. Berikan ke Cryomancer Kostas.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters nearby Estuary Bank Junction
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan  monster sekitar Estuary Bank Junction

Philipas' Soldier: Graverobber Stephonas is looking for someone to help him in the central district of Petrified City.
Philip's Soldiers: Graverobber Steponas mencari seseorang untuk membantunya di pusat kota Petrified City.

Philipas' Soldier: Retrieve the Cough Medicine
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan Cough Medicine

Philipas' Soldier: Wilhelmina Carriot asked you to retrieve the Cough Medicine that the monsters took away for the soldiers who were swept by the Petrifying Frost.
Philip's Soldiers: Wilhelmina Carriot memintamu mendapatkan Cough Medicine yang diambil monster dari tentara yang dikalahkan oleh Stone Frost.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect %s from monsters in Vienti Fortress
Philip's Soldiers: Vienti Fortress

Philipas' Soldier: Light a bonfire in Vienti Fortress
Philip's Soldiers: Nyalakan api unggun di Vienti Fortress

Philipas' Soldier: Bokor Edita asked you to light the bonfires in Vienti Fortress to console the Frosted souls in this city.
Philip's Soldiers: Bokor Edita memintamu menyalakan api unggun di Vienti Fortress untuk menghibur jiwa Frosted  di kota ini.

Philipas' Soldier: You lighted the bonfire as Edita asked. Return to Edita.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah menyalakan api unggu yang diminta Edita. Kembali ke Edita.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Rubabos
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Rubabos

Philipas' Soldier: Alchemist Saliamonas asked you to defeat the Rubabos that are destroying the ruins in Nebekia Fortress.
Philip's Soldiers: Alchemist Saliamonas memintamu mengalahkan Rubabos yang menghancurkan reruntuhan di Nebekia Fortress.

Philipas' Soldier: You've defeated Rubabos as requested by Saliamonas. Return to Saliamonas.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengalahkan Rubabos seperti yang diminta Saliamonas. Kembali ke Saliamonas.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat Arma that mocked the Sealed Stone
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan Arma yang menghina Sealed Stone

Philipas' Soldier: The Sealed Stone asked you to defeat the Arma that mocked it. Defeat Arma for the Stone.
Philip's Soldiers: Sealed Stone memintamu mengalahkan Arma yang menghinanya. Kalahkan Arma untuk Stone.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeated Arma that mocked the Stone. Report to the Stone.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkaned Arma yang menghina Stone. Lapor ke Stone.

Philipas' Soldier: Disciple Hones says that Shadowgaler has the Soul Crystal which is the key to finding the teacher's legacy. Use the Eye of Truth to find Shadowgaler and defeat it.
Philip's Soldiers: Disciple Hones bilang Shadowgaler mempunyai Soul Crystal yang merupakan kunci untuk menemukan peninggalan guru. Gunakan Eye of Truth untuk menemukan Shadowgaler dan Kalahkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Hones' Memo : Go to the Shrine of Remembrance if you've collected all the Magic Stone of Contract fragments. You can restore the Magic Stone in the preservation magic tile.
Philip's Soldiers: Hones's Memo : Pergi ke Shrine of Remembrance kalau kamu telah mengumpulkan semua pecahan Magic Stone of Contract. Kamu bisa mendapatkan kembali Magic Stone di  preservation magic tile.

Philipas' Soldier: Jane's spirit and Archon will be freed when you stop the Magic Stone of Interaction. You can weaken the Archon by using the seal that supress the Spell power on the Archon.
Philip's Soldiers: Spirit Jane dan Archon akan bebas jika kamu menghentikan Magic Stone of Interaction. Kamu bisa melemahkan Archon dengan menggunakan seal yang menekan kekuatan Spell Archon.

Philipas' Soldier: You need to restore the weathered tombstone. Throw the red poison bottle to the monster to get Sticky Acid Fluid and get the diluent from the Item Merchant in Fedimian.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu harus mendapatkan kembali weathered tombstone. Lemparkan botol racun merah ke monster untuk mendapatkan Sticky Acid Fluid dan dapatkan pencair dari Item Merchant in Fedimian.

Philipas' Soldier: Use the food boxes the Blacksmith gave you to lure Infrogalas Mages that you can defeat for sticky resin. {nl}You can also directly hunt for Infrogalas Mages in Viltis Forest.
Philip's Soldiers: Gunakan kotak makanan yang diberikan Blacksmith untuk memancing Infrogalas Mages yang bisa kamu kalahkan untuk sticky resin. {nl}Kamu bisa juga langsung memburu  Infrogalas Mages di Viltis Forest.

Philipas' Soldier: Go to the next area
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi ke area selanjutnya

Philipas' Soldier: Go to the next area with Amanda
Philip's Soldiers: Pergi ke area selanjutnya dengan Amanda

Philipas' Soldier: Get out from the monsters' raid
Philip's Soldiers: Keluar dari sarang monster

Philipas' Soldier: Get out from the monsters' raid.
Philip's Soldiers: Keluar dari sarang monster.

Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Kingdom Army Guard Delus

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Royal Army Guard Delus.
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Kingdom Army Guard Delus.

Philipas' Soldier: Reclaim the Camp
Philip's Soldiers: Dapatkan kembali Camp

Philipas' Soldier: Bring the Royal Army Guard who fell behind
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa Kingdom Military Guard yang tertinggal

Philipas' Soldier: Bring the Royal Army Guard who fell behind.
Philip's Soldiers: Bawa Kingdom Military Guard yang tertinggal.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the Royal Army Guard Delus
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Kingdom Military Guard Delus

Philipas' Soldier: Check the Royal Army Guard corpse and collect equipment
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa jasad Kindom Military Guard dan kumpulkan equipment

Philipas' Soldier: Check the bodies of the Royal Army Guards sieged by the monsters and collect equipment.
Philip's Soldiers: Periksa jasad penjaga Kingdom Military yang dikepung monster dan kumpulkan equipment.

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters occupying the camp
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang menguasai camp

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Delus
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Delus

Philipas' Soldier: Set up a defense facility
Philip's Soldiers: Dirikan fasilitas pertahanan

Philipas' Soldier: Set up a defense facility to defend the camp
Philip's Soldiers: Dirikan fasilitas pertahanan untuk mempertahankan camp

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters attacking
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang menyerang

Philipas' Soldier: Protect Amanda from the monsters attacking
Philip's Soldiers: Lindungi Amanda dari monster yang menyerang

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to Amanda
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Amanda

Philipas' Soldier: Defeat the monsters that raided the Kingcom Military guards.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalahkan monster yang menyerang penjaga Kingcom Military.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the General's soul
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan General's soul

Philipas' Soldier: Talk to the General's soul
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan General's soul

Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mengumpulkan cukup racun dari thorny tress. Sekarang, kumpulkan racun dari kolam.

Philipas' Soldier: Pilgrim Julius suddenly turned into a Drapeliun after seeing the music box. Calm down the Drapeliun that is attacking by reducing its HP below 50% and persuading it.
Philip's Soldiers: Pilgrim Julius tiba-tiba berubah menjadi Drapeliun setelah melihat kotak musik. Tenangkan Drapeliun yang menyerang dengan mengurangi HPnya dibawah 50% dan rayu dia.

Philipas' Soldier: Penitence Route of Great Cathedral
Philip's Soldiers: Penitence Route of Great Cathedral

Philipas' Soldier: Tenant Farmer Weiss hid the seeds that he secretly grew, but he can't go get them due to the monsters. Please bring the seed pouch from the Farm Plaza.
Philip's Soldiers: Tenant Farmer Weiss menyembunyikan bibit yang diam-diam dia tanam, tapi dia tidak bisa memanennya karena monster. Bawa kantong bibit dari Farm Plaza.

Philipas' Soldier: It is too dried so the juice doesn't come out anymore!
Philip's Soldiers: terlalu kering jadi juice tidak keluar lagi!

Philipas' Soldier: Collecting the bushes
Philip's Soldiers: Mengumpulkan semak

Philipas' Soldier: You've obtained well dried bushes!
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah mengumpulkan semak kering!

Philip's Soldiers: kamu ditipu oleh thorns of bushes!

Philipas' Soldier: Digging up the Metal Plate
Philip's Soldiers: Menggali Metal Plate

Philipas' Soldier: You fell down while you were digging up the Metal Plate, but you've digged it well!
Philip's Soldiers: kamu jatuh saat menggali Metal Plate, tapi kamu sudah menggalinya!

Philipas' Soldier: Monsters suddenly appeared near the Metal Plate!
Philip's Soldiers: Monster tiba-tiba muncul dekat Metal Plate!

Philipas' Soldier: You've dug the Metal Plate well!
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah menggali Metal Plate!

Philipas' Soldier: If I am going to fall tomorrow, I don't care if I risk my life today.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan jatuh besok, aku tidak peduli jika mengorbankan hidupku hari ini.

Philipas' Soldier: I am sure that they brought them to Drasos Chapel Ruins, but since we can't leave this place, we are going to die due to hunger.{nl}I am sorry, but can you retrieve the stolen supplies for us?
Philip's Soldiers: Aku yakin mereka membawanya ke Drasa Worship Ruins, tapi karena kita tidak bisa meninggalkan tempat ini, kita akan mati karena kelaparan.{nl}Maaf, bisakah kamu mendapatkan kembali pasokan yang telah dicuri dari kami?

Philipas' Soldier: When we were in the era of Premier Eminent, we were supported by the superior troops, lots of supplies and etc.{nl}But, 600 years have passed after Premier Eminent died.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saat kita ada di era Premier Eminent, kita dibantu oleh pasukan hebat, banyak pasokan dan lain.{nl}Tapi, 600 tahun telah berlalu setelah Premier Eminent mati.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Would dead people come back if the curse is cured in this city?{nl}No, but the times after now are more important.
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah orang yang mati akan kembali jika kutukan disembuhkan di kota ini?{nl}Tidak, tapi waktu setelahnya yang lebih penting.

Philipas' Soldier: I understand their loyalty for the kingdom, but when I see them make people do impossible things that lead to deaths...{nl}I don't know who is the monster anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku mengerti kesetiaan mereka pada kerajaan, tapi saat aku melihatnya membuat orang melakukan yang tidak mungkin yang menyebabkan kematian...{nl}Aku tidak tahu siapa monsternya.

Philipas' Soldier: If you could help me...{nl}Maybe we could save them even if they are cursed with the petrification. Although they may lose their arms.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu bisa membantuku...{nl}Mungkin kita bisa menyelematkan mereka walaupun mereka telah dikutuk, dengan purification. Walaupun mereka bisa kehilangan tangan mereka.

Philipas' Soldier: Did you defeat it? Great job!{nl}Now I don't have to fear this place being torn down until another monster shows up.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu mengalahkannya? Kerja yang bagus!{nl}Sekarang aku tidak takut jika tempat ini hancur sampai monster lain muncul.

Philipas' Soldier: Have you met Wilhelmina at Kovos Hall Site before?{nl}She is in charge of the Knights of Kaliss, but she is full of hatred towards the Royal Army Guards.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu sudah pernah bertemu Wilhelmina di Kovos Hall?{nl}Dia penanggungjawab Knights of Kaliss, tapi dia sangat benci dengan tentara kerajaan.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We are in a good relationship with her since we work well together.{nl}We were able to plan this since she helped us well.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hubungan kami dengannya baik sejak kita bekerja sama.{nl}Kita bisa merencanakan ini karena dia membantu  kita.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Can you hand over the records to Wilhelmina that you've brought?{nl}We told them that we would help penetrate into Gargoyle so don't forget to receive something before you come here.
Philip's Soldiers: Bisakah kamu serahkan catatan yang kamu bawa ke Wilhelmina?{nl}Kami mengatakan bahwa akan membantu menyerang kedalam Gargoyle jadi jangan lupa menerima sesuatu sebelum kamu datang kesini.

Philipas' Soldier: Finally, the records which weren't in hands of the Royal Army Guards are here.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Akhirnya, catatan yang ada di tangan tentara kerajaan ada disini.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This is... a love letter? {nl}I don't need it so you can take it or throw it away.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini.. Surat cinta? {nl}Aku tidak memerlukan jadi kamu bisa mengambil atau membuangnya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Hmm... It contains most of what we need. {nl}Please give this scroll to Amanda.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Hmm... Berisi hal yang kita butuhkan. {nl}Serahkan scroll ini ke Amanda{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: This is the scroll designed to face against Gargoyle.{nl}The sounds won't leak out no matter what  you do anything inside so you won't be detected by Royal Army Guards.
Philip's Soldiers: Scroll ini didesain untuk menghadapi Gargoyle.{nl}Suara tidak akan keluar apapun yang kamu lakukan didalam jadi kamu tidak akan ketahuan oleh tentara kerajaan.

Philipas' Soldier: The Knights of Kaliss possesses many competent wizards.{nl}They will give us what we need.
Philip's Soldiers: Knights of Kaliss mempunyai banyak keahlian sihir.{nl}Mereka akan memberikan apa yang kita butuhkan.

Philipas' Soldier: Scroll?{nl}I thought she'd give us something like Balista or a magicial weapon...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Scroll?{nl}Kukira dia memberikan kita sesuatu seperti Balista atau senjata magis...{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But, this is the most effective method for now isn't it?
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi, ini cara yang paling efektif saat ini kan?

Philipas' Soldier: Please get rid of Gargoyle.{nl}I need to pack my bag at the Fortress of the Land.{nl}It will not be hard for you.
Philip's Soldiers: Singkirkan Gargoyle.{nl}Aku harus merapikan tasku di Fortress of the Great Earth.{nl}Akan tidak sulit untukmu.

Philipas' Soldier: Object?{nl}Ah, it's nothing special, but it is a Monocle that enables one to see the true nature of the special force.{nl}We will be able to find the room with the treasure easily with it.
Philip's Soldiers: Benda?{nl}ah, bukan masalah besar, itu namanya Monochle yang dapat membantu melihat bentuk asli dari suatu kekuatan khusus.{nl} Jika punya benda itu maka dapat dengan mudah mencari ruangan yang berisi harta karun bukan?

Philipas' Soldier: Object?{nl}Ah, it's nothing special, but it is a Monocle that enables one to see the true nature of the special force.{nl}We will be able to find the room with the treasure easily with it.
Philip's Soldiers: Benda?{nl}ah, bukan masalah besar, itu namanya Monochle yang dapat membantu melihat bentuk asli dari suatu kekuatan khusus.{nl} Jika punya benda itu maka dapat dengan mudah mencari ruangan yang berisi harta karun bukan?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The scroll Wilhelmina gave us is awesome!{nl}I didn't hear a thing even from right beside.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Scroll Wilhelmina yang diberikan ke kita luar biasa!{nl}Aku tidak dengar apapun bahkan dari samping.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Shall we enter the Fortress of the Land?{nl}Let's meet inside.
Philip's Soldiers: Haruskah kita masuk Fortress of the Great Earth?{nl}Ketemu didalam.

Philipas' Soldier: Spears are mighty and never lose.{nl}I want to see the guy's pitiful face after Shadow Gailer is dead.
Philip's Soldiers: Tombak besar dan tidak pernah kalah.{nl}Aku ingin melihat muka menyedihkan orang itu setelah Shadow Gailer mati.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard a monster called Biteregina is threatening people at Manocle Grave.{nl}What do you think? I hope you think of it as the price for learning my skills.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dengar monster bernama Biteregina mengancam orang di Manocle Grave.{nl}Bagaimana menurutmu? Aku harap kamu menganggap itu sesuasi dengan harga belajar skill ku.

Philipas' Soldier: If you were to pick between a gun and a spear, which one would you choose?{nl}If I were you, I would choose both.
Philip's Soldiers: Kalau kamu harus pilih antara senjata dan tombak, yang mana akan kamu pilih?{nl}Jika aku kamu, aku akan pilih keduanya.

Philipas' Soldier: My soul is shredded and trapped in the seal. {nl}Defeat the Experimental Slime so I can get released.
Philip's Soldiers: Jiwaku runtuh dan teperangkap di seal. {nl}Kalahkan Experimental Slime jadi aku bisa lepas.

Philipas' Soldier: Those pieces of another me lost the voices to call you.{nl}Please find my voice again from Arma.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagianku yang lain kehilangan suara memanggilmu.{nl}Temukan suaraku lagi dari Arma.

Philipas' Soldier: Please release this seal.{nl}When you collect the Crystals of Restriction from Flask Mages and break them, the seal will be broken.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu lepaskan seal ini.{nl}Jika kamu mengumpulkan Crystals of Restriction dari Flask Mages dan menghancurkannya, seal akan rusak.

Philipas' Soldier: The contract needs to continue. Please release me.{nl}As those observers are defeated, my spirit becomes free.
Philip's Soldiers: Contract harus tetap berjalan. Bantu lepaskan aku.{nl}karena semua pengintai telah kalah, spiritku menjadi bebas.

Philipas' Soldier: I am here and all over the world.{nl}My soul was torn into pieces long ago.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku disini dan seluruh penjuru dunia.{nl}Jiwaku terpecah pecah menjadi potongan sudah lama.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Where are my other pieces...
Philip's Soldiers: Dimana potonganku yang lain...

Philipas' Soldier: Are you talking about the fire pot? I know it.{nl}But, I can't give it to you for free. Unless you could get me the condensed oil from Saknis Plains from Blue Puragis...
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu membicarakan tentang pot api? Sudah kuduga.{nl}Tapi, aku tidak bisa memberikannya begitu saja. Kecuali kamu bisa mengambilkan condensed oil dari Saknis Fields from Blue Puragis...

Philipas' Soldier: For my future disciple, I have prepared a nice gift at Starving Demon's Way.{nl}I hope you like it.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk calon muridku, aku sudah menyiapkan kado bagus di Starving Demon's Way.{nl}Semoga kamu suka.

Philipas' Soldier: Very nice indeed.{nl}You have no problem understanding my spells.
Philip's Soldiers: Memang bagus.{nl}Kamu memahami manteraku dengan baik.

Philipas' Soldier: The Thaumaturge Master told me to give it to you.{nl}If you hadn't done it, I would have kept it for myself... Such a pity.
Philip's Soldiers: Thaumaturge Master memintaku memberi ini.{nl}Kalau kamu belum melakukannya, pasti aku simpan untuk diriku.. Sayang sekali.

Philipas' Soldier: I don't really mind the rumors, but do people really believe that a spell can preserve your youth? {nl}Well, maybe it can but... {nl}Ah, I don't want to talk about it anymore.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak  mencemaskan isu, tapi apa benar orang percaya mantera bisa bikin kamu awet muda? {nl}Hmm, mungkin bisa tapi.. {nl}Ah, aku tidak mau bicara lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: For the people who go on the way of the pilgrim with hope, this curse is so much pain for them.{nl}We don't even know the true nature of the curse so I am so mad.
Philip's Soldiers: Untuk orang yang pergi ke jalan pilgrim dengan harapan ,kutukan ini lebih sakit bagi mereka.{nl}Kita tidak tahu asal kutukan sebenarnya jadi aku sangat marah.

Philipas' Soldier: I was so mad that there were no Revelators back then.{nl}But, after hearing that some Revelator saved the Mage Tower, my thoughts changed.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sangat marah tidak ada Savior dibelakang sana.{nl}Tapi, setelah mendengar bahwa beberapa Savior menyelamatkan Mage Tower, pikiranku berubah.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think the goddess may come back when they complete their duties and I complete mine.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku rasa Goddess akan kembali setelah tugas mereka dan aku menyelesaikan tugas.

Philipas' Soldier: I didn't expect that the true intent of the curse cast on this forest is after the Great Cathedral.{nl}Fortunately, we were able to stop the curse due to one Revelator, but I feel ashamed.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak menyangka tujuan sebenar kutukan pada hutan ini mengincar Great Cathedral.{nl}Untungnya, kita bisa menghentikan kutukan karena satu Savior, tapi aku merasa malu.

Philipas' Soldier: The curse here is serious, but there are other places where the influence of the curse is more severe. {nl}The city of Ruklys... I heard everything there turns into stone due to the curse of petrification.
Philip's Soldiers: Kutukan disini serius, tapi ada tempat lain dimana pengaruh kutukan lebih parah. {nl}Kota Ruklys... Aku dengar apapun disana berubah menjadi batu karena kutukan petrificasi.

Philipas' Soldier: I think it was my fault that I left the Mage Tower to save the people after Medzio Diena.{nl}Maybe, instead of the Revelator, I could've saved the tower.
Philip's Soldiers: Kurasa memang salahku meninggalkan Mage Tower untuk menyelamatkan orang setelah Medzio Diena.{nl}Mungkin, daripada Savior, aku  bisa menyelamatkan tower.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard the story about the Revelator who stopped the Demon Lord at the Great Cathedral who casted the curse in this region.{nl}I guess... now there won't be any more people who suffers from the curse.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dengar cerita tentang Savior yang menghentikan Demon Lord di Great Cathedral yang melakukan kutukan di region ini.{nl}Kurasa... Sekarang tidak ada lagi yang menderita karena kutukan.

Philipas' Soldier: I've been to many places before in my life, but this place is really horrible.{nl}Even if I want to rescue the ones who are cursed, the only thing I can do is to help them fall asleep comfortably.
Philip's Soldiers: Sepanjang hidupku aku sudah ke banyak tempat, tapi tempat ini benar-benar buruk.{nl}Walaupun aku ingin menyelamatkan yang terkena kutukan, yang bisa aku lakukan hanyalah membantu mereka tertidur dengan nyaman.

Philipas' Soldier: I heard a Revelator defeated the Demon Lord attacking the Mage Tower.{nl}That's the most positive news I've heard lately.{nl}All the other news I've heard were horrible.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku dengar Savior mengalahkan Demon Lord yang menyerang Mage Tower.{nl}Itu kabar paling baik yang aku dengar belakangan ini.{nl}Semua berita lain yang aku dengar buruk.

Philipas' Soldier: Is it true that some Revelator defeated the Demon Lord who casted the curse in this region?{nl}If that's true, it is so fortunate since we don't have to see those horrible things again.
Philip's Soldiers: Benarkan ada Savior mengalahkan Demon Lord yang mengutuk tempat ini?{nl}Jika itu benar, syukurlah karena kita tidak harus melihat hal mengerikan lagi.

Philipas' Soldier: Oh no... What was I doing?{nl}Ahhh. My Liliya...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Oh tu... Apa yang aku lakukan?{nl}Ahhh. Liliya-ku...{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Don't mess with the food piles.{nl} He should have shuffled over here by now... Just keep watching.
Philip's Soldiers: Jangan mainin tumpukan makanan.{nl} Seharusnya dia sudah datang sekarang... Tetap waspada.

Philipas' Soldier: While my brothers were on their way to train, they all died from the demons' tricks.{nl}I feel sorry for my brothers who can't return to the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saat Kakakku dalam perjalanan kereta, mereka semua mati karena tipuan demon.{nl}Aku merasa kasian dengan kakakku yang tidak bisa kembali ke Goddess.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: And they were so consumed with madness, even after their death, they could not even return to the goddesses.{nl}That's why I want to give them eternal sleep.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Dan mereka dipenuhi kemarahan, bahkan setelah kematiannya, mereka tetap tidak bisa kembali ke Goddesses.{nl}Karena itulah aku ingin memberikan mereka tidur yang panjang.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: It was really horrible. Those brothers who used to be kind to each other, hurt and killed each other...{nl}And the demons cheated those brothers who were not led to the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Benar-benar buruk. Bersaudara itu yang dulunya baik sekarang saling menyakiti..{nl}Dan demon mencurangi bersaudara itu yang tidak mengarah ke Goddesses.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: My brothers are blaming each other and crying out in madness even after their deaths.{nl}At the altar of the goddesses.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saudaraku saling menyalahkan dan berteriak gila bahkan setelah kematian mereka.{nl}Di altar Goddesses.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Death may be the price I pay for my sin. {nl}Even if it was due to the curse of the demons, it is still a sin I've committed.
Philip's Soldiers: Kematian mungkin harga yang harus aku bayar atas dosaku. {nl}Walaupun itu karena kutukan demon, tetap dosa yang aku lakukan.

Philipas' Soldier: I didn't want to... die like this... {nl}Mother...
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak mau.. Mati seperti ini.. {nl}Ibu..

Philipas' Soldier: I've realized after my death that my colleague left me because of the curse. {nl}This thing is now useless to me... Thank you.
Philip's Soldiers: Aku sadar setelah kematianku kolegaku meninggalkanku karena kutukan itu. {nl}Benda ini tidak berguna untukku sekarang.. Thank you.

Philipas' Soldier: Our squad is all dead because of my incompetence.{nl}I'm the only one left alive, but I don't that will stay true for long.
Philip's Soldiers: Pasukan kita semua mati karena ketidakmampuanku.{nl}Hanya aku yang hidup, tapi aku tidak mau hidup lebih lama.

Philipas' Soldier: It looks like you've done more than Roy's part.{nl}If it wasn't for you, we would not have been successful.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Sepertinya kamu sudah melakukan lebih banyak dari bagian Roy.{nl}Jika bukan karenamu, kita tidak akan berhasil.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: They're all either dead or outta here.{nl}I bet I'm the only one left on this floor. Those cowards.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka semua mati atau pergi dari sini.{nl}Taruhan pasti aku ditinggal sendirian di lantai ini. Dasar pengecut.

Philipas' Soldier: My body... Unfortunately, it doesn't belong to me.{nl}I regret my faults that I'd committed in the past because of my greed.
Philip's Soldiers: Tubuhku... Sayangnya, bukan milikku.{nl}Aku menyesali kesalahan yang aku lakukan di masa lalu karena kerakusanku.

Philipas' Soldier: I hope you are okay.{nl}We are all done, but you are not.
Philip's Soldiers: Semoga kamu baik-baik saja.{nl}Kami semua selesai, tapi kamu belum.

Philipas' Soldier: However...{nl}We can't set up a tombstone with only these ingredients.{nl}I've ordered some necessary tools from the Blacksmith and the Equipment Merchant in Orsha.
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi..{nl}tidak dapat mendirikan monumen dengan material ini saja tentunya.{nl} Aku telah memesan peralatan pada Blacksmith Orsha dan Equipment Merchant.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}Please get it for me.
Philip's Soldiers: {nl} Tolong temukanlah benda itu.

Philipas' Soldier: Be careful on your journey.
Philip's Soldiers: Hati-hati dalam perjalananmu

Philipas' Soldier: So Antanas sent you.{nl}Here's the hammer.
Philip's Soldiers: Orang yang datang karena dikirim oleh Antanas rupanya.{nl} Ini Hammer yang dipesan olehnya.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm relieved we got it back. {nl}I finally get to see the holy relic, even after death.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku lega kita kembali. {nl}Akhirnya aku bisa melihat holy relic, walaupun setelah kematian.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Please find my friend.{nl}I lived so hard until now, so I can't just die here.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu temukan temanku.{nl}Susah-susah aku hidup sampai sekarang, jadi aku tidak boleh mati disini.

Philipas' Soldier: Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit
Philip's Soldiers: Ruklys Army Officer's Spirit

Philipas' Soldier: Finally... The worst curse has been undone!
Philip's Soldiers: Akhirnya... Kutukan buruk telah dicabut!

Philipas' Soldier: Good.{nl}Since the hideout is safe now, you can leave the Fortress of the Land.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagus.{nl}Karena persembunyian telah aman sekarang, kamu bisa meninggalkan Fortress of the Great Earth.

Philipas' Soldier: Damn!{nl}We've lost the Fortress of the Land to those dirty demons!{nl}The magic circle... If we only have that magic circle...
Philip's Soldiers: Sakit hati!{nl} Karena Earth Castile direbut oleh para Demon menjijikkan itu!{nl} Magic Circle.. Kalau saja ada Magic Circle itu..

Philipas' Soldier: Yes... I can sense the same force like Ruklys within you..{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Begitu.. Terasa energi yang sama seperti tuan Ruklys pada dirimu..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I will give you the means to fight against the demons.{nl}I will open the portal for you so please protect our fortress..
Philip's Soldiers: Akan kuberikan jalan kepadamu untuk dapat melawan demon.{nl} Akan kubukakan portal untukmu, tolong lindungi benteng kami..

Philipas' Soldier: What are these scrolls...{nl}A defensive magic circle? I can only see pictures of strange magic fields.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Scroll-scroll apakah ini.. {nl}Defense Magic Circle? Tidak ada apapun selain gambar Magic Circle yang aneh.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: No demons would be able to obtain the revelation.
Philip's Soldiers: Demon apapun itu tidak dapat menerima Revelation.

Philipas' Soldier: {nl}The only letters that I can recognize are the ones about how to activate the magic circle and how to repair it.{nl}The battlefield? Where is that place...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: {nl}Tulisan yang terbaca tidak lebih dari cara memperbaiki dan mengoperasikan Pure Magic Circle ya.{nl}Battle Field? Itu ada dimana ya..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What? You are interested in the revelation?{nl}But there are nothing here that are related to it...{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Datanglah, Kau tertarik pada Revelation?{nl} Tetapi disini tidak ada cerita yang berhubungan dengan hal itu..{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: You better go to the other district first.{nl}I will look around more so let's meet at the habitants' area.
Philip's Soldiers: Pertama-tama alangkah baik jika pergi ke distrik lainnya.{nl} Hmm kalau begitu aku akan mengamati sedikit lagi disini, lalu bertemu lah di  Resident Quarter.

Philipas' Soldier: Okay. Let's look around again with the Monocle.{nl}If you can see some special force, then there will be something like the treasure of Ruklys.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Nah. Haruskah kita coba memeriksa ke arah Monochle kembali?{nl} Jika terlihat suatu kekuatan unik, maka ada sesuatu harta karun milik Ruklys disana.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Maybe, we would be able to find the revelation which you are looking for.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimanapun apakah dapat menemukan sesuatu yang kamu cari yang disebut Revelation itu?

Philipas' Soldier: Can you bring more of these old bombs?{nl}I am not trying to use them for malicious purposes. I just want to do some research.
Philip's Soldiers: Bisakah kamu membawakan bom tua ini?{nl}Aku tidak mencoba menggunakannya untuk tujuan buruk. Aku hanya ingin meneliti.

Philipas' Soldier: I will give you the tools to dismantle the bomb.{nl}If you break the detonator with those, you can bring the bombs safely.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku akan memberikanmu alat untuk menjinakkan bom.{nl}Kalau kamu memecahkan detonator dengan itu, kamu bisa membawa bom dengan aman.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I don't know how you found this bomb, but I think they've used a metal detector.{nl}When you investigate more with that, maybe we could find some remains.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Aku tidak tahu bagaimana kamu menamukan bom inim tapi aku rasa mereka mengggunakan deteksi metal.{nl}Kalau kamu menyelidiki menggunakan itu, mungkin kamu bisa menemukan sisanya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Find the bombs using this metal detector and use the tools I gave to you to break the detonator.{nl}Then you would able to bring them safely. I am counting on you!
Philip's Soldiers: Temukan bom menggunakan detector metal dan gunakan alat yang aku berikan untuk merusak detonator.{nl}Lalu kamu bisa membawanya dengan aman. Aku mengharapkanmu!

Philipas' Soldier: This must be more than a few hundreds years old.{nl}What were they trying to do with this bomb...{nl}Anyway, thanks!
Philip's Soldiers: Ini pasti lebih dari ratusan tahun.{nl}Apa yang mau mereka lakukan dengan bom ini...{nl}Oh iya, thanks!

Philipas' Soldier: By the way, what is the thing that you are looking for?{nl}I guess it's important since you don't say anything about it.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Tetapi apakah yang sebenarnya kamu cari?{nl} Melihat kamu tidak berbicara apapun, sepertinya itu sesuatu yang penting ya?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Anyway, let's go deeper inside.{nl}You should tell me later. Okay?
Philip's Soldiers: Ayo cari lebih dalam.{nl}Kamu harus memberitahuku nanti. Okay?

Philipas' Soldier: Did you find something special from the demons?{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Apakah kamu menemukan sesuatu yang unik dari Demon?{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: What? There isn't anything?
Philip's Soldiers: Apa, Tidak ada?

Philipas' Soldier: Revelator. {nl}After Medzio Diena, Vakarine's power has become weak, so we have to protect her.
Philip's Soldiers: Savior. {nl}Setelah Medzio Diena, kekuatan Vakarine telah melemah, jadi kita harus melindunginya.

Philipas' Soldier: This is not the world of the humans nor the world of demons, but another space of Vakarine...{nl}We have imprisoned the demons inside this prison who are evil to the world.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ini bukan dunia manusia ataupun dunia demon, tapi dimensi lain Vakarine..{nl}Kita telah menahan demon di dalam penjara ini yang merusak dunia.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: However, after Medzio Diena, Vakarine didn't have the power left to maintain this space.{nl}As you can see, this space is gradually collapsing and the dimensional crack is getting wider.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Namun, setelah Medzio Diena, Vakarine tidak punya kekuatan untuk mempertahankan tempat ini.{nl} Seperti yang bisa kamu lihat, tempat ini perlahan runtuh dan pecahan dimensi mulai membesar.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The Demon Lords who are locked in this prison are trying to escape here.{nl}Other demons who came here through the dimensional crack are joining them as well.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Demon Lord yang terkunci di penjara ini mencoba kabur.{nl}Demon lain yang datang ke sini melalui pecahan dimensi juga bergabung dengan mereka.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Vakarine desperately needs your help.{nl}Please help us with your strength to defeat the demons at this prison.
Philip's Soldiers: Vakarine sangat membutuhkan bantuanmu.{nl}Bantu kami dengan kekuatanmu untuk mengalahkan demon di penjara ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Please first stop the demons that are trying to release the Demon Lord Blut that is locked here.
Philip's Soldiers: Bantu hentikan demon yang mencoba melepaskan Demon Lord Blut yang terkunci disini.

Philipas' Soldier: Demon Lord Blut's servants are trying to help him escape here. {nl}Hauberk's help will be useful this time.
Philip's Soldiers: Pembantu Demon Lord Blut mencoba membantu melepaskannya dari sini. {nl}Bantuan Hauberk akan sangat membantu saat ini.

Philipas' Soldier: Right now, Kupole Zydrone is holding down Blut. {nl}But since Vakarine's power has waned after Medzio Diena, we are not like what we were before.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Saat ini, Kupole Zydrone sedang menahan Blut. {nl}Tapi karena kekuatan Vakarine telah menyusut setelah Medzio Diena, kita berbeda dari sebelumnya.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: Fortunately, Blut hasn't been completely freed yet...{nl}However, we don't know how much longer we can endure by ourselves.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Untungnya, Blut belum benar-benar bebas...{nl}Namun, kita tidak tahu berapa lama kita bisa menahannya lagi.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: We have to somehow weaken the power of the Demon Lord Blut.{nl}I am sure his allies set the camp near Bjaurer Hideout.{nl}Please get the mark of Blut that they hold.
Philip's Soldiers: Bagaimanapun caranya kita harus melemahkan kekuatan Demon Lord Blut.{nl}Aku yakin sekutunya mendirikan camp dekat Bjaurer Hideout.{nl}Bantu ambilkan tanda Blut yang mereka pegang.

Philipas' Soldier: Our original duty was to supervise and manage the prison.{nl}But... now, we are trying our best to just hold back the demons. {nl}No matter what it takes.
Philip's Soldiers: Tugas awal kita adalah mengawasi dan mengatus penjara.{nl}Tapi... Sekarang, kami mencoba sebaik mungkin untuk menahan para demon. {nl}Apapun resikonya.

Philipas' Soldier: So you are the one who Vakarine talked about.{nl}Well done. Everything will be done with goddess' will.
Philip's Soldiers: Jadi kamu yang dibicarakan Vakarine.{nl}Bagus. Semuanya akan selesai dengan keinginan Goddess.

Philipas' Soldier: We've locked Blut across this barrier.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Blut dikunci dibelakang dinding ini. {nl}Sekarang, kita harus meruntuhkannya. Kamu siap?

Philipas' Soldier: No demon besides Blut knows more about Vakarine's weakening than we do.{nl}Blut is not completely freed yet, so we now have an opportunity to get rid of him.{nl}
