Philip's Soldiers: Kamu dapat mengumpulkan sisa bahan untuk membuat Rune Stone {nl}dari beberapa monster di Tyla Monastery.{nl}Ingat, dapatkan Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment, {nl}Velaphid's Cold Blood dan Pumpleflap's Robust Horn.

Philipas' Soldier: I see you've gathered all of the materials.{nl}Now, let's start with creating a Rune Stone.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semuanya.{nl}Mari kita mulai membuat Rune Stone.

Philipas' Soldier: This is your Rune Stone.{nl}Now you will be able to use magic of the Rune Caster.
Philip's Soldiers: Ini Rune Stonemu.{nl}Sekarang kamu bisa menggunakan magic of the Rune Caster.

Philipas' Soldier: It's a success!{nl}If Hauberk has any thought of doing so, he wouldn't have wasted any time in harming me.{nl}Let's hope he does so.
Philip's Soldiers: Berhasil!{nl}Jika Hauberk ada sesuatu yang ingin dilakukan, dia pasti tidak perlu menggangguku.{nl}Mudah-mudahan dia ada kerjaan.

Philipas' Soldier: It may have been thanks to Goddess Austeja, but this region was safe from Medzio Diena.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Berkat Goddess Austeja, daerah ini aman dari Medzio Diena.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: But the goddess hasn't come again afterwards...{nl}The monsters are also becoming a nuisance and making everyone feel nervous.
Philip's Soldiers: Tapi goddess belum pernah kembali setelah itu...{nl}Para monster juga semakin menyebalkan dan meresahkan.

Philipas' Soldier: I'm thinking of quiting beekeeping and look for another job because of the monsters.{nl}But the villagers say that this is supposed to be safer than other places... {nl}I can't imagine how it must be elsewhere.
Philip's Soldiers: Gara-gara monster itu aku sempat berpikir untuk berhenti beternak lebah dan mencari pekerjaan lain.{nl}Tapi orang-orang desa bilang di sinilah satu-satunya tempat paling aman daripada daerah lain... {nl}Tak bisa kubayangkan bagaimana di daerah laen

Philipas' Soldier: They say that the goddess made a seal at Uskis Arable Land and Spring Light Woods.{nl}The villagers expected an flock of monsters because of the honey... {nl}But I think it is because of the seal.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka bilang bahwa goddess telah membuat seal di Uskis Arable Land dan Spring Light Woods.{nl}Orang desa kira kawanan monster itu disebabkan oleh madu... {nl}Tapi menurutku ini karena adanya seal.

Philipas' Soldier: Cleopas and the villagers...{nl}They keep creating problems with the priests because {nl}the monsters are interrupting the beekeeping.{nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Cleopas dan orang-orang desa...{nl}Mereka sibuk bersama para priest {nl}karena para monster itu merusak peternakan lebah mereka.{nl}

Philipas' Soldier: I think that we should stand together at a time like this...{nl}Somehow I don't think that'll happen unless Goddess Austeja comes back.
Philip's Soldiers: Dalam situasi seperti ini semestinya kita bersatu...{nl}Kadang aku pikir ini tidak akan pernah terjadi jika Goddess Austeja kembali.

Philipas' Soldier: They say that the Owl Sculptures placed around the {nl}forest are there to make sure that souls don't get lost.{nl}Some kind of sculptor supposed to have sculpted them alone...{nl}It's impressive that he managed to make all of them.
Philip's Soldiers: Mereka bilang bahwa Owl Sculptures disimpan di sekitar hutan{nl}untuk memastikan soul-soul itu tidak hilang.{nl}Beberapa sculptor biasanya membuatnya sendirian...{nl}Mengesankan bahwa mereka telah menciptakan semuanya.

Philipas' Soldier: There had been some tales of meeting the lost souls...{nl}But lately they are a more common sight. {nl}
Philip's Soldiers: Ada beberapa cerita tentang bertemunya jiwa-jiwa yang telah hilang...{nl}Tapi akhir-akhir ini itu merupakan hal yang umum. {nl}

Philipas' Soldier: The monsters are also attacking more than before.{nl}What in the name of the goddess happened out there...
Philip's Soldiers: Para monster juga lebih sering menyerang daripada sebelumnya.{nl}Apa yang telah terjadi di sana...

Philipas' Soldier: The Rune Caster and the Rune Stone [Rune Caster Advancement]
Philip's Soldiers: Rune Caster dan Rune Stone [Rune Caster Advancement]

Philipas' Soldier: Ask what the materials are
Philip's Soldiers: Tanyakan apa saja bahan-bahannya

Philipas' Soldier: If you had saved all of the sealed souls in the sealed stones past the Mage Tower, you will be able to receive the last mission from the sealed stone on the way to the Great Hall of Keturidu.
Philip's Soldiers: Jika kamu telah menyimpan semua sealed souls yang terdapata di dalam sealed stones melalui Mage Tower, kamu akan dapat menerima misi terakhir dari sealed stone dalam perjalanan ke Great Hall of Keturidu.

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with the Rune Caster Master
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rune Caster Master

Philipas' Soldier: Talk with the Rune Caster Master at the Goddess' Ancient Garden.
Philip's Soldiers: Bicara dengan Rune Caster Master di Goddess' Ancient Garden.

Philipas' Soldier: Collect Rune Stone materials from Tyla Monastery
Philip's Soldiers: Kumpulkan Rune Stone materials dari Tyla Monastery

Philipas' Soldier: The Rune Caster Master says that you must collect the materials for the Rune Stone required to cast Rune Magic. Collect Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment, Velaphid's Cold Blood and Pumpleflap's Robust Horn from Tyla Monastery.
Philip's Soldiers: Rune Caster Master menyuruhmu mengumpulkan bahan-bahan yang dibutuhkan Rune Stone untuk dapat mengeluarkan Rune Magic. Kumpulkan Malstatue's Evil Energy Fragment, Velaphid's Cold Blood dan Pumpleflap's Robust Horn dari Tyla Monastery.

Philipas' Soldier: Report to the Rune Caster Master
Philip's Soldiers: Laporkan pada Rune Caster Master

Philipas' Soldier: You have collected all required materials. Return to the Rune Caster Master and hand them over.
Philip's Soldiers: Kamu telah mengumpulkan semua bahan-bahannya. Kembali pada Rune Caster Master dan serahkan semuanya.
